Title: In the Kharkiv direction, the enemy twice tried to advance in the Vovchansk area
Description: This is in the operational information of the General Staff of the Armed Forces of Ukraine as of 22:00 on March 4. the Russian invaders carried out 40 airstrikes using 59 anti-aircraft missiles. In addition, the Russians used 783 kamikaze drones to attack and carried out 3,828 attacks on the positions of our troops and populated areas. On the Kharkiv direction, the enemy twice tried to advance in the Vovchansk region, but was repulsed. In the Kupyansk direction, the enemy carried out three assaults on the positions of our defenders in Petropavlivka, Pischany and Boguslavka districts. Ukrainian defenders repelled all attacks. On the Lymanskyi direction during the day, Russian invaders attacked Ukrainian positions 14 times near the settlements of Novomykhailivka, Grekivka, Nove, Novolyubivka, Yampolivka and Dibrova, one skirmish continues until now. In the Kramatorsk direction one enemy attack continues in the direction of Stupochky. In the Toretsk direction, the Russians attacked the positions of the Defense Forces ten times. The occupiers concentrated their efforts near the settlements of Dachne and Toretsk. At the moment, six clashes have ended. In the Pokrovsky direction, invading units tried 17 times to break through our defenses near the settlements of Promin, Lysivka, Sergiivka, Ulakly, Andriivka, Oleksiivka. The enemy carried out an air strike in the Horyhovoy area. In the Novopavlovsk direction, the enemy attacked our positions near Constantinople and Rozdolny ten times, two skirmishes continue until now. Sichneve, Novopavlivka, Oleksiivka and Ivanivka were hit by guided air bombs. The enemy twice attacked the positions of our defenders in the area of ​​Privilny and Charivny in the direction of Gulyaipil. At the same time, they carried out airstrikes on Komyshuvas, Gulyaipol and Zaliznychny. In the Orichivsk direction, our troops repelled seven enemy attacks in the Nesteryanka, Novodanilivka and Kamiansky areas, and two more clashes are still ongoing. In the Dnieper direction the enemy launched one unsuccessful attack, and Lviv was under air strike. In the Kursk region Ukrainian defenders repelled 30 enemy attacks. In addition, the enemy carried out 18 air strikes with the use of 28 guided bombs, and also carried out 364 artillery attacks on the positions of our troops and populated areas. The General Staff of the Armed Forces of Ukraine honored the soldiers of the 128th Separate Territorial Defense Brigade -Dike Pole- and the 34th Separate Coastal Defense Brigade, who steadfastly deter the enemy.

Title: -Historical turning point-: the expert explained the importance of the European rearmament plan
Description: This opinion was expressed by a lawyer, a serviceman of the Armed Forces of the Ukrainian Armed Forces, Oleksandr Musienko, in a conversation with an ArmyInform correspondent. -In the context of the fact that the USA is now suspending its aid to Ukraine, the consolidation of Europe is very important and necessary. It should be understood that the security of Europe directly depends on the security of Ukraine,- says Oleksandr Musienko. He emphasizes that if before some of the Europeans had unnecessary illusions that the USA is ready to provide its help at any moment and is the guarantor of Europe's security, now such confidence is disappearing. -Because it is not a fact that the United States will be ready to defend Europe. Today it is a shock for Europe what is happening and the decisions that the United States is making. But this shock should mobilize. Maybe someone is scared, someone is afraid, does not know what to do among European politicians. So: to do what is needed now is to consolidate around Ukraine and, together with Ukraine, oppose Russian aggression, which is a threat to Europe,- the interlocutor emphasizes. At the same time, according to Oleksandr Musienko, -challenges have intensified- because the United States really wants to reduce its military presence in Europe. -It is for this purpose that the plan for the rearmament of Europe was developed and presented. This is an unprecedented event, it is about 800 billion euros. The plan will involve more investment in the production of weapons in Europe, will involve cooperation between European countries, cooperation, complementarity and replacement of those components and means that are lacking. I would call this program a new industrialization, because a lot will be invested in the defense industry itself, the purchase of weapons, first of all, air defense systems, artillery ammunition, drones. This is what Ukraine really needs now,- the expert says. In his words, this is -truly a historical turning point for Europe.- -It's good that it's happening. Of course, in this way we can hope that, in particular, after the summit in London, the countries of Europe become closer to the idea of ​​a united army and united around Ukraine.- At the same time, Oleksandr Musienko calls it -strange- that the Baltic countries were not invited to the summit in London. -This is probably the only negative that can be said about this event. Other decisions are important. In particular, Britain's adoption of an air defense aid package. These are billions of pounds, which Britain will urgently allocate now and help Ukraine. It is important now to state this consolidation of Europeans and the proposal to create an appropriate coalition — a reboot, let's say, of the anti-Putin coalition,- the interlocutor summarized. Oleksandr Musienko once again emphasized that it is important to hold the summit after the visit of the President of Ukraine to Washington: because it -shows that Ukraine is not alone - Europe is with us.- As ArmiyaInform wrote, on March 4, the President of the European Commission, Ursula von der Leyen presented a plan for the rearmament of the European Union (ReArm Europe) and support for Ukraine. It should be noted that at the summit in London with the participation of President Volodymyr Zelenskyi on March 2 discussed the challenges facing Ukraine and all of Europe, the struggle against Russian aggression and the search for ways to a just, sustainable peace. On the same day, it became known that Ukraine will be able to use 1.6 billion pounds of British export financing for the purchase of 5,000 more missiles for air defense systems.

Title: Higher education and management experience: how to get an officer rank for mobilized privates and se...
Description: Eligible opportunities apply during martial law and prescribed in the Order of the Minister of Defense No. 170. In particular, privates, sergeants, and senior officers who serve under the draft during mobilization can receive the rank of second lieutenant and be appointed to positions with the rank of colonel. Requirements: Of course, we are talking about positions that correspond to the profile of official activity, acquired experience and specialty. Such servicemen continue to undergo military service under the draft during mobilization, the document says. So there is no requirement to sign a contract. There is also no requirement that they undergo appropriate training before being appointed to the position. However, it will still be necessary to learn later. According to the instructions, in the future such servicemen will be sent to professional military education courses (L-courses) to obtain the appropriate levels of military education. It should be noted that the primary officer rank can be obtained by privates, sergeants and senior officers who have a higher education not lower than a bachelor. But they need to undergo military training under the officer training program. By the way, sergeants who do not have a higher education can also receive the rank of officer. To do this, you need to sign a contract, as well as have combat experience and experience as an officer. You can read about it in more detail here.

Title: Onslaught of the hybrid generation: the United States is testing a new reconnaissance vehicle that c...
Description: According to portal DefensePost, the next stage of testing took place at the annual exercise Combined Resolve 25-1 at the Joint Multinational Readiness Center in Hohenfels, Germany, during which the car was driven by servicemen from the 3rd Brigade of the 10th Mountain Division of the US Army. During the conducted practical tests, the high potential of the NGTV-H for performing complex reconnaissance operations was revealed, as the new vehicle allows soldiers to collect and transmit critical intelligence data on the battlefield in difficult conditions. The tests are part of the US Army's ongoing effort to modernize its capabilities to meet the changing demands of today's battlefield. The new equipment was delivered as part of the Transformation in Contact initiative, which allows testing new developments in conditions close to combat. This hybrid diesel-electric light reconnaissance vehicle could be a potential replacement for the legendary Humvee, which has served the military for more than 40 years. Market analysts emphasize the fact that the new NGTV-H vehicle was presented at the annual conference of the Association of the US Army only in October 2024. While there is currently no formal requirement to replace the Humvee, the NGTV-H's hybrid electric technologies could meet the Army's new needs for mobility and energy efficiency. The NGTV-H is based on the Chevrolet Silverado 3500HD ZR2 platform. It is equipped with a Duramax engine with an advanced 12-module battery, supplemented by motors on the front and rear axles, which is already used in the Army's Infantry Squad Vehicle. The car combines a diesel engine with an electric battery capable of producing up to 300 kilowatt-hours of energy and has a 15-gallon (56.7 liter) fuel tank. One of the key advantages of the hybrid system is the -silent mode-. These features allow the NGTV-H to utilize Silent Drive and Watch technologies, greatly enhancing stealth capabilities. Thanks to the electric battery, the car can operate without engine noise, which is especially important in combat conditions. Switching between modes is carried out by pressing one key. This reduces the military's dependence on additional batteries: from 48 pounds (21.7 kg) of batteries per platoon during operations Desert Storm and Desert Shield, this figure has now increased to 1,200 pounds (544.3 kg). NGTV-H helps reduce this burden significantly. The car is equipped with numerous safety features, including rollover protection, anti-lock brakes, electronic stability control and advanced camera systems that provide a 360-degree view. The NGTV-H is designed to meet the challenges of today's battlefields, offering capabilities such as: The vehicle can be transported by C-130 and C-17 aircraft, as well as transported by CH-47 Chinook or MH-53 King Stallion helicopters. -Our NGTV-H represents a transformative mobile solution that offers significant tactical advantages through the use of GM's proven commercial technologies,- said Steve Dumont, president of GM Defense. Although the Army leadership is only beginning to integrate hybrid-electric technologies into combat vehicles, tests in Europe could speed up the process. The use of NGTV-H not only meets modern requirements for energy efficiency, but also opens up new opportunities for the application of such technologies on the battlefield. The testing of this hybrid tactical vehicle is another step in the direction of quieter, greener and more mobile military vehicles capable of meeting the future needs of the Army. Once fully operational, the new tactical vehicle is expected to significantly increase the stealth of reconnaissance operations and provide units with better mobility in difficult terrain. The US Army is testing a new Next Generation Tactical Vehicle-Hybrid (NGTV-H) hybrid pickup. Video: Defense News

Title: Lies until they get caught: enemy fakers spawned a scarecrow about -bloody ZSushniks-
Description: This -information creation- actively uses enemy resources, accompanied by edited screenshots of Ukrainian media. Allegedly, our fighter, returning from the front, opened fire on the child. Logic? What is the logic? The main thing is to spread panic and sow hatred for the Armed Forces. And now let's get down to the facts. The fake is based on a real event that happened in February 2023 in Boryslav. A man named Mykhailo Petrunyak, not a military man, but a civilian, fired a shot from a modified flare gun, wounding a 15-year-old boy in the thigh. The court found Petrunyak guilty and he received the appropriate punishment. But how to make the -terrible truth- about the -bloody ZSushniks- out of it? It's very simple: we take a real news item, add the words -fighter of the 21st OMBr- - and voila, a new narrative is ready. This is not the first time. Russian propaganda has tried more than once to link Ukrainian military crimes that they did not commit. This was the case with the fake about the -murder of the TCC employee- and with the alleged -punitive executions of civilians.- Everything is simple. The Ukrainian army is one of the main targets of the Russian information war. After all, strong, motivated soldiers supported by the people are what Moscow fears the most.

Title: A family of traitors - a couple of Russian spies went on trial in Kharkiv
Description: This was reported on March 4 by the prosecutor's office of the Kharkiv region. The woman was additionally charged with illegal acquisition, possession of a large amount of narcotic drug, committed repeatedly with the purpose of sale (Part 2 of Article 307 of the Criminal Code of Ukraine). The man is also accused of illegal acquisition and possession of a narcotic drug without the purpose of sale (Part 1 of Article 309 of the Criminal Code of Ukraine). Extras are a couple from Kharkiv. The guy and his girlfriend were recently convicted of property crimes and were serving time. According to the investigation, in December 2024 they established permanent contact with a representative of the Russian Federation. They communicated through the Telegram messenger. The Russian curator offered the participants to record the locations of the Ukrainian military, as well as the residences of SBU employees, for a reward, to which they voluntarily agreed. Under the guise of a romantic stroll through the city, a man and a girl secretly photographed and videotaped the specified objects and sent them to the representative of the Russian Federation. In addition, the girl had another -job-. She placed -bookmarks- with methadone around Kharkiv. Later, the person involved photographed the -hiding places- and passed on the information to clients. According to the investigation, the accused did not sell drugs. However, law enforcement officers found cannabis in his jacket. The perpetrators are awaiting sentencing while in custody. The accused will be tried in the Kyiv District Court of Kharkiv. They face up to twelve years in prison. As reported by ArmyInform, he put his own mother on trial - a master of the forest who became an enemy spy.

Title: Weather-dependent enemy assaults - the enemy attacks -under the weather- in Chasovoy Yar
Description: Ivan Petrychak, representative of the press service of the 24th separate mechanized brigade named after King Danylo, told about this on the air of the Yedyni Novyny telethon. According to him, the enemy storms -under the weather.- Snow, fog, rain - the enemy becomes more active, because then the -eyes- - Ukrainian UAVs - cannot see. -In normal weather, we detect these groups and destroy them far away on approaches. But when the weather worsens, they already have a chance to get closer to the positions of our infantry. Then there are shooting battles, the infantry enters the battle and cuts off the enemy. When drones can fly, they cut off the enemy on approaches,- Ivan Petrychak noted. As reported ArmyInform, in the Novopavlovsk direction, in the operational zone of the 37th separate marine brigade, compared to last week, enemy activity has decreased somewhat, the number of attacks has decreased.

Title: Ecocide in Donbas: the occupiers turn mines into a source of poisonous water

However, unauthorized mine water pumping will lead to groundwater and soil pollution, as well as landslides and subsidence. -The fact that the unauthorized pumping of mine waters does not lead to a local problem, but to a potential environmental disaster, does not stop the Kremlin's plans. It threatens nature, people's health and the stability of entire regions,- the Center of National Resistance emphasizes. Meanwhile, the Kalmius River has turned into a floating landfill for industrial emissions, domestic waste and sewage. This is happening against the background of a total fresh water crisis in the temporarily occupied territories. Title: -7 seconds to hell-: the sniper -Rio- told how he single-handedly stopped the assault of the occupie...
Description: The story of the fighter was made public on the brigade's page. -It took 7 seconds to repulse an enemy assault in Rubizhny,- says -Rio-. Then, at the beginning of a full-scale invasion, the enemy assault group consisted of seven invaders, five of whom were in his crosshairs. -I said hello to everyone. It all took 7 seconds — and the assault was over,- the fighter recalls. -Rio- is a person with positive energy. His nickname seems to hint at life on the beaches of Copacabana, surfing and football. However, in war he is a ruthless hunter who strikes fear into the enemy. -The main task of a sniper is to eliminate the enemy. How exactly - there are many options,- he explains. Among the main difficulties in the work of -Rio- singles out drones. -They are very disruptive. Especially with thermal imagers — they are constantly looking for our positions. You have to be careful. And you still have a lot of weight, constant cold. His -heap of weight- is about 40 kg of equipment: a sniper rifle, an assault rifle, camouflage materials, a supply of food and water, chargers, ammunition. Sniper -Rubigue- works with different calibers - from 308 to 50. However, he calls the UAR-10 rifle the main weapon: -It is a golden mean between range, accuracy and weight.- During the war, he eliminated enemies both at a distance of 10 meters and at 1100. But he notes that he is not chasing records. -The main thing is to complete the task,- he says. And he adds: -There is a sniper as long as there is wind.- As ArmyInform reported, -It's probably a little easier for me to fight because I'm a hunter,- says 33-year-old Olexandr. from 32 separate mechanized brigade. He spoke about his experience of fighting on the front lines, where -on the battlefield, every day seems like an eternity.-

Title: Motorcycles were used to get to Romania: a ferryman with a client was stopped in Transcarpathia
Description: informs about this. The perpetrator came up with a scheme according to which he and his client were to ride motorcycles to one of the tracts near the border, and then try to cross the snowy highlands on foot in order to get to Romania without the checkpoints. The Transcarpathian planned to receive 5,000 US dollars from the Lviv resident for such equipment. The law enforcement officers documented the fact of the transfer of these funds. -The shipper was detained in accordance with Article 208 of the Criminal Code of Ukraine. He has already been notified of the suspicion of committing a crime under Article 332 of the Criminal Code (illegal transportation of persons across the state border of Ukraine),- the report says. It is noted that the court decided to take the resident of Zakarpattia into custody for 60 days with the possibility of making bail in the amount of 605,000 hryvnias. He faces punishment in the form of deprivation of liberty for a period of seven to nine years. ArmyInform reminds that it is better not to break the law or risk your life, but to use the aggregator of vacancies in the Armed Forces and recruiting centers.

Three are thrown into one pit. Thanks to Vladimir Vladimirovich for our happy future!-, the operator comments on the situation. As reported by ArmyInform, in Kurshchyna a Russian pretended to be dead well, which surprised the pilots.

Title: Ukraine and America deserve a respectful dialogue and a clear position of each other - President
Description: The video address was published on the President's website. -Today, many have one question: what will happen next with help from America? I instructed the Minister of Defense of Ukraine, the heads of our intelligence, diplomats to contact their counterparts in the United States of America and get official information. People don't have to guess. Ukraine and America deserve a respectful dialogue, a clear position of each other. Especially when it comes to protecting lives during a full-scale war. Of course, we in Ukraine have received various signals for more than one week, and there was already a precedent for stopping aid. There was a stoppage of humanitarian and energy aid. There was also a stoppage of military aid — at the end of January, but then everything was quickly restored. We saw the risks. Therefore, our services — both military and special services — had time to work out algorithms for actions in case of any development of the situation. This is not the 22nd year. Now our resilience is higher. We have protection. But for us, normal, partnership relations with America are important for the real end of the war. None of us wants endless war. Ukraine will always be grateful to America for all the support it provided and continues to provide, and which works to preserve the currently rather fragile foundations of security in Europe. It's not just about our country. This is about everyone in Europe. We seek constructive cooperation. Partnership relations. One can only regret what happened in the White House instead of our negotiations. But we must find the strength to go on, respect each other, as we always respect America, Europe, all partners, and do everything together to bring peace closer. And I thank everyone who supports Ukraine in this. Today I already spoke with the President of Finland, with the Prime Minister of Great Britain, with the Prime Minister of Greece, with the Prime Minister of Croatia, with the Secretary General of NATO, with the leader of the German CDU party, Friedrich Mertz - this is the party that won the recent elections to the Bundestag. Clear support for Ukraine. Thank you. There is very important news from the European Commission regarding substantial funds for the defense of Europe. For us, this is primarily additional air defense — additional systems, additional missiles, an additional opportunity to defend our cities and villages, our positions. And all this creates a good additional basis for working to end the war. We will continue consultations, and there will be new joint steps. Ukraine deserves peace. Ukrainians deserve respect. And the last thing. We know that the Russians have not changed their positions and demands regarding Ukraine. They will demand the reduction of our army, they will want a legal relinquishment of our territories, as well as a significant political deformation of Ukraine with a weakening of the Ukrainian Constitution. And I will say that in fact, as long as we all in Ukraine stand together and firmly, as long as we are here, no one will succeed — the peace will be worthy,- assured Volodymyr Zelenskyy. As ArmiyaInform reported, Volodymyr Zelensky declared that he is ready to work under the leadership of Donald Trump for peace.

Title: Valery Churkin has created a system of combat experience analysis in the Defense Forces
Description: The Ministry of Defense of Ukraine informed about this on March 4. The system, called the VVD (Learning and Application of Experience) portal, makes it possible to adapt tactics, training programs and modernize weapons in accordance with the new challenges of war. Deputy Minister of Defense of Ukraine Valery Churkin said this during a speech at the conference -Lessons Learned in a Dynamic Defense Environment - 2025: How Combat Experience Changes the Approach to War-. new approaches to warfare. -We have already created an effective mechanism for gathering combat experience and applying it to the troops, which allows us to quickly adapt to new threats and develop advanced battle tactics. Now it is important not only to continue this process, but also to expand its capabilities,- Valery Churkin added. During the conference, which was organized by the public organization -Center of Excellence -Boriviter-- together with the Ministry of Defense and the General Staff of the Armed Forces of Ukraine, the participants discussed steps to expand the integration of combat experience into military planning. Ukraine is working on deepening cooperation with international partners, which will make it possible to implement the best global practices in the military sphere. As reported by ArmyInform, in the project -Report on damage- damages of 9000 enemy objects have already been recorded.

Title: Minus 30 occupiers and drone launch positions: the Armed Forces destroyed a Russian military facilit...
Description: informs the General Staff of the Armed Forces of Ukraine about this. As a result of the attack, enemy dugouts, firing positions and up to 30 military personnel who participated in hostilities against Ukraine were destroyed. This location was used to plan and conduct attacks, including launching FPV drones on Ukrainian positions. -The defense forces of Ukraine are ready to continue operations to destroy military facilities of the Russian Federation until it stops armed aggression against the Ukrainian people,- the message reads. As reported by ArmyInform, yesterday, March 3, the Air Force of the Armed Forces of Ukraine inflicted a high-precision strike on the point administration of the 98th Guards Airborne Division of the Russian Armed Forces in the village of Kalinin, Donetsk region.

Title: Volodymyr Zelenskyi said that he is ready to work under the leadership of Donald Trump for the sake ...
Description: He wrote about this on social networks on March 4. -We consider this agreement as a step towards strengthening security and reliable security guarantees, and I sincerely hope that it will work effectively,- the head of state said. He emphasized that Ukraine does not want an endless war, but strives for peace and is ready to sit down at the negotiating table as soon as possible to bring a reliable peace closer. The president added that no one wants peace more than Ukrainians. -My team and I are ready to work under the strong leadership of President Trump to achieve lasting peace. We are ready to work quickly to end the war,- Volodymyr Zelenskyy assured. As the head of state noted, the first stages could be the release of prisoners, an immediate truce in the sky: a ban on missiles, long-range drones, bombing of energy and other civilian infrastructure — and an immediate truce at sea if Russia does the same. -After that, we want to go through all the next steps very quickly and agree with the US on a strong final agreement,- he noted. According to him, Ukraine appreciates how much America has done to help preserve sovereignty and independence. And Ukrainians remember the turning point when US President Donald Trump gave Ukraine -javelins-, and are grateful for that. -Our meeting in Washington, at the White House, on Friday did not go as planned. It's unfortunate that this happened. It's time to do it right. We would like further cooperation and communication to be constructive,- said Volodymyr Zelenskyi. As reported by ArmyInform, the Verkhovna Rada of Ukraine officially applied to US President Donald Trump, Congress and the American people, thanking them for the previously provided military assistance.

Title: They are sitting in their burrows hungry and dehydrated - the Russians are not ready for assaults in...
Description: The head of the public affairs service of the 63rd mechanized brigade, senior lieutenant Rostyslav Yashshchyn, told this on the ArmiyaTV stream. -We are very actively working on the enemy's logistics and as a result we have the fact that the occupiers are sitting in their holes hungry and dehydrated. We recently showed a video of an exhausted Russian man walking around a field looking for bottles, trying to find either ice or water. We have intercepted the conversations of the Russians, that negotiations are underway to use the -brimstone- to go to the broken -loaves- and search, maybe some of the food has not burned,- said Rostyslav Yashchyshchyn. As reported by ArmyInform, fighters of the 61st Mechanized Steppe Brigade contributed to the destruction of Russian logistics in the Kursk region.

Title: Security guarantees and cooperation: the President of Ukraine talked with the leaders of Greece and ...
Description: He wrote about this on social networks on March 4. Volodymyr Zelenskyy informed Kyriakos Mitsotakis about the leaders' summit in London. The head of state said that they are working on a joint plan of practical actions that will make it possible to end the war as soon as possible, strengthen Ukraine and develop specific security guarantees. -We must move quickly and in a coordinated manner to bring about a just and lasting peace. The plan will be really strong and will represent a vision for the whole of Europe. The opinion of each of our partners is important to us. Thank you for your support and willingness to continue helping Ukraine,- he emphasized. He also had a conversation with the leader of the German CDU party, which won the elections to the Bundestag, Friedrich Merz. The parties coordinated positions and agreed on further cooperation and contacts. Volodymyr Zelenskyi thanked for the support. -We in Ukraine greatly appreciate Germany's efforts to restore European security and protect life in Ukraine. We remember that Germany is the leader in the supply of air defense systems to Ukraine and plays one of the leading roles in ensuring the financial stability of our state,- the President noted. As reported by ArmyInform, Volodymyr Zelenskyi in his evening address informed about the key decisions adopted during the Supreme Commander-in-Chief Staff meeting. The main attention was paid to the issues of defense capability, financial stability and state stability.

Title: The Russian army carried out an airstrike in the Kharkiv region, wounding a civilian
Description: The Kharkiv Regional Prosecutor's Office informs about this. In particular, the KAB hit the homestead. Private homes were damaged. -Under the procedural guidance of the Dergachy District Prosecutor's Office of the Kharkiv Region, a pre-trial investigation has been launched into the fact of committing a war crime (Part 1, Article 438 of the Criminal Code of Ukraine),- the message says. All possible and appropriate measures are being taken to document war crimes committed by Russian servicemen. As reported by ArmyInform, at night Russian troops made another massive attack on Odessa using attack drones. The attack damaged the city's energy infrastructure, leading to emergency power outages in some areas.

Title: The Commander-in-Chief of the Armed Forces posted footage of the work of our drones and gunners
Description: The Commander-in-Chief of the Armed Forces wrote about this on the evening of March 4. -The combat work of our gunners and drone operators effectively demonstrates to every Russian occupier that only death awaits him on Ukrainian soil. The fight continues! Glory to Ukraine!-, Oleksandr Syrsky noted and shared the following video: As reported by ArmyInform, the Commander-in-Chief of the Armed Forces estimated the losses of the occupiers since the beginning of the year amounted to almost 84 thousand people.

Title: A fighter - Azov - eliminates the occupier by roasting a Russian tank from the SSO: a stream from a ...
Description: They bought weapons from the Russians. The military counterintelligence of the SBU together with the soldiers of the 95th brigade of the DSH conducted a special operation. In the Kursk direction, they attacked a Russian soldier who agreed to sell weapons to our soldiers directly from his military unit. A video of Mirage flights appeared on the Internet. The fighters that France handed over to us are already performing combat missions. These and other topics are discussed by our presenters - junior lieutenant Volodymyr Kravchuk and lieutenant Yevhen Nazarenko.

Title: The Air Force struck the command post of the airborne division of the Russian Federation
Description: About this infoView recordmuGeneral Staff of the ZSU. It is noted that as a result of the defeat, the control system of the occupying forces was disrupted, which significantly complicated the coordination of the actions of the military units (subunits) of the airborne division. The Defense Forces of Ukraine continue to deprive the enemy of the opportunity to operate effectively on the battlefield, methodically destroying its command and logistics structures. -This operation is another step towards the destruction of the military potential of the aggressor and the liberation of Ukrainian land. The Armed Forces of Ukraine will not stop until the occupying army loses the ability to wage war,- the statement said. As reported by ArmyInform, the Unmanned Systems Forces of the Armed Forces of Ukraine, in cooperation with other components of the Defense Forces, on the night of March 4, 2025 inflicted damage on a number of important objects of the Russian aggressor.

Title: -The web of fate-: how the tank of the Iron Brigade withstood the impact of the FPV drone in the Kha...
Description: The tankers told this in a video posted on the brigade's page. The tank was moving together with its partner when the commander of the other vehicle reported on the radio: -A drop has arrived!- In a matter of seconds, the crew decided to withdraw to the waiting area. But it was at this moment that an enemy ammunition fell on the armor from above. The gunner saw it instantly: -I just looked - and it's right in front of me on the grid! Blue tape was visible.- The reaction was lightning fast: -Run inside!- shouted the commander. The crew closed the hatches and reported to command. Miraculously, the ammunition did not detonate, and the tank continued to move, even despite the technical problems. -The mechanic quickly found his way, we were left without a clutch, but somehow we rolled in sixth gear for eight or nine kilometers,- the fighters say. Miners, a trophy and a good mood When the crew reached the safe zone, everyone was ordered to move away from the car, because there was a threat of another reset. Sappers arrived at the scene - they neutralized the explosives, and the FPV drone remained as a trophy of the Ukrainian defenders. -We're all happy, everyone's laughing,- the soldiers say. And they add: skill, armor and a little luck - this is what helps to survive the war. As reported by ArmyInform, Ukrainian UAV operators staged a real safari on Russian positions, destroying three -kublas- of the invaders, as well as enemy technical means.

Title: They detained a group of arsonists who destroyed military vehicles in the Dnipro region on the order...
Description: reported this on March 4 Security Service of Ukraine As the investigation established, all four enemy henchmen are local residents aged 19 to 25 who were looking for -quick earnings- on Telegram channels. On one of these Internet resources, they were recruited by a representative of the Russian special service and offered money in exchange for cooperation. Further, the suspects received instructions from the FSB regarding the independent production of incendiary mixtures and a list of potential targets. -Under the crosshairs- of the enemy were pick-ups and multi-vans of the Armed Forces of Ukraine, which underwent maintenance in the front-line region after completing combat missions on the front line. According to available information, the intruders destroyed two official SUVs of the Defense Forces and were preparing to fulfill new orders from the occupiers. SBU officers detained the suspects at their places of residence. Instead of the promised funds from the Russian Federation, the perpetrators received a suspicion from the investigators of the Security Service for h. 2 Art. 28, ch. 1 Art. 114-1 of the Criminal Code of Ukraine (obstructing the lawful activities of the Armed Forces of Ukraine and other military formations committed by a group of persons following a prior conspiracy). The perpetrators are in custody. They face up to 8 years in prison. As reported by ArmyInform, a Russian arson agent was detained in Kropyvnytskyi.

Title: Hit the infantry with a game changer - in the Novopavlovsk direction, the dominance of drones decide...
Description: Denys Bobkov, senior officer of the communications department of the 37th separate brigade of the marines, told about this on the air of -Suspilny-. According to him, enemy assaults are still continuing. There were no significant changes in the enemy's tactics. The enemy continues to use -meat attacks- — they attack the positions of the Defense Forces with infantry. He does not use technology very actively, he prefers light vehicles - motorcycles, buggies, ATVs. All these -wheels- are hunted by Ukrainian drones. -Drones have really become a ``game changer''; on the battlefield We are very active in using unmanned aerial vehicles. We hit both the enemy's manpower and equipment. Dominance at low and medium altitudes is one of the key factors of successfully executed operations,- said the senior officer of the communications department of the 37th Separate Marine Corps Brigade. As ArmyInform reported, the situation in the Kharkiv direction is under control, and this control has been ongoing for the past month. All this time, the Defense Forces manage to destroy the offensive potential of the Russians.

Title: The occupiers looked for holes in the Ukrainian defense, and the Spartan fighters eliminated them
Description: The video showing the defeat of the occupiers appeared on page 3 of the operational brigade named after Colonel Petr Bolbochan of the Spartan State University. -We are using all available means to fight against the occupiers. In particular, drones and artillery to prevent the enemy from reaching our infantry positions,- defenders commented. As reported by ArmyInform, snipers of -Spartan- eliminated groups of Russians in the Pokrovsky direction.

Title: The Ministry of Defense has strengthened quality control of goods for the State Special Service of T...
Description: The Ministry of Defense of Ukraine reported this on March 4. Food and property, including ammunition and personal protective equipment, will be checked if the cost of their purchase exceeds a specified financial threshold. The control will also cover fuel and lubricants in large volumes. -We strive to ensure uniform quality standards for all goods received by the units of the Ministry of Defense. This is important for maintaining a high level of combat readiness and guaranteeing the safety of every soldier,- stressed the Deputy Minister of Defense of Ukraine, Brigadier General of Justice Serhiy Melnyk. To ensure high efficiency of control, the DSST will have access to modern laboratories of the Ministry of Defense. -The Central Department of Quality Control will allow the DSST to carry out detailed tests of goods supplied to units in its laboratories. Thanks to this, we will be able to timely identify possible deficiencies in the supply and promptly eliminate them,- said the head of the Administration of the State Special Service of Transport, Major General Oleksandr Yakovets. As reported by ArmiyaInform, the Ministry of Defense told about features of samples of thermal vehicles for defenders.

Title: Since the beginning of the day, 59 skirmishes have taken place at the front, most of them in Kurshch...
Description: This is in the operational information of the General Staff of the Armed Forces of Ukraine as of 4:00 p.m. March 4. Cynical shelling from the territory of the Russian Federation affected border settlements, including Starykov, Ulanov, and Popivka of the Sumy region; Mykolaivka, Chernihiv region. On the Kharkiv direction, the enemy twice tried to advance in the Vovchansk region, but was repulsed. On the Kupyansk direction the invading army attacked three times near Petropavlivka, Pishchany and Boguslavka. Two clashes continue until now. On the Lymansky direction the enemy attacked nine times in the areas of settlements of Novomykhailivka, Grekivka, Nove, Yampolivka and Dibrova, until now fighting is going on in two locations. On the Toretsk direction the enemy attacked in the Toretsk and Dachny districts, made seven attempts to improve their position, three clashes are currently ongoing. In the Pokrovsky direction since the beginning of the day, the occupiers have made 12 attempts to dislodge our defenders from their positions in the areas of Promin, Lysivka, Sergiivka, Andriivka, Oleksiivka settlements. The defense forces are holding back the enemy's onslaught and have repulsed all attacks. The enemy launched an air strike in the Horihovoy area. Today in the Novopavlovsk direction enemy units attacked the positions of our troops near Constantinople four times, one attack continues until now. Yanvarske, Novopavlivka, Oleksiivka and Ivanivka were hit by guided aerial bombs. Today, the enemy once attacked the positions of our defenders in the Privilny district in the Gulyaipil direction. At the same time, they carried out airstrikes on Komyshuvas, Gulyaipol and Zaliznychny. Six skirmishes took place in the Orykhiv direction, the enemy is trying to advance in the direction of Nesteryanka and Kamiansky, three skirmishes are still ongoing. In the Dnieper direction the enemy launched one unsuccessful attack, Lviv was hit by an air strike. In Kursk region Ukrainian defenders repelled 14 attacks by invaders. The enemy also carried out eight airstrikes, dropping 13 anti-aircraft missiles, and fired 183 artillery barrages. Battles are currently taking place in nine locations. In the Seversky and Kramatorsk directions the enemy did not carry out active offensive actions, it is shelling the positions of the Defense Forces and populated areas, deploying attack UAVs, conducting reconnaissance. As reported by ArmyInform, over the past day the army of the aggressor country lost 1,340 people and 8 armored combat vehicles of various models.

Title: -I will not go for meat-: a resident of Kurshchyna frankly told the SSO fighters about his reluctanc...
Description: The video of the conversation of the special forces with a resident of Kurshchyna was published on page 8 of the special forces regiment of the SSO named after Prince Izyaslav Mstislavich. During the communication with the soldiers of the SSO, the resident of Kurshchyna said that he has no desire to fight against Ukraine and to be -expendable material-. He frankly stated that he -doesn't care- who will kill him - Ukrainians or Russians, because he does not see the point in this war. -If I wasn't with you (against the Ukrainians), I would have gone to fight. And so nah*y. This is my village, I studied. I survive here. to fight Where to fight? Do you hear why I am going where (to join the service of the Russian Federation)? Going for meat? What the hell is this?- he declared. The man said that he saw how the Russians -drove, brought one, the other, buried them- and did not want to repeat their fate. He also mentioned the -seven hundred Chechens from Kadyrov- who were -cutting down the forest- on the border, and the -Dagestani conscript- who was -broken.- This dialogue became a vivid example of the fact that many Russians do not have any motivation to fight against Ukraine. They do not believe in Kremlin propaganda and do not want to die for other people's interests. -They have no motivation, because they are not fighting for their land,- said the fighters of the 8th SSO regiment. Ukrainian special forces appealed to everyone who is still hesitating: -The only chance to survive is to surrender. We are fighting for our own, and no one is going to break us.- Your browser does not support video. As reported by ArmyInform, paratroopers of the 95th Airborne Assault Polish brigade captured a marine from the Russian 810 brigade of the marines.

Title: In the occupied Luhansk region, an oil product base supplying fuel to the Russian army was hit
Description: This was reported on March 4 by the Forces of Unmanned Systems of the Armed Forces. Our drones also attacked an oil refinery in Syzran (800 kilometers from the Ukrainian border) and an oil pipeline in the Rostov region. -The forces of unmanned systems continue to hit the strategic enterprises of the enemy, reducing his ability to wage war against Ukraine,- SBS said. As reported by ArmyInform, the Defense Forces strike on strategic objects of the Russian fuel infrastructure.

Title: -Cocktail of endorphins, dopamine and serotonin-: -Pablo- about what a drone operator feels when he ...
Description: The story of the fighter was made public on the page of the National Guard of Ukraine. -For several days in a row, they stormed us on the Zhiguli,- says Pablo, recalling the battles in the East. — They cut out the front door… And what happened to them after they hit the mine. He falls silent, but there is fire in his eyes. -When my drone hits the target, I feel… a cocktail of endorphins, dopamine and serotonin at the same time.- -Pablo- is not just a drone operator. He is a former scout who passed through Siversk, Lyman, and Kupyansk. He saw the war up close, and understood: the future lies in technology. -Drones are the eyes of our units,- he explains. -We cannot afford to be on the ground, even in rain or snow.- His work is not only the ability to fly a drone. This is knowledge of navigation, electronics, explosives, cartography. And the main thing is the ability to make decisions quickly. -The specifics of the job are a combination of technology and tactics,- says Pablo. Recently, he was seriously injured and lost part of his leg. But even in the hospital it doesn't seem like it. -I'm lucky,- he says. -I should have died several times, but I survived.- His motivation is the future of the child, family, and country. -What I do today gives us a chance for a safe life tomorrow.- -Pablo- dreams of a prosthesis so he can run again, even a half marathon. And also about the powerlifting competition. -Sport is my motivation,- he says. -He helps me adapt to reality.- He appeals to his brothers: -Take care. Remember your relatives who are waiting for you. And never forget what you stand for. As reported by ArmyInform, Oleksiy Sereda, chief sergeant, technician of one of the navigation systems of the 114th tactical brigade of aviation, known by the nickname -Panda-, told an incredible story of his combat experience in the Vovchan direction.

Title: Training in realistic conditions: how the military passes the special forces Q-course
Description: The corresponding video appearedon the unit page. -Today we will show you fragments of the last phase of -SUT- Small unit tactics. The training and training center of the SSO: we will teach, prepare, check, and then everything again in a circle,- the defenders commented. The main goal of the small unit tactics training phase is to prepare well-trained and highly qualified groups capable of successfully operating in dynamic conditions, adapting to various external factors. Cadets of the SSO Qualification Course undergo intensive training in realistic conditions. As reported by ArmyInform, the fighters of the Special Operations Forces of the Armed Forces together with the gunners of a friendly unit destroyed the newest the Russian 2С43 -Malva- self-propelled artillery installation, which the occupiers began to produce only in 2023.

Title: They hit armored vehicles, crushed the infantry - our drones showed their hits
Description: The video of combat work was released on March 4 on the brigade's channel. -No dugout, no armored car, no occupier will hide from the -birds- of our brigade. FPV drones accurately find the target and destroy the enemy where he feels -safe-. Targeted. Mercilessly. Efficiently. Death to the enemies! Glory to Ukraine!- - said in the message of the brigade. Polish paratroopers are included in the list of military units where the -Contract 18-24- program operates. As reported by ArmiyaInform, military counterintelligence of the SBU together with soldiers of the 95th separate amphibious assault brigade of the Polish Army conducted another special operation, which demonstrates that in the ranks of the Russian army there are those who value money more than -ideology-.

Title: Reliable brothers and a wide selection of specialties: -Knights- about the benefits of service under...
Description: They published the corresponding video on their channel. Among the advantages, the military mentioned: -The generation that decides now.- Looking for a path that matters? The 28th OMBr is experience, strength and determination. Join those who bring victory closer every day. Stand with us!- - called the defenders. As reported by ArmyInform, several hundred people have already applied to the 28th separate of the mechanized brigade named after the Knights of the Winter Campaign under the new project -Contract -18-24-. As a reminder, -Contrakt 18-24- is a voluntary initiative that allows Ukrainians in the specified age category to join the Defense Forces of Ukraine for one year. The project offers a decent financial reward, professional combat training according to NATO standards and social guarantees that no civilian profession can provide.

Title: From the stadium to the trenches: the occupiers turn athletes into -cannon fodder- for TOT
Description: This is reported by the Center of National Resistance. -Traitors will combine military service with training. However, given the exclusion of the Russian Federation from a number of sports competitions and the world's non-recognition of the occupied territories, it is possible that the athletes will still have to finish their sports careers and be eliminated on the battlefield,- the Center of National Resistance emphasizes. In fact, the occupiers use athletes as -cannon fodder- despite their athletic achievements. This is another example of how Russia disregards human lives for its imperial ambitions. The National Resistance Center calls for information on collaborators and traitors who aid the occupiers in their criminal activities. As reported by ArmyInform, the Russian occupiers have deployed a new filtration camp in the temporarily occupied territories of Ukraine, where they forcibly detain local residents. The camp is designed for 1,000 people and is designed to -test the loyalty- of residents of recently captured settlements.

Title: From the stage in the center of Moscow called to kill Ukrainians: Ivan Okhlobystin was informed of t...
Description: This was reported by the SBU on March 4. According to the investigation, in September 2022 he became the headliner of a concert-meeting on Red Square in Moscow, which took place on the occasion of the fake annexation of the temporarily occupied territories of Ukraine to Russia. -Then Okhlobystin directly from the stage called for the continuation of the armed aggression of the Russian Federation, the killing of Ukrainians and the seizure of new regions of our state. In addition, the SBU documented other speeches of the person involved, where he campaigned for the spread of the Kremlin regime throughout the territory of Ukraine,- the report says. The SBU noted that for public support of racism, in particular war crimes of the occupation groups of the Russian Federation, the Kremlin regularly honors the figure with various awards as an ideological propagandist. Linguistic expertise initiated by the Security Service confirmed the facts of the attacker's subversive activities for the benefit of the aggressor country. Based on the collected evidence, the investigators of the Security Service notified Okhlobystin of suspicion under several articles of the Criminal Code of Ukraine: -Since the suspect is hiding on the territory of Russia, complex measures are underway to bring him to justice for crimes against our state,- the SBU said. As reported by ArmyInform, the Security Service collected the evidence base and reported suspicion to the Russian singer-propagandist Grigory Lepsveridze, better known by his stage name -Leps-.

Title: -Passport or death-: the occupiers are depriving Ukrainians of medical care at the TOT
Description: This is reported by the Center of National Resistance. From January 1, 2026, TOT residents will not be able to receive medical care without the so-called -OMS policies- (compulsory health insurance). It is impossible to issue this -policy- without a Russian passport. -Since the beginning of the full-scale invasion, the Russian side has continued to implement a large-scale campaign of forced issuance of passports in the temporarily occupied territories. The occupiers call this process -caring for local residents-, but in fact these actions are an illegal way of subjugating, controlling and destroying the national identity of Ukrainians,- the Center of National Resistance emphasizes. In fact, the occupiers present Ukrainians with a choice: either accept Russian citizenship or remain without access to medical services. This is another step in the policy of forced assimilation and genocide of the Ukrainian people. The National Resistance Center reminds that forced passporting is a violation of international law. As reported by ArmyInform, in the temporarily occupied Luhansk region, collaborators are organizing forced blood donation drives for Russian military personnel fighting in Ukraine. Events have become mandatory for all employees of budget institutions and students of local pseudo-universities.

Title: Wanted to blow up the building, but the detonator did not work: our fighters eliminated the unlucky ...
Description: The corresponding video appeared on the OSUV channel -Khortytsia-. In Toretsk, the enemy suffered numerous losses, but did not give up their aggressive intentions to capture the Ukrainian city. -Another episode of the Russian-Ukrainian war. The invader decided to blow up the building using anti-tank mines. However, this was his last combat mission in his life - the detonator did not work,- the message reads. Your browser does not support video. As a result, Ukrainian fighters eliminated the occupier with sniper fire, and the FPV drone operator put an end to this story. -The drone hit the invader directly. The battle for the city of Toretsk continues. Our defenders choose the right to live freely in extremely difficult conditions. Soldiers of the guard battalion, together with other adjacent units, are desperately defending Ukrainian land,- the military assured. It is noted that this footage was filmed by the 4th guard battalion of the 101st separate guard brigade of the General Staff named after Colonel General Gennady Vorobyov. As reported by ArmyInform, from this unit heavy battles are being fought with the Russians in Toretsk.

Title: The defense forces struck strategic objects of the fuel infrastructure of the Russian Federation
Description: informs the General Staff of the ZSU. In particular, in the Rostov region of the Russian Federation, the oil pumping infrastructure of the occupiers, involved in the provision of the invading army, was damaged. Heavy explosions and fire were recorded in the target area. There are also hits on the production facilities of the Syzran Oil Refinery in the Samara region. The enemy actively countered with the means of radio-electronic warfare and air defense. A fire was recorded at the enterprise. In addition, there is information about powerful explosions in the Sokhranovsky district of the line-production management of main gas pipelines in the Rostov region of the Russian Federation. Detailed information on the consequences of damage to objects is currently being clarified. As reported by ArmyInform, on the night of February 28, the Defense Forces of Ukraine destroyed a storage warehouse for thermobaric ammunition of the Russian invaders in the temporarily occupied territory of Donetsk oblast, in Selidovoy district.

Title: The Russians are not allowed to accumulate - in the Kharkiv region, assaults are nipped in the bud
Description: Volodymyr Degtyarev, a representative of the public relations service of the -Charter- brigade, told about this on the air of -Suspilny-. According to him, if you analyze the losses of the enemy in February, you can see an interesting trend - there are more dead enemies than wounded. This trend may be due to the fact that the enemy has less movement and more crowding. And the enemy practically does not use heavy equipment, hiding it underground. -Because we have created such ``kill zones'' for them. That is, dead zones — from their positions and a dozen kilometers to the rear, which are controlled from the air by our FPV and strike drones. We destroy their shelters, destroy their logistics, stop their equipment. Over the past month, we burned more than a dozen passenger cars. The only tank that we managed to destroy was standing in a closed position,- said the representative of the public relations service of the -Charter- brigade. As reported ArmyInform, in the direction of Sumy, UAV calculations of the 15th mobile border detachment -Steel Kordon- were arranged a real -safari- on the occupiers. Thanks to the vigilance of the border guards, several enemy shelters where Russian soldiers were holed up were discovered.

Title: Fast and maneuverable: Defense forces will receive new kamikaze drones
Description: As reported in the Main Directorate for Life Cycle Support of Weapons and Military Equipment, NORD drones are compact and maneuverable. Drones have an advanced control system that ensures reliable communication between the operator and the -bird- in the conditions of enemy electronic warfare. Aircraft have carbon frames in several sizes. NORD -birds- with a combat load of several kilograms are capable of accelerating up to 150 kilometers per hour. As reported by ArmiyaInform, during February 2025, the defense department codified and put into operation in the Defense Forces of Ukraine more than 100 new models weapons and military equipment. More than 90 percent of them are domestically produced.

Title: Defense Minister of Latvia: Europe will continue to help Ukraine
Description: This is stated in his post on the X social network. -Latvia and Europe will continue to provide assistance to Ukraine. We are united and firm - Europe must take on even greater responsibility and mobilize - it must support Ukraine from a position of strength, with military weapons and with security guarantees,- the post reads. The minister emphasized that this is an important moment for Europe and it is necessary to invest at least 3% or more in its security, actively arm itself and develop a powerful defense industry for its security and protection. -Ukraine, the United States and Europe must continue diplomatic efforts in all possible formats to ensure a just peace. It is important that all parties have a common strategic goal — ensuring peace in Ukraine,- Andris Spruds noted. As reported by ArmyInform, the Verkhovna Rada of Ukraine officially applied to US President Donald Trump, Congress and the American people, thanking them for the previously provided military assistance and emphasizing the need for further partnership.

Title: Comfortable, warm, durable: the MOU talked about the features of thermal clothing samples for defend...
Description: informs about this. If the new specifications for men's underwear were approved as early as February 2024, then such underwear for female defenders - only at the beginning of 2025. The following specifications have been approved for men's and women's underwear: Both underwear are available in three colors: Coyote, Olive Green and Black, and also include sizes from XS to 3XL. The Director of the Department of Procurement Policy of the Ministry of Defense, Hleb Kanevskyi, said that in 2024 and 2025, the procurement agency of the Ministry of Defense, DOT, purchased men's thermal underwear according to new specifications in the amount of more than UAH 890 million. -We plan to start purchasing women's samples as well. We are constantly working to improve conditions for our military. The new underwear is comfortable, wear-resistant, provides the proper level of thermal insulation and moisture removal,- he said.   The new demi-season underwear should be made of a knitted fabric that combines 95% cotton and 5% elastane. Due to the special weaving, the cool smoothness of the underwear ensures: The set of demi-season underwear consists of a shirt and underpants. For underwear, a special knitted fabric with a nachos, made from a special jersey weave, is used. The main components (93% polyester and 7% elastane) provide strength and comfort. Key features of the underwear: The underwear set consists of a winter shirt and trousers, as well as a packing bag for storage and washing. The updated underwear features an anatomical fit, flat seams for ease of wear, and long sleeves with cuffs to keep you warm. Innovative multi-layer fabrics provide optimal thermoregulation, and modern weaving technologies increase wear resistance and contribute to rapid moisture removal. These changes will ensure reliable protection and durability of underwear, which will become an important element of clothing both for everyday wear and for work in extreme conditions.

Title: -Taxi- to hell: Ukrainian FPV drones arranged a -hot- trip for the occupiers near Pokrovsk
Description: The video of combat work was published on the brigade's page. Title: A woman from Kharkiv was waiting for the Russian peace, she received a criminal case
Description: The Kharkiv Regional Prosecutor's Office informs about this. According to the investigation, the suspect has been an active participant in pro-Russian chats on Telegram since March 2024, where she spread theses of Kremlin propaganda. She claimed that -Russia is not conquering territories, but liberating lands from the Nazis,- and called the Russian military -heroes.- The illegal nature of the woman's statements was confirmed by the conclusion of the forensic linguistic examination. She was informed of the suspicion due to the fact of the distribution of materials containing the justification of the armed aggression of the Russian Federation against Ukraine (Part 2, 3 of Article 436-2 of the Criminal Code of Ukraine). -This woman, like many other supporters of the -Russian measure-, lived in the illusion that Russia would bring her -liberation-. But instead, she got only problems with the law,- the Kharkiv Regional Prosecutor's Office noted. As reported by ArmyInform, within the scope of tasks regarding increasing the level of awareness of personnel about international humanitarian law, determined by the Commander-in-Chief of the Armed Forces of Ukraine, in Kyiv for representatives the legal service of the Armed Forces of Ukraine organized and conducted a training course on operational law.

Title: Rapid fire: the French-English development is able to effectively counter swarms of drones
Description: This mobile multipurpose weapon system is designed to respond to the new threats facing today's armed forces, including drones that can attack in swarms and can overwhelm conventional missile defenses. With a powerful anti-aircraft gun, a high-performance 3D radar and a versatile C2 module, the RAPIDFire is optimized to engage all types of air threats, including fighter-attack (FGA), helicopters or unmanned aerial vehicles (UAV), cruise missiles or precision-guided munitions. The first samples of RapidFire were presented back in 2012. In early 2014, Rapidfire conducted successful tests, hitting two unmanned aerial vehicles. RapdiFire has demonstrated its ability to rapidly engage very small targets such as UAVs, which are becoming increasingly important as reconnaissance systems as well as vehicles. The anti-aircraft turret is mounted on the back of the 6×6 truck chassis. The turret is remote-controlled and armed with a 40 mm cannon that has an effective range of 4,000 meters against air targets and 2,500 meters against ground targets. Although the gun has a rate of fire of up to 200 rounds per minute, it only takes one to ten rounds to hit a target. The RAPIDFire system was also designed to fire the STARStreak missile system, a very short-range air defense missile system with a missile speed of over Mach 3 and a range of about 7 km. The combination of six STARStreak missiles and the latest generation 40mm ammunition provide both precision attack and high firepower. RapidFire uses a variety of munitions, including Anti-Air Burst Ammunition (AA-AB) for air defense and Stabilized Discarding Sabot (APFSDS) or General Purpose Round-Air Burst (GPR-AB) munitions against armored fighting vehicles, ground forces and other ground threats. RapidFire can fire on the move for self-defense purposes. The vehicle has a total of 140 ready-to-fire ammunition in the turret (a combination of anti-aircraft, anti-missile and GPR shells) and 80 in the storage box. The APFSDS anti-armor munition penetrates 140 mm rolled homogeneous armor at a distance of 1500 m. In the firing position, the stabilization of the machine is provided by two telescopic supports with a hydraulic drive, installed on each side of the chassis. The RapidfFire gun system is mounted on a high-terrain chassis. An armored cabin with seats for the driver and gunner is installed in the front of the machine. The cabin is made of welded steel armor and provides protection against fire from small arms of caliber up to 7.62 mm and projectile fragments. There is one door on each side of the crew cabin. The cabin windows are 26 mm thick, and the cabin is equipped with an air conditioning system. RAPIDFire is highly automated, and a person is actually only needed to assign the weapon type and fire orders. High mobility is ensured by the fact that the RapidFire gun turret is mounted on the Mercedes-Benz Unimog 6×6 U2450 off-road truck chassis, but the system can be integrated on another wheeled chassis. The engine of the RapidFire car is a Mercedes-Benz LA 240 hp 6-cylinder turbocharged diesel. at 2600 rpm. The gearbox is mechanical, with 8 forward gears and 1 reverse gear. The Mercedes-Benz Unimog 6×6 U2450 can travel at a maximum highway speed of 95 km/h with a maximum range of 600 km. The RapidFire fire control system includes a gyro-stabilized sensor head, IR (infrared) day and night electro-optics with an infrared detection range of up to 18 km, and a laser range finder. Optoelectronic sensors are built directly into the turret, allowing RAPIDFire to operate autonomously if necessary. RapidFire is also immune to most known jamming technologies, thus protecting it from interference and enemy attacks. The systems receive target information from the CONTROL Master 60 surveillance radar and the CONTROL View command and control module, manufactured by Thales. This C2 system controls up to six RAPIDFire units simultaneously. To enter firing mode, the RAPIDFire machine stops and communicates with the controller, which takes about one minute. Optoelectronic sensors are mounted directly on the turret, so the gun can operate even if it is not connected to the surveillance radar. The gun can open fire within 4.5 seconds after the target is detected by the radar. RapidFire has a reaction time of 4.5 seconds from target detection to readiness to fire. RAPIDFire systems can be coordinated with CONTROLMaster 200 or CONTROLMaster 60 control stations. The CONTROLMaster family is based on GROUNDMaster radars.

Title: The Ukrainian military discussed the implementation of combat experience at an international confere...
Description: This is reported by the General Staff of the Armed Forces of Ukraine. During the event, military experts discussed key aspects of the institutionalization of the study of combat experience, the modernization of the military training system, and the impact of combat analysis on military innovation. -Today, the Armed Forces of Ukraine already have a system for studying and implementing combat experience. In addition to collecting information and summarizing reports, special groups are being formed in military-scientific institutions. They work directly on the frontline, analyze the situation and develop recommendations for the necessary changes,- noted the head of the Department of Innovative Activities of the Armed Forces of Ukraine, Colonel Vitaliy Dobryanskyi. The importance of such measures is difficult to overestimate, because Ukrainian combat experience is unique not only for national defense, but also for international partners. The exchange of knowledge contributes to the improvement of military strategy and increasing the efficiency of the Defense Forces of Ukraine in modern conditions. As reported by ArmyInform, within the limits of tasks regarding increasing the level of awareness of personnel about international humanitarian law, determined by the Commander-in-Chief of the Armed Forces of Ukraine, in Kyiv for representatives of the legal service The Armed Forces of Ukraine organized and held a training course on operational law.

Title: The new EU rearmament and support plan for Ukraine: what it entails
Description: She announced this in a statement on March 4. The first part of ReArm Europe's plan is to unlock the use of public defense funding at the national level. -Member states are ready to invest more in their own security if they have the financial space. And we should give them that opportunity. That is why we will soon propose to activate the provisions of the Pact on national security,- said Ursula von der Leyen. This would allow member states to significantly increase their defense spending without resorting to the excessive deficit procedure. For example: if member states increase their defense spending by an average of 1.5% of GDP, this could create fiscal space of around €650 billion over four years. The second proposal will be a new tool. It will provide member countries with 150 billion euros in defense investment loans. -It's basically about spending better — and spending together. We are talking about pan-European areas of capabilities. For example, anti-aircraft and anti-missile defense, artillery systems, unmanned aerial vehicles with missiles and ammunition and anti-drone systems,- said the President of the European Commission. This will help member countries to combine demand and make joint purchases. With these purchases, member states can also significantly strengthen their support for Ukraine. The third point is the use of the EU budget. The European Commission will offer additional opportunities and incentives for member states, as well as provide an opportunity to use cohesion funds to increase defense spending. The use of these funds does not require unanimity, so countries such as Hungary or Slovakia will not be able to block these decisions. The last two areas of activity are aimed at mobilizing private capital by accelerating the work of the savings and investment union and through the European Investment Bank. -Europe is ready to take responsibility. The ReArm Europe initiative can mobilize almost €800 billion for a safe and resilient Europe. We will continue to work closely with our NATO partners. This is a turning point for Europe. And we are ready to take a step forward,- concluded Ursula von der Leyen.

Title: -This is a win-win situation-: recruits will help the 92nd brigade implement a new assault concept
Description: Mstislav Banik, head of the recruiting section of the 475th separate assault battalion of the 92nd separate assault brigade, told about this on the air of -Suspilne Novosti- href=-https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=o4XONrDJWsc-> According to him, in general, 18-year-old boys who want to be stormtroopers and 18-year-old boys who want other positions apply to the recruiters of the 475th assault battalion of the 92nd brigade. And also older people of various abilities. The battalion is looking for everyone who will help implement its assault concept. -Our idea is that drones will destroy everything, create a dead zone from enemy positions. Then, accordingly, the assault infantry will enter these positions, finish them off, occupy places. It must be of very good quality, so for us “contracts 18-24” very important,- said the head of the recruiting section of the 475th separate assault battalion. According to Mstislav Banik, the demand for the positions of stormtroopers is quite high. Despite the fact that this job is probably the most difficult in the army. -For many, this is a ticket to life. An opportunity to get some career growth, earn money. Many guys who apply for such contracts are from the village. They have problems with work, problems with creating, providing for a family, and so on. But this is not 100% of our audience. There are guys from big cities who say: well, it's time to destroy my enemies, too,- noted Mstislav Banik. The state offered an excellent solution, he notes. It's a win-win for everyone. And most importantly, current recruits will be able to form an exceptional elite within assault battalions and assault brigades. -Guys get an opportunity to sign a contract for just one year. And after that, have both reservations and the importance of going abroad. You can earn up to $80,000 this year. That is, these are all absolutely real numbers and, accordingly, the Armed Forces will win in this way, because there are young personnel, young guys who are really ready to carry this burden and perform such difficult tasks,- summarized the head of the recruiting section of the 475th separate assault battalion of the 92nd separate assault brigade Yakreported ArmyInform, the 92nd Assault Brigade named after Kosh Ataman Ivan Sirk is one of the six brigades participating in the -Contract 18-24- project. She already has her first recruits. The recruits received the first payments under the contract — 200,000 hryvnias — and have already started training. As a reminder, -Contrakt 18-24- is a voluntary initiative that allows Ukrainians in the specified age category to join the Defense Forces of Ukraine for one year. The project offers a decent financial reward, professional combat training according to NATO standards and social guarantees that no civilian profession can provide.

Title: The Russians attacked Sloviansk and Kramatorsk: two correctional officers were detained
Description: This was reported by the SBU on March 4. As the investigation established, the enemy tried most of all to find out the locations of the bases and logistics centers of the Defense Forces, which are involved in hostilities on the eastern front. In order to obtain the coordinates for the fire damage, the occupiers remotely recruited two local residents. One of the traitors turned out to be a 47-year-old resident of Sloviansk. -In August 2024, the man came to the attention of the military intelligence of the Russian Federation when he published pro-Kremlin comments on social networks. After the recruitment, the agent monitored the locations of the largest concentration of personnel of the Ukrainian troops, in particular in the areas of checkpoints at the entrances to the city,- the report says. Also, the suspect tried to identify warehouses with ammunition and repair stations for military equipment of the Defense Forces. He passed the collected information through -Odnoklasniki- to his old friend - a fighter of the occupation groups of the Russian Federation, who is fighting near Bakhmut and cooperates with the Russian special services. Another traitor turned out to be a 37-year-old factory worker in Kramatorsk. -The man worked for the FSB, which recruited him through a Telegram channel, where he made -posts- in support of the occupiers. On the instructions of the Russian special service agent, the agent went around the area, and also took pictures and marked the locations of Ukrainian troops on Google maps,- the SBU said. The SBU officers detained the suspect when he was preparing an intelligence -report- with the coordinates of potential targets. -Investigators of the Security Service informed both detainees about the suspicion for h. 2 Art. 111 of the Criminal Code of Ukraine (treason committed under martial law). The perpetrators are in custody. They face life imprisonment with confiscation of property,- the SBU said. As reported by ArmyInform, the guard of one of the Kharkiv hotels, who did not have patriotic beliefs and helped the Russian Federation to correct strikes in Kharkiv region.

Title: Electronic referrals to the VLC in Reserve+ now contain the exact date and place of the medical exam...
Description: The Ministry of Defense of Ukraine informs about this. The innovation is part of a large-scale reform of the VLK, which involves the digitization of procedures and the improvement of the regulatory and legal framework. The corresponding changes were approved by Order No. 4 of January 3, 2025. According to the document, the heads of the TCC and SP, as well as the heads of the recruiting centers of the Armed Forces, will form referrals to the VLK in electronic form by means of the Unified State Register of conscripts, conscripts and reservists -Oberig-. Citizens will be able to submit a request and receive this document in the -Rezerv+- application. Electronic referrals are available both for those who wish to go through the commission on their own, and for those who have already received a paper summons to the VLK. It is enough to make a request in the application. -Time is one of the most valuable human resources. The update will allow you to pass the commission without unnecessary visits to the TCC, papers and long queues. I am glad that thanks to Rezerv+ we are helping our citizens free up time for important matters,- said Kateryna Chernogorenko, Deputy Minister of Defense of Ukraine for Digitalization. A paper version of the referral, printed from the registry, will be available if needed. In this case, the document will necessarily have a QR code with all the necessary information and will be registered in the journal in accordance with the requirements established by Government Resolution No. 560 of May 16, 2024. It is also possible to receive a paper referral in the form given in Appendix 11 to the Procedure for the Conscription of Citizens for Military Service During Mobilization, for a special period approved by CMU Resolution No. 560. In particular, this refers to citizens who, during martial law, expressed a desire to mobilize directly to a selected military unit. In this case, the commander of the military unit is obliged to inform the territorial manning center about the issuance of the corresponding referral, and the commander of the TCC - to enter this information in the -Oberig- register. As reported by ArmyInform, since the beginning of 2025, with the assistance of the Central Department for the Protection of Servicemen's Rights (TSUZPV), 156 issues of defenders have been resolved and their families based on the results of processing applications and requests from them.
