As ArmiyaInform reported, the operators UAVs of the 12th special purpose brigade -Azov- of the National Guard made a selection of the last moments of the lives of the occupiers.

Title: Almost 800 targets per month - -Cold Ravine- sets the enemy on fire
Description: This was reported on March 3 by the operational command -East-. Including: 110 invaders — eliminated 192 invaders — wounded 71 dugouts/shelters/structures — destroyed 162 dugouts/shelters/structures — damaged 8 points of remote piloting — destroyed 52 points of remote piloting — damaged 43 units of equipment — 74 pieces of equipment were destroyed - damaged -At the same time, Black Raven actively conducts mining and regularly delivers humanitarian cargo to the positions of the infantrymen. Today, the battalion is expanding its work: there are open vacancies for a pilot, a technician (technical engineer), an IT specialist, and a driver. -Join!- - said in the message of OK -East-. As reported by ArmyInform, operators of the Black Raven unmanned systems battalion of the 93rd mechanized brigade -Kholodny Yar- showed numerous destructions by kamikaze drones of Russian attack aircraft.

Title: Gifts in the style of St. Nicholas - our pilots threw explosives into the chimney of the occupiers
Description: The video of combat work was released on March 3 on the brigade's channel. One of the rockets flew straight into the pipe and exploded in the middle of the house where the Russian attack aircraft were hiding. Also, accurate drops led to the ignition of enemy equipment and the destruction of infantry in open terrain. As reported by ArmyInform, the battalion of unmanned attack aircraft complexes -Achilles- of the 92nd assault brigade named after Ataman Ivan Sirk together with the Guardsmen of the 1st Brigade of the operational assignment -Stormy- of the National Guard in time discovered and burned enemy equipment.

Title: A trip to Belarus is expensive — two smugglers were exposed in Volyn
Description: This was reported on March 3 by the special prosecutor's office of the Western region. According to the investigation, the suspects undertook the organization of an illegal transfer for a conscript to Belarus outside the official checkpoint. For $12 thousand they were supposed to accompany him by car to the point of departure, but on the way they were exposed by law enforcement officers while receiving the agreed amount of money. During the authorized searches, material evidence was found and seized from the accomplices, confirming the involvement of the persons in the illegal scheme. A preventive measure has already been chosen for one of them, and the relevant petition is being considered by the court for the other. ArmyInform reminds that it is better not to break the law or risk your life, but to use the aggregator of vacancies in the Armed Forces and recruiting centers.

Title: Kremlin propaganda and 10,000 fake accounts: agitators of racism and a hacker were arrested
Description: This was reported by the SBU on March 3. One of the figures is a former functionary of the banned Party of Regions. The attacker wrote commissioned articles for the Kremlin's international mouthpieces, including the Russian online publication -Strategic Culture Fund-. According to the investigation, the man prepared dozens of publications in which he justified the armed aggression of the Russian Federation and discredited the Defense Forces of Ukraine. -For the conspiracy, the person involved created hostile content under a pseudonym. And for contacts with representatives of the Russian special services, he used anonymous chats in messengers,- the SBU said. Another suspicion was received by a local resident who already has a conviction for spreading pro-Kremlin propaganda, but repeated the crime during the probationary period. This time, the recidivist shared provocative posts on his Facebook page, denying the war crimes of the Russian Federation and calling for a coup d'état in Ukraine. -Also, cyber specialists of the SBU, together with the National Police, exposed an IT specialist in Horishniy Plavnyi, who organized a bot farm to spread Kremlin narratives on the Internet,- the SBU reported. According to the case materials, the attacker massively registered mobile numbers of Ukrainian operators, using which he created fake accounts in social networks. In the future, the Russians used these -accounts- to -disperse- Russian content allegedly from citizens of Ukraine. More than 10,000 have been neutralized so far. pseudo-pages that were created through the attacker's bot farm. Based on all the revealed facts, the detainees were notified of suspicion in accordance with the crimes committed under several articles of the Criminal Code of Ukraine: The perpetrators are in custody. They face from 8 years of imprisonment to life imprisonment with confiscation of property. As reported by ArmyInform, the Security Service and the National Police detained a Russian agent who, at the behest of the Russian Federation, was preparing a terrorist attack on February 28 in one of the most populous places of Zhytomyr - near the -Alley of Glory to Heroes-.

Title: More equipment and less risk: our fighters landed on T-11 parachute systems
Description: informs about this March 3 General Staff of the Armed Forces of Ukraine. T-11 is a new generation of landing parachutes that replaced the outdated systems. They ensure: -These parachutes have already proven their effectiveness in the armed forces of the leading countries of the world, and now Ukrainian paratroopers are mastering the latest technologies that will allow them to perform combat tasks even more effectively,- the message says. As reported by ArmyInform, within the scope of the -Contract 18-24- project, recruits are already under the updated program. BZVP is the first stage of training military personnel to perform combat missions. This program is the basis for further service and, according to the updated program, lasts one and a half months.

Title: With a goal every 9.5 minutes - - Magyar Birds - did a good job in February
Description: The final video was published on the brigade channel. Among the destroyed is a lot of enemy equipment, but the priority for the -Birds of Magyar- remains the enemy infantry, said brigade commander Major Robert Brovdy. In addition to defeating the enemy, the 414th brigade established the release of ammunition for remote mines, which are supplied to dozens of military units of the Defense Forces. As reported by ArmyInform, the fighters of the 414th brigade of unmanned attack systems -Birds of Magyar- were able to find enemy armored vehicles, which the occupiers hid quite far from the front.

Title: -Night Hunters-: Mobile groups of Guards destroyed 5 -Shaheed- over the weekend
Description: The video of combat work was made public on the page of the National Guard of Ukraine. -The enemy continues its night attacks, but each of its launches is an opportunity for our soldiers to strike back,- said the post to the publication. As reported by ArmyInform, the pilots of the 77th Airborne Dnipro Brigade of the Armed Forces of the Armed Forces of the Armed Forces of Ukraine showed a number of hits on Russian soldiers on the Borivskyi direction.

Title: The era of -tsar-mangals- and -tsar-REBs- has passed — in the Lyman direction they attack exclusivel...
Description: This information was confirmed by Maksym Bilousov, head of the communications department of the 60th separate mechanized brigade, on the air of -Suspilne Novosti-. According to him, the attacks do not stop and follow one scenario. Stormtroopers are either dropped to the Defense Force position on -armor- or, more often than not, they just go on foot. -That is, two infantrymen are coming. They reach a certain fortification, after that they form a group of 8, 10 or more people, and then storm our positions. We are trying to destroy as many of these groups as possible at the stage of formation,- Maksym Bilousov said. Also, according to him, it is necessary to stop the equipment at the entrance - so that it cannot land the landing party. And it is also important to destroy it completely, so that the next attack aircraft do not use the -armor- as a cover. Precisely because the enemy's equipment is burning very actively, the current mechanized assaults cannot be compared with last year's. -There was such a so-called tsar-mangal, when there were huge superstructures on tanks. And there were also -king-REBs- - it seemed that mistletoe was growing on trees, this was approximately the number of REBs on the tank. Now the number of mechanized assaults has decreased,- said the head of the communications department of the 60th separate mechanized brigade. As reported ArmyInform, the pilots of the 77th Airborne Dnieper Brigade of the Armed Forces of the Armed Forces of Ukraine demonstrated a number of hits on Russian soldiers on the Borivskyi direction.

Title: The singer promised the Russians a fee for every destroyed tank of the Armed Forces: Grigory Leps wa...
Description: This was reported by the SBU on March 3. According to the case materials, he publicly supports the Russian Federation's full-scale invasion of Ukraine, and also justifies and finances the Russian war. It is documented how, after one of the concerts in the summer of 2023, Leps promised to pay the Russians one million Russian rubles for each destroyed tank of the Armed Forces, on the cameras of the Russian mass media. -In addition, he repeatedly gave the occupying groups of the Russian Federation -gum aid- in the form of bulletproof vests, sets of underwear and food products. -Leps regularly tells about this during his interviews with Russian propagandists,- the SBU said. On the basis of the collected evidence, the investigators of the Security Service notified Hryhoriy Lepsveridze in absentia of the suspicion under two articles of the Criminal Code of Ukraine: -Since the suspect is hiding from justice on the territory of Russia, comprehensive measures are underway to bring him to justice for crimes against our state,- the message reads. As reported by ArmyInform, the SBU in absentia served suspicion on the Kremlin singer-propagandist.

Title: In the Kursk region, Ukrainian defenders repelled 13 enemy attacks
Description: This is reported in the operational information of the General Staff of the Armed Forces of Ukraine as of 4:00 p.m. March 3. Border settlements, including Zarichne, Porozok, Seredyna-Buda and Kucherivka of the Sumy region, were affected by cynical shelling from the territory of the Russian Federation; Moss of Chernihiv region. In the Kharkiv direction the enemy tried to advance towards Bochkovo, but was repulsed. On the Lyman direction, the invading army attacked nine times near Novolyubivka and Yampolivka. Two clashes are still going on. Enemy aviation bombarded Stavky and Novoyehorivka. In the Seversky direction Ukrainian soldiers repelled an enemy attack in the area of ​​Bilogorivka. In the Kramatorsk direction Ukrainian defenders repulse two assaults by the occupiers near Chasovoy Yar and in the direction of Stupochy. In the Toretsk direction the enemy attacked in the Toretsk area, made seven attempts to improve their position, three skirmishes are currently ongoing. In the Pokrovsky direction since the beginning of the day, the occupiers have made 13 attempts to dislodge our defenders from their positions in the areas of the settlements of Oleksandropil, Lysivka, Promin, Dachenske, Kotlyne and Andriivka. The defense forces are holding back the enemy's onslaught and have repulsed 11 attacks, with two engagements still ongoing. The enemy carried out airstrikes in Pokrovsk, Myrolyubivka and Udachnoy districts, dropping three air bombs. Today in the Novopavlovsk direction enemy units attacked the positions of our troops near Constantinople and Skudny six times, three attacks continue until now. Burlatske and Voskresenko were hit by guided air bombs. Today, the enemy hit Gulyaipol and Zeleny Pol in the Gulyaipil direction with guided aerial bombs. In the Orichiv direction, two skirmishes are ongoing, the enemy is trying to advance in the direction of Stepovoy and near Nesteryanka. In Kursk region Ukrainian defenders repelled 13 attacks by invaders. The enemy also carried out six airstrikes, dropping seven anti-aircraft missiles, and launched 190 artillery barrages. At the moment, battles are going on in three locations. In the Kupyan, Gulyaipil and Prydniprovsk directions the enemy did not carry out active offensive actions, it constantly bombards the positions of the Defense Forces and populated areas, deploys attack UAVs, conducts reconnaissance. In total, the Russian invaders lost 1,350 people in the last day. Ukrainian soldiers also destroyed 11 tanks, 16 armored combat vehicles, 60 artillery systems, two air defense systems, 61 operational-tactical UAVs and 109 vehicles.

Title: -Magura- hunts in Kurshchyna, they threw bees at the invaders, Magyar's report: a stream from a fron...
Description: In Kurshchyna, fighters of the 47th -Magura- brigade repulse constant Russian attacks. Last day, the enemy attacked our positions with small infantry groups and columns of equipment. The first roll consisted of three tanks and two armored personnel carriers, only one armored personnel carrier survived. The second wave — one tank was burned, another was knocked out. Magyar published a report on the work of his unit for the past month. According to him, in February -Birds of Magyar- destroyed 4225 targets. These and other topics are discussed by our presenters - junior lieutenant Volodymyr Kravchuk and lieutenant Serhiy Lipko.

Title: Since the beginning of the year, the rights of 156 servicemen and their families have been renewed
Description: The Ministry of Defense of Ukraine informed about this on March 3. -We do everything possible to ensure that the rights and guarantees of each of our defenders are protected. We don't just respond to appeals, but also implement systemic changes to make protection mechanisms more effective,- said the Deputy Minister of Defense of Ukraine, Brigadier General of Justice Serhiy Melnyk. Among the most common violations with which military personnel and their relatives have applied are non-payment of monetary support and additional remuneration, non-transfer to another place of service, non-submission of documents regarding missing persons, non-payment of one-time benefits in case of death or injury, non-referral to the VLK. -The number of appeals is constantly increasing, which indicates the strengthening of trust in our management. We are trying to identify systemic violations and are working on improving the legislation in order to prevent their recurrence,- said the head of the Central Department for the Protection of Servicemen's Rights, Colonel Petro Fivkin. As ArmiyaInform reported, the Ministry of Defense continues work to ensure uninterrupted supply of critical resources for the army.

Title: As a result of the Russian strike on the training ground, two officials were removed from their duti...
Description: This was announced by Commander-in-Chief of the Armed Forces of Ukraine General Oleksandr Syrskyi. We will remind you that on March 1, the enemy attacked one of the military units on the territory of the training ground of the Ground Forces of the Armed Forces of Ukraine in the Dnipropetrovsk region. As a result of the impact of the ballistic missile -Iskander-M- in cluster equipment, there are dead and injured. While the investigation is being conducted, the head of the unit training center and the commander of the military unit have been removed from their duties. The Commander-in-Chief of the Armed Forces tasked the commanders of the types and individual branches of the Armed Forces (forces) to organize an inspection regarding the fulfillment of the requirements of the orders of the General Staff and the General Staff of the Armed Forces on the timeliness of notification of missile danger, prohibitions (restrictions) on the placement of personnel and the holding of meetings and gatherings in open areas, as well as placement in places not designated for this purpose. Also, Oleksandr Syrskyi determined for them to specify the status of fulfillment of previously assigned tasks regarding conducting training classes outside the boundaries of training centers, if possible in buried, engineering-protected structures that provide reliable protection of personnel, as well as how engineering work was carried out in relation to their equipment. -I express my sincere condolences to the relatives and relatives of the fallen defenders of Ukraine. the Russian aggressor will pay dearly for the crime he committed,- he emphasized. As reported by ArmyInform, the commander of the Ground Forces of the Armed Forces of Ukraine, Major General Mykhailo Drapaty, expressed his deep condolences to the families of the victims and assured that those guilty of improper security organization will be held accountable.

Title: More than 21,000 soldiers have returned to the army thanks to the law on SZCH
Description: This is reported by the State Bureau of Investigation. On March 1, 2025, the exemption period for military personnel who voluntarily left a military unit or place of service but voluntarily returned to the military ended. This became possible thanks to the amendments to the Law of Ukraine -On Military Duty and Military Service- signed by the President of Ukraine, Volodymyr Zelenskyi. -The largest number of fighters returned to the Armed Forces of Ukraine, and the military also actively returned to the National Guard and the Border Guard,- the report says. We will remind, after arriving at the unit, the serviceman had to submit a report about renewal in the service, which triggered a clear algorithm of further actions - from the preparation of documents until the resumption of payments. After March 1, 2025, servicemen who voluntarily left the unit must also return to service, but the mechanism of their legalization in the unit will already be somewhat different. As reported by ArmyInform, serviceman Oleg with the call sign -Dill- spent about a year in the army. The man committed the SZH and spent some time in the rear, but returned to service.

Title: Maximum motivation and desire — new recruits have already been evaluated in 92 separate assault unit...
Description: This was told on the broadcast of the telethon -Edyny Novyvi-. Becoming a recruit is very simple. According to the first contractors, everything is happening as quickly as possible. -Heard in the news, went to the Reserve, applied. Literally in two days passed the VLK, signed. Good money is, so to speak, a nice bonus. But I've wanted to for a long time. If he went here, then to the end. I want to connect my life with this,- said recruit Mykhailo. The recruit is accompanied at every step. First, they talk about the conditions in detail, special people deal with the package of documents, conduct tests. After the process is completed, a person receives tangible property and goes to the base, where he will undergo basic military training. From the call to sending to the BZVP - up to 10 days. -A person is sent to basic military training. That's 45 days. After that, a person undergoes professional training - two weeks, and after that he undergoes adaptation - two weeks,- said -Red-, the commander of the assault company of the 92nd assault brigade. And that's not all. After the recruit is sent to the selected unit, he will also study again - up to ten days. This is reconciliation. Only after it, the recruit will perform tasks on the front line. -The guys who voluntarily signed a contract with our brigade and joined the Armed Forces show a very strong motivation. They take the initiative and learn. They have a desire to protect our native state,- states -Red-. As ArmyInform reported, several hundred people have already applied to the 28th separate mechanized brigade named after the Knights of the Winter Campaign for the new project -Contract -18-24-. As a reminder, -Contrakt 18-24- is a voluntary initiative that allows Ukrainians in the specified age category to join the Defense Forces of Ukraine for one year. The project offers a decent financial reward, professional combat training according to NATO standards and social guarantees that no civilian profession can provide.

Title: First grenades, then beehives — the Armed Forces used bees against the Russian infantry
Description: A video of a unique use of a formidable biological weapon was released on the regiment's channel. A group of our stormtroopers under the command of a soldier with the call sign -The Path- was clearing a house in the Pokrovsky direction, where they came across a basement with occupiers. The fighters used up all the grenades, but the enemy still resisted. After some time, after dropping two hives with Ukrainian combat bees into the basement with the Russians, the occupiers were liquidated. -Perhaps it is not according to NATO standards. But it's 2025 outside, and Russia is still trying to destroy us, sparing neither the lives of its citizens nor its resources, and it's definitely not going to stop,- the regiment commented on the video. As reported by ArmiyaInform, an attack aircraft of the Russian army stripped to the waist and tried to shoot down our bomber with aimed fire. But a reset from the pilots of the 225th regiment calmed him down.

Title: UAH 7.7 billion for fuel for the army: DOT planned purchases for the second quarter of 2025
Description: The Ministry of Defense of Ukraine informed about this on March 3. The purchasing agency of the State Rear Operator has already planned the purchase of fuel and lubricants for the II quarter of 2025. -The estimated cost of PMM purchases for the II quarter is almost UAH 7.7 billion. We aim not only to provide the military with the resources they need, but also to create an efficient, predictable supply system. It is important that all processes take place openly. This strengthens the market's confidence in public procurement in the field of defense,- said Hlib Kanevskyi, director of the Department of Procurement Policy of the Ministry of Defense of Ukraine. In particular, the procurement is provided for: -The updated plan takes into account the current needs of the defense sector and will ensure uninterrupted supply of critical resources for military units. Transparency and efficiency of procurement remain key priorities of DOT. All tenders will be announced on the Prozorro platform in accordance with current legislation,- said Maryna Eremeyeva, director of the fuel and lubricants program of the DOT. Ukrainian and international suppliers are invited to participate in tenders. Detailed information on the terms of participation will be available on Prozorro, and the procurement plan can be found on the website of the DOT. As reported by ArmyInform, the Ministry of Defense talked about the key indicators of the DOT's work for the year.

Title: Explosive guys - our drones learned how to make fireworks out of enemy attack aircraft
Description: The video of the combat operation was released on March 3 on the brigade's channel. Damage was caused by both kamikaze drones and skids. In the event of a direct hit, the Russians spectacularly exploded with all the ammunition they were carrying. Resets were not so bright, but no less effective. As reported by ArmyInform, the fighters of the 77th Airborne Dnieper Brigade of the Airborne Assault Forces of the Armed Forces of Ukraine told about fierce fighting at the Kuzya position.

Title: They promised to transfer to the rear units and avoid participation in hostilities: two soldiers wer...
Description: The National Police informs about this. Dilki are fellow servicemen aged 32 and 51. It was established that they offered a military serviceman who, due to his health, had to undergo a military medical examination, to assist in declaring him unfit or limited fit for service with further transfer to the rear military unit. They valued their services at $4,000. For this amount, they promised to influence the members of the military medical commission. And in case of refusal to provide money, they threatened artificial obstacles and an unfavorable decision of the VLK. -In addition, one more device of a younger perpetrator was established - he offered the wife of a serviceman a reward of $3,000 to help move her husband to a military unit with deployment to the rear,- the report said. In particular, he convinced the woman that he had influence on the military leadership and threatened that her husband would be involved in direct participation in hostilities if she refused to provide money. Law enforcement officers documented both transactions and stopped the offenders after they received the full amount from the woman and half from the man. They were notified of the suspicion and face up to eight years in prison with confiscation of property. As reported by ArmyInform, DBR employees in cooperation with the National Security Service of the National Police and the SBU detained the acting head of Khmelnytskyi of the district administration, which organized a scheme under which conscripts could receive the status of limited fitness for money.

Title: -Malva- bloomed: soldiers of the Defense Forces destroyed the newest Russian self-propelled guns, wh...
Description: The video of combat work was published on the page of the SSO Command of the Armed Forces of Ukraine. During aerial reconnaissance, SSO fighters discovered -Malva- in a hidden parking lot. The operators of the special unit instantly transmitted the coordinates of the target to the gunners, who delivered an accurate strike. -Malva- was destroyed, and as a result of the detonation of the ammunition, the quad bike, which was used to service the self-propelled guns, was also damaged. -We barely had time to remove it from the conveyor, and it was already scrapped,- SSO fighters ironically comment. - This is not -analog- for you, but -scrap-. As reported by ArmyInform, Special Operations Forces of the Armed Forces of Ukraine successfully conducted an operation to clear an industrial building where Russian occupiers were hiding. Due to the professionalism and coherence of actions, the SSO fighters eliminated a significant number of enemies without losses on their side.

Title: A law enforcement official faces 8 years in prison for transporting evaders
Description: The State Bureau of Investigation reported this on March 3. The head of the department of inspectors organized a channel of illegal border crossing outside the checkpoints in the area for which he was responsible. For this, he engaged a subordinate who, through messengers, looked for those willing to leave the country. -The official remotely coordinated their actions, giving instructions on the place and time of the border crossing. The cost of the -service- was from 6 to 10 thousand US dollars,- the SBI said. According to operational data, it was possible to transport up to five people per week under this scheme. To avoid exposure, the criminal even tried to bribe another law enforcement officer. The SBI detained the suspect while receiving payment from another -client-. Currently, the full range of persons involved in criminal activity is being established. -The detainee was informed of suspicion for h. 3 Art. 369 of the Criminal Code of Ukraine (offer, promise or provision of undue benefit to an official). The issue of selecting a preventive measure for him and removing him from office is being decided,- the message reads. The offender faces up to eight years in prison with confiscation of property. ArmyInform reminds that it is better not to break the law or risk your life, but to use the aggregator of vacancies in the Armed Forces and recruiting centers.

Title: - Except that the Yakut militias are on the moose - - on the eastern front, the Russian army is incr...
Description: Major Viktor Tregubov, the spokesman of the Khortytsia operational-strategic group of troops, told about this on the air of -Yedina Noviny- . According to him, this is a -very large horde.- But this horde has very heavy losses every day. Yes, during a month of fighting on the Eastern Front, the Russians are burning approximately as many tanks as some European countries have in their armaments. Russians are really getting fewer techniques. That is why we increasingly see -interesting- videos. -When the Buryats on ponies ride across a snowy field - something like the Battle of Kalka. If it had been 800 years ago, they would have looked very scary. But we have already passed the stage where at least something looks exotic. Unless some Yakut militiamen will come on the moose,- Viktor Tregubov said. As ArmyInform reported, the Defense Forces managed to partially stabilize the enemy's advance in the Pokrovsky direction. However, the Russians are pulling up reserves and using a large number of personnel, evenly -pushing- across the entire width of the front.

Title: An investigation into the rocket attack on the training ground in Dnipropetrovsk region has been lau...
Description: informs about this. Currently, the SBI is conducting a thorough investigation in order to establish all the circumstances of the tragedy and bring the perpetrators to justice. -The SBI expresses its sincere condolences to the families of the dead and injured defenders, sharing their pain at this difficult time,- the statement said. Investigative actions are ongoing, a special joint group of law enforcement officers, which includes SBI investigators, experts and other specialists, went to the scene of the attack. As reported by ArmyInform, the Ground Forces Command of the Armed Forces of Ukraine is determined to establish all the circumstances of the tragedy that occurred on one of the military training grounds as a result of an enemy attack. Major General Mykhailo Drapaty expressed his deep condolences to the families of the victims and assured that those responsible for the improper organization of security will be punished responsibility.

Title: 26 GCS mechanized demining machines will be delivered to Ukraine in 2025
Description: This was reported by the Ministry of Defense of Ukraine on March 3. Representatives of the Ministry of Defense of Ukraine visited the production facilities of the Swiss-German company Global Clearance Solutions in Germany, which develops and tests GCS demining machines. The visit took place at the invitation of the management of the Ukrainian branch of this company. The GCS-200 unmanned multi-purpose platform, samples of which the partners handed over to one of the military units of the Support Forces Command of the Armed Forces of Ukraine last year, has a number of modifications. As a tracked machine, it is very maneuverable and can turn in places with a minimum radius of about four meters. The project is financed by international donors, in particular the governments of Germany, Switzerland, Canada, the USA, Great Britain, and Lithuania, as well as through the United24 platform. The use of mechanized demining machines reduces risks for the deminer and speeds up land clearing processes. This was emphasized by Colonel Yevhenii Zubarevskyi, head of the department for the organization of mine action activities - deputy head of the mine action department of the Main Directorate of Mine Action, Civil Protection and Environmental Safety. -The Global Clearance Solutions company is one of the world leaders in the production of robotic complexes for demining, the equipment of which is part of the units of the Armed Forces of Ukraine, the State Special Transport Service, the State Emergency Service and the National Police. It is actively used in demining the territory of Ukraine,- he said. According to him, these are reliable modern complexes that have shown their effectiveness during the execution of works. -It is important to note that the company provides a full range of services to the Security and Defense Forces, which includes training and technical support for its vehicles. In addition to mechanized demining machines, Global Clearance Solutions is developing the latest technologies for automating the demining process with the use of UAVs and sensors to search for explosive objects,- Yevgeny Zubarevsky noted. As reported by ArmyInform, the long-term plan for the development of Ukraine's demining potential for 2024-2034 envisages the allocation of 700 mln to our state euros from partners for the purchase of equipment.

Title: -Sale- in Russian: how the Polish paratroopers together with the SBU disarm the enemy from the insid...
Description: The corresponding video was made public on page 95 of the separate Polish amphibious assault brigade Special service employees enlisted the cooperation of a serviceman from one of the Russian military units in the Kursk direction. This -businessman- in uniform agreed to sell ammunition, weapons and other weapons to Ukrainian defenders. And all this is for personal enrichment. -They fight for money. We are for victory!- - is succinctly commented in the 95th brigade. It seems that the Russian military is not only -demilitarizing- its own equipment, but is also ready to -demilitarize- its own warehouses. Not for free, of course. As reported by ArmyInform, the project -Contract 18-24- is gaining momentum, and applications are increasing. The 95th Separate Airborne Assault Brigade of the Polish Brigade reported on the signed contracts and sending new recruits to training centers. And also about the first payments under the contract.

Title: -Death from under the crown-: how Ukrainian drones wipe out the enemy from the face of the earth in ...
Description: The video of combat work was made public on the brigade's page. As the press service of the brigade reports, Ukrainian pilots operate with surgical precision, leaving no chance for the enemy to survive. -Pilots of the Signum 53rd Battalion of the Monomakh Brigade work in such a way that the enemy has neither a chance nor time to understand where the death came from,- the message reads. Almost 100 meters of solid forest, thick branches and treetops hiding the target, minimal space for maneuver - all this does not become an obstacle for Ukrainian soldiers. One recent example is the successful destruction of an enemy dugout along with personnel. -The enemy dugout along with the pilots and personnel have been destroyed,- the press service succinctly reported. As reported by ArmyInform, a rare case of double damage to the enemy was recorded by aerial reconnaissance units of the Signum 53 mechanized brigade named after Prince Volodymyr Monomakh.

Title: Ukraine is fighting for peace, and Russia continues the war — Volodymyr Zelenskyy commented on the l...
Description: This was reported by the head of the Ukrainian state on his page. -Over the past week, the enemy has carried out more than 1,050 drone strikes, launched almost 1,300 aerial bombs and more than 20 missiles. This is the purposeful destruction of Ukrainian cities and the killing of our people,- the head of state said. The President emphasized that those who really want peace do not strike the civilian population with ballistic missiles. That is why it is necessary to strengthen international support for Ukraine in order to stop Russian attacks. -We must focus on strengthening our air defense, supporting the army and creating effective security guarantees that will prevent the return of Russian aggression,- Volodymyr Zelenskyi said. The head of state emphasized that justice must prevail, and Ukraine believes in the power of unity and the restoration of a just peace. As reported by ArmyInform, in Kharkiv the Russian Geran-2 drone attacked a five-story residential building, as a result of which eight people were injured, including a 6-year-old boy. The incident happened around 22:15 on March 2 in the Kyiv district of the city.

Title: Regular attacks by infantry - the enemy constantly disturbs the northern border
Description: Andriy Demchenko, the spokesman of the State Border Service of Ukraine, told about this on the air of the Yedyni Novyni telethon. According to him, now the enemy is trying to enter our territory with assault groups in the direction of the settlement of Nowenke. But units of the Defense Forces are doing everything to prevent the enemy from gaining a foothold there. Such attempts by the Russians, as Andriy Demchenko noted, are regular. -These are not mass assaults. Actually, when the enemy tries to knock out the Defense Forces of Ukraine from the Kursk region, he, first of all, puts pressure on our units in the Kursk region from the flanks. And in the future, he is trying to expand the zone of active hostilities, trying to enter the territory of Ukraine,- said the spokesperson of the State Border Service of Ukraine. Earlier, ArmyInform reported that the enemy tried to hide his Nona self-propelled artillery system, transport and personnel. But the 5th separate Kyiv assault brigade once again proved that it is useless to hide from the Ukrainian attack aircraft.

Title: - They lie down in whole groups - snipers eliminated the Russians

Title: They burned equipment worth $9 million: in Kurshchyna, our fighters stopped two waves of Russian off...

Title: Spring has come, drones have returned — in the Pokrovsky direction, the sky is black with drones

Title: The Drone Line project starts today: how to join the best units of unmanned systems

The project has already received an additional UAH 4.6 billion in funding from the Ministry of Defense, which will be directed directly to the units: the purchase of UAVs, electronic warfare equipment, transport and everything necessary for the performance of combat missions. In particular, you can become part of one of the best formations: You will receive: Fill out the questionnaire on the website droneline.army.gov.ua or contact the hotline 0 800 301 314. Title: The commander of the Ground Forces of the Ukrainian Armed Forces initiated an independent investigat...

An independent review involving military counterintelligence has been ordered to ensure the impartiality of the investigation. Major General Mykhailo Drapaty assured that no one will be able to avoid responsibility by hiding behind formalities and bureaucratic procedures. -I predict that they will try to hide the truth in the fog of bureaucracy. But I will not allow this,- the commander of the Ground Forces emphasized. According to him, the system of formalism and outdated approaches that threaten the lives of servicemen must be finally broken in the Armed Forces. He emphasized that every commander - from the general to the sergeant - should be aware of the responsibility for his subordinates not only in battle, but also in the rear. The investigation into the circumstances of the tragedy continues. Major General Mykhailo Drapaty assured that all the details will be clarified, and the guilty persons will not be able to avoid responsibility.

Title: Swimming pool, vats, massage: how the Bukovyna paratroopers recover their strength after battles

Massages, water procedures, a pool, hot tubs, as well as the opportunity to relax in the fresh air - all this helps the military not only relax, but also to return to the formation in optimal shape faster. -Recovery is the key to combat capability,- says the brigade. -We understand how important it is to provide our soldiers not only with quality equipment, but also with proper conditions for rest and psychological relief.- Thanks to this approach, paratroopers can more effectively cope with stress, prevent emotional burnout and remain ready for new combat missions. Title: -Tornado- with foreign -stuffing-: how the Russian Federation uses foreign components for its own we...
Description: informs about this from the Head of the IOU. According to a study conducted as part of the War&Sanctions project, the Tornado-C projectiles use two fiber-optic gyroscopes: Using two gyroscopes at the same time is intended to increase the accuracy of the hit. The analysis showed that the Russian and foreign devices have a similar structure, including three Sagnac ring interferometers and electronics boards. The electronics of the Russian unit are assembled on the basis of the programmable gate array (FPGA) Altera Cyclone (USA), and the foreign unit is based on the STMicroelectronics (Switzerland) microcontroller. In addition, the Russian block contains components from manufacturers from: The complete list of components and their photos are published on the War&Sanctions portal. As reported by ArmyInform, another array has been published on the War&Sanctions portal data on foreign components in Russian weapons, in particular in attack drones, which the enemy uses in the war against Ukraine.

Title: -Iron Support-: How ground-based drones are helping Defense Force fighters on the front lines
Description: A photo report of the combat work of ground drones was published on the brigade's page. -The direction of ground drones in our country is developing very quickly and is setting trends for the entire robotics industry in the world,- the brigade notes. Ground robotic systems perform a wide range of tasks: Over the past year, Ukrainian engineers have developed more than 200 different ground robotic systems, including logistics-evacuators, mining robots and impact robots. Their main goal is to minimize military involvement in dangerous operations. The 65th military brigades actively use Ukrainian-made wheeled and tracked drones, and also cooperate with developers to improve the technology. -Any drone must be modified to perform tasks on a specific section of the front and under specific conditions (these are electronic warfare systems, and features of the terrain and radio horizon, the minefield of the territory, the nature of the soil, and the distance from the anti-aircraft missile system),- the brigade explains. As reported by ArmyInform, the operators of the -Ronins- unit 65 mechanized brigade of the Veliky Lug Armed Forces hit three Russian Buk M-3 anti-aircraft missile systems.

Title: -Hunter- from Kharkiv region: an infantryman told about the -thoughtlessness- of the occupiers and l...
Description: The story of the fighter was made public on page 32 of the separate mechanized brigade. Oleksandr is used to shooting with aim, but admits that he is not impressed by the very fact of killing the occupiers, but by their -thoughtlessness-. -The closest contact I had with the enemy was a few meters away. This is when the position was set up in a country house, and the occupants climbed right under the windows. Four dozen of them were already lying dead around the house. And what struck me was not the daily routine of killing the invaders with single shots, but the thoughtlessness with which they kept going and going at our bullets,- he says. The occupiers, even after seeing a large number of dead comrades, continued to advance. -If I had seen so many bodies of my comrades, I would probably have thought about whether it was worth rushing to that intersection. And these were staring eyes and pearls,- Oleksandr wonders. At night, Ukrainian fighters cut the backpacks off the dead occupiers, looking for power banks to charge radios and phones. -It was noticed that they did not even take enough ammunition with them. Usually four stores are staffed. It was as if they were gathering for the last time, in one end. Did they find an additional three packs of ammunition in one stocky man,- says the infantryman. On the front lines, every day is a challenge. -Especially now, in the cold,- adds the fighter. — We stock up on chemical warmers. Last time, the gap was covered, so they covered themselves with blankets and lit trench candles. If there is snow, then there will be no problems with water for tea. I always take my phone with me because I miss my family. There is a calm moment - I definitely look at photos with them.- Oleksandr gets into a bus to go to the positions. When asked where he gets his strength from, he answers that he does not need to be motivated, because he comes from Kharkiv Oblast and lived under occupation. -And we also dream about children with our beloved. And we want to give birth to them under a peaceful sky,- he admits. As reported by ArmyInform, Oleksiy Sereda, chief sergeant, technician of one of the navigation systems of the 114th tactical aviation brigade, known by the call sign -Panda-, told an incredible story of his combat experience in the Vovchan direction.

Title: The enemy attacked the most in three directions — the General Staff of the Armed Forces
Description: This is stated in operational information of the General Staff of the Armed Forces of Ukraine as of 08:00 on March 3. Yesterday, the enemy launched 1 missile strike against the positions of Ukrainian units and populated areas with the use of 4 missiles, as well as 88 airstrikes, including dropping 126 anti-aircraft missiles. In addition, it carried out more than 5,600 attacks, including 124 from rocket salvo systems, and engaged 2,375 kamikaze drones for strikes. The aggressor carried out airstrikes, in particular, in the areas of Lyutivka and Dovzhik settlements of the Kharkiv region; Pokrovsk, Hryshyne, Leontovychi, Novopavlivka, Oleksiivka, Horikhove, Voskresenka of the Donetsk region; Zaliznychne, Gulyaipole, Varvarivka of the Zaporizhzhia region; Sichneve, Dnipropetrovsk region. Yesterday, missile troops and artillery of the Defense Forces hit four areas of concentration of enemy personnel, weapons and military equipment, one radar station and four enemy artillery systems. Last day, on the Kharkiv direction, there was a skirmish in the area of ​​the settlement of Vovchansk. In the Kupyansk direction, there were three attacks by the occupiers during the day. The defense forces repelled enemy assaults in the areas of Zagryzove, Petropavlivka and Lozova settlements. In the Lyman direction the enemy attacked 15 times. Tried to advance near Novy, Yampolivka and Novomykhailivka. Last day, in the Kramatorsk direction, four assaults took place in the areas of Chasiv Yar, Hryhorivka and Aleksandro-Shultine settlements. On the Toretsk direction the enemy launched 14 attacks in the Toretsk and Shcherbinivka districts. In the Pokrovsky direction our defenders stopped 18 attacks of the aggressor towards the settlements of Tarasivka, Promin, Pokrovsk, Kotlyne, Udachne, Kotlyarivka, Andriivka, Vodyane Druge and Ulakly. On the Novopavlovsk direction Defense forces repelled five enemy assaults in the regions of Kostiantynopil, Privilne and Skudne settlements. In the Orikhov direction in the areas of Nesteryanka and Novodanilivka settlements, the invaders carried out two futile assaults on the positions of our defenders. Last day, the enemy stormed the positions of our defenders three times in the Dnieper direction. The enemy did not conduct offensive operations in the Siversky and Gulyajpilsk directions. In the Kursk direction last day, our defenders repelled 30 enemy attacks. The enemy fired 444 artillery shells, 12 of them from rocket salvo fire systems; launched 19 air strikes, dropping 30 anti-aircraft missiles. In the Volyn and Poliske directions no signs of the formation of enemy offensive groups were detected. Our soldiers inflict significant losses in manpower, equipment and actively undermine the offensive potential of the enemy in the rear to the occupying forces. In general, the Russian invaders lost 1,350 people last day. Ukrainian soldiers also destroyed 11 tanks, 16 armored combat vehicles, 60 artillery systems, two air defense systems, 61 operational-tactical UAVs and 109 vehicles.

Title: Peace as a priority: Volodymyr Zelenskyi on security guarantees, unity and support of partners
Description: The head of the Ukrainian state announced this on his page. The President noted that in the near future European countries will agree on joint approaches to future security guarantees and the end of the war. These positions will be presented to Ukraine's strategic partner, the United States of America. -Reliability, duration of peace and a correct agreement on the end of the war are truly our common priority,- emphasized Volodymyr Zelenskyy. The President thanked all Ukrainians who make daily efforts to defend the country - both at the front and in the rear. He emphasized that the strength of Ukraine lies in the unity of the people, because it is the decisive factor in the struggle for freedom and independence. -I want to thank all of you now - everyone in our native Ukraine who feels how much unity matters and how history changes when millions defend the dignity of their country. Our soldiers on the front, all our people, I am proud of you,- he said. The President also reported on his audience with His Majesty King Charles III, expressing gratitude for Great Britain's support to Ukraine. Diplomatic efforts of Ukraine in the international arena continue, and issues of security and post-war peace remain on the agenda of key negotiations. Ukraine continues to work with its allies to ensure reliable protection of its borders and a strategic future for the Ukrainian people. Title: The average age of a soldier of the US Army, the Ukrainian IDF and the eternal confrontation with th...
Description: “On the agenda is such a question as mobilization of people aged 18 to 24. Definitely on a voluntary basis, definitely under a contract, and the package offered by the state in the financial part is truly unique in world history. Is this the right step and is it a step forward? Definitely. Let's take a concrete example: the average age of a soldier in the US Army, which is considered the most powerful in the world, is 26 years. And the average age of a serviceman mobilized in our country varies from 40 to 46 years. We must be well aware that both mental resistance and physical fitness, conditionally, of 20-25-year-olds and people who have reached the age of 40 are not one and the same. This is an absolutely balanced, reasonable and very correct step, and the fact that everything is built on both financial and ideological motivation is incredibly good. I have no doubt that at least several tens of thousands of Ukrainians will definitely follow this program. Now, again, a bit of history. We have to understand that when there are big wars, there is always a big mobilization. And I must remind you that, for example, in the United States of America during the Second World War, mobilization began at the age of 18. And if you read our Constitution carefully, protecting the territorial integrity and inviolability of our state is the duty of every citizen. And so, they say that 22-23-year-olds cannot fight: this does not stand up to any criticism, because they are the same citizens. If they want to have all the rights that other citizens over the age of 25 have, then that is their duty. Both as a citizen and as an expert, I fully support this opinion of our top military-political leadership and believe that it will be useful and appropriate. And in general, if we continue to indulge in the general philosophy, then the time will come when absolutely everyone will serve, and all men without exception should receive basic military training, starting from the age of 18. That is, we have to build the Ukrainian IDF. We have no other option in the eternal confrontation with the enemy.

Title: Jet gigantomania: the UAE army flaunts the world's largest MLRS with 240 barrels
Description: However, such a decision can be explained not only by the great respect of the rulers of the leading countries of the Arab world for things characterized by adjectives of the highest degree of comparison with the prefix -nai-, but also by the not too large number of personnel in the UAE army. After all, according to the information of the experts of the Dutch defense portal Army Recognition, this monster installation, which includes weapons comparable in strength to six BM-21 -Grad- machines, and which by default has 30 artillery personnel, here there is a need for only 3 military personnel, ArmiyaInform reports. In general, analysts of the arms market noted that this multiple rocket launcher system, known as the JDS Multiple Cradle Launcher, developed by Jobaria Defense Systems for the UAE Armed Forces, is the most powerful installation of its class. It is better known by the name Jahanam, which in Islamic terminology means -hell-. Its firepower surpasses all existing analogues due to its unique architecture, which allows for the simultaneous release of 240 122 mm projectiles. The basis of the system is the concept of maximizing the number of guides in one salvo, which allows replacing an entire battery of traditional MLRS with a minimum crew. Instead of several machines working in coordination, a single platform has been created with four autonomous launchers, each of which has three transport-launch containers designed for 60 ammunition. The design of the complex is based on a five-axle semi-trailer towed by a heavy three-axle Oshkosh HET tractor. Our editors have repeatedly told in their publications about the family of these American high-powered special vehicles. But back to Jahanam. Its total length in the extended position reaches 29 meters, the width is 4 meters, and the height is 3.8 meters. The total mass of the system exceeds 105 tons, making it the largest among known jet systems. The armored cabin is equipped with protection according to the STANAG 4569 standard, which ensures resistance to the impact factors of small arms and shrapnel. For operation in extreme climatic conditions, a powerful air conditioner is provided, as well as an air filtration system to protect against weapons of mass destruction. In the initial position, the launchers are transported in a horizontal position, and when entering the combat position, they are deployed and fixed at a given angle. Four pairs of outriggers with hydraulic outriggers are used to provide stability during a salvo, which, when deployed, raise the landing gear completely off the ground. The system is equipped with its own 380V auxiliary diesel generator, which provides power for all electronic systems, including guidance and fire control. The guidance of the launchers is carried out by high-precision electric drives, while each of the four launchers can change the angle of inclination independently of the others, which allows you to fire at several targets at the same time or adjust the ballistics depending on the range. Each unit deploys in azimuth to an angle of up to 90°, and hydraulic cylinders provide angle elevation. Roketsan TR-122 and TRB-122 missiles are used as ammunition, created on the basis of Soviet shells for BM-21 -Grad-, but with improved range and accuracy characteristics. The length of the missile is 2.9 meters, the mass reaches 72 kg, and the warhead can be both high-explosive and cluster, which carries impressive elements in the form of steel balls. The effective range of fire is from 16 to 40 km depending on the modification of the projectile, and a volley of all 240 missiles allows you to destroy targets in an area of ​​up to 4 km². The rate of fire is 2 missiles per second, which means that a full volley can be fired in less than two minutes. This makes the system both powerful and highly effective at suppressing the enemy at large and large distances and areas. After the salvo is completed, the crew can either change position to avoid return fire, or reload using a specialized transport loader. Full reloading takes about 30 minutes thanks to the presence of two taps that allow two cartridges of ammunition to be replaced at the same time. This significantly reduces the time of preparation for the next salvo and increases the tactical flexibility of the complex. The fire control system is integrated with modern means of navigation and communication, including inertial and satellite systems, which allows effective coordination of fire support with other units. Built-in communications enable data transmission between batteries and command posts, enabling automated target allocation and high-precision salvo firing. All calculations of aiming angles are performed by the fire control system taking into account the data of the meteorological station, which allows taking into account the influence of wind, temperature and other factors on the trajectory of the missiles. For all its firepower, the JDS Multiple Cradle Launcher has a number of drawbacks related to its large size and limited mobility. The system is designed for use on roads with a hard surface and is poorly adapted to rough terrain, which makes it less effective in conditions of intensive maneuvering combat. In addition, the high cost and complexity of operation limit its mass production. However, for the conditions of the Middle East, where the armed forces can rely on a developed road network and the absence of dense forests, such a complex is a powerful means of fire suppression at long distances. After the first demonstration of the system at the IDEX international exhibition in 2013, the UAE Armed Forces adopted it for use. However, despite the unique characteristics, foreign countries have not shown interest in purchasing, which may indicate its highly specialized application. Later, Jobaria Defense Systems began development of improved variants of the complex, including versions capable of using heavier 300 mm missiles with a range of up to 100 km. However, such systems remain rather a demonstration of technological capabilities than a mass solution for modern armies. The development of various weapons and military equipment, aimed at improving the main characteristics, often leads to very remarkable results. The improvement of modern rocket systems of salvo fire, which pursued similar goals, several years ago led to the appearance of a unique combat vehicle JDS Multiple Cradle Launcher. As far as is known, this technique was used only by the UAE army, while other countries did not order similar combat vehicles. Such results, perhaps, clearly confirm the obvious fact: not every increase in performance makes sense and can find practical application. However, it should be taken into account that such conclusions are drawn based on the results of the study of a ready-made sample of equipment that has been tested and used in the troops. RSZV Jahanam demo. Video: Armyreco

Title: Camels for the Wagners, captives from the Far East and EW in a backpack: the story of eight-child Is...
Description: How did the enemy act in Bahmut? What did the captured Russians in the Zaporozhye direction tell? But how did military trickery allow the Isaiah group to seize an enemy position where 30 Russians were at once? A military man told our correspondent about it. -When the large-scale invasion began, I didn't see any other options for myself. I just couldn't stay at home. Although I also have a large family - I have eight children - but still. I have six sons, two daughters. The eldest son is also fighting. And, besides everything, I am from Kharkiv. When the enemy had already entered my city, I could not imagine anything else for myself: in any case, I had to go to fight. …We performed tasks in Bakhmut. Enemy infantry constantly stormed us there. The occupiers from Wagner fought against us. They actually know how to fight, let's not say otherwise. Because underestimating the enemy is pointless, it is a big mistake. They had small assault groups, up to 5 people at most. After they entered the building, the so-called camels went to them. These are people without weapons, with backpacks containing ammunition, food, and water. Because the assault group entered -lightly-: the equipment was normal, but they were mostly in sneakers. And these are young, trained guys. And their sports training was also quite good. These were not alcoholics or drug addicts of any kind. Later, reinforcements approached them. There was a case when we shot their senior group. Others left. We quickly took it, took the radio station and sat listening to the enemy. And, by the way, I was also wounded there in Bakhmut. …Then our unit was already working in the Zaporizhzhia direction. There it was necessary to capture the enemy. Most of them were convicts. In the same direction, there were cases when I participated in the evacuation of our wounded. One day, I, two officers and the operative on duty, because all the soldiers were in their positions, went to pick up our wounded. They took the electronic device with them in a backpack. It is necessary to understand that when you are involved in the evacuation, especially of the seriously injured, more people are needed for this, so that there is an opportunity to exchange with those who carry comrades. And we had to walk eight and a half kilometers there. At the evacuation point, we then called our quad bike, which was adapted specifically for transporting the wounded. And our guys were taken away on it. At that moment, the enemy tried to attack us with drones. We muffled something with REB. And I shot down one drone with a machine gun. There, in the Zaporozhye direction, we and a group of seven people captured 13 Russians at once in two days. We talked to them: they thought that the Ukrainians were no longer here, that the Poles were here. Well, we helped their wounded. Because I don't want to be like these scoundrels. Those we took that time were from the Russian Far East. There was also a case when again a group of seven people captured an enemy position, which was occupied by 30 Russians at once. Again, some were captured. Then we went to them in the morning. Passed through their positions: solely due to team cohesion, training and determination. Their observational posts simply put us to sleep. We approached one enemy dugout. I whisper in Russian: -Open!- From there, someone: -Are you Styopa?-. I answer: -Me, brother!-. They came out, I immediately said: -On the ground!-. There were five of them in that dugout. Then moved on to their position. They also had those who accepted the battle. But it did not help them. Because each of us thought only about the liberation of the Ukrainian land. Later, while still in captivity, we took some of them. We simply moved around them and shouted that they were surrounded and to surrender. They were misled. We then listened to their intercepts. So they thought then that there were many of us and that we were everywhere.

Title: About Russian wheat: from a savior to a tool of blackmail
Description: Ukraine is traditionally one of the largest grain exporters in the world. However, starting in 2022, Russia is deliberately blocking Ukrainian exports, creating an artificial deficit on world markets. This leads to rising prices and threatens the food security of many countries. Prime Minister of Ukraine Denys Shmyhal emphasized that such actions of the Kremlin are aimed at provoking global instability and hunger. While Russian officials talk about -saving- the world with their wheat, they are simultaneously engaged in stealing Ukrainian grain in the occupied territories. This grain is then sold on international markets under the guise of Russian, which is a gross violation of international law and ethical norms. Russia is not the first time using food as a means of pressure. Blocking Ukrainian ports and preventing grain exports, the Kremlin is trying to force the international community to make concessions. This is a cynical game on human lives, where hunger becomes a tool to achieve political goals. In response to Russian blackmail, Ukraine launched the -Grain from Ukraine- initiative aimed at supporting countries suffering from the food crisis. Within the limits of this program, Ukrainian grain is supplied to the most vulnerable regions of the world, demonstrating true solidarity and responsibility. Russian propaganda skillfully creates the illusion of benevolence, hiding behind it the true motives of control, blackmail and political pressure. The world community must be vigilant and not succumb to these manipulations, realizing that real help lies in supporting those who act transparently and responsibly.

Title: The European Union emphasized that Ukraine needs reliable security guarantees in a peaceful way
Description: This stated the President of the European Council, Antonio Costa, after the summit in London. -I will continue to work with all the leaders of the EU member states to prepare our special meeting of the European Council next Thursday,- Antonio Costa said. He noted that today's summit in London was very useful and important and reminded that a repetition of the Minsk agreements should be avoided. -And for this we need reliable security guarantees. Peacemaking goes hand in hand with peacemaking. We will continue to work to ensure lasting peace in Ukraine,- the President of the European Council emphasized. At the summit in London they discussed the challenges facing Ukraine and the whole of Europe, the fight against Russian aggression and the search for ways to a just and sustainable peace. As reported by ArmyInform, Ukraine and Great Britain reached a strategic agreement on the launch of the large-scale LMM-RapidRanger project to strengthen Ukraine's air defense.

Title: In the Kherson region, Russians attacked a civilian car with a drone, a woman was killed

A 53-year-old man was also injured. He was hospitalized with an explosive and craniocerebral injury, contusion. Doctors provide the victim with all the necessary assistance. Title: At the summit in London, four steps were agreed on regarding the situation in Ukraine: details
Description: This was announced by the Prime Minister of Great Britain, Keir Starmer, at a briefing on Sunday. The British Prime Minister noted that any new agreement to support Ukraine must be backed by force, and each country must do its part. The leaders agreed on the following steps: Keir Starmer noted that any agreement would involve Russia, but that it -cannot dictate the terms.- -Otherwise we will not make any progress. If a deal is made, it will need to be defended. What we have seen in the past is a cease-fire without any support, which was regularly violated by Russia. This is a situation we must avoid,- he said. It should be noted that at the summit in London, with the participation of President Volodymyr Zelenskyi, discussed the challenges facing Ukraine and all of Europe, the fight against Russian aggression and the search for ways to a just and sustainable peace. As reported by ArmyInform, Ukraine will be able to use 1.6 billion pounds of British export financing for the purchase of 5,000 more missiles for air defense systems.

Title: Rustem Umyerov: Ukraine and Britain are starting a joint megaproject for 5,000 missiles
Description: reported this by the Minister of Defense of Ukraine Rustem Umyerov. As part of this initiative, Ukraine will receive more than 5,000 LMM (Lightweight Multirole Missile) interceptors and launchers for them. LMMs are high-precision interceptor missiles that effectively destroy Shahed drones. They have already proven their effectiveness in the battles of 2022-2024. This agreement is one of the largest in the history of Ukraine in the field of security and defense. The £1.6 billion project is aimed at strengthening Ukrainian air defense by 2030. It is financed by a loan guaranteed by the British government agency UK Export Finance (UKEF). The project is being implemented together with the British company Thales, Ukrainian enterprises and the government of Great Britain. In addition to the supply of weapons, the interstate agreement provides for the localization of production and technology transfer, which will strengthen our strategic independence in the field of air defense. -I thank the British government and all partners for supporting Ukraine in the fight for freedom,- said Rustem Umyerov. As reported by ArmiyaInform, at the summit in London challenges faced by Ukraine and the whole of Europe, the fight against Russian aggression and the search for ways to a just, sustainable peace were discussed.

Title: Britain will provide Ukraine with 1.6 billion pounds for the purchase of missiles for air defense sy...
