(SOLAS) by disabling automatic identification systems. As ArmiyaInform reported, recently cases of damage to power and fiber-optic communication cables have become more frequent in the Baltic Sea. This most often happens when -unknown- warships or civilian vessels pass nearby.

Title: -Baba Yaga- makes hell for the occupiers: hexacopter -Vampire- hunts the enemy near Pokrovsk
Description: -Baba Yaga- in the district. Urgently to the shelter-, - heard on the radio intercepts how the Russians in a panic are waiting for the -arrival- of the Ukrainian attack bomber -Vampir-. -Where is the -night-light-, I can't see anything?-, -It's interesting how -Baba Yaga- looks, the boys said that it is big-, - the Rashists are not calming down. Another occupier answers them: -It's a pity that you never saw her, because if you really saw her, you would no longer be alive.- The occupiers of the -Vampire- cannot be seen at night, although it is very large in size, but the hum of the -Baba Yaga- engine, as they call our drone, can be heard even on approach. -In general, when the -Vampire- flies, the sound of the engine can be heard all the way behind kilometer It is audible, but the drone itself is not visible. The sound seems to be approaching from all sides, and the enemy simply does not understand where the danger is coming from. And this brings real terror to the enemy, because he doesn't know how to counter our bomber,- says -Owl-. Here's a look: Bohdan shows an aerial reconnaissance video from -Mavik-, where the Russian positions are in complete chaos, shooting, someone runs to the dugout, others run to the fields and explode on mines nearby. Some of the Rashists take assault rifles and aim in the air, trying to shoot down the -Vampire-. But it doesn't work. -Lord's Punishment- steadily approaches the enemy. -Owl- confidently leads the bomber to the target. 3 km from the front line, our reconnaissance found a shelter of enemy infantry. Here we see, -Vampire- is hovering over the target. The guy presses the button on the control panel, the anti-personnel mine rocket flies at the heads of the occupants, and not even a few seconds pass - an explosion. This is daily night combat work. The guys say: they are making hell for the occupiers on our land. Bohdan -Sova- told ArmyInform correspondents about the combat work of the attack drone-bomber, how -Vampyr- differs from another heavy bomber -Bat-, about courier delivery to the front line and why this drone has become a real terror for Russians. The weight of this UAV is 30 kg, it can carry 15-kilogram discharge, range of use up to 9 km. The optimal distance at which the crew flew and destroyed the enemy was up to 7-8 km along the line of battle. Under favorable weather conditions and battery capacity, work in the air is up to 40 minutes. This time is enough to fly to a point on the terrain, make an accurate hit on the racks and return. The calculation of the -Vampire- hits places where the enemy's manpower is concentrated: dugouts, shelters and various structures. Plus, he makes discounts on heavy and light armored vehicles of the Russian Federation. -I worked on the -Bat-, now I destroy the Russians on the -Vampire-. I will say that both drones are powerful and high-quality weapons. If we talk about advantages, then -Vampire- is somewhat better in terms of capabilities. Stronger communication, works more stably over a long distance and behaves better in the air when suppressing enemy EW,- says -Owl-. The choice of means of damage is very diverse: high-explosive fragmentation, cumulative, thermobaric and fragmentation-incendiary ammunition. If we need to hit the Russian infantry, then we stick to fragmentation projectiles. And if you destroy an armored tank, then you need cumulative-. -Vampire- works only at night, because during the day it can be spotted and shot down. It has an eight-mode thermal imager. Not every enemy EW according to its characteristics is capable of suppressing the bomber. But, of course, it is best to bypass the area of ​​influence of the enemy's EW or, if possible, gain a higher altitude. Communication with -Vampire- can be up to 500 meters. And most of the Russian EWs that are on the equipment have a range of up to 300-400 meters. Even if the calculation has lost contact with the drone, it can independently return via satellite to the point from which it took off. The guys say that it is very convenient and high-quality to do remote mining from the hexacopter. -We can remotely replace any point with the terrain that we are told. Probable routes of advance of enemy infantry, armored vehicles or tank-dangerous areas are determined. Our drones mine these roads with anti-personnel and anti-tank mines, block the enemy's approach routes, which complicates his logistics, – says Bohdan. The better the mined approaches to the positions, the less equipment and personnel of the enemy will be able to approach our defenders. The bomber crew is 3 people, an operator, an assistant operator and an ammunition engineer. The -Owl- has more than a year of experience in managing the -Vampire- and defeating the occupiers. As a standard, work on positions is up to 5 days. After obtaining the coordinates of the target, the average combat operation is 25 minutes: this is the time that the -Vampire- overcomes at a distance of, for example, 7 km to the target, the actual defeat and return. The maximum drop weight carried by the hexacopter on the occupiers is 18 kg. Once the boys were given the task of -extinguishing- the enemy in a one-story brick building. Inside are Russian attack aircraft that were preparing to storm Ukrainian positions. -It was night, they quickly flew up to this house. It is not easy to destroy an entire house at once. Performance technique is important here. First, ammunition is thrown from the drone at the accident site, the cord, which burns, pierces the roof, the projectile -enters- the house and rests. The cord burns out and ignites the discharge charge, an inertial explosion occurs, and then the ammunition itself ignites. After that, it detonates and tears apart the entire building. All! A goal in the goal! -Mavik- UAV crews work in tandem with us, conducting aerial reconnaissance and usually recording fire damage to the enemy,- – says Bohdan. When there is a very strong fog, it is a sign for the enemy to advance. Then they form small assault groups that advance towards our infantry positions. Recently, the enemy has been very active in our direction. It happened that 50 attack aircraft were advancing from different directions. The occupiers thought that the fog had already settled and they would not be seen, but it was a fatal mistake. In fact, the fog was still up and we caught them doing it. Then three sides of heavy bombers -Vampire- worked on the enemy. On the same day, but at night, the enemy attacked again. An assault group of 15 armed squads, each shouldered by infantry weapons. Plus, the enemy had anti-thermal imaging cloaks, which should have made the stormtroopers invisible. They put everyone together. In general, now the occupiers began to use invisibility cloaks much more in the dark. They hide and cover themselves in forest plantations. So they sleep undisturbed until morning. Logistics at the position of the infantrymen are now very complicated. You won't get by on the equipment, enemy FPV drones are hunting. Therefore, -Vampires- help a lot. Often using heavy drones, pilots deliver food, water, BC, medicine, batteries for walkie-talkies, cigarettes and even fuel for generators. That is, they work like a courier delivery: quickly and at the right time. The guys thank you for the -tasties- and then fight with even more enthusiasm. The crew of the -Vampire- hexacopter is a priority target for the occupiers. The enemy is constantly looking for the location of drones. Therefore, you have to be very careful. It is usually better to set up positions in destroyed settlements, of course, if there is no such possibility, you have to work from forest plantations. 4-5 km from the contact line. -In Karlivka, the Russians attacked our bomber with ordinary Maviks.- Just rammed. Then one blade on it was knocked off, but the drone will still be operational, because there are 5 more blades. -Vampire- bombarded the bombers with drops and turned back. The occupiers still practice dropping nets or ropes from above the bomber. If the blades become entangled, the drone may even fall. But fortunately, the enemy did not manage to do this. In fact, it is very difficult to do it in the air, you need to have a higher level of piloting skill. Katsaps have problems with this. Usually, one or two blades of the -Vampire- may fail, but the drone still performs its task and returns,- – Bohdan -Sova- told.

Title: Explosive 3D printers: ammunition containers and rocket fuel to be printed for the Pentagon
Description: According to the official portal of Supernova Industries Corp (-Supernova-), this company from Austin, the capital of Texas, received a $2 million subcontract from the American Center for Manufacturing and Innovation (ACMI) for 3D printing of military-grade energy materials, ArmyInform notes. And to put it simply, this contract is about the creation of explosives used to fill projectiles and solid fuel for rockets. As noted in a profile release from the firm, which specializes in advanced 3D printing technologies for various sectors of society's life, the allocation of funds took place within the Critical Chemicals Pilot Program of the American Center for Manufacturing and Innovation (ACMI) through a multi-purpose contract of the US Department of Defense. At the same time, we are talking about the production contract, although, considering its total amount, it can still be perceived as a guideline. Experts of the defense portal IKK Defense Express (DE), who understood the details of this agreement, reported that the know-how of Supernova Industries consists in the fact that they invented a way to print mixtures by laminating and adding their impurity, which leads to their hardening under the influence of light. -The technology is called Viscous Lithography Manufacturing (VLM) and allows printing materials with unlimited viscosity. And, as a bonus, in fact of any form in terms of complexity,- stated defense technology market researchers. The demonstration video shows that the company is already working with APCP blends. It is a solid rocket fuel based on ammonium perchlorate, and also with the RDX explosive - hexane. Supernova representatives also stated that their research chemists are also working on their own -energy formulas-. -In this way, with the help of 3D printing, the problem of -unstitching- the rather narrow mouth of ammunition production - combat equipment is solved. Usually traditionally, this process is done by pressing or pouring explosives into the case. And given that the ammunition case can also be printed on a 3D printer, everything becomes much more interesting,- DE experts concluded. -Our technology has the potential to overcome the design limitations of conventional manufacturing methods to produce the next generation of military-grade power components, including solid-state rocket motors (SRMs), explosives and pyrotechnics,- said Roger Antunes, founder and CEO of Supernova Industries Corp. Supernova has already printed simulated energy materials and is currently developing a methodology for printing energy formulas, -which will be a major breakthrough in the additive manufacturing industry,- the company said. In preparation for the Pentagon contract, Supernova launched a new Pulse Production Platform for high-viscosity resins in November 2024. The firm also introduced Viscogels, a proprietary portfolio of photopolymer materials that offer superior mechanical properties compared to competing resins. The new platform includes the Pulse One Viscous Lithography Manufacturing (VLM) 3D printer, Pulse Postprocessing Cell and Pulse Control Center software. This comprehensive manufacturing package is compatible with the company's Viscogels line, which includes twelve different materials spanning four families of photopolymers (rigid composites, plastic materials, rubber and silicone). Testing rocket propellant made on printers machines of Supernova Industries Corp. Video: Supernova Defense & Space

Title: Russian propaganda is definitely on steroids: they made up a -murderer- from the 92nd OShBr
Description: In February 2025, Russian Telegram channels began to share a screenshot of an article from the Ukrainian publication Dumka. In this -sensational- news, it was claimed that a serviceman of the 92nd Separate Assault Brigade (OShBr) first killed an employee of the TCC, who mobilized him, and then his relative. Sounds like the script for a cheap thriller, doesn't it? In fact, the original -Opinions- article from February 18, 2025 told about a 42-year-old resident of the village of Manchenki in Kharkiv Oblast, who was found guilty of two murders and robbery. The first crime occurred in 2020, when he killed a pensioner for 6,000 hryvnias, and the second - in 2023, when he killed an acquaintance during a quarrel. There are no mentions of the military, the 92nd OShBr or TCC employees in the article. But for Russian propaganda, such details are trivial. This fake is intended to discredit the Armed Forces of Ukraine and the mobilization process. Russian propagandists seek to sow panic and mistrust among Ukrainians, making them doubt their own defenders. But, as practice shows, Ukrainians have long learned to recognize these information leaks. Remember that information hygiene is our joint contribution to defeating the enemy on the information front. Do not allow propagandists to influence your consciousness.

Title: Shooting down UAVs, working with EW devices, pre-medical assistance: how recruits pass BZVP
Description: Colonel Yury Dyachenko, head of the Department of Training Training Centers of the Ground Forces Command of the Ukrainian Armed Forces, told the Ministry of Defense about this. -The fifth edition of the program has been implemented. In this program, we have already increased the practical component. 80% of BZVP is practice, another 20% is theory. 40% of BZVP are warfare tactics. Fire training accounts for 30%, and another 30% for other training subjects,- Yuriy Dyachenko said. The new program also includes special training. Among the innovations of the BZVP are the skills of working with UAVs and EW. -We have the study of EW tools used in the military and the basic skills of working with unmanned aerial vehicles. There is such a system of -Nettles- and the servicemen no longer use paper maps,- said the soldier. According to him, many changes have also been made in fire training. -In the fourth edition of the program, which was still active in November, we had 29 training shooting exercises. Now it's 43,- he said. One of the main areas of the new program is the skills of shooting down unmanned aerial vehicles using anti-drone guns. -Also included in the department's weapons study program. If earlier a serviceman performed exercises only with a submachine gun, now he performs with weapons that are in the department. These are RPK machine guns, PCs, and grenade launchers,- Yuriy Dyachenko explained. In addition, pre-medical care skills training has been increased from 14 to 20 hours. The MOU emphasized that the BZVP is now adapted to modern requirements and threats. From 60% to 95% of instructors at training centers have combat experience. -Why 60%? We have rear, technical specialties, technical specialties where it is not necessary to have combat experience. In order for servicemen to gain this experience, we regularly send them to mission areas. Now there are already somewhere 200-250 people in the areas of execution of tasks, performing combat tasks,- Yuriy Dyachenko said. Within the framework of the -Contrakt 18-24- project, recruits are already undergoing BZVP according to the updated program. As a reminder, -Contrakt 18-24- is a voluntary initiative that allows Ukrainians in the specified age category to join the Defense Forces of Ukraine for one year. The project offers a decent financial reward, professional combat training according to NATO standards and social guarantees that no civilian profession can provide.

Title: In the Kursk direction, Ukrainian defenders repelled nine enemy attacks

On the Lymanskyi direction during the day, the invading army carried out six attacks on Ukrainian positions near Novy and Novomykhailivka, four battles are ongoing. Our soldiers firmly hold the defense and inflict losses on the enemy. Borova and Boguslavka were hit by airstrikes. In the Toretsk direction since the beginning of the day, 10 clashes have taken place in the areas of Krymske, Dachne, Toretsk and Dilyivka settlements. One skirmish is still ongoing. In the Pokrovsky direction Russian invaders made 15 attempts to dislodge our defenders from their positions near Nova Poltavka, Elizavetivka, Promen, Pokrovsk, Pischany, Udachny, Preobrazhenka, Bohdanivka, Andriivka and Ulakli. The defense forces are holding back the onslaught and have repulsed 13 enemy attacks, with two skirmishes still ongoing. In addition, the enemy aircraft attacked Novopavlivka and Novoukrainka with anti-aircraft missiles. In the Novopavlovsk direction there were five enemy attacks in the regions of Konstantinopol and Skudny. Three enemy assaults were repulsed by Ukrainian soldiers in the Gulyaipil direction, near Privilny and Charivny. Ternove, Gulyaipole and Zaliznychne were hit by airstrikes. Three skirmishes took place in the Orichivsk direction, one attack by the Defense Forces has already been repulsed, the aggressor is trying, with the support of aircraft, to advance in the Pyatikhatok and Kamyansky districts. One battle continues in the Dnieper direction. In the Kursk direction, Ukrainian defenders repelled nine enemy attacks, two more battles continue until now, in addition, the enemy carried out 14 airstrikes, downing 17 anti-aircraft missiles, carried out 210 artillery strikes on the positions of our troops and the population points In the Kharkiv, Siver and Kramatorsk directions the occupying troops did not carry out active offensive actions. In the rest of the directions, there were no significant changes in the situation. We will remind, the loss of Russian invaders amounted to 1050 people last day. Ukrainian soldiers also destroyed 11 tanks, 15 armored combat vehicles, 61 artillery systems, a multiple-launch rocket system, an air defense system, 128 UAVs, and 107 vehicles of the occupiers.

Title: - No one wants a new wave of occupation - - The President on the need for security guarantees
Description: About it in to the Fox News channel. According to him, Putin violated the ceasefire agreements 25 times during 10 years. Therefore, Ukraine should receive security guarantees. -This is a very sensitive issue for our people. I speak as the president of the people who has been fighting this struggle for 3 years. I am very open, but I cannot change our attitude towards Russia. And I don't want to. To us, they are killers… I respect our soldiers and our civilians who work and support our soldiers. I can't say, -Stop!- No one will stop. Because everyone is afraid that Putin will return tomorrow. We want a lasting and just peace. We want security guarantees,- Volodymyr Zelenskyi said. According to him, Ukraine wants peace and will get it diplomatically. There must be negotiations. And Ukraine, Russia, the USA and Europe should be present at these negotiations. But Ukraine must be strong against them. -What does this mean? To know that our army is strong, that our partners are with us and we have security guarantees. We have broached the topic of NATO - this is the fastest way. But not all countries support it. I said now, if not NATO, no one insists. Let's build NATO in Ukraine… First of all, we want peace. And that's why I'm in the US. That is why I visited President Trump,- the President of Ukraine emphasized. Volodymyr Zelenskyi also answered the question of what will happen if Ukraine remains without US support: -It will be difficult for us. That's why I'm here. That is why we are talking about future negotiations. But we cannot lose our values, our people. We cannot lose our freedom. the Russians came to our territory. They came to our houses. They killed so many people. Just forget about it? Just to say that Putin is a great guy? No, it's without us. We don't need him. No one wants a new wave of occupation,- the head of state said. As reported by ArmiyaInform, on February 28, Volodymyr Zelenskyy met with the bipartisan delegation of the US Senate in Washington. After that, the President of Ukraine discussed with US President Donald Trump and Vice President Jay D. Vance about the Russian Federation's war against Ukraine. Title: In a month, the Ministry of Defense codified more than 100 new samples of anti-terrorist weapons
Description: The Ministry of Defense of Ukraine informs about this. For comparison, during the same period last year, about 60 samples of OVT were codified, and only about a third of them were of Ukrainian production. Among the new samples of OVT, which passed codification in February, in particular, unmanned aviation complexes, ammunition for them, electronic warfare systems, RKBZ means, automotive equipment, aviation equipment, etc. Since the beginning of the year, more than 10 new models of unmanned aerial systems with a fiber-optic control channel have already been codified and put into operation in the Defense Forces. -Innovative weapons are rapidly changing the picture of war. Aerial drones provide reconnaissance, situational control of the battlefield, and act as a means of destroying enemy targets. Currently, drones costing $500 hit enemy targets that cost tens or even hundreds of thousands of dollars,- Deputy Defense Minister Valery Churkin said. According to Valery Churkin, in order to effectively fight against a resource-rich aggressor country, we must achieve dominance in the development of new tools of war and their scaling. -We have to win the technological race against the enemy. Ukrainian drones, EW systems, reconnaissance, weapons of destruction must prevail in terms of their characteristics against enemy models. The arithmetic of war in our case is about increasing the lethality and effectiveness of the use of means,- added the Deputy Minister of Defense of Ukraine. As ArmiyaInform reported, for the first time NATO allowed developers and scientists from Ukraine to participate in a hackathon aimed at solving common threats.

Title: Autocivilka for veterans may become free again
Description: Iryna Borzova, the head of the subcommittee on issues of state youth policy, told about this on the air of the Yedyni Novyni telethon. According to her, now veterans pay 50% of the price of the insurance policy. But if the draft law is adopted in the second reading and signed by the President, the state will compensate veterans with an additional 50% of the cost of the motor vehicle. -That is, it will be free for veterans. Even if the war veterans from the beginning of 2025 have already concluded an agreement and paid for the car insurance, when the Law enters into force, they will be refunded the money they paid for the insurance contract,- Iryna Borzova added. She added that this would apply to a car registered directly to a veteran. As reported by ArmiyaInform, from January 1, 2025, changes have taken place in the Law of Ukraine -On Mandatory Civil Liability Insurance of Land Vehicle Owners-. From that moment on, participants in hostilities must issue a -civilian car registration-.

Title: In the Kherson region, a child was injured as a result of a Russian UAV attack

Doctors diagnosed a craniocerebral injury, a contusion, as well as a shrapnel injury to the face and abdomen. The condition of the child is serious. -Doctors are doing everything possible to save,- the message reads. Title: Border gambit: an illegal route that broke off at -Hertz-
Description: This is reported by the State Border Service of Ukraine. As it turned out, one of the detainees is a local resident who agreed to take the -client- across the border on the remote instructions of the organizer of the illegal scheme. The fugitive turned out to be a resident of Ternopil, who paid 20,000 US dollars for illegally crossing the border. He was promised an unhindered departure across the border, but the attempt was stopped by the border guards. An illegal migrant faces administrative responsibility. At the same time, the organizer of the scheme is currently wanted, and his accomplice has been detained under Article 208 of the Criminal Code of Ukraine. He was informed of the suspicion under Article 332 of the Criminal Code of Ukraine and a preventive measure was chosen - detention with the possibility of bail. The information is included in the Unified Register of Pretrial Investigations. ArmyInform reminds that it is better not to break the law or risk your life, but to use the aggregator of vacancies in the Armed Forces and recruiting centers.

Title: Ukraine wins the technological race: in February, more than 100 new models of OVT were put into oper...
Description: The Ministry of Defense of Ukraine informs about this. For comparison, during the same period last year, about 60 samples of OVT were codified, and only about a third of them were of Ukrainian production. Among the new samples of OVT, which passed codification in February, in particular, unmanned aviation complexes, ammunition for them, electronic warfare systems, RKBZ means, automotive equipment, aviation equipment, etc. Since the beginning of the year, more than 10 new models of unmanned aerial systems with a fiber-optic control channel have already been codified and put into operation in the Defense Forces. -Innovative weapons are rapidly changing the picture of war. Aerial drones provide reconnaissance, situational control of the battlefield, and act as a means of destroying enemy targets. Currently, drones costing $500 hit enemy targets that cost tens or even hundreds of thousands of dollars,- Deputy Defense Minister Valery Churkin said. According to Valery Churkin, in order to effectively fight against a resource-rich aggressor country, we must achieve dominance in the development of new tools of war and their scaling. -We have to win the technological race against the enemy. Ukrainian drones, EW systems, reconnaissance, weapons of destruction must prevail in terms of their characteristics against enemy models. The arithmetic of war in our case is about increasing the lethality and effectiveness of the use of means,- added the Deputy Minister of Defense of Ukraine. As ArmiyaInform reported, for the first time NATO allowed developers and scientists from Ukraine to participate in a hackathon aimed at solving common threats.

Title: Occupied Luhansk region: debts at the mines and forced passporting of the population
Description: This was reported by Artem Lysogor, head of the Luhansk OVA. It is noted that despite the promise of modernization and the installation of new equipment in 2025, the enterprise faced other realities - staff reductions and salary delays. Debts to employees have been accumulating for several months, and investors have not provided a clear payment schedule. During the year of work of the new owner, there were cases when one month's salary was paid in installments - in six stages. In addition, in the occupied part of Luhansk region, from July 1, mobile numbers will be blocked for those who do not update their personal data. For this, people are forced to get a Russian passport and contact telecommunications operators. Such requirements were introduced in accordance with changes to Russian legislation that entered into force on January 1. At the same time, ORLO stopped selling, reissuing and renewing numbers for foreign citizens and stateless persons. As ArmyInform reported, in the temporarily occupied territory of the Luhansk region the Russian military took up the -education- of the young generation. In the schools of the so-called LPR, the -patriotic- program -Luhansk character- started on September 1, where children were divided into -yellow children-, -pioneers- and -laborers-.

Title: The results of February: Russia lost more than 36,000 soldiers and thousands of pieces of equipment
Description: This is reported by the Ministry of Defense of Ukraine. In February, Russian tactical aviation dropped more than 3,522 anti-aircraft missiles. In January, it used a total of about 2,400 guided aerial bombs. According to the information of the General Staff of the Armed Forces of the Russian Federation, in February the Russian army suffered significant irreversible and sanitary losses of manpower - 36,570 people. Conventionally, this is the number of three motorized rifle divisions. It will be recalled that the Russian army suffered the greatest loss of personnel in December 2024 - 48,670 killed and wounded. Also in February, our defenders destroyed and damaged 1,415 enemy artillery systems. This amount would be enough to equip more than 78 artillery divisions (18 barrels in the Artillery Division of the Russian Army). In addition, 331 enemy tanks were knocked out or disabled during the month. Conventionally, these are 10 enemy tank battalions (there are 31 vehicles in a tank battalion of the Russian army). Over the past seven months, this is the highest rate of enemy losses in this nomenclature of OVT. The agency added that our defenders were most effective against enemy tanks in October 2023, when 521 enemy tanks were destroyed during the month. Also, 596 enemy armored fighting vehicles were destroyed or damaged by the Defense Forces. Conventionally, this is the number of BBM for almost three motorized rifle divisions of the army of the Russian Federation. In the shortest month of the year, our defenders hit the largest number of enemy vehicles in the entire period since the beginning of the large-scale invasion of the Russian Federation - 3,472 vehicles and tankers. As reported by ArmyInform, over the past 24 hours, the army of the aggressor country has lost 1,050 personnel and 61 artillery system of various models.

Title: The number of victims has increased in Kharkiv: the consequences of a large-scale attack
Description: The General Prosecutor's Office informs about this. According to the investigation, on the night of March 1, the enemy launched a massive drone attack on three districts of Kharkiv. Shevchenkivskyi district A UAV hit an arch near a multi-story residential building. A 6-year-old girl experienced an acute reaction to stress. Another blow came to a medical facility in the city center. Four women, patients of this medical facility, were injured. One of the drones aimed at a roadway near a car dealership and a residential complex. A UAV attack on the territory of the garden association was also recorded. Kyiv district The drone hit a non-working office building, which had already come under enemy fire several times. Another UAV hit a two-story commercial building. Apartment buildings, pharmacies, cafes, shops, etc. were damaged. The woman experienced an acute reaction to stress. A man and a 6-year-old boy were injured by glass, another man hit his head during the explosion. Law enforcement officers also recorded a drone strike at a gas station. Three employees were given medical assistance: they were diagnosed with an acute reaction to stress. Novobavarsky district The drone aimed at a private residential building. Fortunately, there was no one there. The explosive wave also damaged the premises of the printing house. Prosecutors and police investigators are taking all possible and appropriate measures to document war crimes committed by the Russian military. As reported by ArmyInform, tonight Russian troops launched massive strikes on Kharkiv and its suburbs, attacking the Kyiv, Shevchenkiv and Novobavary districts of the city, as well as the Kharkiv district of the region.

Title: Ukraine seeks to involve France in the joint development of the defense industry

Serhiy Boev informed that critical needs of Ukraine remain air defense and anti-aircraft systems, interceptor missiles for existing systems, heavy armored vehicles and ammunition. -In addition to investments and production development, Ukraine is also interested in the purchase of ready-made weapons. The needs remain significant, the situation at the front is dynamic, so we need quick solutions,- the deputy minister concluded. Serhii Boev also informed the special representative of the French president about Russia's current plans. He emphasized: the actions of the aggressor show that the Russian Federation is not going to stop the war and continues to build up its capabilities in the formation of units, the recruitment of new people and the development of military equipment. -Continuation of support from partners and willingness to increase it is important for us. Ukraine must be strong on the battlefield - this is important for achieving sustainable peace,- noted Serhiy Boyev. As reported by ArmiyaInform, the Ministry of Defense of Finland launches a new program to support Ukraine, which involves placing orders for the production of weapons in its own defense industry.

Title: -The army is fighting for the best personnel-. The expert explained the strategic importance of the ...
Description: This opinion was expressed by a lawyer, a serviceman of the Armed Forces of the Ukrainian Armed Forces, Oleksandr Musienko, in a conversation with an ArmyInform correspondent. -I believe that it is a very correct initiative to attract recruits to the ranks of the Armed Forces of Ukraine, motivating them, creating very serious conditions that provide both the opportunity to make a career in the ranks of the Armed Forces of Ukraine, and stimulating it with a good social package, the opportunity to receive payments, loans for housing, cars, etc. That is, there is also a stimulus, including a material one. Of course, moral factors are important; this is actually a call to stand up and defend the homeland in a difficult period,- says Oleksandr Musienko. He emphasizes that -the state did not use the method of coercion-, but the method that involves encouragement. According to him, the model of the project -Contract 18-24- was created according to -NATO- standards and provides for the involvement of volunteers through the recruitment system. -This is an opportunity to choose a position, a brigade, a unit where you want to do military service in the future. And this gives the impetus just for Ukrainians who are now choosing their future for themselves and choosing a profession and specialty by joining the ranks of the Armed Forces,- says the expert. In addition, according to Oleksandr Musienko, new recruits can actually get answers to two questions. -The first is the opportunity to get a profession that will be related to the protection of sovereignty, the protection of the motherland. That is, it is about moral encouragement. And this is very important. And we are also talking about financial incentives - I mean the opportunity to build a career and receive a decent reward for it. That is, we are even talking about the actual market component, which is becoming competitive, the army is fighting for the best personnel. That's important.- Musiyenko reminded that since the network of recruiting centers started working in Ukraine, many Ukrainians have been interested in the possibility of joining the ranks of the Armed Forces of Ukraine. -And it's already working. Our brigades, our Armed Forces need new people in different specialties, because it is strength, stamina, health, it is, in fact, an organism that can be more suitable for physical exertion, etc. Therefore, I believe that this idea is very useful, promising and will certainly give an impetus to improve the composition of the Armed Forces of Ukraine, and for the future, even for the post-war period, will provide an opportunity to form such a necessary reserve for us and to attract Ukrainians to the Armed Forces of Ukraine,- Oleksandr Musienko summarized. As a reminder, -Contract 18-24- is a voluntary initiative that allows Ukrainians in the specified age category to join the Defense Forces of Ukraine for one year. The project offers a decent financial reward, professional combat training according to NATO standards and social guarantees that no civilian profession can provide. As reported by ArmyInform, within the scope of the -Contract 18-24- project, up to the 28th brigade named after the Knights of the Winter Campaign hundreds of people applied. Dozens of candidates have already passed the military medical board, and some have signed contracts.

Title: The -Panther- is being tamed in the Apennines: Italy will purchase a significant number of KF-51 Pan...
Description: As stated in the editorial of the defense portal The Defense Post, official Rome will allocate about 10 billion euros ($10.4 billion) specifically for the purchase of KF-51 Panther tanks (-Panther- in Ukrainian), which will be equipped according to Italian military decisions, ArmiyaInform reports. At the same time, the Italian defense ministry announced that the program would be -the largest contract in history- for the German industrial partner. In the latest update, Italy said that the entire budget for the purchase of armored vehicles to expand the country's armored fleet over 15 years, which will include 350 Lynx combat vehicles in addition to the Panthers, with exercised options will not exceed 30 billion euros ($31.2 billion). Our editors told in their materials about the Lynx infantry fighting vehicles (BMP) of the new generation. In the order from the government of the Italian Republic for the KF-51 Panther MBT, certain -accents- were made on the national requirements. As experts of the Dutch defense portal Army Recognition emphasize, one of the key elements of the KF-51 Panther is the integration of advanced technologies that increase its effectiveness on the battlefield, in particular in terms of protection and combat capabilities. The most notable feature is the integration of the Active Protection System (APS), in particular the Strike Shield system. This system is designed to detect and neutralize incoming threats, such as anti-tank projectiles and missiles, before they reach a combat vehicle. This active protection mechanism significantly increases the vehicle's survivability on the modern battlefield, where the threat of precision munitions is ubiquitous. The Strike Shield is expected to be a critical component in the successful operation of the KF-51 Panther, enhancing its ability to operate in high-risk environments while minimizing vulnerabilities. In addition to APS, the KF-51 Panther will also be equipped with barrage munitions - unmanned aerial vehicles with an integrated combat load, capable of conducting patrols and destroying found targets. Unmanned munitions, often called -suicide drones,- are capable of remaining in the air for long periods of time, seeking out and striking critical targets such as enemy tanks, air defense systems, and command centers. Deploying these munitions with the KF-51 Panther could give the Italian Army a significant advantage, allowing the tank to not only engage enemy forces directly, but also strike from a distance, thus increasing its overall combat effectiveness. These advances are part of a major effort to modernize the Italian Army's armored vehicle fleet, with the KF-51 Panther being developed in collaboration with Germany. The vehicle will retain the 120 mm main gun, ensuring continuity with current NATO standards, while the integration of modern technologies such as digital systems for C4I (command, control, communications, computing and intelligence) and improved mobility will ensure KF-51 Panther to remain at the forefront of armored warfare. This tank is designed to replace older platforms, providing better protection, lethality and versatility for the Italian Army. The KF-51 Panther is expected to play a key role in future operations both in Europe and beyond, as NATO continues to adapt to new threats. The combination of advanced defense systems, barrage munitions and an emphasis on innovation make the KF-51 Panther a significant asset in the Italian Army's arsenal, contributing to its strategic readiness and defensive capabilities for years to come. The news demonstrates Italy's commitment to keeping its armored forces competitive in NATO and underscores its investment in next-generation military technologies that are shaping the future of warfare. As these developments continue, the KF-51 Panther is likely to become a centerpiece of Italy's military modernization efforts, and its capabilities could influence the future of armored vehicles globally. KF-51 Panther is the future main battle tank of the Italian Army. Video: Rheinmetall

Title: Aquanauts, -the shadow fleet and the vessel -Amber-: the spokesman of the Navy on the actions of the...
Description: So, recently in the Baltic Sea in the economic zone of Sweden near the island of Gotland, the Swedish Coast Guard discovered another damage to the cable that runs between Finland and Germany. It is about the C-Lion 1 cable. Such cases happen regularly, and many experts associate these incidents with the passage of ships of either the Russian -shadow fleet- or ships with Russian crews under the flags of various states. Such cable damage is detected immediately, and if you look at the cable map, it is quite dense in the Baltic. Quite a lot of various communications take place there. It is also known that the Russians have special units created specifically for underwater sabotage. Dmytro Pletenchuk, spokesman for the Navy of Ukraine, noted that -We cannot accuse any country without having the relevant evidence. In any case, it will be clear after all the appropriate measures have been taken there. Moreover, Western civilization, in principle, is built on evidence and on the competitiveness of the process. Yes, the Russians have a military unit that has the appropriate equipment for working in the depths and trained personnel. These personnel are called hydronauts, sometimes also aquanauts. And the requirements for this personnel, their qualifications are as high as for cosmonauts. They aim to specifically conduct such events. I am sure that in the Baltic the members of the North Atlantic Alliance member countries can take care of themselves, but in any case, of course, in this situation one should look carefully and pay a lot of attention to the underwater situation. We are more outside observers in this situation, but still this situation is interesting to us, because there are also various communications in the Black Sea. Some experts agree that these incidents are a preparatory stage for aggression. So, in January, the Irish military spotted an -auxiliary- and, in fact, a reconnaissance vessel -Amber-, which has two underwater vehicles among its equipment and may also have the appropriate personnel on board. The Amber vessel was spotted in the Irish Sea, inside Ireland's exclusive economic zone, 5-7 km north of the cables connecting Ireland and Britain. The Irish recorded the crew of a Russian ship operating three drones over Irish waters, apparently conducting surveillance. At the same time, the Russians turned off the ship's transponder, which informs everyone around about the location of the vessel. Some experts agree that the Russians may be preparing for their next aggressive actions in this water area. And in addition to mapping and directly reporting all these communications on their map, they can also resort to, for example, some time-delayed sabotage. Therefore, the damage to underwater cables with the help of special means is a sign of the Russians' preparation for aggressive actions against the EU.

Title: They destroyed the enemy D-30 along with the calculation: gunners of the 30th OMBr on old Acacias -u...
Description: For several weeks, one of the sections of the front, which is defended by the brigade, was actively stormed by Russian troops. We have already told how these assaults helped to repel tankers -30's-. But the efforts of other units were also directed at this. Artillerymen actively supported their infantry. It is important that enemy convoys and assault groups do not even come close to our positions, says battery commander Andrii with the call sign -Uzh-: -We try to destroy them while they are moving. To break their order of battle, to inflict losses. So that as little as possible of their infantry approached our VOPs. The main thing is to knock down their pace of attack. When the order of battle breaks down, they start to panic, go in different directions. No matter what the opponent is, when he sees heavy losses, he already loses the -zeal- to advance.- Andrii has been in the army for 17 years. After studying at the National Academy of Ground Forces, he joined the 30th Brigade, where his friends served. During the period of the large-scale invasion, the entire combat path was completed together with the brigade. According to him, now they can work most effectively on infantry and light armored vehicles. And this is exactly what the enemy uses most often. -Even if the gap is not far away, this technique breaks through fragments and stops. And the personnel of the enemy will suffer losses in it. They attack with everything they have. Light armored vehicles of the MTLB type, various civil vehicles – -Zhiguli-, different pickups, -loaves-. Everything that goes, that's what they leave on. They often attack on motorcycles. At least 10-20. And there were 30-40 at one time. If the equipment runs out, they advance on foot. But so far, apart from heavy losses, nothing significant has been achieved.- And the enemy's equipment does not reach our positions at all, Andriy adds. Vitaly with the call sign -Pyton- also talks about the high intensity of attacks. He is the platoon leader in this battery. He says that he was on vacation when the first strong -thrusts- occurred. But he constantly monitored the situation. -I look, and the kombat is breaking up here. Because all the guns were working here at once. This usually does not happen. And then here, apparently, every bush was shooting.- The -Uzha- battery works on Soviet 2C3 -Acacia- self-propelled guns of 152 mm caliber. The equipment is not new, but if it is kept in good condition, repaired and serviced on time, it also shows good results, he says. -We have trained repair crews. They know this technique well, know where to get parts, repair quickly. A significant advantage of Western equipment is that it works on 155 caliber. It has more shells. And we have problems with shells. Because this is Soviet caliber. And our supplies are running out, as well as the enemy's, by the way. So we are waiting, maybe someday they will be rearmed.- But -Python- considers -Acacia- to be one of the best in its class. After all, it is very well suited for modern combat conditions. -There are those around who work on tanks (we are talking about the German self-propelled guns PzH 2000, which were transferred to Ukraine by Germany - ed.) and others, but I believe that the 2C3 is one of the best. It is compact and we can hide it. And she hits far. I also see problems with -Dana- and other self-propelled wheeled vehicles. They have to leave. They stand in the open space. And we can open fire at any moment. We are hidden, camouflaged and hit far. For example, if I were given a new 2C3 or a shell, I would choose the 2C3. Also, in my opinion, the self-propelled gun should have a -gooseneck-. Not wheeled. This is what happens here in winter, autumn and spring – everything gets stuck. Only the -goose- is feeling normal.- However, problems with the ammunition do appear from time to time, continues -Python-. -Give us new shells, so that they have a stable charge and all factory parameters, it will beat absolutely by the book. Very apt. The whole problem lies in projectile charges. Because we have already chosen everything. Vinaigrette is brought from all countries. And give us new shells, it will crack like a shell.- Vitaly -Python- has been fighting since 2022. He once graduated from the military department with an artillery specialty. When he was mobilized, after training he got into the 30th separate mechanized brigade named after Prince Konstantin Ostrozky. He says that most of the personnel of his unit have been fighting since the very beginning of the large-scale invasion. During this time, the war changed fundamentally. It became much more difficult. -Back then, a drone could be found somewhere once a month. And we were not talking about FPV and -Lancet- at all. And we worked from an open area. So now you won't work. Now disguise comes to the fore. And not only masking. We bury ourselves. We bury the car.- With good camouflage and a clear organization of work, it is very difficult to find artillerymen, Vitaly continues. -We can be in one position for a year or two. Drones flew over us for over a year and did not see us. But if they notice, then you have to change your position very quickly. At first, they work as a -barrel- (barrel artillery - ed.). And then -Lancet- takes off. In addition to repelling enemy assaults, gunners are engaged in counter-battery combat. According to the battery commander Andrii, the last thing to be destroyed was the D-30 gun along with the calculation and ammunition.

Title: stories about -non-existent- armed forces brigades: when propaganda crosses the border of absurdity
Description: In their attempts to discredit the Ukrainian volunteer movement, the Russian media spread information that Ukrainians are raising money for military units that do not exist in nature. This statement has no evidence and is another attempt to sow distrust among Ukrainians and the international community. Interestingly, such accusations are often a projection of the Russian side's own actions. For example, as early as 2022, cases of the creation of fake charity sites imitating Ukrainian funds to collect funds to support the occupation forces were recorded. the Russians copied the design of well-known Ukrainian foundations, translated their materials and attributed the collected funds to their -volunteers-. Of course, fraud can happen in any society. For example, pseudo-volunteers were exposed in Kyiv who collected funds allegedly for the needs of the Armed Forces, but spent them on their own needs. However, such cases are isolated and do not reflect the general picture of selfless work of Ukrainian volunteers. The main goal of such fakes is to undermine trust in the volunteer movement and reduce support for the Armed Forces of Ukraine. By spreading false information about -non-existent- brigades and fraudulent assemblies, Russian propaganda is trying to demoralize Ukrainian society and sow discord. To avoid becoming a victim of misinformation: Remember that informational hygiene is no less important than physical hygiene. In times when propaganda tries to influence our thoughts and actions, critical thinking and mindfulness are the best defenses.

Title: World leaders reacted to the conversation between the presidents of Ukraine and the USA
Description: -Dear Zelenskyi, dear Ukrainian friends, you are not alone,- Polish Prime Minister Donald Tusk wrote in X. -Ukraine, Spain is with you,- said the Spanish Prime Minister Pedro Sanchez. -Russia is the aggressor, Ukraine is the victim. We must respect those who fought from the very beginning,- emphasized French President Emmanuel Macron. Also, Latvian President Edgars Rinkevics in X stated that Ukraine is a victim of Russian aggression, efforts for a just, durable peace should not be spared and that his country supports Ukraine. -Thank you America, thank you for your support, thank you for this visit. Thank you to the President, Congress and the American people. Ukraine needs a just and long-lasting peace, and we are working precisely for this,- the President of Ukraine wrote in X. We will remind you that on February 28, Volodymyr Zelensky met with the bipartisan delegation of the US Senate in Washington. After that, the President of Ukraine discussed with US President Donald Trump and Vice President JD Vance about the Russian Federation's war against Ukraine.

Title: Knife duels between soldiers: the Armed Forces showed how mobilized people are trained at the BZVP
Description: The corresponding video appearedon their page. Classes in knife fighting are the development of physical and psychological resilience of servicemen. Practiced skills will help in various situations during military service. -It is important that at the end of each training there are duels between servicemen, this helps to better assimilate the acquired skills, as well as to understand the body's reaction to the stress that occurs during combat operations,- the military assured. The instructors point out that the chance of two servicemen meeting at knifepoint is minimal, but in modern warfare you need to be ready for anything. We will remind you that for the first time at the Pivnich military base a unified knife combat training system for mobilized soldiers is being introduced for the first time. ArmyInform also talked about the adaptation course of mobilized people before sending them to zero.

Title: Grill-mobile: -Windbreaker- roasted a Russian BMP
Description: They published a video of combat work on their channel on February 28. -Grill-mobile. The enemy BMP was fried with an FPV drone. We destroy the enemy every day! The crew of the -Vitrol- is working,- commented the Ukrainian defenders.

Title: He stopped the infantrymen of the Russian Federation, who were trying to break through to the positi...
Description: The story of the fighter was published on the page of the brigade. He has been fighting since the beginning of a full-scale war. As a machine gunner in an assault group, he learned to act quickly and in advance. -Once, while at the observation post, Rodion noticed an attempt by a group of enemy infantry on motorcycles to break through to our positions. He destroyed the first enemy, wounded the rest. The enemy has lost mobility, and his assault has been thwarted,- the report said. UAV operators have completed the final sweep. In the war, Rodion used to support himself with the words: -If you take up a job, do it well.- -He followed this life motto even in his peaceful life, working in construction. At home, a large family is waiting for him, whose support gives him strength. Motivation and will help him to confront the enemy,- 127 Obr TrO said. As reported by ArmyInform, Serhiy with the call sign -Forest- - a soldier of the 61st separate mechanized Steppe brigade - during the battles in Donetsk region saved his comrades who were surrounded in the village of Orlivka.

Title: The troops of the Russian Federation shelled Dniprovshchyna, a kindergarten was mutilated
Description: informs the head of Dnipropetrovsk OVA Serhii Lysak about this. In particular, the Russian army wounded two people in the Sinelnyk region, men aged 48 and 35. -They will be treated on an outpatient basis. The aggressor attacked a total of two communities — Mezhivska and Velikomykhailivska. Used drones and KAB. A kindergarten, 13 private houses, cars and power lines were mutilated,- the message reads. An 84-year-old woman was also injured in Nikopol region. She was treated at the scene. -During the day, Nikopol, Myrivska, Pokrovska, Marganetska communities were hit in the region. The enemy attacked with drones. A private house and a truck were damaged,- said Serhiy Lysak. As reported by ArmyInform, this night air defense units shot down 107 enemy attack UAVs, another 97 simulator drones did not reach their targets and were located are lost

Title: In Transcarpathia, border guards exposed 12 smugglers in a day
Description: The State Border Service of Ukraine informed about this on February 28. As a result of the measures taken, five attempts to move seven conscripts across the border were stopped. Thus, during an attempt to illegally transport two men to Romania across the Tisza River, three suspects were exposed in Zakarpattia Oblast. The perpetrators planned to earn $14,000 from the illegal operation. They also exposed five persons involved, who intended to ferry two border violators. The law enforcement officers documented the fact of receiving an illegal monetary reward in the amount of 9,000 euros from one of the border violators. Two shippers with a client were caught red-handed after they received an illegal reward in the amount of $8,000. In addition, two more people were detained. The law enforcement officers documented the fact that one of the border violators transferred funds in the amount of 7.5 thousand US dollars to the smugglers. If the guilt of members of criminal groups is proven, they face punishment in the form of deprivation of liberty for a period of seven to nine years. Currently, investigative actions in cases are ongoing. ArmyInform reminds that it is better not to break the law or risk your life, but to use the aggregator of vacancies in the Armed Forces and recruiting centers.

Title: The Steel Border FPV drone destroyed the engineering equipment of the Russians
Description: The video of combat operation appeared on the page of the State Border Service of Ukraine. FPV drone operators quickly reacted to the detected target and delivered a targeted strike. -Due to accurate damage, the enemy will no longer be able to use this technique. The -Steel Border- fighters continue to effectively destroy enemy equipment and fortifications, leaving no chance for the invaders to rest,- the message reads. Earlier, ArmyInform showed how in the Sumy direction fighters of the Steel Brigade border- with the help of drones discovered several shelters of the occupiers.

Title: The occupiers demand that schools finance training -cannon fodder-
Description: informs on February 28, the Countering Disinformation Center (CCP) with reference to the Defense Forces of Ukraine. In 2024, prosecutors filed almost 200 such lawsuits, and in most cases the court sided with the state. Schools are required to equip a shooting range, purchase stores for Kalashnikov assault rifles with training cartridges, grenade models, shooting simulators, etc. It is noted that most educational institutions do not have money for this equipment, so they have to save on teaching materials or collect money from parents. As noted in the CPD, the lack of funds is explained by the fact that Moscow is cutting social programs due to huge military expenditures. -For example, the authorities of the Russian city of Irkutsk complain that for the second year in a row they have not received funds from the central budget for critically needed school repairs. But this does not concern the authorities in the Kremlin, their priority is the preparation of -cannon fodder-, the report says. As reported by ArmyInform, the Russian occupiers increase informational pressure on the temporarily occupied and deeply controlled frontline territories of the Armed Forces.

Title: The occupiers handed over 42 children from the Kherson region to Russian families
Description: informs on February 28, the Commissioner for Human Rights of the Verkhovna Rada of Ukraine Dmytro Lubinets. According to him, from 2022 to 2024, 42 children from the Kherson region, who were under occupation from the first days of the full-scale invasion, were transferred to Russian families for care. -for a long time, the Russian authorities hid information about children from the Kherson region and ignored the demands of the Ukrainian side to provide data on every deported and forcibly displaced child. In particular, little was known about the pupils of the Kherson Regional Children's Home,- the report says. In 2022, in order to save the children, the employees of the institution hid them in the basement of the church until they were found by FSB officers. Dmytro Lubinets noted that most of these children had parents or other legal representatives. However, the Russians took them to Crimea and placed them in the -Yalinka- children's home, known for its cruel treatment. -Questionnaires of some children later began to appear in the Russian federal adoption data bank. It is claimed that 10 children from Kherson Oblast are still in this children's institution in Crimea, for whom a -new home- is being sought, he said. The Ombudsman emphasized that such actions are a gross violation of international law, the IV Geneva Convention and the UN Convention on the Rights of the Child. -The deportation of Ukrainian children and their forced transfer to Russian families is a war crime for which the perpetrators must be held accountable!- - he summarized. As reported by ArmyInform, at least 1.5 million children from the temporarily occupied territories of Ukraine have already passed through propaganda processing of the Russian Federation. This is how the aggressor country cultivates potential agents of influence for itself in the theoretically de-occupied territories of Ukraine.

Title: The Air Force filmed the defeat and fall of -Shaheda-
Description: The video of the combat operation appeared on February 28 on the page of the Southern Air Command. The video shows a Russian UAV flying. He is hit by the Ukrainian defenders and Shahed starts to fall. -We continue our struggle!- - said the defenders. As reported by ArmyInform, on the night of February 28, the enemy attacked 208 Shahed type UAVs and simulator drones of various types and from various directions. Air defense units shot down 107 attack UAVs of the enemy, another 97 simulator drones did not reach their targets and were lost in location.

Title: The losses of the occupiers since the beginning of the year amounted to almost 84,000 people — the C...
Description: This was announced by the Commander-in-Chief of the Armed Forces of Ukraine, General Oleksandr Syrskyi. He emphasized that the Defense Forces of Ukraine continue to destroy the Russian invaders. Day and night, by all available means, neutralization of the enemy continues. The Commander-in-Chief of the Armed Forces also published a video with successful defeats of the occupiers by our drones. -I thank every Ukrainian soldier for his heroic and professional work! The fight continues! Glory to Ukraine!-, says the post to the video. As reported by ArmyInform, on the night of February 28, the Defense Forces of Ukraine destroyed a storage warehouse for thermobaric ammunition of the Russian invaders in the temporarily occupied territory Donetsk region, in Selidovoy district.

Title: She forged a certificate so that an acquaintance could flee abroad: a doctor is suspected in Kharkiv
Description: The Kharkiv Regional Prosecutor's Office informs about this. The case involves a doctor-surgeon who worked in one of the inter-district medical and social expert commissions (MSEK) of Kharkov, which have already been disbanded. The investigation established that in 2023 she -helped- her conscripted acquaintance to escape from Ukraine. -Without performing a medical examination, the suspect entered fictitious information into official documents, -diagnosing- him with a serious illness. At the time when the documents were -reviewed-, the man was at his workplace in one of the correctional colonies in the Kharkiv region,- law enforcement officers said. This forged document became the basis for obtaining a certificate that certified that the man had the second group of disabilities for a period of three years. On the basis of this fabricated documentation, he left the country and never returned. -From January 1, 2025, MSEK were liquidated. They have been replaced by expert teams for the assessment of daily functioning of the person (ECOPFO). That's where the woman got settled. She took up the position of administrator of ECOPFO in one of Kharkiv's hospitals. The law enforcement officers exposed the suspect,- the report says. The woman reported suspicion of facilitating the organization of illegal transportation of persons across the state border of Ukraine and official forgery. -The court granted the prosecution's request: the suspect was remanded in custody,- the prosecutor's office noted. ArmyInform reminds that it is better not to break the law or risk your life, but to use the aggregator of vacancies in the Armed Forces and recruiting centers.

Title: The President of Ukraine met with the bipartisan delegation of the US Senate
Description: He wrote about this in a telegram. -An important visit to America. Continuation of military assistance to our country and corresponding legislative initiatives, a meeting with President Trump, efforts to achieve a just and durable peace, our vision of ending the war and the importance of reliable security guarantees became the main topics of our negotiations, he noted. According to him, Ukraine is proud to have such strategic partners and friends as the United States of America. -Thank you for the constant bicameral and bipartisan support of Ukraine throughout all three years of full-scale Russian aggression,- the head of state noted. As reported by ArmyInform, the President of Ukraine Volodymyr Zelenskyy in Shannon held a meeting with the Prime Minister of Ireland Mikhol Martin and discussed with him the steps to end the war with guaranteed peace for Ukraine and the whole of Europe.

Title: Ukrainian hackers destroyed the data of a Moscow provider that served the oil industry of the Russia...
Description: Hackers reported this in their Telegram channel. As a result of a successful attack on the Moscow provider CWN (JSC -Pronet-), its server infrastructure and data were destroyed. This provider served, in particular, the oil industry companies of the aggressor country: the producer of oil equipment — JSC -Ochersk Machine-Building Plant-, as well as the scientific and technical center in the oil and gas industry of JSC -VNIIONG-. In addition, on February 16, a hacker group attacked the provider -Megaset-, which serves the city of Vladimir. Because of the attack, the provider's work is stopped, and it may take up to two weeks to restore services. As a result of these attacks, the infrastructure of the provider was destroyed, as well as the provision of communication services was suspended. As reported by ArmiyaInform, from February 7 to 8, 2025, cyber specialists of the Armed Forces of the Ukrainian Armed Forces and the Main Intelligence Directorate of the Military Intelligence Service conducted a large-scale cyber operation against the main contractor of Gazprom, the company Gazstroyprom and a group of subsidiaries engaged in the construction and maintenance of Russia's oil and gas infrastructure.

Title: - Three vanyushkas are coming, pulling sledges - Russian attacks in the Kramatorsk direction are bor...
Description: Yuriy Syrotyuk, chief sergeant of the fire support company of the 5th assault brigade, told about this on the air of the Yedyni Novyni telethon. According to him, at first, Russian commanders send those who do not feel sorry for infantry attacks - mostly wounded, with bad ammunition. When the firing positions of the Defense Forces are determined, the occupiers send more trained fighters into endless assaults. Yuriy Syrotyuk noted that, in general, the army of the Russian Federation has changed a lot. -The other day, they saw a sledge being pulled behind them. The Russian army is degrading in technical terms. This is visible to the naked eye. If tanks, then tanks are old, if BMP, then old. But, unfortunately, the ability to send new troops does not degrade. That's why 3-4 -vanyushkas- go and pull the sledges behind them. On those sleds they are pulling some kind of ammunition. We notice them all, destroy them,- he said. As ArmyInform reported, Russians and Koreans are constantly storming the positions of the Defense Forces in the Kursk region. They attack in a variety of ways. Equipment is used, but in most cases - infantry. Constantly experiencing huge losses.

Title: GUR received more than UAH 1 billion to support the families of the dead scouts
Description: This is reported by the Ministry of Defense of Ukraine on February 28. -The allocated funds are intended for the provision of one-time monetary assistance to the families of fallen servicemen of the Ministry of Defense of the Ministry of Defense of Ukraine. This is part of the state program of social protection of military personnel who gave their lives during the repulse of the armed aggression of the Russian Federation against Ukraine,- the message reads. As reported by ArmyInform, for civilians who were held captive as a result of the armed aggression of the Russian Federation against Ukraine, the right to receive a deferment from mobilization.

Title: A schoolboy was preparing a terrorist attack near the Alley of Glory to Heroes: an agent of the Russ...
Description: SBU informs about this. According to the case materials, the accomplice of the enemy turned out to be a 16-year-old schoolboy from the Zhytomyr region, who was involved in criminal activities by the Russian special services in exchange for money. As the investigation established, a minor terrorist should have left an improvised explosive device (IED) disguised in a backpack on the Alley. -At that moment, the occupiers planned to detonate the explosives remotely together with their agent. In this way, the Russian special service hoped to achieve two goals: to carry out a bloody terrorist attack with a large number of victims, and also to eliminate its agent as an -extra witness-, the report says. SBU counter-intelligence early exposed the enemy's plot and arrested the perpetrator -in the act- when the young man was approaching the site of the planned terrorist attack. -The schoolboy made the SVP himself according to the instructions from the Russian curator. To disguise the explosives, he placed them in a pan, and to enhance the striking effect, he additionally stuffed the explosives with iron screws. Then, instead of going to school, the young man took a taxi to Zhytomyr to prepare for a terrorist attack,- the SBU said. The agent was in constant communication with the Russian intelligence officer throughout the entire drive to the central avenue. After receiving the -report- of arrival at the destination, the occupants had to activate the SVP by calling a mobile phone that was connected to the explosive device. However, thanks to the anticipatory actions of the law enforcement officers, the tragedy was prevented. -Currently, the investigators of the Security Service plan to notify the detainee of the suspicion for h. 1 Art. 14, ch. 2 Art. 258 of the Criminal Code of Ukraine (preparation to commit a terrorist act). The perpetrator faces up to 12 years in prison with confiscation of property,- the SBU said. As reported by ArmyInform, the Security Service detained an agent of Russian military intelligence in Odessa. The attacker set fire to Ukrzaliznytsia's energy facilities and prepared hiding places with firearms and explosives components.

Title: A Russian warehouse and a control post were blown up, a new prisoner -Azov-: a stream from a front-l...
Description: The Russian hid in a shack and tried to shoot back at our soldiers. The bullets almost hit one of the Azov men. After a short shootout, the occupier surrendered. When he was given first aid, the Russian was put in a wheelbarrow and taken to captivity under enemy fire. Aerial scouts of the 65th brigade showed a video of the destruction of the Russian control post. The occupiers set up their position in a high-rise building in the village of Nesteryanka, Zaporizhzhia region. Air reconnaissance passed the coordinates to a friendly unit, which worked on the Russians. These and other topics are discussed by our hosts - junior lieutenant Volodymyr Kravchuk and lieutenant Yevhen Nazarenko.

Title: The government is improving the organization of providing medical assistance to the military
Description: As informs the Ministry of Defense, the Cabinet of Ministers of Ukraine made relevant changes to Order No. 352 of May 24, 2017. Wounded, injured and sick military personnel receive medical assistance in state and communal health care facilities designated by regional state administrations and the Ministry of Defense. -It is for these institutions that updated requirements will be implemented. Their basis will be the experience of providing medical assistance to the military of the Security and Defense Forces during a large-scale war within the boundaries of a single medical space,- the message says. In addition, the changes approved by the government align the ordinance with the Law of Ukraine -Basics of the Legislation of Ukraine on Health Care-. In particular, the obsolete terms -secondary (specialized)- and -tertiary (highly specialized)- medical care were removed from the document. As reported by ArmyInform, for civilians who were held captive as a result of the armed aggression of the Russian Federation against Ukraine, the right to receive a deferment from mobilization.

Title: Aviation of the Armed Forces of Ukraine struck the positions of the FSB of the Russian Federation in...
Description: informs the General Staff of the Armed Forces of Ukraine about this. As a result of the point damage, the enemy's important military infrastructure was destroyed, including communications equipment, signal amplifiers, satellite communication equipment and other technical means used to coordinate combat operations. -This significantly reduced the enemy's ability to manage forces and assets in the region. This strike is another step towards weakening the enemy's forces and reducing their military potential,- the message reads. It is noted that the Defense Forces of Ukraine continue to inflict casualties on the enemy until the last Russian invader leaves the territory of Ukraine. As reported by ArmyInform, on the night of February 28, the Defense Forces of Ukraine destroyed a storage warehouse for thermobaric ammunition of the Russian invaders in the temporarily occupied territory Donetsk region, in Selidovoy district.

Title: The Deputy Minister of Defense took part in the opening of the exhibition project -For Freedom-
Description: The exhibition -For Freedom- demonstrates the stories of courage and self-sacrifice of foreign soldiers from more than 20 countries who stood up to defend the freedom and independence of Ukraine. The exhibition includes photographs and personal belongings of the legionnaires, which provide a deeper understanding of the motivations and experiences of these heroic people. The For Freedom project was created by the museum in partnership with The R. T. Weatherman Foundation, which has provided significant humanitarian aid to Ukraine since the start of the full-scale invasion, including medical supplies and the evacuation of wounded soldiers. The foundation also actively supports foreign volunteers and deals with repatriation of the bodies of the dead. The event was attended by co-founders and presidents of the Foundation Andrew Duncan and Megan Mobbs, Chairman of the Verkhovna Rada of Ukraine Ruslan Stefanchuk, foreign volunteers, and families of fallen legionnaires. Deputy Minister of Defense of Ukraine Serhiy Melnyk expressed his deep gratitude to the Foundation and all foreign volunteers for their support: -We are grateful to the foreign volunteers who stand side by side with Ukrainian defenders against the aggressor. Stories of the courage of people who became part of the Ukrainian resistance are presented at this exhibition and inspire us to continue the struggle. I would like to highlight the role of the R.T. Foundation. Weatherman Foundation, which provide significant assistance to our wounded defenders, thanks to which they can receive high-quality treatment and rehabilitation abroad,- noted Serhiy Melnyk. The exposition is open to visitors in the main building of the Museum under the monument -Motherland- at the address of st. Lavrska, 27.

Title: 15 Russian ships were hit: the results of the Group 13 special unit
Description: This is reported by the Main Intelligence Directorate of the Ministry of Defense of Ukraine. It is noted that February 28 marks two years since the creation of the special unit of the GUR of the Ministry of Defense of Ukraine Group 13 - the results of its combat work helped to ensure the security of the Ukrainian state at sea and impressed the world. -Thunderstorm at sea and in the air! The skill of the operators, creative approaches to the execution of missions, constant improvement of the means of destruction also made it possible for the first time in the world to destroy an enemy air target with a strike from a marine drone,- the intelligence officers assured. As reported by ArmyInform, on December 31, 2024, with missiles from Magura V5 platforms, soldiers of Group 13 hit three Russian Mi-8 helicopters, two of which went to the bottom of the Black Sea.

Title: -Standed, took a selfie- - Russian generals burn a huge resource and want -result-
Description: Volodymyr Chernyak, an officer of the -Rubizh- brigade, told about this on the broadcast of the Yedyny Novyny telethon. The enemy attacks, changes tactics quite often. These are mostly infantry, but sometimes mechanized assaults. The enemy definitely does not have a shortage of manpower. According to him, the military command of the Russian army burns a huge resource in battles, so it demands results from its subordinates. Sometimes the opponent's desire to -draw- this result is comical. -Sometimes the enemy takes very stupid actions. For example, to run almost a marathon with the tricolor in order to fix it on the outskirts of some settlement. This is a real case. He was standing next to him, taking a selfie. After that, our FPV drones… Let's put it this way, the serviceman ceased to exist,- said Volodymyr Chernyak. It is because of the desire for results, the officer noted, that the -famous- suicide attacks on buggies and cars are happening. The stormtroopers jump on these cars themselves so as not to run on foot. -They have the task of reaching our positions. Their command is not interested in how they will do it. They drive these VAZs through the fields because it is a one-time vehicle. They themselves understand that they are in it, most likely, and will burn. But they do it because it's an order,- stated the officer of the -Rubizh- brigade. As ArmyInform reported, Russians and Koreans are constantly storming the positions of the Defense Forces in the Kursk region. They attack in a variety of ways. Equipment is used, but in most cases - infantry. Constantly experiencing huge losses.

Title: Since the beginning of the day, 12 skirmishes have taken place in the Toretsk direction — General St...
Description: This is in the operational information of the General Staff of the Armed Forces of Ukraine as of 4:00 p.m. on February 28. Today, the communities of such settlements as: Oleksandrivka, Kucherivka, Korenok, Studenok, Kharkivka, Malushyne and Zarichne of the Sumy region were affected by the fire of enemy artillery and mortars; Liskivshchyna and Yanzhulivka of Chernihiv region. In the Kharkiv direction the enemy once tried to storm the positions of our units in the Vovchansk district, and was repulsed.
