On the Lymanskyi direction during the day, the invading army carried out one attack on Ukrainian positions near Ivanivka. Our soldiers firmly hold the defense and inflict losses on the enemy. In the Severskyi direction, the enemy twice attacked our defenders in the districts of Belogorivka and Verkhnokamyanskyi. One battle continues until now. In the Kramatorsk direction Ukrainian defenders repulse two enemy attacks near Orihovo-Vasylivka. In the Toretsk direction since the beginning of the day, 12 clashes have taken place in the areas of Krymske, Dachne, Toretsk and Leonidivka settlements. Four clashes are still ongoing. In the Pokrovsky direction, the Russian invaders made 15 attempts to dislodge our defenders from their positions near Elizavetivka, Promeny, Lysivka, Novoukrainka, Pischany, Kotlyny, Nadiivka, and Andriivka. The defense forces are holding back the onslaught and have repulsed 12 enemy attacks, with three engagements still ongoing. Enemy aircraft struck Zvirovo and Leontovichi with anti-aircraft missiles. In the Novopavlovsk direction there were six enemy attacks in the area of ​​Constantinople. Two enemy assaults were repulsed by Ukrainian soldiers in the Gulyajpilsk direction, near Privilny and Rivnopil, at the moment one battle is going on. Sichneve and Zaliznychnye were hit by airstrikes with guided bombs, the invader hit Gulyaipol with unguided missiles. Three skirmishes continue in the Orihiv direction. One attack by the Defense Forces has already been repulsed, the invader is trying, with the support of attack aircraft, to advance in the districts of Pyatikhatok and Kamianskyi. In the Kursk direction Ukrainian defenders repelled four enemy attacks, three more clashes are still ongoing, in addition, the enemy carried out ten airstrikes, dropping 14 anti-aircraft missiles, and fired 333 artillery strikes on the positions of our troops and populated areas. In the Kupyan and Dnieper directions the occupying troops did not carry out active offensive actions. In the rest of the directions, there were no significant changes in the situation.

Title: Ministry of Defense: Ukrainians who were captured were granted the right to postpone mobilization
Description: This was reported by the Ministry of Defense of Ukraine. The Cabinet of Ministers of Ukraine adopted the relevant resolution -On Amendments to Appendix 5 to the Procedure for Conscription of Citizens for Military Service During Mobilization, for a Special Period.- This document normalized the provisions of the Law of Ukraine -On Mobilization Training and Mobilization- as amended on November 20, 2024. In order to receive a postponement of conscription for military service during mobilization, it is necessary to provide an extract from the Unified Register of persons in respect of whom the fact of deprivation of personal freedom has been established as a result of armed aggression against Ukraine. As reported by ArmiyaInform, since March 11, 2022, as a result of active and continuous work (as of February 21, 2025), 61 exchanges have been carried out and 4131 citizens of Ukraine were released from captivity.

Title: At $500 per head, our pilots calculated how much one dead occupier costs them
Description: The calculations were published on February 28 on the unit's channel. -Recently, our group closed a round number. You can also talk a little about statistics and costs. During the two weeks of work, the occupier's losses from the -Cartuze- amounted to 101 units of manpower (51 killed and 50 wounded). 17 -Mavik-3--standard, with an average cost of $1,800, were spent on this work. Seven drones were lost in one day due to difficult weather conditions, namely wet snow that stuck the camera and it was impossible to return home. But on this day, the enemy was very active, and it was impossible not to work. Other drones were lost mainly due to powerful communication suppression, and two drones were shot down with small arms. During this time of work, 700 Foot Crusher ammunition were spent, the cost of one is 500 UAH. That is, an average of 7 -bimbs- were spent on one target. Of course, this is not practical data, 65 percent of the ammunition simply did not make it home due to the absence of a target and weather conditions. Also, 3 -Avenger- antennas burned during the snowfall. So, the average cost of one destroyed target was approximately $500, including all expenses,- said the message of -Sharp Kartuzy-. As reported by ArmyInform, the operators of the -Sharp cartridges- unit of the National Guard recorded an attempt of a Russian attack aircraft to shoot down our RPG-26 drone.

Title: French power on the Ukrainian front: a cook from France roasts Russians with an American Mk-19
Description: His story was told in the International Defense Legion of Ukraine. With his team of grenade launchers as part of the International Defense Legion of Ukraine, Bones deftly destroys the enemy with the American Mk-19 40 mm automatic grenade launcher. — I consider Ukraine to be a European country, and the Ukrainian people to be a European people. And it is our duty to listen to the Europeans. And it is our duty to protect the European land from aggression, the legionnaire emphasizes. Bones has been performing combat missions as part of the International Defense Legion of Ukraine for the third year. — My group now has Vivi, Tim, Roque and Zin Gher. Vivi and I came to the Legion together. Tim and Roque were soldiers in France. Italian ZIN Gher is also with us. He won't let me into the kitchen (laughs). They all joined without any hesitation. We have become true professionals in our field. -Each of us knows how to handle the Mk19, so we can handle it in any position we need,- he says. Since the beginning of the war, Bones and his team have participated in many combat missions in the hottest directions. They already have battles in Luhansk region, Kharkiv region, and Kherson region behind them. In the future, when the war ends with the victory of Ukraine, the French legionnaire Bones plans to stay in Ukraine. You can learn more about the International Defense Legion of Ukraine and join the brave team on the official website.

Title: Poland for $10,000 — a law enforcement officer was detained in Volyn with accomplices who broke a wi...
Description: The State Bureau of Investigation reported this on February 28. In January of this year, a law enforcement officer met with a familiar conscript who was looking for ways to travel abroad. He assured that he would be able to ferry him to Poland outside the checkpoint in the territory of the Volyn region. The cost of the service was estimated at $10,000. The law enforcement officer assured that he would take the man directly to the border, bypassing the checkpoints, and help him cross the border. The -client- was ordered to gather the necessary things and wait for the signal. On February 24, he was informed that everything was ready for the transfer and a meeting was scheduled in Lutsk. There, the client gave the accomplice an advance in the amount of $1,000. Then the man was taken closer to the border with Poland. After handing over the rest of the money — $9,000 — the law enforcement officer and his accomplices were detained by the FBI. ArmyInform reminds that it is better not to break the law or risk your life, but to use the aggregator of vacancies in the Armed Forces and recruiting centers.

Title: The drone coalition announced the third international tender
Description: This is reported by the Ministry of Defense of Ukraine. Ukrainian companies, as in the series of tenders for interceptor drones and FPV drones, can submit applications. Proposals are accepted until March 17. To view the technical requirements and to participate in the tender, the company must register on the portal of the Ministry of Defense of Great Britain Defence Sourcing Portal and select to apply for a Drone lot Capability Coalition - Tactical Multirotor ISR UAV. The Ministry of Defense reported that the Defense Forces have an urgent need for tactical-level multi-rotor ISR, which is why the Drone Coalition has decided to focus on these drones. Thanks to them, the military can scout the area and increase the situational awareness of their units. -We continue to create an asymmetric advantage thanks to the scaling of drone production both in Ukraine and abroad,- said Kateryna Chernogorenko, Deputy Minister of Defense for Digitalization. According to her, it is important not to lose momentum and increase the capabilities of the Defense Forces so that they can destroy the enemy as much as possible. The MOU recalled that in the previous tender there were two lots - improved FPV and interceptor drones. Then Ukrainian manufacturers were able to participate in the competition for the first time. According to its results, 14 companies were selected for the FPV drone lot, and 5 companies were selected for the interceptor lot. -In January-February, these models were tested in Latvia. Next, the best means will be tested in Ukraine, and in the event of confirmation of the declared characteristics, the Ministry of Defense of Great Britain will conclude contracts for mass procurement at the expense of the Joint Fund of the Drone Coalition,- the message reads. The drone coalition was formed in February 2024 during the 19th Ramstein-format meeting. This idea was proposed by Latvia. Together with Great Britain, they coordinate the work of the initiative. It currently includes 18 countries: Latvia, Great Britain, Australia, the Czech Republic, Denmark, France, Estonia, Italy, New Zealand, Canada, Lithuania, Luxembourg, the Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Germany, Sweden and Ukraine.

Title: In Sumy Oblast, one and a half centners of explosives were dropped into the air from enemy drones
Description: The National Police reported this on February 28. In the Sumy district, local residents discovered the wreckage of an enemy attack drone. The most dangerous part of the find turned out to be a 50-kilogram warhead that did not detonate when it fell. Police explosives officers conducted a thorough inspection and successfully defused it. At another location, in the middle of the field, experts discovered another downed UAV. Its warhead was almost twice as large as the previous one — 90 kilograms of explosive power. Explosive technicians eliminated the danger, preventing a threat to people. After successful demining, both combat units were taken to a specially designated place and destroyed by controlled detonation. As reported by ArmyInform, the enemy began to attack Sumy with new strike drones.

Title: - Contracts have already been signed, the first payments have already been made - 95 brigades are re...
Description: Ihor Gadlevskyi, head of the recruiting department of the 95th ODSHBr, told about this on the air of the -Yedini Novyni- telethon. According to him, the image of the 95th brigade speaks for itself, so the selection process is as simple and honest as possible. People are interested, call, find out about the conditions. Then, potential candidates arrive at the site, choose a specialization, pass appropriate psychological tests and a military medical board. -We are a military unit that recruits for absolutely all positions. We have a lot of applications that we are processing. That is, a lot of applications are received every day. This trend is increasing, there are already signed contracts, there are already the first payments. That's why the tendency is to increase, and this can't help but please,- Ihor Gadlevskyi said. As ArmyInform reported, the brigades are already training the first recruits who joined the Armed Forces within the scope of the Contract project 18-24-. The first volunteers are already undergoing training in 72 separate mechanized brigades named after Black Zaporozhets.

Title: I wanted like in -Rambo-, but it turned out like in -The Naked Gun- - the occupier was not allowed t...
Description: The video of the incident was released on February 28 on the channel of the Black Swan strike group of the 225th Assault Regiment. The footage shows how the Russian undressed to the waist for some reason and started aiming fire from a machine gun. But it could not hit our drone. The skid forced the occupant to flee, but after walking only a few meters, he fell. That was the end of it. As reported by ArmyInform, operators of the Black Swan strike group of the 225 assault regiment missed two Russian attack aircraft during an attack on the positions of a neighboring unit.

Title: The commander of the brigade of the Russian army was informed of the suspicion of the use of chemica...
Description: This was announced on February 28 by the Prosecutor General's Office. According to the investigation, the suspect gave a direct order on the battlefield to use means of warfare prohibited by international law — K-51 and RG-Vo gas hand grenades equipped with tear gas (CS, CN). As a result of the use of these grenades, servicemen of the Armed Forces of Ukraine in the Donetsk region received chemical damage. Such facts are not isolated. In December 2024, the suspicion of similar actions was already reported to the lieutenant general, chief of the radiation, chemical and biological defense forces of the Soviet Union. During the investigation, evidence was obtained that he ensured the use of chemical weapons in hostilities against Ukraine. According to the Hague Convention, warring parties do not enjoy an unlimited right to choose the means of inflicting damage on the enemy. International humanitarian law prohibits weapons, projectiles, substances that can cause excessive damage or unnecessary suffering. Taras Semkiv, Deputy Head of the Department for Combating Crimes Committed in Conditions of Armed Conflict of the Prosecutor General's Office, reminds that Ukraine and the Russian Federation are full participants in the Convention on the Prohibition of the Development, Production, Stockpiling, Use of Chemical Weapons, and on Their Destruction. According to p. 5th century I of the Convention, each state party undertakes not to use chemical means of fighting riots as a means of warfare. However, prosecutors, together with SBU investigators, in cooperation with specialized structural units of the Armed Forces of Ukraine, constantly record the facts of the use of chemical weapons banned in the Russian Federation as a means of waging war. The prosecutor's office and investigative bodies cooperate closely with the Organization for the Prohibition of Chemical Weapons and take samples of chemical weapons, including on the battlefield, in accordance with the relevant protocols of the OPCW. In the future, the OPCW examines the received samples in several separate independent laboratories. -According to one of these facts, a report has already been received from this organization that there was indeed the use of combat poisonous substances, in particular SN gas, during the conduct of hostilities by representatives of the Russian Federation. Moreover, the representatives of the armed forces of the Russian Federation very often flaunt the use of appropriate means of fighting riots on the front line. It is obvious that they do not hide this, such facts are not punished in any way on the territory of Russia, the relevant investigations are not conducted, which indicates the complete connivance of such actions by the top military-political leadership of the Russian Federation,- said Taras Semkiv. As ArmiyaInform reported, it was reported about the suspicion of a major general of the Russian Armed Forces, who was looting the property of the Chornobyl NPP.

Title: Units of the Ministry of Defense demined more than 5,000 hectares of de-occupied territories in Febr...
Description: This is reported by the MoU on February 28. According to the data of the Main Department of Mine Action, Civil Protection and Environmental Safety, 32.67 km of highways and 13.4 km of power lines were inspected and cleaned during this period. During demining, 3,196 explosive objects were discovered and destroyed. A total of 426,084 units since the beginning of the large-scale invasion of the Russian Federation. -Demining units of the Armed Forces of Ukraine and the State Special Transport Service are involved in clearing the de-occupied territories of explosive objects. During the month, the number of certified operators of mine countermeasures increased by 3,- the message reads. It is noted that their total number at the end of February 2025 reached 83 people. The MOU emphasized that, in accordance with the Law of Ukraine -On Mine Action in Ukraine-, only mine action operators are involved in humanitarian demining. As reported by ArmiyaInform, the long-term plan for the development of Ukraine's demining potential for 2024-2034 envisages the allocation of 700 million euros to our state from partners for the purchase of equipment.

Title: The army of the Russian Federation carried out more than 3,000 strikes on Donetsk region, 141 civili...
Description: The National Police of Ukraine informs about this on February 28. In particular, 15 settlements were under fire: the cities of Bilozerske, Kostyantynivka, Kramatorsk, Myrnograd, Pokrovsk, Rodynske, Sloviansk, Toretsk, the villages of Andriyivka-Klevtsevo (Iskra), Zeleny Gai, Nova Poltavka, Oleksandro-Kalynovka, Pleshchiivka, Torske, Fedorivka. 141 civilian objects were destroyed, including 76 residential buildings. As reported by ArmyInform, this night air defense units shot down 107 enemy attack UAVs, another 97 simulator drones did not reach their targets and were located are lost

Title: The security guard of one of the hotels is suspected of correcting the attacks of the Russian Federa...
Description: The Kharkiv Regional Prosecutor's Office informs about this. The man sought out the location of Ukrainian defenders and later transmitted this information through Telegram channels in text and in the form of images with appropriate markings to his acquaintance. -The law enforcement officers collected the evidence base and exposed the adjuster. During the search, equipment with evidence of illegal activity was seized from him. The correctional officer is awaiting trial while in custody,- the message reads. The Kharkiv Regional Prosecutor's Office approved and sent to the court an indictment against a 48-year-old man for spreading information about the location of the Armed Forces of Ukraine and other military formations formed in accordance with the laws of Ukraine, committed under martial law (Part 2, Article 114-2 of the Criminal Code of Ukraine). He will be tried in the October District Court of the city of Kharkiv. The accused faces up to eight years in prison. As ArmyInform reported, the Kharkiv Regional Prosecutor's Office reported the suspicion to a former law enforcement officer from Izyum, who during the occupation of the city moved to on the side of the enemy.

Title: Defense forces destroyed the warehouse of thermobaric ammunition of the occupiers
Description: informs the General Staff of the Armed Forces of Ukraine about this. In addition, three more important objects of the Russian occupiers were affected. -In particular, the Ilya Oil Refinery (Krasnodar Territory of the Russian Federation), which is involved in the provision of the Russian army of occupation. The results of the damage are being verified,- the message says. As reported by ArmyInform, on February 26, 2025, the Air Force of the Armed Forces of Ukraine successfully attack on the UAV control post of the 503rd Motorized Rifle Regiment of the 19th Motorized Rifle Division of the 58th Army of the Russian invaders in Nesteryanka, Zaporizhzhia Region.

Title: The Ministry of Defense unified packaging and labeling for material property suppliers
Description: The Ministry of Defense of Ukraine informed about this on February 28. This should optimize logistics processes, reduce unloading time, and reduce the burden on the Armed Forces supply centers. If earlier the requirements for packaging and labeling were assigned separately to each item, now they apply to tangible property in general. -The modern army needs effective logistics. Unification of packaging and labeling requirements is an important step toward systemically improving supply for the military. Clear standards simplify logistics, increase control and ensure fast and accurate shipment of property. We continue to work to ensure that every stage of providing the army is as efficient as possible and meets the real needs of the military,- Hleb Kanevskyi, director of the Procurement Policy Department of the Ministry of Defense of Ukraine, emphasized. The document was developed by the Central Department of Material Support Development of the Ministry of Defense of Ukraine together with the procurement agency of the DOT, the Central Department of Material Support of the Rear Command of the Logistics Forces of the Armed Forces of Ukraine, joint support centers (OCZ) and SAP implementation experts. -In 2024, while visiting the OCZ, we saw how material property for the Armed Forces was being shipped. Most of the supplies came in bags, the weight of which was too much for the workers of the centers, many of whom were servicemen after being wounded. Manual unloading of such bags not only slowed down the process, but also created an additional burden on the staff. In addition, small markings made it difficult to identify property, and bulk storage took up too much space. In order to make the unloading process faster and more convenient, we, together with representatives of interested units of the Ministry of Defense, have developed a new technical specification for suppliers,- said Viktoriya Vinogradova, director of the tangible property program of the DOT. The updated requirements provide for the facilitation of the unloading process, which is especially important for servicemen who have been injured or wounded. In particular, the new rules apply to: In March, the DOT plans to visit all the unified security centers of Ukraine to assess the effectiveness of the new requirements. Preliminary results indicate a significant improvement in the delivery and labeling process. The Ministry of Defense and the DOT are open to suggestions and continue to analyze feedback from OCZ and suppliers to further improve the system and make changes to the technical specification. As ArmiyaInform reported, the Ministry of Defense was told about the priorities in the field of defense procurement.

Title: The enemy is attacking the Sumy region border with infantry groups
Description: This was reported by the Countering Disinformation Center on February 28 with reference to the Defense Forces of Ukraine. The Center published its statement in response to information circulating on the Internet that Russian troops are attacking the border of the Sumy Oblast, in the area of ​​the settlement of Novenke. -The defense forces destroy the enemy. At this time, there has been no breakthrough, the fighting continues,- the Center said in a statement. As reported by ArmyInform, the enemy began to attack Sumy with new strike drones.

Title: To escape from the executioner simply to storm - in Kurshchyna, the Russians who are sent to attack ...
Description: Stanislav Krasnov, company commander of the 95th separate amphibious assault brigade, told about this on the broadcast of the -Yedini Novyni- telethon. According to him, in Kurshchyna there are already real cemeteries made of burned equipment on the roads. So the enemies -trained- by Ukrainian UAVs move on foot. If the North Koreans, then these are larger groups - 8 or 10 people, the Russians actually fight alone or in pairs. When these Russian attack aircraft are captured, they tell almost identical stories. -More than half of those who are captured are those who tried to escape to the army from prison or from criminal prosecution. That is, the story is identical for everyone: he was involved in selling drugs, ended up in prison. He was tortured. It was offered - either they will be tortured in the future, or they have to sign papers to go to the service. They sign and go to work,- said Stanislav Krasnov. As ArmyInform reported, it is difficult in the Novopavlovsk direction. The occupiers are trying to press actively. Armored vehicles are more actively used despite the loss.

Title: Place of death — Kharkiv region: many Russian attack aircraft have already received such a record
Description: The video of the combat operation was released on February 28 on the brigade's channel. -They tried to run and hide in the forest, but you can't escape from our aerial reconnaissance... Sight, drop, fire: this is how enemy targets turned into stationary objects,- the brigade commented on the video. As reported by ArmyInform, a fighter with the call sign -Hammer- from the 2nd company of the 2nd assault battalion of the 3rd assault brigade filmed on GoPro how he and a friend hold a circular defense in position.

Title: Joined the Black Zaporozhets: the first recruits under the 18-24 contract are already undergoing tra...
Description: told about their preparation on the air of the telethon -Edyny Novyni-. Recruits Yevhen, Maksym and Denis signed a contract with the 72nd separate mechanized brigade named after the Black Zaporozhets in the first days of the project's launch. -They didn't want to take me. And so and so I tried, but it didn't work all the time. Now I had such an opportunity to join the army, and I immediately went,- said Yevhen, a recruit of the 72nd brigade. According to the program, contract holders are guaranteed a cash payment of one million hryvnias, a mortgage at 0%, free medical care and the right to travel abroad after the end of the contract. Basic training of fighters will last at least 45 days. Plus from 14 days of professional training. Adaptation course in the military unit from 14 days. According to the head of the recruiting department of the 72nd separate mechanized brigade named after the Black Zaporozhets, Georgy Mykhaylovskyi, the brigade leads in the number of applications and recruitment continues. To the question of whether servicemen who have been in the army for more than a year have questions about new contractors, he simply answers: -We don't have such problems. The fighters, on the contrary, are waiting for the arrival of young recruits specifically for combat positions. This is a boost. And the guys know that motivated people go and want to help us,- noted Giorgiy Mykhaylovskyi. As ArmyInform reported, 400 applications have already been received for the 95th Polish Airborne Assault Brigade after the start of the new project -Contract 18-24-. The first contracts with military personnel were also signed.

Title: With a stick on the -petals-, our soldiers showed a quick demining
Description: The video was released on February 28 on the battalion channel. -There are no safe places on the front line. Our fighters are constantly under fire from artillery and the sight of drones, while repelling assaults. The enemy, in addition to this, abundantly sprinkles everything around with small and dangerous anti-personnel mines - -petals-. But even here, among enemy mines, which are extremely difficult to detect, our guys find a solution. Deactivate the -petals- with what is at hand - a stick, for example. Because there is no other choice,- the battalion commented on the video. As reported by ArmyInform, a soldier of the 4th battalion of the -Force of Freedom- of the 4th brigade of the operational assignment -Rubyzh- of the National Guard was able to capture six Russian attack aircraft at once.

Title: In two regions of Ukraine, adjusters who were pointing missiles at the Russian Federation were detai...
Description: reported this on February 28 Security Service of Ukraine. In Cherkasy region, new attempts by the Russian Federation to obtain actual data on the Defense Forces were prevented. A 20-year-old resident of the city of Radyvyliv was detained, who was spying on units of the Armed Forces of Ukraine that were moving towards the front through the territory of the western region. In the case of detection of military convoys, the attacker recorded the approximate number of military equipment and its tactical characteristics. In addition, under the guise of meeting with relatives, the person involved traveled to the Lviv region, where he tried to establish the locations of operational airfields. In exchange for cooperation, the occupiers promised their informant -evacuation- to Russia and a passport of the aggressor country. A 58-year-old local woman was detained in Poltava, who corrected Russian missile and drone attacks on the regional center. In order for the enemy to launch attacks outside the zone of Ukrainian air defense, the suspect scouted the bases of radar stations near the city. It is also documented that she monitored the consequences of enemy -arrivals-. During the searches, mobile phones with evidence of work for the Russian special services were seized from both detainees. Investigators of the SBU informed the accused about the suspicion under part. 2 Art. 114-2 of the Criminal Code of Ukraine (unauthorized dissemination of information about the movement, movement or location of the Armed Forces of Ukraine). The perpetrators are in custody. They face up to 8 years in prison. Complex measures were carried out by SBU employees in Poltava and Cherkasy regions under the procedural guidance of regional prosecutors' offices. As ArmiyaInform reported, the Security Service of Ukraine reported the suspicion to the general director of the Russian United Aircraft Corporation Yuriy Slyusary in absentia.

Title: First, the mine, and then the drones — a complex defeat of the enemy's BMP
Description: The video was released on February 28 on the 66 Brigade channel. The Russians tried a mechanized assault on the Lymansky direction on BMP-3. But the enemy car blew up on a mine barrier, which was installed by the engineers of the 66th brigade. And two FPV drones of the battalion of unmanned systems and the 4th battalion of the Presidential Brigade burned the equipment to the ground. -Two of the crew escaped, the third was less lucky than the others. Now it lies fried next to the same burnt-out BMP,- the 66th brigade commented on the video. As reported by ArmyInform, fighters of the 1st mechanized battalion of the 66th mechanized brigade named after Prince Mstislav the Brave are close They destroyed the enemy soldiers.

Title: The IT coalition handed over equipment worth 7.5 million euros to Ukraine
Description: notified about this. -I thank the countries of the IT coalition for strengthening the stability of our infrastructure. With this equipment, we will increase the capabilities of the Defense Forces, and we will also be able to implement digitization in the Ukrainian army faster,- said Kateryna Chernogorenko, Deputy Minister of Defense of Ukraine for Digitalization. This time, the partners submitted to the Ministry of Defense of Ukraine: This is the second delivery from the IT coalition in 2025. In January of this year, within the framework of the initiative, Estonia, the Netherlands and Luxembourg handed over equipment worth 3.3 million euros to Ukraine. We would like to remind you that the IT coalition is one of the coalitions of capabilities within the framework of the Contact Group on Defense of Ukraine (-Ramstein format-). It supports the Armed Forces of Ukraine and the Ministry of Defense in the field of IT, communications and cyber security. The coalition currently includes Belgium, Denmark, Ireland, Iceland, Spain, Italy, Canada, Latvia, Lithuania, the Netherlands, Germany, the United Kingdom, Finland, Sweden and Japan. The leaders of the coalition are Estonia and Luxembourg.

Title: The REB did not help - the paratroopers repelled the enemy armored assault with drones
Description: The video of combat work was released on February 28 on the company's channel. The occupiers on a dance and an armored car went to our positions. The equipment was protected by a powerful EW, but this did not prevent our drones from first stopping the Russians, and then finishing off both the tank and the armored vehicle. -The enemy continues to carry out assaults on the positions of our troops, as a result of which the invaders are inflicting heavy losses in infantry and equipment every day,- the Perun group commented on the video. As reported by ArmyInform, the drone operators of the 79th airborne assault brigade of Tavriysk once again proved that accuracy and skill can be decisive in the fight against the enemy.

Title: A man was arrested in Shostka who attacked an employee of the TCC
Description: This was notified by the Police of the Sumy Region. On February 27, a joint team of police and employees of the TCC conducted checks on individuals. A 23-year-old local resident behaved defiantly during the inspection, refused to comply with the lawful demands of law enforcement officers and began to resist. The offender used tear gas against the TCC representative, and then hit him. One of the police officers was also injured during the arrest of an aggressive offender. According to this fact, police investigators have already opened criminal proceedings under 2 Art. 345 (threat or violence against a law enforcement officer) and ch. 2 Art. 350 of the Criminal Code of Ukraine (threat or violence against an official). The offender was detained in the procedural order, he faces up to five years in prison. -The use of force against law enforcement officers and officials is a criminal offense that will have the appropriate consequences,- the police emphasized. As reported by ArmiyaInform, in Odesa police detained a man who caused bodily harm to a soldier of the TCC and SP during a document check.

Title: Korea is interested in the experience of the Armed Forces of Ukraine in the use of drones: Serhiy Bo...
Description: This was discussed at the meeting of the Deputy Minister of Defense of Ukraine, Serhiy Boyev, with the Korean delegation, which was headed by a member of the National Assembly of the Republic of Korea, Yoo Yong Won, reported in the MoU. The parties discussed the cooperation of the countries and the exchange of experience. -Your visit is important for the development of cooperation between Ukraine and the Republic of Korea. The Ukrainian defense industry is interested in cooperation with the Korean defense industry. Together we can improve our technologies and speed up the production of the necessary equipment,- emphasized Serhii Boev. Yoo Yong Won drew attention to the legal restrictions of the Republic of Korea on the import of weapons, while at the same time he suggested considering the possibility of holding a joint seminar of Ukrainian and Korean defense manufacturers. As ArmiyaInform reported, the Russian mass media reported that starting February 28, Seoul allegedly decided to lift restrictions on the export of medical equipment to Russia. They present it as a sign of a reduction in international pressure and normalization of relations.

Title: They burned a tank, they also burned a grader — the border guards distinguished themselves in the Kh...
Description: The video of the combat work was published on the company's channel. In the weekly selection of combat work of the operators of strike drones, the following were destroyed: T-90 tank, BMP-2, armored combat vehicle, 7 vehicles of the occupiers, MTLB, grader, mortar and anti-tank missile system. Also, 2 warehouses of fuel and lubricants, 3 generators were burned, an electronic communications station, a repeater, and an enemy reconnaissance drone were destroyed. As reported by ArmyInform, gunners of the -Revenge- border guard brigade destroyed the shelter and broke the assault plan for the Russian unit.

Title: Drowning during a swamp assault: the Defense Forces said that it will stop enemy armored vehicles
Description: Major Viktor Tregubov, the spokesman of the Khortytsia operational-strategic group of troops, told about this on the -Suspilne.Novyny- broadcast. According to him, the situation there is more difficult than the situation in the Pokrovsky direction, despite the slightly lower number of military clashes. The occupiers have concentrated a lot of forces on the Novopavlovsk region, and the Ukrainians do not have Pokrovsk to rely on as a large base. However, the situation may change dramatically soon. After all, forecasters promise warming. -Warming can change the situation, slightly reducing the effectiveness of attacks, including reducing the effectiveness of the use of armored vehicles. Maybe it will bind them a little, because now the ground is frozen. And if the temperature there will really be in the region of +5+10, then even armored vehicles will not be very comfortable to advance on the dirty off-road, especially under the conditions of effective mining,- said Viktor Tregubov. As reported ArmyInform, in the Pokrovsky direction the invaders are not waiting for reinforcements one or two at a time, but are trying to attack our positions on their own.

Title: To live in Kurshchyna for a short time - our pilots - demobilize - Russian attack aircraft
Description: The video of the combat operation was released on February 28 on the brigade's channel. -The enemy is also trying to storm our troops in Kurshchyna. Therefore, the soldiers of our brigade work both day and night to destroy the enemy even on the approaches to the positions. What are the occupiers doing? They hide in forest plantations, disguise themselves in open areas, climb into anti-tank ditches... What are we doing? We catch and destroy everyone - with no chance of rescue,- the brigade commented on the video. As reported by ArmyInform, the Skywars air defense unit of the 47th mechanized brigade -Magura- showed the destruction of an enemy attack UAV.

Title: Open new opportunities: join the Polish paratroopers under -Contract 18-24-
Description: The brigade published a video explaining the benefits of the contract. The project opens up new opportunities: a decent financial reward, professional combat training according to NATO standards, social guarantees that no civilian profession provides. Also exemption from mobilization is provided for 12 months after the end of the contract. -Fly for a contract in the 95th brigade of the DSHV. Details at link,- says the post to the video. As ArmiyaInform reports, 400 applications have already been received for the 95th Polish Assault Brigade of the Armed Forces after the start of the new of the -Contract 18-24- project. The first contracts with servicemen were also signed. As a reminder, -Contrakt 18-24- is a voluntary initiative that allows Ukrainians in the specified age category to join the Defense Forces of Ukraine for one year. The project offers a decent financial reward, professional combat training according to NATO standards and social guarantees that no civilian profession provides.

Title: Our air defense shot down 107 enemy UAVs — the Air Force
Description: This was reported on February 28 by the Air Force of the Armed Forces of Ukraine. On the night of February 28, 2025 (from 19:00 on February 27), the enemy attacked with 208 Shahed-type attack UAVs and simulator drones of various types from the directions: Orel, Bryansk, Kursk, Millerovo, Shatalovo, Primorsko-Akhtarsk - Russian Federation. The air attack was repulsed by aviation, anti-aircraft missile forces, electronic warfare units and mobile fire groups of the Air Force and the Defense Forces of Ukraine. As of 09:00, the downing of 107 Shahed-type attack UAVs and drones of other types in Kharkiv, Poltava, Sumy, Kyiv, Chernihiv, Cherkasy, Vinnytsia, Zhytomyr, Kirovohrad, Dnipropetrovsk, Zaporizhia, Kherson and Mykolaiv regions has been confirmed. 97 enemy impersonator drones - lost in location (no ill effects). Kharkiv Oblast, Sumy Oblast, Mykolaiv Oblast and Zaporizhzhia were affected as a result of the enemy attack. As reported by ArmyInform, 90 enemy UAVs were shot down yesterday, 72 imitative drones did not reach their targets.

Title: The BMP shed burned down like a BMP barbecue - our pilots reformatted the enemy's equipment
Description: The video of the combat work was released on February 28 on the channel of the Airborne Assault Forces of the Armed Forces of Ukraine. -The occupiers modernized their own BMP to the -barn-barbecue- modification, but this did not save it from destruction. The watchful eyes of the paratroopers-operators see everything,- commented the video in the Armed Forces of the Armed Forces of Ukraine. As reported by ArmyInform, the paratroopers of the 78th separate airborne assault regiment of the DSHV of the Armed Forces of Ukraine an Italian was captured who fought on the side of the Russian invaders.

Title: A moment of silence in Ukraine
Description: -For the purpose of commemorating the bright memory, civic courage and self-sacrifice, fortitude, resilience and heroic feat of the soldiers who died while performing combat missions to protect the state sovereignty and territorial integrity of Ukraine, civilians who died as a result of of the armed aggression of the Russian Federation against Ukraine, I decree: to start holding a national minute of silence every day at 9:00 a.m. for compatriots who died as a result of the armed aggression of the Russian Federation against Ukraine, to be announced in all mass media, regardless of the form of ownership,- the document says.

Title: A couple of suicides — in the Pokrovsky area, the Russians are using unprecedented tactics
Description: Captain Anton Shestakov, head of the operational planning section of the 4th battalion of the Spartan operational brigade, told about this on ArmiyaTV stream. -Very often, one or two go out to attack with weapons, with the intention of seizing a position on their own. Apart from this direction, we have never seen anything like this, we have never encountered anything like this,- shared Anton Shestakov. According to him, Russian attack aircraft have to cover dozens of kilometers on foot to our positions, because our drones are destroying the enemy's equipment. During these transitions, the occupiers are hit by skids and kamikaze drones, the Russians run away, hide in abandoned dugouts, meet the remnants of the previous groups and continue their movement again until complete destruction. As reported by ArmyInform, Spartan drones turn enemy infantry into -targets-.

Title: NATO Secretary General announced billions in aid to Ukraine after a conversation with the US Preside...
Description: This is stated in a message on the Alliance website. It is noted that Mark Rutte and Donald Trump discussed the critical need for a long-term settlement of the situation in Ukraine. -They recognized the valiant defense of Ukraine after the large-scale invasion of 2022, which was made possible by the help of America and its allies, starting with the Javelin anti-tank missiles provided during the first Trump administration,- the statement said. The Secretary General of NATO and the President of the United States agreed on the importance of Europe and Canada significantly increasing defense spending and defense industrial capacity, which will be given special attention at the NATO summit in The Hague in June. Mark Rutte also made a post in X's social network, in which he emphasized that NATO members are moving quickly to increase investments in defense. -Significant increases have been announced and more are on the way. As for Ukraine, the members of the Alliance are preparing additional billions in aid and contributions for security guarantees,- he wrote. As reported by ArmiyaInform, Deputy Minister of Defense of Ukraine for European Integration Serhiy Boyev during a meeting with Assistant Secretary General of NATO for Political Affairs and Security Policy Boris Ruge informed about the current security situation in Ukraine and the needs in view of the political context.

Title: Soldiers of the GUR hit the forward command post of the occupiers in the Kherson region
Description: This was reported by the Main Directorate of Intelligence of the MOU. The control point belonged to the 14th Army Corps of the USSR. Intelligence officers of the Department of Active Actions of the Ministry of Defense of Ukraine struck with an explosive discharge from a drone. As ArmiyaInform reported, on February 26, the Air Force of the Armed Forces of Ukraine successfully struck the UAV control post of the 503rd motorized rifle regiment of the 19th motorized rifle division 58th army of the Russian invaders in Nesteryanka, Zaporizhzhia region. On February 25, the Armed Forces of the Armed Forces carried out a successful high-precision strike on a residential building used by the 1429th motorized rifle regiment Russian Federation as a command and observation post and a place to launch UAVs, near the settlement of Kopany, Zaporizhzhia region.

Title: -Contract 18-24-: recruit so that the enemies are afraid - the Russians spam the paratroopers of the...
Description: Sergeant-manager of the recruiting department of the 95th ODSHBr, chief sergeant Oleksandr Zorin, told about this in a comment to ArmiyaInform. Now, he assures, potential recruits have a specific interest in certain positions. -The trend of applications fluctuates a lot. If on the first day there were 100 applications, on the second day there were already 30 applications, on the fifth day there were 10. And now, on the contrary, there are 50 applications, 60 applications. People have become more specific, they already understand what they want,- said the sergeant of the recruiting department of the 95th Polish Airborne Assault Brigade. According to Oleksandr Zorin, the -Contract 18-24- project is very annoying to the enemy. Recruiters of the 95th brigade are currently fighting spam from Russians, who are sending a lot of fake messages. However, the work goes on, people join the Defense Forces. The most popular position in the 95 brigade is called the position of a sniper. The main advantage of paratroopers is a perfect education - with BZVP and a diverse set of exercises. The full cycle is at least 90 days. -We have our own group of instructors who teach, show and tell. They have extensive combat experience, not only in Ukraine, but also abroad. Already after that, recruits enter the next stage, which is combat coordination. There, they already get to know the commanders, the unit, its specifics,- Oleksandr Zorin noted. As reported by ArmyInform, within the framework of the -Contract 18-24- project, up to 10 separate mountain assault brigades of the Armed Forces of Ukraine -Edelweiss- applied 288 potential recruits, of which 90 people were selected. Most are currently undergoing VLK, there are also those who have already signed a contract. We remind you, -Contract 18-24- is a voluntary initiative that allows Ukrainians in the specified age category to join the Defense Forces of Ukraine for one year. The project offers a decent financial reward, professional combat training according to NATO standards and social guarantees that no civilian profession provides.

Title: At night, the enemy massively attacked Sumy with attack drones
Description: This was reported by the Sumy Regional Prosecutor's Office. As a result of the attack by the occupiers, a 68-year-old woman was injured and hospitalized. An 18-year-old girl also sought medical help with an acute reaction to stress. 8 apartment buildings were damaged. Under the procedural guidance of the District Prosecutor's Office of the city of Sumy, a pre-trial investigation into the commission of war crimes is being conducted (Part 1 of Article 438 of the Criminal Code of Ukraine). As reported by ArmyInform, on February 27, as a result of Russian strikes on Kostyantynivka, at least one person was killed and four locals were injured.

Title: During the past day, 128 combat clashes were recorded — the General Staff of the Armed Forces of Ukr...
Description: Operational information as of 08:00 on February 28 was published by the General Staff Armed Forces The aggressor carried out airstrikes, in particular in the areas of the following settlements: Krasnopillya, Sumy region; Galaganivka, Chernihiv region; Ryasne, Slatine, Doroshivka, Kharkiv region; Siversk, Kramatorsk, Kostyantynivka, Oleksiivka, Pokrovsk, Udachne, Zvirov, Oleksandro-Kalynov, Grodivka, Nadiivka, Horikhov, Novopil of the Donetsk region; Kamianske, Mali Shcherbaki, Zaliznychne, Gulyaipole, Novodarivka of the Zaporizhzhia region; Tyaginka, Prydniprovske, Tarasivka, Ingulets, Kherson region. Over the past day, missile troops and artillery of the Defense Forces hit one personnel concentration area, two enemy air defense systems and three enemy artillery systems. In the Kharkiv direction, the enemy tried six times to break through the defensive lines of our defenders in the direction of Vovchansk and Kindrasivka. In the Lyman direction, the enemy attacked six times. He tried to penetrate our defense near the settlements of Yampolivka, Torske, Zelena Dolyna and Kolodyazi. In the Siverskyi direction, our soldiers successfully repelled two enemy attacks in the area of ​​Belogorivka. In the Kramatorsk direction, the occupiers attacked twice in the areas of Vasyukivka and Predtechyny. In the Toretsk direction, the enemy carried out 11 attacks in the Krymskyi and Toretsk districts. In the Pokrovsky direction, our defenders stopped 49 assaults by the aggressor towards the settlements of Berezivka, Myrne, Promin, Lysivka, Pokrovsk, Novoukrainka, Zvirove, Kotlyne, Udachne, Nadiivka, Uspenivka, Preobrazhenka, Zaporizhzhia, Andriivka, Pishchane, Myrolyubivka, and Bohdanivka. In the direction of Novopavlivsk yesterday, the enemy carried out 16 attacks in the areas of Kostiantynopil, Novopil, Novodarivka, Skudne and Burlatske settlements. In the Gulyaipil direction, the enemy attacked the positions of our defenders in the Charivny districts six times. In the Orihiv direction, the occupying forces stormed the positions of the Defense Forces nine times in the areas of Stepovoy, Pyatikhatok, and Kamiansky. No signs of the formation of enemy offensive groups were detected in the Volyn and Poliske directions. The enemy did not carry out offensive operations in the Kupyan and Prydniprovsky directions of the previous day. Defense forces of Ukraine continue the operation in the Kursk region. Last day, the enemy carried out 16 airstrikes, dropping 28 anti-aircraft missiles, and fired 405 shots, including 15 from anti-aircraft guns. Ukrainian defenders repelled 11 assaults by invaders. -Our soldiers inflict significant losses in manpower and equipment on the occupying troops and actively undermine the offensive potential of the enemy in the rear,- the statement of the General Staff of the Armed Forces of Ukraine said. As reported by ArmyInform, over a thousand soldiers and fifty artsystems were lost by the enemy per day.

Title: Kilometer-long trenches, tunnels, underground cities - the enemy digs deeper from our drones
Description: Photos of enemy fortifications were published on the regiment's channel. In the construction of the trench network, the enemy uses boards, bodies of burned equipment and reinforced concrete floors. Sea containers or similar structures are often buried and connected to other fortifications. Command posts, housing, canteens, and workshops are placed in such underground towns. Passages of such underground towns extend up to 3 km, and the depth is up to 3 meters. -Our drones pissed off the enemy so much that he started creating spiral trenches in the shape of a snail, where he places machine gunners - -air defense on minimalkas-. Such machine gun nests fire 360° and cover enemy air defense, artillery, tanks and other heavy equipment from our bomber drones. Our fighters find solutions to counteract such -know-how- and continue to destroy priority targets, no matter how the enemy tries to protect them,- said Nemesis. As ArmiyaInform reported, as a result of joint work with comrades, fighters of the 412th Nemesis Regiment destroyed an enemy tank in the Zaporozhye direction.

Title: More than a thousand soldiers and fifty artillery systems — the General Staff of the Armed Forces re...
Description: Information about the losses of the Russians was made public on the morning of February 28 by the General Staff of the Armed Forces of Ukraine. The total combat losses of the enemy from 24.02.22 to 28.02.25 are approximately: As reported by ArmyInform, more than a third of army attacks occurred on the Pokrovsky direction.

Title: There are no enemy missile carriers in Ukrainian seas — the Navy
Description: as of 06:00 on February 28 the Naval Forces of the Ukrainian Armed Forces reported this. There are 4 enemy ships in the Mediterranean Sea, 3 of which are carriers of -Caliber- cruise missiles with a total firing of up to 26 missiles. During the day, in the interests of the Russian Federation, passage through the Kerch Strait was carried out: to the Black Sea - 2 vessels, of which 1 continued its movement in the direction of the Bosphorus Strait; to the Sea of ​​Azov - 13 ships, 7 of them moved from the Bosphorus Strait. Russia continues to violate the International Convention for the Protection of Life at Sea of ​​1974. (SOLAS) by disabling automatic identification systems. As reported by ArmyInform, the Navy of the Armed Forces of Ukraine predict whether the Russians will have a holiday season.

Title: More than a third of the enemy attacks fell on the Pokrovsky direction — the General Staff of the Ar...
Description: Operational information as of 22.00 on February 27 the General Staff of the Armed Forces reported. In the Kharkiv direction, he tried to break through the defensive lines of our defenders in the direction of Vovchansk and Kindrasivka four times. In addition, he carried out an air strike on Slatino. Six times the enemy attacked in the Lymansky direction, trying to advance in the direction of the settlements of Yampolivka, Torske, Zelena Dolyna and Kolodyazi. Our defenders repelled all enemy attacks. In the Siverskyi direction, our soldiers successfully repelled two enemy attacks in the area of ​​Belogorivka. The settlement of Siversk was hit by guided bombs. In the Kramatorsk direction, the Defense Forces repelled two enemy attempts to advance near Vasyukivka and Predtechyny. The enemy launched airstrikes with guided bombs on Kramatorsk. The enemy tried 11 times to penetrate our defense in the Toretsk direction in the Krymskyi and Toretsk areas. Three clashes continue until now. In addition, the settlement of Kostyantynivka was hit by guided bombs. The enemy is intensively attacking the Ukrainian defenders in the Pokrovsky direction. Here, during the day, the aggressor carried out 43 assault and offensive actions. The greatest activity of the Russian occupiers was in the areas of the settlements of Berezivka, Myrne, Promin, Lysivka, Pokrovsk, Novoukrainka, Zvirove, Kotlyne, Udachne, Nadiivka, Uspenivka, Preobrazhenka, Zaporizhzhia, Andriivka, and Bohdanivka, 12 clashes have continued until now. The enemy used 15 guided bombs on the settlements of Oleksiivka, Pokrovsk, Udachne and Zvirove. According to preliminary calculations, the losses of the occupiers in this direction since the beginning of the day amounted to 72 — killed and 67 — wounded. In addition, the Defense Forces destroyed a vehicle, a gun, one motorcycle and one ATV, a portable electronic warfare station, two SuperCam reconnaissance drones and one Zala. A tank, two artillery systems and a rocket salvo fire system were disabled. In the Novopavlovsk direction, our defenders repelled 11 attacks in the areas of Kostiantynopil, Novodarivka, Novopil and Burlatske settlements. So far, five clashes are ongoing. In the Gulyaipil direction, the enemy attacked the positions of our defenders in the Charivny districts six times. At the same time, the enemy carried out airstrikes on the settlements of Zaliznychne, Gulyaipole and Mali Shcherbaki. In the Orihiv direction, in some cases with the support of attack aircraft, the enemy attacked the defensive positions of our defenders nine times in the districts of Stepovoy, Pyatykhatok and Kamiansky, four battles are still ongoing. Since the beginning of the day, the enemy has not carried out offensive actions in the Kupyan and Prydniprovsky directions. Ten combat clashes took place today in the Kursk direction. During the day, the enemy launched 336 artillery strikes, including 15 from rocket salvo systems, carried out 16 airstrikes, and dropped 24 guided bombs. -Today, the soldiers of the 128th separate territorial defense brigade -Dike Pole- and the 34th separate coastal defense brigade should be commended for their effective combat work. Glory to the Ukrainian soldiers! -Glory to Ukraine!- - said in a message from the General Staff of the Armed Forces of Ukraine. As reported by ArmyInform, in the Pokrovsky area, the Russian army attacked the Defense Forces 35 times in the Pokrovsky area.

Title: More than a plane: how the Mirage 2000 fighter became one of the symbols of France
Description: In the continuation of this interview, Professor Haruk talked about how engineers and designers from the country of the Gallic Roosters turned the fairy tale into reality and put the Mirage 2000 on the wing. —Andrii Ivanovych, we ended our previous conversation with the fact that the then President of the French Republic, Valéry Giscard d'Estaing, receiving the outstanding aircraft designer and Dassault Aviation president Marcel Dasso in the Elysee Palace, emphasized that the country's government would buy only Mirage 2000 single-engine aircraft for the French Air Force. What was this position of the French leadership based on? — The Mirage 2000 aircraft project was conceived by the specialists of the Avion Marcel Dassault company in 1972. as a low-cost alternative, a kind of back-up option in case of abandonment of the complex and expensive ACF -combat aircraft of the future- project, which was being implemented at that time. The calculation turned out to be correct - when in 1975 the program to create the ACF was closed by the decision of the French government, the alternative version of the new combat aircraft came to the fore. ACF's design experience was not lost: for the Mirage 2000, a number of his developments were used, in particular the TRDDF engine SNECMA M53. The aerodynamic design — a tailless with a low-slung delta wing (leading edge sweep of 58°) — was borrowed from its very successful predecessor, the Mirage III fighter. However, thanks to the use of an electric remote control system, the maneuverability and controllability of the new Mirage turned out to be much better than that of its predecessor. Traditional aluminum alloys became the main structural materials for Mirage 2000; along with them, carbon-plastic panels found some use in the construction. - With the design features of this aircraft, everything is more or less clear. And what about the terms of implementing ideas and bringing them to the creation of real prototypes? - The significant commonality of the design with the Mirage III and the use of an already ready engine ensured the implementation of the project in a very short time: from the official start of the program to the flight of the first prototype, which took place on May 10, 1978, only 27 months passed. Half a year later, on September 18, 1978, the second car was tested. In total, five prototypes were produced, the last of which (two-seater) took off for the first time on October 11, 1980. — What leading tasks were significant for the engineers and designers of the French fighter? — During the creation of the Mirage 2000, the functions of a fighter-interceptor were considered a priority. It was this variant under the designation -Mirage 2000C- that was first introduced into serial production, which began at the end of 1982. In total, the French Air Force received 124 such aircraft. The first 37 cars, which belonged to the S1, S2 and S3 series, were equipped with M53-5 engines (thrust at maximum speed / afterburner 5500/8800 kgf), and the following S4 and S5 series - M53-P2 (respectively, 6600/9700 kgf). The aircraft in its standard version was equipped with the Thomson-CSF RDM radar (range 60-70 km). However, the refinement of this radar required time, so the first serial fighters received the RDM-1 radar with limited capabilities - it could not provide the use of air-to-air radar with a semi-active radar GOS. Since 1987, the Mirage 2000S has been equipped with an RDI radar with an increased range of up to 100 km and improved ground target recognition capabilities. The aircraft has a developed EW complex, which includes the Serval radar radiation warning station, the Saber active jamming station and the Eclair false target shooting device (a new Spiral device was installed from the 93rd Mirage 2000C). In the mid-1990s. some of the planes that participated in operations over the Balkans were additionally equipped with -Samir- missile attack warning stations. The Mirage 2000S cabin equipment is primarily represented by traditional analog devices. There is also an indicator on the background of the windshield. —What can you tell us about the Mirage armament?—The built-in armament of the Mirage 2000S consists of two 30-mm DEFA 554 cannons with 125 rounds of ammunition. Suspended weapons with a total weight of up to 6,300 kg are located on nine nodes: five under the fuselage and four under the wings. The center under-fuselage assembly and inboard wing pods are -wet-, meaning additional fuel tanks can be hung from them. The main armament of the air-to-air class is the R.530 medium-range missile (with a semi-active radar or infrared homing system) and the close combat R.550 -Mazhik- (with an infrared homing system). A typical warload variant included two R.530 and two R.550 missiles on underwing assemblies. In the 1990s the Mirage 2000S armament includes a new MICA IR guided missile with an IR homing system (another version of this missile is the MICA EM with an active radar homing system - aircraft of this modification cannot be used). To hit ground targets, the aircraft can use conventional aerial bombs, bomb cartridges, as well as anti-aircraft missiles. The use of KAB and KR with laser guidance is allowed, but the Mirage 2000S onboard equipment does not provide target illumination. Therefore, this function must be performed by another aircraft with the appropriate equipment or by a ground-based aircraft gunner. — As far as is known, the Dassault Aviation company also produced so-called sparks, aircraft for pilot training. Were any features introduced there? — Indeed, the French Air Force also received 30 Mirage 2000B two-seater combat training aircraft. This variant fully corresponds to the Mirage 2000S fighter in terms of the BREO composition and combat capabilities. However, the Mirage 2000B (like all other two-seaters of this family) does not have built-in guns. Instead, it is possible to hang an under-fuselage container SS630 with two 30-mm cannons and ammunition of 300 shells per barrel. —In addition to meeting the needs of their own Air Force, Mirage manufacturers immediately aimed to conquer foreign markets. Did potential foreign buyers have any special wishes? - From the very beginning of the development of the Mirage 2000, its creators hoped that the new machine would be able to repeat the export success of its predecessors, the Mirage III and Mirage F1 fighters. But if the French Air Force could be satisfied with a specialized fighter-interceptor, most foreign buyers needed a multi-purpose aircraft capable of striking ground and surface targets as well. With these requirements in mind, the Mirage 2000E export version was created. It was equipped with an RDM+ radar with advanced capabilities, and could also carry an Atlas II laser range finder-target designator in an outboard container. — And where did France send the premier export aircraft? — Egypt became the first foreign buyer of the Mirage 2000. In 1981, he ordered 20 aircraft - 16 single-seater Mirage 2000EM and four two-seater Mirage 2000VM. As part of the set of aircraft, containers -Atlis II-, -Mazhik- and -Super 530-, -air-surface- AS.30L and PRR -Armat- were ordered. But since the command of the Egyptian Air Force wanted to receive aircraft with M53-R2 engines, their delivery had to wait until 1986. The 82nd Fighter Squadron (Jebel El Mansour Air Base) was equipped with these fighters. As of the beginning of 2023, 17 aircraft remained in its composition - 15 Mirage 2000EM and two Mirage 2000VM. The Indians were more impatient than the Egyptians - in order to speed up the delivery of the Mirage 2000, they agreed that some of the machines would receive M53-5 engines. The Indian Air Force has ordered 40 Mirages - 36 single-seat 2000H and four two-seat 2000TN. Their delivery began in 1985 and was carried out at a very fast pace - all 40 machines were delivered within 12 months. The first 30 aircraft (in particular, all four two-seaters) were equipped with M53-5 engines, the last ten received TRDDF M53-R2. Later, the rest of the fighters were converted with such engines. In March 1986, an additional batch was ordered - six Mirage 2000N and three Mirage 2000TN machines (five were delivered by 1990, and two more in 1992 and 1994), and in September 2000 - ten more aircraft (four single and six double). So, in total, the Indian Air Force received 59 -Mirages-: 46 2000N modifications and 13 - 2000TN. —The first combat use of the Mirage 2000 took place during the multinational Operation Desert Storm. But, as far as is known, the Indians did not only train on these planes - in the Indian Air Force, Mirage 2000 was called -Vajra- - -Lightning-. The 1st, 7th, and 9th squadrons of the 40th wing (Gwalior Air Base, Madhya Pradesh) were armed with such fighters. They received their baptism of fire during the Kargil conflict in 1999. Operating in the conditions of the highlands, -Mirages- made 515 sorties. In 240 of them, they struck ground targets, using not only conventional bombs, but also laser-guided anti-aircraft missiles. In 2011, India entered into an agreement to upgrade its aircraft to the Mirage 2000-5 Mk2 standard. The fighters get the RDY-2 multifunctional radar, the ICMS Mk4 integrated EW complex, the Totem 3000 navigation system, new monitors, a built-in oxygen generator, and the cockpit equipment is adapted to work with night vision goggles. The arsenal of modernized aircraft (the single-seater version was designated -Mirage 2000I-, and the two-seater - 2000TI) includes MISA air-to-air missiles; in addition, the planes are adapted to use Damocles sighting containers. The first two cars (one-seater and two-seater) underwent modernization in France in 2013 and were handed over to the customer in March 2015, the rest were finished in India. As of the beginning of 2023, 38 single-seater Mirage 2000s and 10 two-seaters remained in service, both modernized and non-modernized. In September 2021, India purchased another 24 used aircraft from France - 13 complete (of which 8 are to be restored to flying condition) and 11 partially dismantled. — It seems that these fighters were also delivered across the ocean, to South America? — In 1986, 12 aircraft — ten single-seater Mirage 2000R and two two-seater 2000DP — were received by the Peruvian Air Force. Together with them, they acquired the Mazhik 2 air-to-air missile defense system and a wide range of air-to-surface unguided weapons. The Peruvian Air Force equipped the 412th Fighter Wing (La Jolla Air Base in the south of the country) with Mirage 2000 aircraft. During the conflict with Ecuador in 1995. they carried out combat patrols, but did not manage to achieve any results. Since 1997, the aircraft have undergone limited modernization - they were adapted for the Lizard (Israeli-made) laser-guided KAB suspension, Remora and Caiman EW containers, and also installed devices for shooting down false targets -Spiral-. In 2010-2012 Peruvian Mirage 2000 aircraft were overhauled with the installation of the Totem 3000 navigation system. In 2018, information appeared about plans to modernize six machines, including arming them with MISA missiles, but no data on their implementation was published. It was assumed that the Peruvian Mirage 2000 jets would be in service until 2025, but after the retirement of the MiG-29 fighter jets, this term is likely to be extended. — According to information in the media, the following samples of these aircraft that were sent for export also had certain changes. What did they consist of? — If the planes purchased by Egypt, India and Peru were generally little different from the standard Mirage 2000S/B, then the next two customers — the UAE and Greece — received machines with significant changes in the BREO composition. The UAE (or, more precisely, one of the emirates that are part of this state - Abu Dhabi) in 1983. ordered a total of 36 Mirages: 22 2000EAD single-seat fighters, eight 2000RAD single-seat scouts, and six 2000DAD two-seat combat trainers. At the request of the customer, they were equipped with Italian-made EW equipment, the integration of which with the rest of the BREO delayed the start of deliveries until 1989. Mirage 2000RAD machines are the only specialized reconnaissance aircraft in the entire Mirage 2000 family. They can carry on the under-fuselage assembly one of three variants of the container with reconnaissance equipment: the SLAR 2000 side-viewing radar, the COR 2 photo-reconnaissance container, or the AA-3-38 -Harold- long-range long-range photography equipment. Mirage 2000 aircraft of the UAE Air Force took part in combat operations during Operation Desert Storm, patrolling the airspace. Greece ordered 40 aircraft in 1985 - 36 single-seater Mirage 2000EG and four two-seater Mirage 2000BG. In the mid-1990s. these aircraft underwent modernization under the Talos program - they received the RDM-3 radar, the ICMS Mk1 EW complex, and also acquired the ability to use the Super 530D air-to-air missile defense system and the Exoset AM39 missile defense system. Modernized aircraft received the designation -Mirage 2000EGM- and -Mirage 2000ВGM-. There will be…

Title: Genocide of the occupiers, nomadic mortars, battles with the Wagnerites and bags of fire: ArmyInform...
Description: Lawyer, graduated from the National Academy of Internal Affairs of Ukraine and Kyiv University of Intellectual Property and Law of the National University -Odesa Law Academy-. Engaged in business, for some time worked in the rapid response unit of the Court Security Service. Under his leadership, the battery's mortar calculations inflict heavy losses on the enemy near Pokrovsk, preventing him from advancing to the administrative borders of the Dnipropetrovsk region. This section of the front is now one of the hottest. The invaders advance with infantry, supported by drones, artillery and tanks. About the combat work of the mortar unit in the Pokrovsky direction, the battles with the Wagnerites in Bakhmut, the importance of coordination with neighboring units in the battle, how the enemy uses fiber-optic drones and what a -mortar fire bag- is for Russian attack aircraft - in the ArmyInform material. -From the beginning of the formation of the battalion in the position of commander of the mortar battery. We fought in Klishchiivka, Kurdyumivka, and Ozaryanivka, then in Bakhmut itself, in Ivanivsk, in these directions we fought with the -Wagner- PMK, then we were transferred near Siversk - Rozdolivka. We are already destroying the enemy in the Pokrovsk region. At first, we inflicted damage to raschists near the settlement of Vovkove, and now we are killing katsaps in the Kotlynoye district. So combat experience is enough, says Timur. On the armed battery there are 82 mm mortars. This is quite an effective means of defeating the enemy. The small weight and the possibility of disassembling the mortar into its main parts allow it to be transported by any type of transport, and if necessary, to be moved by calculation forces. The firing range is up to 4 km, we use this weapon to destroy or suppress the enemy's manpower and firepower, we hit trenches and trenches. Now we are stopping the advance of small assault groups of the Russian Federation near Pokrovsk with mortar fire. Mine is enough, we are creating hell for the occupiers. After the first hit, the mortar must be adjusted to the target. The type of mines and powders must be taken into account. Wind strength at different altitudes, humidity, air temperature - everything is important in our work. In some areas of the front, even before the mass use of FPV drones, they worked as -nomadic mortars-: they drove along the line through forest plantations, fired three shots, changed position, fired again, quickly rolled up and drove away. Now it is no longer possible. It is necessary to dig in, disguise weapons, install anti-drone nets and trench EW. After firing, stack the mortar and hide it in the dugout so that it is not cut by fragments. What are the enemy tactics near Pokrovsk? the Russians advance in small infantry groups of 8-10 people from different directions. If the aerial reconnaissance has detected the enemy, the coordinates of the targets are reset to us, and then we strike from the mortar weapons in the area of ​​the advance of the enemy groups. Their tactics are predictable. It is to occupy some line of defense, entrench, dig in and then advance and continue the offensive from already established positions. One group goes, we uncoil it, then the second group moves through the field and forest plantations, we also destroy it. Another group generally crosses over the corpses of -their own- and moves on. Russians do not feel sorry for people. They are pressing precisely with numbers and advancement from different directions. There are days when the guys don't move away from the mortars at all, and the gunner has to aim the mortar at the target many times a day. Typically, mortar rounds destroy more than 50 occupiers in one day. And only God knows how many more lay down that we did not see. the Rashists kill themselves with their weapons and grenades. If under Pokrovsk, combat work is more on moving targets in the field and forest plantations, then in Bakhmut, in the urbanized zone, we inflicted mortar strikes on stationary non-moving targets of the Rashists. These were some infantry positions, places of accumulation of manpower and weapons, machine gun and mortar nests in apartment buildings, offices, garages and private houses. The enemy could hide in the city, it is more difficult to knock him out here, unlike in the open area. But also in the field, if the enemy is prepared to survive under mortar fire, it is possible. Therefore, everywhere has its own nuances. There were very intense battles with the -Wagnerians- in Bahmut, they grinded the enemy as efficiently as possible. There were days when up to 100 Russian mercenaries were destroyed. That was the norm back then. The enemy then advanced in whole companies, and now here near Pokrovsk in detachments. I remember that in February 2023, due to the lack of infantrymen at the positions, they picked up a machine gun and met the enemy with fire at the front edge. The situation was very difficult, it was necessary to maintain the defense. After the shooting battle, I go out to see what is behind the trench, I see a picture - the dead bodies of the -Wagnerians- are lying everywhere, it was very cold, frosty and windy then. In general, mortar units operate relatively close to the battle contact line and save our infantry who are even closer to the enemy. Sometimes it happens that we practically stand together with the infantry, 200-300 meters from them. Every 2-3 days, we try to rotate guys in positions. People need to rest and recover. Work at the command and observation post of the battery is carried out around the clock. First of all, this is interaction with air reconnaissance, adjusting the forces and means of both the mortar battery and the units assigned to us from various artillery batteries. It is very important to set up combat work correctly, conduct reconnaissance of firing positions, equip them for mortars, camouflage weapons so that enemy UAVs do not detect them, provide logistics nodes, transport BC, evacuation issues, and so on. For me, there are 4 main aspects to the successful process of destroying an enemy: interaction with neighbors, adjustments, prioritization of targets, and the fire damage itself. Plus, we destroy the enemy and -open up- Russian dugouts not only with 82 mm mortars, we also have a 100-mm Rapira anti-tank gun and a self-made -mini-Grad- RSZV -Partizan- in our battery. In battle, coordination is very important both within the battery's mortar calculations and with neighboring units that are also working in our direction. Hitting the enemy is complex work. Here, not only mortars pile up, FPV drones join in, infantry suppresses with their fire from machine guns and mounted anti-tank grenade launchers plus barrel artillery and neighbor tanks. Mortars work, first of all, in the interests of infantrymen. They are the most difficult, they are the first to meet the enemy and are constantly under fire. Therefore, when the enemy attack aircraft come, mortar calculations are actually the first to support our guys on the front line and suppress the enemy. If our infantry does not enter the battle, it means that the mortars worked successfully. According to the classics of combat use: we are creating a so-called mortar fire bag for Russian assault groups. We attack the area of ​​their concentration with mines, at the same time we lay the mines so that the fragments from the shells catch up with each raschit. We see where the enemy is running, our drone is adjusting from above. In general, the combat work of mortar calculations depends very much on the situation on the front and on the actions of the enemy. I remember fighting against Russian paratroopers near Siversk, they knew how to attack in an organized manner with the support of drones. It was difficult with them. But there are such cases when at night the Russians storm the … own infantry positions. At some point, the enemy groups lose orientation on the terrain, do not have thermal imagers and go to their trenches. And here the most interesting thing begins: a fight begins, shooting, in this chaos, the Rashists kill each other. We are watching all this with popcorn, because we already know where their advanced infantry positions are. When it gets boring on the KSP, our mortars and strike drones are already connected to the highway, which finish off both enemy attack aircraft and raiders who are fighting off -their own- in the trenches. Behind the assault groups of the Russian Federation are -barrage squads- who shoot at everyone who does not go on the offensive or who abandons -their own- during the assault and turns back. Such radio interceptions occur periodically. This was especially evident in the area of ​​the settlement of Rozdolivka in the Seversky direction, where the occupiers threatened massacre. Then the Rashists committed mass suicides without even reaching our positions. Such is the fate of the Russian occupier. It happened that a platoon of invaders simply hid in the village and sat in the basements, did not go to the assault and did not return, because they were afraid that their people would be shot.
