Then the Katsap platoon commander was given the command -Go find your men, take them out or zero them right there in the basements.- Can anti-aircraft guns detect mortar fire? Perhaps the enemy is using a serif system and radar. After all, a mortar projectile flies quite high. They will be able to detect the approximate sector where our mortar is located. An enemy reconnaissance UAV takes off and conducts preliminary reconnaissance. But if a small 82 mm mortar is well camouflaged, it will not be visible at all and will be difficult to find in the area. We do some other things that the enemy doesn't know about and that saves the lives and health of mortar crews. The only rule in combat is to change to survive. The enemy improves tactics, we transform. On the contrary, we are making changes, and the Rashists are not sleeping either. If once more artillery hit our mortars, now it is the era of -fpvishok-, drone war. REBs come to the rescue, but not always, the occupiers began to use FPV drones on fiber optics. But I will say this, fiber-optic drones are slow and not maneuverable by their characteristics. Somehow the guys were evacuating from their positions and these -fpvishki- tried to catch up with the car. The car was at a speed of more than 70 km/h and the drone did not catch up with it. If you make a sharp maneuver, the FPV fiber will fly further, so there are options for survival. After all, he has to make a turn in the air, it takes some time. It cannot maneuver quickly like a normal FPV. Therefore, the enemy is increasingly using fiber-optic drones to attack stationary targets. Fortunately, we have not yet had to meet them in our positions.

Title: Propaganda in action: fiction about the lifting of sanctions by South Korea
Description: Russian mass media, including RIA Novosti, reported that on February 28, Seoul allegedly decided to lift restrictions on the export of medical equipment to Russia. They present it as a sign of a reduction in international pressure and a normalization of relations. In fact, South Korea has made changes to the export control procedure that only apply to humanitarian supplies. This means that some medical equipment intended exclusively for humanitarian purposes can now be exported under a simplified procedure. Instead of a full licensing process, suppliers only need to declare the purpose of the shipment. This is another example of how Russian propaganda tries to pass off wishful thinking as reality. They distort the facts to create the illusion of support and lifting of sanctions. But, unfortunately for them, the world is not so naive and easily recognizes these manipulations. In the times of information wars, it is important to critically evaluate the sources of information and not succumb to provocations. Russian propaganda continues its attempts to misinform the world community, but the truth always comes out.

Title: With thanks to betrayal: an ex-policeman from Izyum exchanged his honor for a Russian -isolator-
Description: The Kharkiv Regional Prosecutor's Office informs about this. According to the investigation, the policeman voluntarily cooperated with the occupation authorities. First, he handed the Russian military letters of thanks from the residents of Izyum for the help of the Armed Forces. This information helped the occupiers identify pro-Ukrainian citizens. Subsequently, the traitor received the position of -head of the detention center for the temporary detention of suspects and accused persons- in the occupation -police-. In this position, he guarded illegally detained Ukrainians and issued documents according to Russian legislation. Before Izyum was released from the ZSU, the collaborator fled to Russia. Currently, the issue of declaring him wanted is being decided. As reported by ArmyInform, a 56-year-old man who publicly justified armed aggression of the Russian Federation against Ukraine was exposed in Kharkiv and admired the Russian army.

Title: -Marder- in action: the marines showed how they train to defeat the enemy in any conditions
Description: The combat training video was published on the brigade's page. The purpose of these trainings is to gain the necessary experience to successfully carry out combat missions and hold back the enemy's offensive. -As a result, we receive the most valuable thing - a successfully completed task and the prevention of the enemy's offensive,- the message reads. Title: - Shaheds - attacked Kharkiv Oblast, there are casualties

As reported by ArmyInform, on February 27, as a result of Russian strikes on Kostyantynivka, at least one person was killed and four local people were injured.

Title: -They stopped themselves-: Russian attack aircraft were embarrassed during an attempt to break throu...
Description: The corresponding video was published on the brigade's page. -It's a shame to waste even drones on such attack aircraft - they stop themselves,- the brigade said in a statement. Three Russian soldiers tried to reach Ukrainian positions on motorcycles. But the plan failed: Ukrainian fighters from the BBS unit of the 63rd brigade had only to destroy the abandoned transport. -Guys, don't be sad, walking is healthier!- - added the Ukrainian defenders. As reported by ArmyInform, DBR employees in cooperation with the National Security Service of the National Police and the SBU detained the acting head of Khmelnytskyi of the district administration, which organized a scheme under which conscripts could receive the status of limited fitness for money.

Title: -Destroyed. Without options-: the fighters of the Defense Forces defeated the Russian mortars in the...
Description: The video of combat work was made public on the brigade's page. -Our operators do not give the enemy a single chance,- the brigade emphasized. According to reports, the Russian military tried to hide in shelters, but this did not save them from Ukrainian mortars. -The enemy mortars and their infantry hid in shelters - in vain. The accurate fire of the 5th Assault Force forced them to cease to exist,- the report said. As reported by ArmiyaInform, in the Kramatorsk area, the fighters of the 5th Kyiv assault brigade of the Ukrainian Armed Forces effectively use drones to destroy enemy equipment and personnel.

Title: - Warming up- the occupiers in Toretsk: how the Ukrainian military hunts Russian drones
Description: The video of the combat operation was made public on page 28 of a separate mechanized brigade named after the Knights of the Winter Campaign. The enemy's calculation is simple: hide in broken houses, hide drones, and when necessary, call for help. However, the Ukrainian pilots of the Gyurza unit from the Unmanned Systems Battalion of the 28th Separate Mechanized Brigade do not give them such an opportunity. Just one signal is enough, and the coordinates are transmitted to the artillery and gunners. It happened this time as well. The occupiers left visible signs of their presence - rags and antennas - hoping for help. But instead of reinforcements, they received a -warm- reception from the Ukrainian defenders: artillery, the 4th rifle battalion and drone operators of the 28th brigade destroyed their positions. As reported by ArmyInform, within the scope of the -Contract 18-24- project, hundreds of people applied to the 28th Brigade named after the Knights of the Winter Campaign. Dozens of candidates have already passed the military medical commission, and some have signed contracts.

Title: - Girl-girl- on ATGM: the story of a defender who destroys enemy equipment
Description: The defender's story was published on the page of the Land Forces of the Armed Forces of Ukraine. Svetlana did not have a military education, but she owned firearms, had physical training and a psychological education. She was sure: if there is a desire, everything can be learned. -I understood that everything can be mastered if there is motivation. And when a new staff structure appeared in the brigade, I, as a junior sergeant, was appointed commander of the unit,- she says. However, not all her peers accepted her new role. -Guys whom I considered brothers suddenly became hostile,- admits Svetlana. -Not every man can accept a female commander.- Svitlana works with the Ukrainian Stugna-P anti-tank missile system, which allows you to destroy enemy equipment from cover. -I like that you can work from a trench where you are at least a little bit protected. You can aim, think, exhale, and make an accurate shot,- she says. And when the missile hits the target, it is a moment of special emotions. -I immediately edit a small video with motivational music and send it to our group. It energizes the whole team.- Despite the difficulties, Svetlana's motivation remains unchanged. -I have a goal, and it has not faded. I see the light at the end of the tunnel and go towards it. Nothing will affect me.- Her story is yet another proof that war knows no gender boundaries. The main thing is strength of spirit, faith in one's work and boundless love for Ukraine. As reported by ArmyInform, combat medic Anna with the nickname -Myshka- is a girl who has just turned 19 years old, consciously chose the path of a defender of Ukraine and joined the ranks of the Armed Forces of Ukraine.

Title: -Swing- for the occupiers: how -Spartan- drones turn enemy infantry into -targets-
Description: The video of combat work was made public on the brigade's page. -The occupiers try to shoot back, run away, hide when they see or hear our drones in the sky. But the meeting with the drones of -Spartan- does not leave them with any hope of salvation,- the brigade said in a statement. Ukrainian kamikaze drones staged a real -hunt- for Russian infantry, delivering precise strikes with FPV drones and drops. -Precise FPV strikes and drops stop the enemy's attempts to approach the positions of our infantry,- the brigade emphasized. As reported by ArmyInform, the Russian command continues to demonstrate its -caring- attitude towards the personnel, sending to storm Ukrainian positions, even wounded servicemen.

Title: Welcome to the -Russian world-: the occupiers have deployed a new filtration camp on TOT
Description: This is reported by the Center of National Resistance. -Filter 'all inclusive' from the occupiers: a check for cooperation with the Armed Forces and a Russian passport as a gift,- the Center of National Resistance ironically commented on the situation. Residents of the occupied territories are forcibly taken to the camp, where they are subjected to interrogations and -checks-. At the same time, everyone is issued a Russian passport, effectively forcing them to become citizens of the aggressor country. -In fact, the Russians are committing genocide and destroying a nation in the heart of Europe right now,- the Center for National Resistance emphasizes. Despite the occupiers' attempts to cover up their crimes, the Center of National Resistance closely monitors camp staff and all those involved in their operation. -We emphasize that crimes against humanity have no time frame for prosecution and no one will escape retribution,- the statement said. The National Resistance Center is urging citizens to submit information that will help bring war criminals to justice at a link on their website. As reported by ArmyInform, in the temporarily occupied territories of Ukraine, Russian invaders continue militarization of local population, in particular teenagers. This time they resorted to the cynical use of children as human shields during their training.

Title: The mountains are calling, the Telegram map is leading: Ukrainians tried a -tour- to Romania, but so...
Description: informs DPSU about this. As it turned out, residents of the Dnipropetrovsk region bought an electronic map with a route leading to Romania through the mountains for $2,000 from one of the Telegram channels. -Illegal tourists- planned to use the -services- of the Telegram channel to avoid crossing the border legally. However, their plans were thwarted by the vigilance of border guards. Administrative reports were drawn up on the detainees for attempting to illegally cross the state border. Title: The Ukrainian military tested the latest fiber optic modules -Shovkopryad-
Description: This is reported by the Command of the Unmanned Systems Forces. This advanced development allows not only to expand the functionality of FPV drones, but also to integrate fiber optic modules into ground robotic complexes (GRC), as well as to provide control of surface and underwater unmanned systems. The developers of -Silkworm- emphasized the maximum simplicity and efficiency of the technological solution, which is critical for use in combat conditions. FPV drones equipped with these modules are light, maneuverable and capable of covering distances of more than 20 km, which gives Ukrainian drones a significant advantage in confrontation with the enemy. As reported by ArmyInform, Ukraine is actively expanding its capabilities to combat Russian strikes by introducing new technological solutions. One of these innovative steps was the use of FPV drones to destroy Iranian kamikaze drones Shahed.

Title: From the occupation to the front: the story of Kherson, which became the eyes of the artillery in th...
Description: The story of the fighter was made public on page 44 of the separate artillery brigade. Not having time to recover, -Kherson- went to the military commissariat. He was given a week to adapt and was sent to the ranks of the 44th Artillery Brigade. The 29-year-old hero in civilian life was a road foreman. He knew army discipline from his military service, and he also trained in ground defense in Kakhovka. In the Ternopil brigade, he serves as an operator-mechanic of the control platoon: he controls drone flights over the front line, guards positions and monitors the enemy from a height. Also ensures communication between units. -My work is dynamic,- Kherson says. — Especially interesting in firing positions. You arrive - and you see how the guys are holding on, how they are shooting.- The geography of the -Kherson- war is mainly the Zaporozhian areas. -At the beginning of the war, we used drones and were better than them,- Kherson recalls. — But time has changed the battlefield. Now EWs - means of electronic warfare - are jamming signals and disrupting plans, both theirs and ours.- According to the signalman, Ukrainian soldiers taught the occupiers to defend themselves. After successful counterattacks, the occupiers drew conclusions. Now they dig in everywhere, set up ambushes, prepare for all possible attacks. At the same time, their tactics have not changed - one can feel the -Sovietness-. -The 'meat assaults' continue,- Kherson says. -The main thing for them is to grab a piece of the city or a forest strip, they just go until they cover everything with their corpses.- The occupiers are constantly -monkeying- Ukrainians, Kherson notes. If they once did not understand each other on drones, now they are launching land-based UAVs, intercepting technologies. Their -Kulibins- find information on the Internet and tinker. -However, we still have the best specialists,- the interlocutor compares. — The boys are improving, making drones of various modifications, studying. Volunteers help, supply equipment. Even with minimal support, our engineers create incredible things.- He speaks about his brothers with special warmth. During the war, units in -Kherson- changed more than once. But I was always surrounded by friendly and sincere people. He still keeps in touch with many of them. Usually the -Kherson- group -flew- every other day. The schedule is the same: coffee at four in the morning, then they gather and go to the positions. From the sixth you can see the sky, the earth, the enemy. Laying down Starlink and waiting for the command - permission to take off. Searching all day. Outputs of enemy artillery, movement. A lot of information was obtained through interception. There were times when the occupiers and Ukrainians were caught intercepting, then guided to their positions. The arrivals were close. -We are more accurate,- Kherson says proudly. - Sometimes even their shells don't explode - a -defective state-. Kherson is motivated by the fact that he was in the occupation, what he saw what they are capable of. -Father remained in the occupation, we hardly spoke, so as not to frame him,- he continues bitterly. — They communicated only when I was on vacation. I knew that he was shocked when the city of Kherson was captured, I was worried for him. And then… He died. From that day on, no connections with those parts.- For him, this war is not just a front line. It is a personal line between ordinary life and horror. -They do what they want - with women, with children… No one wants a -second Bucha-. I was under occupation, so I went to the front. Because if they are not stopped, the same will happen to my mother, wife, child.- Kherson's values ​​are simple and indisputable: family and country. -There are many goals,- he says. — But the biggest thing is to be with the family. Everyone needs this. To create the future — for yourself, for your children. The most important thing is that it all ends. I'm doing everything I can.- As reported by ArmyInform, the 48-year-old intelligence officer Ihor from Crimea, for whom the issue of protecting his native land is a matter of principle, shared with his impressions of a recent combat mission.

Title: Sky hunters: Ukrainian drones set up a safari on Russian -kubla-
Description: The video of combat work was published on page 3 of the separate Iron Tank Brigade. -Their next booty, as always, fills with pride for their skillful brothers, and also with pleasure from pictures of disposal of the Russian occupiers,- says the description of the video. With the help of FPV drones, Ukrainian pilots destroyed three enemy fortifications. The enemy antennas on the tower were also hit. In addition, Ukrainian artillerymen covered one enemy position with fire, and on another they -cleaned- the hideout of the occupants with a fragmentation charge. As ArmiyaInform reported, fierce battles are ongoing in the snow-covered Kharkiv Region. Warriors of the 3rd separate tank Iron Brigade thanks to their arsenal of reconnaissance and strike drones hold the defense and inflict significant losses on the enemy.

Title: - Loaves- burning, - Zhiguli- exploding — our pilots arranged the last trip for the occupiers
Description: The video of combat work was released on February 27 on the battalion channel. The lack of armored vehicles forces the invaders to use civilian vehicles, which the Russians do not even try to protect them from drones. This leads to the fact that the equipment burns beautifully. -On loaves or zhigulys, it will still be a blast,- the battalion commented on the video. As reported by ArmyInform, the fighters of the 110th mechanized brigade named after Corporal General Mark Bezruchko with drones destroyed a bunch of enemy armored vehicles and infantry.

Title: The Ministry of Defense spoke about priorities in the field of defense procurement
Description: this was stated by First Deputy Minister of Defense of Ukraine Lieutenant General Ivan Gavrilyuk, commenting on the key areas of military cooperation with European partners. -Today, more than ever, Europe must show strength in the face of the challenges ahead. It is fair to say that a strong Europe is impossible without a strong Ukraine,- he emphasized. According to Ivan Gavrylyuk, an important factor in increasing the combat capability of the army is the sphere of defense procurement. Key priorities in this direction for 2025 have been identified: improvement of procurement mechanisms, monitoring and control of contract execution, expansion of cooperation with international partners, creation of an effective internal control system. A separate priority is support for Ukrainian defense production. -Over the past three years, Ukraine has made a breakthrough in the development of the defense industry. Every year, about 70% of the budget of the Ministry of Defense, intended for the purchase of anti-aircraft missiles, is directed to the Ukrainian manufacturer,- said Lieutenant General Ivan Havryliuk. At the same time, due to the lack of financial resources, a certain part of the production capacity of the domestic defense industry is currently not loaded. Therefore, it is imperative that Ukrainian allies increase their financial investments in the Ukrainian defense industry. One of the ways to finance defense production is to use the profits from the frozen assets of Russia. Work is underway with European partners on this issue. The MOU said that one part of the funds of the new tranche will be directed to the purchase of defense products in EU member states, the other to the purchase of weapons and equipment from Ukrainian defense and military enterprises. Other sources of funding for the needs of the Defense Forces of Ukraine are being discussed with allies. -Financial support of European partners is an investment not only in strengthening Ukraine's defense capabilities, but also in the defense of Europe,- concluded the First Deputy Minister of Defense. As reported by ArmyInform, during the year the procurement agency of the Ministry of Defense -State rear operator- concluded 719 contracts for the total amount of UAH 74.6 billion, providing the army with food, ammunition and fuel and lubricants.

Title: Circular defense of the Third Assault Division, hunting for Russians in Toretsk: stream from the fro...
Description: The stormtroopers had to maintain a circular defense, as well as fend off drones and withstand the arrival of cluster bombs. In Toretsk, the pilots of the -Gyurza- unit found hiding places of Russian drone operators and gave their coordinates to the fighters of the 28th brigade. According to good tradition, the fighters of the brigade sent warming gifts to the Russians and fired at the occupiers from their positions. Pilots of the Incognito battalion of the 54th brigade eliminated the Russians who went on an assault in a convertible. Instead of using expensive armored vehicles for attacks, the occupiers turned the Soviet -Bukhanka- into a -convertible-. This modification simply made it easier for our pilots. These and other topics are discussed by our hosts - lieutenants Serhiy Lipko and Yevhen Nazarenko.

Title: The defense forces hit the control point of the Russian UAVs
Description: informs the General Staff of the ZSU. This military facility was used by the enemy to control, store and service UAVs of the Russian Federation. -The brave pilots of the Air Force of the Armed Forces of Ukraine will continue to destroy the occupying forces until the Russian Federation stops its armed aggression against the people of Ukraine,- the message reads. As reported by ArmyInform, on February 25, 2025, the Air Force of the Armed Forces of Ukraine carried out a successful high-precision strike on a residential building used by the 1429th motorized rifle regiment of the Russian Federation as a command and observation post and a place for launching UAVs, near the settlement of Kopany, Zaporizhzhia region.

Title: Ireland will provide Ukraine with Giraffe radars
Description: The Office of the President informs about this on February 27. The head of state thanked Ireland for the help and support provided to Ukraine. It was noted that Ukraine appreciates that Ireland shares its vision for the future security architecture. In particular, Volodymyr Zelenskyi and Mikhol Martin discussed security guarantees and the importance of the unity of Ukraine, Europe and the United States on the way to a just peace. -Special attention is paid to control of the skies, Ireland's participation in the demining coalition and the EU training mission to train the Ukrainian military. Michal Martin reported that Ireland will provide Giraffe radars to Ukraine,- the message reads. In addition, the parties discussed the construction of shelters in Ukrainian schools, support for the reform of school meals and the Ukrainian initiative to guarantee food security in Syria. As reported by ArmyInform, President of Ukraine Volodymyr Zelenskyy held a telephone conversation with his French counterpart Emmanuel Macron to with partners and agree on next steps.

Title: A person died as a result of an attack by Russian UAVs in Nikopol region
Description: The Prosecutor General's Office informs about this. As a result of Russian shelling, a 51-year-old man was killed and a 52-year-old woman was injured. The car was also damaged. Under the procedural leadership of the Dnipropetrovsk Regional Prosecutor's Office, a pre-trial investigation was started in criminal proceedings for the commission of a war crime that caused the death of a person (Part 2, Article 438 of the Criminal Code of Ukraine). -Prosecutors, in cooperation with other law enforcement officers, are taking all possible and appropriate measures to document war crimes committed by representatives of the armed forces of the Russian Federation,- the message reads. As reported by ArmyInform, on February 27, as a result of Russian strikes on Kostyantynivka, at least one person was killed and four local people were injured.

Title: -Rescuers- in pursuit of the occupiers: two collaborators with the -Ministry of the Russian Federati...
Description: informs the SBU about this. According to the case file, after the capture of Kherson, both involved voluntarily switched to the side of the enemy and joined the ranks of the occupying Ministry of the Russian Federation. One of the detainees turned out to be a former military man who agreed to head the -emergency response department- in the pseudo-institution. In this -position-, the collaborator recruited subordinates and special equipment for the needs of the occupation troops who fought on the southern front. He also helped the Russians set up fortifications and checkpoints, and under the guise of -gumconvoys- transported weapons and ammunition to the front. The other detainee is the former -chief economist of the main administration of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the Russian Federation in the Kherson region.- She was responsible for the implementation of the -ruble zone- in the pseudo-government and called on local residents to support the occupiers. After the liberation of Kherson, the woman got a job at the city branch of the State Production and Consumer Service, providing false data. However, feeling the inevitability of punishment, she tried to escape to Mykolaiv region, but was detained at one of the checkpoints. Both collaborators were informed of the suspicion for h. 7th century 111-1 of the Criminal Code of Ukraine (collaborative activity). They face up to 15 years in prison with confiscation of property. As reported by ArmyInform, DBR employees in cooperation with the National Security Service of the National Police and the SBU detained the acting head of Khmelnytskyi of the district administration, which organized a scheme under which conscripts could receive the status of limited fitness for money.

Title: The fourth recruiting center of the Ukrainian army was opened in the Kyiv region
Description: This is reported by the Ministry of Defense of Ukraine. -The center does not issue subpoenas. You can contact him confidentially without revealing your personal data. There are more than 10,000 vacancies in the entire Defense Forces,- the MOU emphasized. UAV operator positions are most popular among citizens. The period of joining military service can last from a few days to 2 months. -The network of recruiting centers is growing, today we are actually represented in all regions of Ukraine. This enables people who want to learn more about the opportunities to join the Defense Forces to come, inquire and get the necessary information,- said Oleksiy Bezhevets, the commissioner of the Ministry of Defense for recruiting issues. He said that people turn to them to find out what the state currently offers, where they can serve, what are the terms of service, as well as what are the vacancies and how they can better apply their civilian knowledge and skills. From now on, you can get a consultation, and if you wish, you can join the Defense Forces at the following address: m. Boryspil, str. Kyivsky Shlyach, 72 (premises of the Boryspil City Council). The center will be open Monday through Thursday from 8:00 a.m. to 5:00 p.m. and on Friday from 8:00 a.m. to 4:00 p.m. A civilian recruiter who has undergone appropriate professional training will also provide consultations by phone: +38 (066) 706 5079. In addition to Boryspil, such centers also provide services in Bila Tserkva, Bucha and Brovary in the Kyiv region. A total of 48 Ukrainian army recruiting centers have been opened in Ukraine in cooperation with local self-government bodies and local authorities. Another center in the network operates in online mode throughout Ukraine. In total, since mid-February last year, more than 42,000 people have applied to the network, and almost 2,000 have joined the desired position in the selected military unit. -The recruiting center is open on the basis of our Administrative Services Center. We believe that this will strengthen the defense capability of our state. Every resident of Boryspil will be able to learn about military service in the Armed Forces of Ukraine here, get advice and make their choice for the defense of our country,- said Boryspil City Council Secretary Vladyslav Baichas. Information about Ukrainian army recruiting centers and contacts can be found at link. As reported by ArmyInform, a specialized exhibition -Recruiting: from ancient times- opened today in Kyiv on Kontraktova Square. to modernity-, which was organized by the Department of Coordination and Direction of Recruiting Centers of the Ministry of Defense of Ukraine together with the National Institute of Remembrance.

Title: Rustem Umyerov: Army+ launched a survey on the exchange of combat experience
Description: He wrote about this on his Facebook page on February 27. According to him, the analysis and implementation of the best solutions from the battlefield is critical for the effective conduct of hostilities and the preservation of the lives of Ukrainian defenders. What exactly is being investigated? The survey is designed to answer key questions: The obtained results will help to update approaches to the collection, analysis and transfer of combat experience, which will make the Ukrainian army even stronger and more adaptable to challenges on the battlefield. The survey will be open until March 13. It is open to military personnel who want to share their experiences and suggest improvements. Rustem Umyerov called on defenders to get involved:“Together we are working to make our army stronger!' Feedback and proposals of the military will become the basis for further changes and reforms in the sphere of exchange of combat experience in the Armed Forces. As reported by ArmyInform, today, February 25, in Kyiv, Defense Minister Rustem Umyerov met with the delegation of the international association of parliamentarians -United for Ukraine- (U4U) - a global network of partners of Ukraine who systematically support it in their countries and on the international arena. They discussed the key defense needs of Ukraine in 2025.

Title: In the Pokrovsky direction, the Russian army attacked the Defense Forces 35 times
Description: This is reported in the operational information of the General Staff of the Armed Forces of Ukraine as of 4:00 p.m. on February 27. The invaders do not stop using artillery on the territories of the regions bordering the Russian Federation. Areas of settlements Oleksandrivka, Bratenytsia, Starykove, Stara Huta, Ulanov, Slavgorod, Sumy Oblast came under enemy fire; Karpovychi, Arkhipivka, Zarechye, Chernihiv region. In the Kharkiv direction, our defenders repelled two enemy assaults in the direction of Vovchansk and Kindrasivka. On the Lyman direction the enemy attacked in the areas of Yampolivka, Torske and Kolodyaz settlements. Since the beginning of the day, there have already been four skirmishes in this direction, which were successfully repulsed by our defenders. In the Seversky direction, in the region of Bilogorivka, the Defense Forces successfully repelled one enemy assault. The settlement of Siversk was hit by guided bombs. In the Kramatorsk direction Defense forces repulse an enemy attempt to advance near Vasyukivka. The enemy launched airstrikes with guided bombs on Kramatorsk. In the Toretsk direction the enemy attacked the positions of our troops in the Krymskyi and Toretsk regions eight times. Four clashes continue until now. In addition, the settlement of Kostyantynivka was hit by guided bombs. In the Pokrovsky direction today, the enemy attacked the positions of our defenders 35 times in the areas of the settlements of Berezivka, Myrne, Promin, Lysivka, Pokrovsk, Novoukrainka, Zvirove, Kotlyne, Udachne, Nadiivka, Uspenivka, Preobrazhenka, Zaporizhzhia and Bogdanivka, ten skirmishes continue until now. The aggressor used 15 guided bombs on the settlements of Oleksiivka, Pokrovsk, Udachne and Zvirove. In the Novopavlovsk direction, our defenders repelled five attacks in the areas of Kostiantynopil and Burlatske settlements. In the Gulyajpil direction, the enemy became more active in the Novopol and Charivny areas, our defenders successfully repelled four attacks on our positions, and two more skirmishes continue until now. At the same time, the enemy carried out airstrikes on the settlements of Kamianske, Zaliznychne, Gulyaipole and Novopil. In the Orikhov direction, the enemy attacked our defenders seven times in the areas of Stepovoy, Pyatikhatok, Novoandriivka, and Kamiansky, and launched an airstrike with unguided missiles in the Novoandriivka area. Since the beginning of the day, the enemy has not carried out offensive actions in the Kupyan and Dnipro directions. Four combat clashes took place today in the Kursk direction. In addition, the enemy carried out 12 air strikes, shot down 18 anti-aircraft missiles, and launched 191 artillery strikes, including 12 from MLRS. As reported by ArmyInform, over the past day the army of the aggressor country lost 1150 personnel and 69 artillery systems of various models.

Title: -They move like lemmings- - on the Lymansky direction, the enemy advances and dies continuously
Description: Maksym Bilousov, head of the communications department of the 60th separate mechanized brigade, told about this on the air of -Suspilne.Novyny-. According to him, even before the New Year, a large number of mechanized attacks were recorded. Now they are minimal - except single MTLB or several BMPs, which are trying to drive to the positions of the Infantry Defense Forces. The enemy does not stop infantry assaults. Infantrymen go almost around the clock, in small groups of 2-4 people. -The enemy just doesn't stop moving. Moves both day and night, tries to accumulate. And the dark time of the day does not stop him. They just move, move, move, move like lemmings. Either they do not have the instinct of self-preservation, or they are simply so brainwashed,- said the head of the communications department of the 60th separate mechanized brigade. As reported ArmyInform, the Russians are actively trying to develop an offensive both to the north and to the west in the Novopavliv region. Its efficiency is not very high.

Title: Enemy -Smerchi- and artillery shelled Kostyantynivka, there are casualties
Description: informs the head of Donetsk OVA Vadym Filashkin about this. In particular, a 32-year-old man was killed, local residents from 48 to 82 years old were injured. -This afternoon, the Russians shelled the city with Smerchas and 152 mm artillery. 5 private houses, 4 high-rise buildings, an administration building, 3 businesses, 3 power lines, a gas pipeline and a car were damaged,- the report said. As reported by ArmyInform, on February 26, the occupying Russian troops dropped at least six air bombs on the city of Kostyantynivka, Donetsk region and its surroundings. -FAB-250-. Rescue operations are ongoing.

Title: Recruiting from ancient times to modern times: a specialized exhibition opened in Kyiv
Description: The exhibition tells how recruitment to the armies took place on Ukrainian lands, starting from Russia and ending with the present. Visitors have the opportunity to learn about the formation of the army of Russia and the Grand Duchy of Lithuania, the Zaporizhzhya Army and the armies of the Ukrainian and West Ukrainian People's Republics, as well as the formation of the Ukrainian Sich Riflemen and the Ukrainian Insurgent Army. The exhibition highlights such issues as the role of volunteers in the armies of different times, the age of soldiers and their social portrait. The exhibition presents information on modern recruiting for the Armed Forces of Ukraine: separate banners contain relevant information for those wishing to join the ranks of the Defense Forces. Part of the exhibition is devoted to combat brigades, which are participating in an experiment to recruit volunteers aged 18 to 24. The banners are equipped with QR codes that allow visitors to learn more about the units of the Defense Forces that they can join at will. -This exhibition is, in fact, a scientific discovery, because before this there were no specialized studies in Ukrainian historical science about how, over the centuries, Ukrainians participated in the defense of the Motherland. On the other hand, it is important in the context of modern events, when each of us has to make a decision - how we can be useful to our state now,- said Volodymyr Tylishchak, deputy head of the Ukrainian Institute of National Remembrance, at the open exhibition. In his turn, the co-author of the exhibition, the serviceman of the Ukrainian Armed Forces Artem Papakin noted that the exhibition tells about recruiting on the lands of Ukraine in a historical perspective with an emphasis on the periods of existence of various forms of Ukrainian statehood. -Today, through the recruiting institute, the state creates conditions for a Ukrainian soldier who joins the army to be motivated, to have sufficient psychological and moral training to defend Ukraine,- noted Artem Papakin. The exhibition will be open on Kontraktova Square until March 31. Representatives of the Armed Forces recruiting centers and the recruiting structures of military units will work within its framework. Anyone interested will be able to receive advice on joining the ranks of the Defense Forces. Vyacheslav Rzheutsky

Title: The Air Force attacked the building where the Russian motorized rifle regiment was hiding
Description: informs the General Staff of the Armed Forces of Ukraine about this. It is noted that as a result of fire damage, the ability of Russian troops to terrorize the Ukrainian civilian population has been significantly reduced. -The Air Force of the Armed Forces of Ukraine will continue operations to destroy the enemy, its equipment and military infrastructure until the Russian Federation withdraws its troops from the sovereign territory of Ukraine,- the message reads. As reported by ArmyInform, units of the Unmanned Systems Forces of the Armed Forces of Ukraine, the Main Intelligence Directorate, in cooperation with other components of the Defense Forces, on the night of February 26, 2025 on a number of strategic objects of the Russian invaders in the Krasnodar region of the Russian Federation and in the temporarily occupied territory of the Ukrainian Crimea.

Title: UAH 16.3 billion were saved on purchases: the Ministry of Education and Culture spoke about the key ...
Description: This is reported by the Ministry of Defense of Ukraine on February 27. The State Rear Operator started operations on 1 December 2023. And already in January 2024, the agency began to provide the Armed Forces with clothing, ammunition and fuel and lubricants, and from April 1 - with food. -In the absence of information on the market, suppliers, and volumes of provision in previous years, DOT specialists built supply processes from scratch, opened the market for new suppliers and made procurement as transparent as possible,- noted the MOU. The use of modern approaches to procurement of DOT made it possible to save the state budget more than UAH 16.3 billion. These funds were directed to the additional needs of the Armed Forces of Ukraine. -The biggest savings were achieved on fuel purchases - almost 6.6 billion UAH, and also on food supply - approximately 6 billion UAH. This is the result of systematic work to optimize costs and improve approaches to procurement,- said Hleb Kanevskyi, director of the Department of Procurement Policy of the Ministry of Defense. According to him, DOT has become an example of how modern solutions can change the system of providing the army. -Transparency, digitization and competition between suppliers are the principles we implement to improve efficiency. We will continue to develop these changes, because our goal is a reliable and predictable supply system for every serviceman,- he emphasized. Figures and results Food: Material property: PMM: One of the key priorities of DOT is to build a system that makes corruption impossible. Corruption prevention mechanisms are built into all processes of the procurement agency of the Ministry of Defense. Including the process of interaction of employees in the team and the process of interaction of the team with external stakeholders. The agency works according to the approved Anti-corruption program for 2023-2025. In 2024, a three-level control system was introduced. This makes it possible to clearly distinguish three main functions: More than 1,600 business partner checks have also been carried out. To implement international management standards, the State rear operator cooperates with NATO's leading procurement agencies. The DOT will continue to digitize processes, implement new approaches to supplier evaluation, and strengthen transparency through the independent oversight of the Supervisory Board. The work of the DOT demonstrates that, even in wartime, it is possible to create an effective and open rear support system that works in the interests of every serviceman.

Title: Two dozen Russian guns were hit near Pokrovsk
Description: The video of the combat operation was published on February 27 on the website of the Main Intelligence Directorate of the Ministry of Defense of Ukraine. The residences and shelters of the Russian invaders also came under fire. -The fight continues!- - assured the GUR. As reported by ArmyInform, GUR pilots destroyed the enemy infantry and equipment.

Title: The top manager of a Russian aircraft construction concern is suspected of supplying planes for bomb...
Description: informs the SBU about this. According to the investigation, since the beginning of the full-scale invasion, Slyusar reformatted the work of Russia's aviation industry for military needs. He organized increased production and modernization of combat aircraft used to bomb Ukraine. As of February 24, 2022, the corporation under the leadership of Slyusar has produced more than 100 aircraft. Among them: These aircraft are used to launch missile strikes against Ukrainian civilian infrastructure, including cruise and ballistic missiles such as the Dagger. The investigation established that Slyusar coordinates his actions with the top military and political leadership of Russia and fulfills their orders. The locksmith was informed in absentia about the suspicion for h. 5th century 27, ch. 2 Art. 28, ch. 2 Art. 437 of the Criminal Code of Ukraine (assistance in waging an aggressive war based on a prior conspiracy by a group of persons). Currently, measures are being taken to bring him to justice. The investigation is conducted under the procedural guidance of the Prosecutor General's Office. As reported by ArmyInform, DBR employees in cooperation with the National Security Service of the National Police and the SBU detained the acting head of Khmelnytskyi of the district administration, which organized a scheme under which conscripts could receive the status of limited fitness for money.

Title: -Gulliver- can pull a military SUV out of the mud: a ground robot was created for the Armed Forces
Description: As notified in the Ministry of Defense, this was reported in the Main Directorate for Life Cycle Support of Weapons and Military Equipment. The ground robotic complex -Gulliver- was designed by Ukrainian engineers taking into account the combat experience of our defenders. The NRK delivers ammunition, equipment, and equipment, and evacuates the wounded. Also serves as a transporter for combat modules. In the appropriate configuration, it can perform mining tasks. --Gulliver- can deliver more than three hundred kilograms of cargo on roads with a hard surface and a slightly smaller cargo - off-road. The traction force of the robot is enough to pull a small military off-road vehicle out of the mud,- the MOU reported. -Gulliver- is placed in the body of a pickup truck, works in a wide range of temperatures, overcomes steep slopes. The battery charge is enough to deliver the cargo several tens of kilometers and return in the opposite direction. The MoU reminded the manufacturers of anti-aircraft weapons that useful information on the codification procedure of new samples of weapons and military equipment is available on the site. As reported by ArmyInform, the military units will be able to write off the property used to service the cars that servicemen received as humanitarian aid.

Title: -Join the brave!-: The International Legion of Ukraine celebrates its three-year anniversary and cal...
Description: On February 27, 2022, in response to the full-scale invasion of Russia, President of Ukraine Volodymyr Zelenskyy called on foreigners to join the defense of Ukraine. This is how the International Legion was born, which united volunteers from different countries. -For three years now, the legionnaires of the free world - volunteers from different parts of the planet, side by side with their Ukrainian brothers and sisters, have been waging an armed struggle against the Russian occupiers as part of unique multinational units,- the legion's statement reads. Legionnaires took part in the key battles of this war: defending Kyiv, liberating Kharkiv Oblast, fighting for Bakhmut and Pokrovsk. -The international defense legions of Ukraine have made a heroic journey as part of the Ground Forces of the Armed Forces of Ukraine and are enjoying well-deserved combat glory!- - emphasized in the legion. To mark the anniversary, the legion released a motivational video created by the media relations team. How to join: Foreign citizens serve in the International Legion on an equal footing with Ukrainians. The first contract can be concluded for 6 months. Before the service, volunteers are selected and trained under the guidance of experienced instructors. The Legion also addressed the international community in English: -The International Legion for Defense of Ukraine is a united team of professionals. Only volunteers serve here. These people know how to fight. Show your strengths! Join the battle for the sake of life! Join the Brave!- As reported by ArmyInform, the soldiers of the -Wings- unit of the Department of Active Actions of the GUR found and destroyed the invaders who were hiding among the graves at the cemetery.

Title: From T-72 to ABRAMS: how the Armored and Maneuverable Coalition provides the Defense Forces
Description: The Ministry of Defense of Ukraine told in detail about this in detail. -The goal of the Coalition is to strengthen the technical park of the Ukrainian army, to ensure the training of personnel and proper maintenance, repair of equipment and weapons samples provided by allies,- the message reads. It also contributes to the development of the Armed Forces of Ukraine and their interoperability with NATO. Four syndicates have been created within the Coalition, each of which has been assigned specific tasks: It is noted that the member states of the coalition have provided Ukraine with hundreds of samples of tanks and armored vehicles. -And if at the beginning of the large-scale invasion it was only about equipment such as T-72 and BMP-1, now Ukraine has received Western-style tanks, including Leopard-1 and Leopard-2, ABRAMS, Challenger and AMX-10, as well as armored combat vehicles, including YPR-765, M113, CVR (T), Pbv-302, LAV, M2A2 Bradley, Marder 1A3, M1126 Stryker, M1117 APC, BOV-VP, etc.,- the MOU said. In total, within the scope of the work of the Contact Group on Assistance to Ukraine, eight coalitions of capabilities were formed: the Air Force Coalition, the Coalition of Integrated Air Defense and Anti-Aircraft Defense, the Coalition of Maritime Capabilities, the Coalition of Drones, the IT Coalition, the Coalition of Artillery, the Coalition of Armored Equipment and Maneuverability, and the Coalition for Mine Action. As a reminder, on January 9, 2025, the heads of defense departments of 14 leading states and Ukraine href=-https://armyinform.com.ua/2025/01/09/rustem-umyerov-ukrayina-i-soyuznyky-zatverdyly-visim-dorozhnih-kart-z-klyuchovymy-czilyamy-syl-oborony-do-2027-roku/-> agreed on road maps for the development of the capabilities of all coalitions. This happened during the meeting of the Group of Leaders of Capability Coalitions within the Contact Group on Defense Issues of Ukraine (Ramstein format).

Title: -Analogovneti- turned into scrap: marines burned two Russian T-90
Description: A video of the combat operation was released on page 38 of a separate brigade of marines. -Minus two T-90s, which have no analogues.- We continue to destroy and send the Russian devils to hell with their scraps,- the marines said. As reported by ArmyInform, the 38th separate marine infantry brigade of the Ukrainian Armed Forces calls to join to its ranks under the new -Contract 18-24- project, which provides for clear terms of service, financial payments and social guarantees.

Title: - On armored vehicles, which drones fly into - Russian assault roulette in the Novopavlovsk directio...
Description: Major Viktor Tregubov, the spokesman of the Khortytsia operational-strategic group of troops, told about this on the broadcast of -Social News-. According to him, the efficiency is low for several reasons. The main thing is that it is convenient to advance there only along the Mokri Yala River, where settlements follow one after another. It is because of this that the enemy can actually go -from house to house-. In other directions, large spaces begin, which must be overcome by machinery. -On armored vehicles, which drones fly into, or on motorized vehicles, which drones fly into. This is one of the few places where they still walk in armored columns, trying to land an amphibious assault. There were cases when they managed to do it, then this landing party was destroyed. But it happens when they attacked in the direction of the village of Bagatyr. The first few tanks immediately blew up just on the mine barriers, and other drones flew into them,- Viktor Tregubov noted. As ArmyInform reported, the Defense Forces took control of Kotlyna in the Pokrovsk direction. Such counterattacks testify to the effectively built interaction of UAV units with assault and motorized infantry units.

Title: The SBI exposed large-scale theft of fuel in a military unit in the Rivne region
Description: This is reported by the State Bureau of Investigation. According to the investigation, the military unit in which the participants of the criminal scheme served was responsible for the distribution of about 10% of the needs of the Armed Forces of Ukraine in fuel and lubricants. The organizer involved in the equipment other military and civilian persons who overestimated the amount of distributed fuel and lubricants. Surpluses were sold through private entrepreneurs. According to operational information, the criminal organization stole more than 100 tons of diesel fuel intended for the needs of the Armed Forces. Only for the period from November 2024 to January 2025, about 20 episodes of theft and sale of diesel fuel in the amount of about 20,000 liters with a market value of UAH 1.2 million were documented. During the special operation, DBR employees detained the organizer of the event, three of his military accomplices and one civilian. They are suspected of creating and leading a criminal organization, stealing military property by abusing their official position. Currently, the issue of the suspect's choice of preventive measures in the form of detention is being resolved. They face punishment in the form of imprisonment for a term of up to 15 years with confiscation of property. The investigation continues, other members of the criminal organization and other episodes of theft are being identified. As reported by ArmyInform, DBR employees in cooperation with the National Security Service of the National Police and the SBU detained the acting head of Khmelnytskyi of the district administration, which organized a scheme under which conscripts could receive the status of limited fitness for money.

Title: Guardian angel from the front: how a 21-year-old medic saves lives on the front
Description: The story of the fighter was made public on the brigade's page. -Twenty-two families were killed before my eyes. People were kidnapped and tortured. The most active people who went to peaceful rallies were executed in public,- the fighter recalls. After leaving the occupation, the 21-year-old medic joined the 33rd brigade. His first combat appearance took place on June 8, 2023, during the Zaporizhia counteroffensive. -Our Unimog medevac was jammed with ammunition and medical supplies. The offensive began, real chaos. The wounded were evacuated, stabilized and transported to the headquarters in Tavriyske. About forty people were taken out during the day,- says -Malibu-. In a few days, the enemy fired at a medical car, and only a chance saved the medic - a fragment pierced the car exactly where he was sitting a few minutes ago. And near Malaya Tokmachka, he risked his life, pulling out the wounded under mortar fire. -The fighters calmed down when they saw me. One said he would die. I answered: -You will see your wife and children again, we will talk more than once.- Once during the evacuation, the doors of the Unimog opened, and the Malibu had to hold the wounded so that they would not fall out on the move. In another case, during the evacuation of the wounded from Donetsk region, a combat vehicle came under fire and broke down. We had to save our comrades on an ordinary UAZ, where only bulletproof vests and helmets were the only protection. -In the high beam, we run towards them. They honked and we turned off our lights. They arrived, loaded the wounded. Orcs fired mortars in the back, but we managed to escape.- The -Malibu- medic has no doubt what the end of the war should be: -For me, Victory is the return of all Ukrainian territories to the borders of 1991. We don't need someone else's - we need to return our own. And Russia, until it is cleansed, must remain in isolation for many centuries.- As reported by ArmyInform, an unusual soldier serves in the 33rd separate mechanized brigade - a UAV engineer with the call sign -Balu-. Once he dreamed of creating smart homes, and now destroys the invaders with the help of smart FPV drones.

Title: -Santa- with a drone: Ukrainian fighters delivered a jewelry gift to the occupiers in the dugout
Description: The video of combat work was made public on the brigade's page. The footage taken from a drone shows how Ukrainian defenders drop a grenade right into the chimney of the dugout of the Russian invaders. The chimney, barely visible from the ground, became a fatal -landmark- for the enemy. As reported by ArmyInform, fighters of the 126th separate brigade of territorial defense destroyed another enemy means of radio electronic warfare.

Title: A motorcycle equals death - our drones destroyed a bunch of enemy riders
Description: A video of combat work was released on February 27 on the unit's channel. Quite often, our pilots encountered a couple of Russians on motorcycles, which made it possible to double the effectiveness of kamikaze drones. Some of the invaders threw away their motorcycles and tried to escape on foot, but they did not succeed. -From the Pokrovsky direction, we received an order for a video clip about motorized assault troops. The order has been completed in full. We could not miss such a trip to the motor show. They will be moving to other concerts,- the unit commented on the video. As reported by ArmyInform, in Donetsk, the pilots of the Muramasa unit strike drones destroyed enemy equipment that was delivering ammunition and provisions to Russian troops.

Title: A minor is insane - in the Dnipro region, a teenager was exposed for working for the enemy
Description: The Dnipropetrovsk Oblast Prosecutor's Office reported this on February 27. Under the procedural guidance of the juvenile prosecutors of the Pavlograd District Prosecutor's Office, a 14-year-old resident of Pavlograd was notified of suspicion of an unfinished attempt to deliberately damage someone else's property by arson (Part 3, Article 15, Part 2, Article 194 of the Criminal Code of Ukraine). According to the investigation, a minor in the Telegram messenger received an offer from an interlocutor to -make extra money- by setting fire to cars belonging to the military of the Armed Forces or bearing the symbols of armed forces. The -customer- provided the young man with clear instructions and algorithms for committing the crime. In compliance with the curator's demands, the suspect poured flammable liquid and planned to set the soldier's car on fire, but he failed to complete the crime. The law enforcement officers detained him in accordance with Art. 208 of the CPC of Ukraine. At present, the suspect has been placed under preventive measure - round-the-clock house arrest. As reported by ArmyInform, a Russian arson agent was detained in Kropyvnytskyi .

Title: Close combat - drones destroyed two Russian attack aircraft in our trench
Description: The video was published on February 27 on the group's channel. During the patrolling, the drone officers noticed that a group of Russians jumped into the trench of the comrades. They advanced to the dugout, but received the first reset. The group fled, leaving behind a wounded comrade, who died in our trench. After some time, the Russians tried to repeat the assault. However, another roll killed the first of the stormtroopers and the others escaped. As reported by ArmyInform, the deputy chief of staff of the combat command of the 225 assault regiment with the call sign -Myron-, told why he went to the front and how he fought.

Title: - Loaf--convertible - our drones struck a miracle of the Russian automobile industry
Description: The video of the combat operation was made public on February 27 on the unit's channel. The occupiers crammed themselves tightly into the vehicles and moved towards our positions. The roof of the -loaf- was cut off to make it easier to unload the landing party. But it turned out that our drone flies so fast that the Russians had no chance to escape. The reconnaissance showed not only the damaged -loaf-, but also the dead bodies of Russian attack aircraft. As reported by ArmyInform, the unit commander of the 54th separate mechanized brigade named after Hetman Ivan Mazepa, who together with subordinates destroyed dozens of enemy positions, disguising drones as Russian ones.

Title: Policeman on call - in Odesa region, a law enforcement officer who transported evaders went to court
Description: The State Bureau of Investigation reported this on February 27. The law enforcement officer decided to organize a transfer scheme last September. He knew the border area and the location of checkpoints well. The man recruited people who wanted to leave Ukraine through social networks, and took $6.5 thousand from each of them for repatriation. Accomplices who were supposed to take men to the border with unrecognized Transnistria helped him to find -clients-. DBR employees detained an official while trying to cross the border with four conscripts. Currently, the law enforcement officer has been dismissed from service and is accused of illegally transporting persons across the state border (Part 3 of Article 332 of the Criminal Code of Ukraine). The sanction of the article provides for a punishment of up to 9 years of imprisonment. ArmyInform reminds that it is better not to break the law or risk your life, but to use the aggregator of vacancies in the Armed Forces and recruiting centers.

Title: Four Russian commanders who organized the large-scale shelling of Kharkiv were identified
Description: This was announced on February 27 by the Prosecutor General's Office. Law enforcement officers identified those involved in the large-scale shelling of Kharkiv on February 28, 2022. Then the troops of the aggressor state carried out an attack with high-explosive cluster unguided rockets from the Smerch anti-aircraft missile system on civilian objects in the Shevchenkiv district of Kharkiv. 8 civilians died, including a 17-year-old boy. One woman also received multiple injuries.   Several high-rise buildings were damaged. The school was almost completely destroyed - the examination established that the damage was more than 13 million hryvnias. The kindergarten was also under attack - experts estimated the damage to the amount of almost 2.2 million hryvnias. According to the investigation, on February 24, 2022, in the direction of the Kharkiv region, units of the Zapad group of troops of the Soviet Union of the Russian Federation, formed on the basis of units of the Western Military District, were operating in the direction of the Kharkiv region, which used means of indiscriminate impact, in particular, the Smerch SAM. It was established that the group of fire and nuclear damage of the headquarters of the Western Military District under the direct leadership of the colonel of the Russian Armed Forces - the deputy chief of staff of the military headquarters - prepared a decision to strike with reactive cluster shells from the -Smerch- MLRS. The decision was approved directly by the Colonel-General of the Russian Armed Forces, the commander of the Air Force, and his first deputy, the Lieutenant General of the Armed Forces of the Russian Federation. In order to carry out the criminal plan of the higher command, realizing that the shelling was aimed exclusively at civilian objects and realizing that the strike would cause a large number of civilian casualties, the colonel of the Russian Federation - the commander of the 79th reactive artillery brigade of the ZVO (military unit 53956, Tver) issued a criminal order to carry out the specified decision and strike at Kharkiv. Prosecutors, together with other law enforcement officers, continue to make maximum efforts to identify Russian military personnel involved in the shelling of Kharkiv region. As ArmiyaInform reported, the SBU in absentia served suspicion on the Kremlin singer-propagandist.

Title: -There are several factors that the Russians complain about-: the Defense Forces spoke about the ene...
Description: Major Viktor Tregubov, the spokesman of the Khortytsia operational-strategic group of troops, told about this on the air of the -Yedini Novyni- telethon. According to him, such successful operations are very important. After all, they point out that in the Pokrovsky direction, where the Russians make the greatest efforts and where the largest number of their troops are concentrated, they have the greatest failures. Even Russian propagandists complain about the problems. -There are several factors that the Russians complain about. The first is the dominance of Ukrainian drones, the second is the lack of personnel, which is very fun to hear from Russian military personnel. And thirdly, they cry about the fact that anti-aircraft missiles have become less effective, because it has become more difficult for them to target due to the effective Ukrainian electronic warfare system,- Viktor Tregubov said. This is the view of the enemy, Viktor Tregubov noted. However, it can be stated that in the Pokrovsky direction, a system of interaction of UAVs with motorized infantry and assault units is now really effectively built. The Russians, in addition to everything else, have problems with logistics. They drain resources. -Now they have switched to civilian cars. Because the military is actually ending. Given that they always had problems with the same rubber, it became a little more difficult for them with the premises. And this is during the period when the ground froze a little. Literally, if we believe the forecasters, in five days we will have an actual spring, and then we will see how the Russians will be with logistics in general,- predicted the spokesman of the Khortytsia operational-strategic group of troops. As ArmyInform reported, the Commander-in-Chief of the Armed Forces of Ukraine, General Oleksandr Syrskyi, in connection with the intensification of the enemy's actions, worked in our brigades, which are conducting the defense in the Novopavlovsk direction.

Title: - They have no desire to go - - in the Kursk region, the enemy knows what awaits him during the assa...
Description: Oleg Chaus, the chief sergeant of the 47th separate mechanized brigade company, told about this on the air of -Social News-. According to him, after the return of winter weather, the assaults continued. First with infantry, then the enemy tried to break through the ranks of the Defense Forces with equipment. And when the BMP and tanks were knocked out - again by infantry. The captives, Chaus notes, say that usually four to five soldiers are launched into the attack, who try to accumulate and slowly advance in sections. -I can say about the morale of the 155th brigade, which committed many war crimes. In their negotiations, we hear how low morale is there. They have no desire to go to the front lines, to go to any assaults on our positions, even to -fortifications-, after some -meat- units enter there. They understand what awaits them,- said the chief sergeant of the company of the 47th separate mechanized brigade. As reported by ArmyInform, in Kurshchyna, enemy drones on optical fiber are used in such quantities, that everything is filled with their fiber.

Title: Tested by war: the Ministry of Defense showed NATO the operation of DELTA, Avengers and UA DRONE ID ...
Description: This was notified in the MOU. A demonstration of the practical application of these advanced developments took place at the NATO TIDE Sprint 2025 conference in Helsinki. -We bring not just concepts, but real combat technologies tested in war conditions. We show how digital products should work on the battlefield — quickly, reliably and taking into account the real needs of the military. The war forces us to develop solutions that are not just innovative, but critically necessary to repel the Russian onslaught,- said Lt. Col. Elizaveta Boyko, head of the Innovation Center department. Representatives of the Ministry of Defense told NATO partners how DELTA overcomes the challenges of war and why constant interaction between developers and the military is important for creating effective solutions. Particular attention was paid to issues of data protection in the system. The Naval Forces of Ukraine demonstrated the work of DELTA in maritime operations. The combat system has already become indispensable for coordinating forces, making operational decisions and managing combat operations on the water. The Ministry of Defense also showed examples of real use of the Avengers AI platform in combat conditions. Ukraine is currently the owner of the largest amount of accurate data on the appearance of the enemy's equipment. This allows you to create innovative tools using artificial intelligence to improve the auto-detection of enemy equipment. NATO representatives noted the high level of Ukrainian technologies and emphasized that DELTA is the most interoperable system even among the Alliance countries, which opens up new opportunities for cooperation and integration. -Modern warfare is not only about weapons, but also about technological superiority. We create solutions that help our military see more, react faster and act more precisely. DELTA and Avengers are not just innovations, but real combat tools that bring us closer to victory every day. Thanks to these technologies, Ukraine maintains its leadership in the field of digital combat systems,- said Kateryna Chernogorenko, Deputy Minister of Defense of Ukraine for Digitalization.

Title: Chatting on enemy attack aircraft - our pilots are on duty in Toretsk
Description: Photos of their work were published on February 27 on the brigade's page. The city was completely destroyed by the Russians. Only dead ruins remained from the high-rise buildings. Sometimes they smoke. It seemed that there could no longer be anything alive here. But Ukrainian drones periodically see groups of local residents on the streets, who have delayed the evacuation to the point where it is practically impossible to carry it out. The main task is to prevent the movement of enemy attack aircraft, which are trying to advance deep into the city. They accumulate in the basements so that they can try to attack Ukrainian positions if there is an opportunity. Often, the occupiers carry EW with them to prevent the tracking of Ukrainian drones. But skillful operators still do not lose sight of the invaders, intercepting each other's broadcasts and helping our artillery, skids or FPV-sniffers to hit the enemy's manpower. As reported by ArmyInform, the operators of the Black Raven 93 unmanned systems battalion of the Kholodny Yar mechanized brigade showed numerous destructions by kamikaze drones Russian attack aircraft.

Title: A Russian arson agent was detained in Kropyvnytskyi
Description: reported this on February 27 Security Service of Ukraine. Employees of the SBU detained the suspect -red handed- when he was conducting additional reconnaissance near the electrical substation that supplies the regional hospital and several units of the Defense Forces. The attacker planned to set fire to this energy facility. As the investigation established, the agent turned out to be a 30-year-old local unemployed man who was looking for -quick earnings- in Telegram channels. After remote recruitment, the enemy henchman scouted the locations of the main energy-generating facilities and collected data on their technical condition and security. The suspect sent the received information to his Russian curator for -approval- of the arson. At the same time, the agent transmitted to the occupiers the geolocations of the possible bases of Ukrainian defenders, on which the enemy planned to carry out air attacks. During the search, a mobile phone with evidence of working for the enemy was seized from the detainee. SBU investigators informed him of the suspicion under 2 Art. 111 of the Criminal Code of Ukraine (treason committed under martial law). The perpetrator is in custody. He faces life imprisonment with confiscation of property. As ArmiyaInform reported, three FSB henchmen were detained who tried to disrupt the movement of trains in Ukraine.

Title: In the aggressor country, schoolchildren were taught a patriotism lesson with the emblem of the Spec...
Description: About the curiosity was reported on February 27 by the Special Operations Forces of the Armed Forces. -Special operations forces of the Armed Forces decided to improve the educational process in enemy schools. And this is what happened: the children, not knowing what the emblem of the famous SSO of the Russian Federation actually looks like (polite people), created a whole collection of drawings. However, they depicted the emblem of the Special Operations Forces of Ukraine,- the SSO of the Armed Forces of Ukraine said in a statement. As reported by ArmyInform, the fighters of the 8th regiment of the Special Operations Forces continue to work effectively on the destruction of the enemy.

Title: Andriy Hnatov was appointed Deputy Chief of the General Staff of the Armed Forces of Ukraine — Ruste...
Description: The minister wrote about this on February 27. In his new position, Major General Andrii Hnatov will be responsible for the generation of forces and cooperation with partners. -Mr. Hnatov has more than 27 years of experience in the army, served in key positions - from the commander of the marine infantry brigade to the commander of the combined forces of the Ukrainian Armed Forces and the troops of the operational command -East-. I am confident that his knowledge and skills will contribute to the strengthening of the defense capability of our country,- said Rustem Umyerov. As reported by ArmyInform, the President of Ukraine Volodymyr Zelenskyi signed Decree No. 148/2025, according to which Andriy Hnatov was dismissed from the post of Commander of the combined forces of the Armed Forces of Ukraine.

Description: The Minister wrote about this on February 27. -In his new position, Major General Andriy Hnatov will be responsible for the generation of forces and cooperation with partners. Title: He threw off his bulletproof vest and machine gun and surrendered - our fighters replenished the exc...
Description: The video of the combat operation was published on February 27 on the page of the operational command -East-.
