Our drones also hit enemy vehicles and infantry. As reported by ArmyInform, operators of the -Heavenly Dream- unmanned systems battalion of the 43rd brigade showed a selection damage to enemy equipment, including drones and armored vehicles, as well as enemy manpower.

Title: Fields, streets, courtyards of houses, everything is covered with optical fiber - in Kurshchyna, Rus...
Description: This was told on the ArmiyaTV stream by the platoon commander of the 1st Assault Battalion of the 95th Assault Brigade of the Polish Brigade, Lieutenant Stanislav Krasnov. -According to information from the intelligence, the maximum number of experienced UAV operators was withdrawn to this direction. Therefore, a large number of drones are involved, including fiber-optic drones. In fact, all the fields, streets, yards of houses here are covered with this wood. There is a lot of it, you go and it is everywhere. These drones fly, patrol all routes, are very widely used,- said Stanislav Krasnov. According to him, the Russians use fiber-optic drones of one type, which is mass-produced in cooperation with the Chinese. As ArmyInform reported, in Kurshchyna the Russians are exhausting our defenses with assaults.

Title: Two officials who organized a corruption scheme in the capital and Volyn TCC were exposed
Description: This was reported by the State Bureau of Investigation on February 27. In January 2025, the lieutenant colonel told one of the conscripts that he had acquaintances in the TCC and SP of Kyiv. With their -assistance-, he could update his military registration data and enter the necessary information into the -Oberig- register. The cost of such -services- was $4,000. After going through the entire necessary procedure for updating the military registration data, the official received the amount stipulated by him. Later, during meetings with other conscripts, the lieutenant colonel said that he had another set-up mechanism for updating military registration data through one of the TCC and SP of the Volyn region and could help do it for a monetary reward. He explained that his supervisor, the colonel of the command, is the former regional military commissar of the indicated region, and has relevant connections. The lieutenant colonel emphasized that -clients- do not even need to go to the Volyn region. He assured that he would independently fill out the necessary applications, draw up a fictitious lease agreement for the residence of -clients- in the territory of the region, and pass the VLK for them, but the cost of such services was already $9,000. In February 2025, a colonel from the command of one of the branches of the Armed Forces of Ukraine contacted acting the head of one of the TCCs and SPs of the Volyn region and asked him to help his subordinate for the appropriate monetary reward. During this time, the scheme was used by three conscripts who handed over the monetary reward in two parts of 9 and 13 thousand US dollars. Law enforcement officers detained the accused while receiving the third part of the bribe. The officials were notified of the suspicion based on the signs of a criminal offense provided for in part. 5th century 27, ch. 3 Art. 368 of the Criminal Code of Ukraine. The sanction of the article provides for punishment in the form of deprivation of liberty for a term of up to ten years of imprisonment. Currently, investigative actions are ongoing with the aim of reporting the suspicion to other officials of one of the TCCs and SPs of the city. of Kyiv and one of the TCC and SP of the Volyn region, who acted in collusion with those involved. ArmyInform reminds that it is better not to break the law or risk your life, but to use the aggregator of vacancies in the Armed Forces and recruiting centers.

Title: Normal pay -for greatness- — the Navy of the Armed Forces predicts whether the Russians will have a ...
Description: Captain 3rd rank Dmytro Pletenchuk, spokesman of the Naval Forces of the Armed Forces of Ukraine, told about this on the broadcast of the Yedyny Novyny telethon . According to him, earlier the eastern coast of the Russian Federation was actually a distant sea zone for the Defense Forces, and only Crimea fell into the zone of direct damage. Now, various -events- are taking place already in the part that is extremely important for the Russians. Precisely from the point of view of export capabilities. -Of course, I cannot provide any information about these cases or confirm what happened there. Because there is always the possibility that the Russians will bomb themselves. In fact, we see that periodically something happens at the terminals, at the oil depots. And you need to understand a few things. First, oil is a weapon for the Russians, and a weapon in every sense: both military and economic. -Oil is the blood that allows the military machine to work,- said the spokesman of the Armed Forces Navy. It is too early to make predictions. However, it is likely that the -events- on the east coast will continue. And, Dmytro Pletenchuk admits, given the revitalization, there will be no holiday season there this year. Not in Tuapse, not in Anapa, not in Sochi. -Because there is an explosion here on one side, and oil is being thrown onto the coast from the other. Therefore, I am sure, there is nothing for the locals to worry about. It doesn't smell much, of course, sometimes people die from it, but, in principle, for Russians, -for greatness- is a normal fee,- noted Dmytro Pletenchuk. As reported ArmyInform, units of the Unmanned Systems Forces of the Armed Forces of Ukraine, the Main Intelligence Directorate, in cooperation with other components of the Defense Forces, at night on February 26, 2025, they struck a number of strategic objects of the Russian invaders in the Krasnodar Territory of the Russian Federation and on the temporarily occupied territory of the Ukrainian Crimea.

Title: From the Russian gas needle to economic capacity: leading economists reveal the ideas of the hybrid ...
Description: ArmiyaInform was informed about this by the Main Directorate of Communications of the Armed Forces. In the film, the country's leading economists reveal the mechanisms of economic pressure that Russia used against Ukraine, and explain how our country was able to withstand this pressure during a full-scale invasion. Rector of the Kyiv School of Economics Tymofiy Brik, candidate of economic sciences Hleb Buryak, financial top manager Oleksiy Herashchenko, author of the project -The Last Capitalist- Valentin Krasnopyorov, coordinator of the educational project -The Price of the State- Mykola Malukha and Gennady Ryabtsev from the National Institute of Strategic Studies analyze Ukraine's path from energy dependence to economic stability. They present little-known facts about how Russia tried to make the Ukrainian economy vulnerable and why these plans failed. Ukraine's top economists explained how Russia used economic leverage for decades for hybrid aggression and preparations for a full-scale invasion, and what helped Ukraine endure. -This film is not just about the economy. This is the story of how Ukraine broke the Russian scenario of economic enslavement, which was written for decades,- says the director of the film, a serviceman of the Ukrainian Armed Forces Serhii Neretin. You can watch the film on the YouTube channel of the Main Directorate of Communications of the Armed Forces of Ukraine. The documentary is part of an information project aimed at informing citizens of Ukraine and the world community regarding Russian aggression, its hybrid manifestations and the strengthening of the resistance of the citizens of our country. Links to previous episodes of the series: -Resistance and unity. Historians explain how not to lose the future- -Resistance and unity. Title: The Commander-in-Chief of the Armed Forces visited the troops in the south of Donetsk region
Description: The Commander-in-Chief of the Armed Forces wrote about this in the morning of February 27. -The enemy is intensively carrying out offensive actions in this direction, trying to break through the defense of our troops and capture three settlements. However, on our side, a number of measures were taken to improve the interaction of military units and units, the regrouping of troops was carried out, which slowed down the advance of the enemy in most of the threatening areas,- assured Oleksandr Syrskyi. At the command posts, he listened to the commander of the -Donetsk- operational-tactical group, Brigadier General Oleksandr Tarnavskyi, and brigade commanders regarding the conduct of hostilities, existing needs and problematic issues. -I gave all the necessary orders regarding their solution. The intention of the Russian occupiers in these directions has remained unchanged for more than three years, namely to reach the administrative borders of Donetsk region. However, the losses of the enemy only increase, and the plans remain unfulfilled. Our soldiers cause maximum losses to the personnel and equipment of the enemy. I express my sincere gratitude to the defenders of Ukraine for their effectiveness, courage and resilience. Glory to Ukraine!- Oleksandr Syrskyi wrote. As reported by ArmyInform, Oleksandr Syrsky and Anthony Radakin discussed the situation at the front and Ukrainian-British cooperation.

Title: Air Force of the Ukrainian Armed Forces: shot down 90 enemy UAVs, 72 simulator drones did not reach ...
Description: This was reported by the Air Force of the Armed Forces of Ukraine. As of 9:00 a.m., the downing of 90 Shahed attack UAVs and other types of drones in Kharkiv, Poltava, Sumy, Kyiv, Chernihiv, Cherkasy, Vinnytsia, Khmelnytskyi, Kirovohrad, Mykolaiv, and Odesa regions has been confirmed. 72 enemy impersonator drones - lost in location (no ill effects). As a result of the enemy attack, Kyiv region, Chernihiv region and Sumy region were affected. The air attack was repulsed by aviation, anti-aircraft missile forces, electronic warfare units and mobile fire groups of the Air Force and the Defense Forces of Ukraine.

Title: The 38th Marine Brigade offers its brotherhood and a clear term of service: join under -Contract 18-...
Description: The team posted a video on its Facebook page showing how to use the new features. -We are the 38th separate brigade of marines. We are called legendary, loyal to Ukraine and ruthless to invaders. We are a deadly storm that turns the enemy into hellish ashes. Our slogan is -Victory loves the faithful!-, says the post to the video. Ready to become part of a legend? 38 separate brigade of marines offers its fraternity, a clear term - 1 year and a payment of 1 million hryvnias. You can find out all the necessary information and get consultations by phone: You can also find brigade contacts on the website 18-24.army.gov.ua or in the Rezerv+ mobile application. You can fill out the application form on the brigade's website at link. As a reminder, -Contrakt 18-24- is a voluntary initiative that allows Ukrainians in the specified age category to join the Defense Forces of Ukraine for one year. The project offers a decent financial reward, professional combat training according to NATO standards and social guarantees that no civilian profession provides.

Title: 8 units of armored vehicles were destroyed in the Kupyansk direction
Description: The video of the combat work was released on February 27 on the Special Operations Forces channel. FPV drone operators were dealt a devastating blow to enemy targets. As a result, the following were destroyed: As reported by ArmyInform, operators of the 3rd regiment of the Special Operations Forces destroyed about a platoon of the Russian military during a raid on an industrial complex in the Donetsk direction.

Title: A moment of silence in Ukraine
Description: -In order to honor the bright memory, civic courage and self-sacrifice, strength of spirit, resilience and heroic deed of the soldiers who fell during the execution of combat missions to protect the state sovereignty and territorial integrity of Ukraine, civilians who died as a result of the armed aggression of the Russian Federation against Ukraine, I decree: to start holding a national minute of silence every day at 9:00 a.m. for compatriots who died as a result of the armed aggression of the Russian Federation against Ukraine, which should be announced in all mass media, regardless of the form of ownership,- the document says.

Title: Equipment is protected, North Koreans are not: in Kurshchyna, the Russians are exhausting our defens...
Description: This was told on the Army TV stream by the platoon commander of the 1st Assault Battalion of the 95th Assault Brigade of the Polish Brigade, Lieutenant Stanislav Krasnov. -The situation is very tense and difficult. The Russians are constantly attacking, trying to break through our defense line. The technique is almost not involved. Constantly trying to attack with small infantry groups. Sometimes not very small. But what they do is every day, several times a day. This is their tactic, they try to exhaust our defense. They fail, take losses, retreat, and then attack again. Yes, where Koreans are involved, groups can be up to 10-15 people. This is less than before, when there were up to 50 people, herds ran. If they are Russians, the groups consist of 2-3 people,- said Stanislav Krasnov. As reported by ArmyInform, paratroopers of the 95th Polish assault brigade captured a marine from Russia 810 brigade of marines.

Title: Finland is creating a new military aid program for Ukraine
Description: This is stated in the message of the Finnish Ministry of Defense. The government is currently discussing a proposal from the Ministry of Defense of Finland for a new funding package for the Finnish defense industry in the amount of 660 million euros. -Thanks to this new support program, Finnish companies and experts will play a central role in supporting Ukraine. So far, we have mainly supported Ukraine through the transfer of supplies, but in the future a significant part of the products will be ordered from our companies,- said Defense Minister Antti Häkkanen. It is noted that the new support program was prepared under the leadership of the Ministry of Defense since the fall of last year. Preparation was carried out in close contact with the business community, international partners and Ukraine. The starting point for procurement is the critical needs of Ukraine, the suitability of the product for transfer, as well as the capabilities of production and delivery companies. The products will be transferred to Ukraine as part of future aid packages. As reported by ArmyInform, Denmark allocates new military aid package to Ukraine in the amount of 2 billion Danish kroner (about 268 million euros).

Title: In the Zaporizhzhia region, there are almost 600 enemy shellings per day, there is destruction
Description: This was reported by Ivan Fedorov, the head of Zaporizhzhya OVA. The enemy made one missile attack on Shiroky. 16 airstrikes were carried out on Gulyaipol and Maly Shcherbaky. 344 UAVs of various modifications attacked Bilenka, Kamiansk, Primorske, Gulyaipole, Preobrazhenka, Shcherbaki, Novodanilivka, Mala Tokmachka, Charivne and Novodarivka. 14 shellings from anti-aircraft missiles covered Stepnohirsk, Pyatikhatky, Kamianske, Gulyaipole, Novodanilivka, Charivne and Novodarivka. 218 artillery shells were fired on the territory of Kamiansky, Gulyaipol, Shcherbaki, Novodanilivka, Malaya Tokmachka, Charivny and Novodarivka. 22 reports were received about damage to apartments, private houses and cars. As ArmiyaInform reported, on February 26, the occupying Russian forces dropped at least six FAB-250 aerial bombs on the city of Kostyantynivka, Donetsk region, today. Rescue operations are ongoing.

Title: A chance to join the legendary brigade: how -Edelweiss- recruit recruits under -Contract 18-24-
Description: In a comment to ArmiyaInform, Major Serhiy Marchuk, head of the recruiting department of the 10th separate mountain assault brigade of the Ukrainian Armed Forces -Edelweiss-, told about this. Serhiy Marchuk emphasized that the advantage of the -Edelweiss- brigade is the combat qualities of the brigade, which has been fighting since 2015 and has already become truly legendary in the Armed Forces. The experience of -Edelweiss- allows you to train new recruits in a high-quality manner. Maximum training during the standard 45 days of basic military training, 14 specialized training and two weeks of adaptation is guaranteed by instructors who teach at their own training ground. Someone was checking how it works, someone was looking for additional information. Now candidates immediately apply for specific positions. Many go for sniper and scout contracts, especially popular grenade launchers. Why? Perhaps due to the fact that an additional reward is provided for the destruction of enemy equipment,- said Serhiy Marchuk. As reported by ArmyInform, within the scope of the -Contract 18-24- project, up to 28 brigades named after the Knights of the Winter Campaign hundreds of people applied. Dozens of candidates have already passed the military medical board, and some have signed contracts. We remind you, -Contract 18-24- is a voluntary initiative that allows Ukrainians in the specified age category to join the Defense Forces of Ukraine for one year. The project offers a decent financial reward, professional combat training according to NATO standards and social guarantees that no civilian profession provides.

Title: Over the past 24 hours, 110 combat clashes have been recorded — the General Staff of the Armed Force...
Description: Operational information as of at 08:00 on February 27 was published by the General Staff of the ZSU. The aggressor carried out airstrikes, in particular in the areas of the settlements of Glukhiv, Mykolaivka, Semenivka, Masheve, Vovchanski Khutory, Gulyaipole, Zaliznychne, Varvarivka, and Lviv. Over the past day, missile troops and artillery of the Defense Forces have damaged one personnel concentration area, four control points, a EW station, artillery means and one other important enemy object. In the Kharkiv direction, the enemy tried five times to break through the defensive lines of our defenders in the direction of Vovchansk, Stroivka, and Dvorichna. Five attacks by invaders took place in the Kupyansk direction yesterday. Our defenders repelled enemy assaults near Petropavlivka and Zagryzovy. The enemy attacked five times in the Lyman direction. Tried to wedge into our defense near Kolodyazyu, Novolyubivka, Grekivka, and Zelena Dolyna. In the Siversky direction, our soldiers successfully repelled the enemy's attack in the Hryhorivka area. In the Kramatorsk direction, the occupiers attacked five times in the Chasovoy Yar, Novomarkovo, Vasyukivka, and Stupochky districts. In the Toretsk direction, the enemy launched ten attacks in the Toretsk and Krymsky areas. In the Pokrovsky direction, our defenders stopped 33 assault actions of the aggressor towards the settlements of Tarasivka, Novotoretske, Myrolyubivka, Promin, Leontovichi, Kotlyna, Udachne, Nadiivka, Uspenivka. In the direction of Novopavlivsk, the enemy launched 19 attacks in the direction of the settlements of Kostiantynopol, Rozdolne, Shevchenko and Burlatske during the past day. In the direction of Gulyaipil, our defenders repelled three attacks in the direction of Charivny. In the Orihiv direction, the occupying forces twice stormed the positions of the Defense Forces in the Pyatikhatok area. The enemy did not conduct active operations in the Dnieper direction last day. No signs of the formation of enemy offensive groups were detected in the Volyn and Poliske directions. Defense forces of Ukraine continue the operation in the Kursk region. Last day, the enemy carried out 16 airstrikes, dropping 21 anti-aircraft missiles, and fired 463 shots, 36 of them from anti-aircraft guns. Ukrainian defenders repelled 18 assaults by invaders. Our soldiers inflict significant losses in manpower and equipment on the occupying forces and actively undermine the offensive potential of the enemy in the rear. In general, the Russian invaders lost 1,150 people last day. Ukrainian soldiers also destroyed 8 tanks, 13 armored combat vehicles, 69 artillery systems, one air defense vehicle, 141 operational-tactical UAVs, 140 vehicles and a unit of special equipment of the occupiers. As reported by ArmyInform, over the past day, the army of the aggressor country has lost 1,150 personnel and 69 artillery systems of various models.

Description: Operational information as of 22.00 on February 26 was made public by the General Staff of the Armed Forces of Ukraine. Five enemy assaults in the direction of Vovchansk, Stroivka, and Dvorichny were repulsed by the Ukrainians in the Kharkiv direction. Enemy aircraft dropped anti-aircraft missiles on Vovchanski Khutory. In the Kupyansk direction, the enemy tried four times to dislodge our units from their occupied positions near Petropavlivka and Zagryzovy, one skirmish is ongoing. Five times the enemy attacked in the Lymansky direction, trying to advance near Kolodyaziz, Novolyubivka, Grekivka, and Zelena Dolyna. Our defenders have repelled three enemy attacks, two battles are ongoing. In the Siversky direction, our soldiers successfully repelled the enemy's attack in the Hryhorivka area. In the Kramatorsk direction, the Defense Forces stopped four enemy attempts to advance near Chasovoy Yar, Novomarkovo and Stupochky. The enemy tried nine times to penetrate our defenses in the Toretsk direction in the Toretsk and Krymsky districts. Three clashes are still ongoing. The enemy is intensively attacking the Ukrainian defenders in the Pokrovsky direction. Here, during the day, the aggressor carried out 33 assault and offensive actions. The greatest activity of the Russian occupiers is in the areas of Tarasivka, Novotoretske, Myrolyubivka, Promin, Leontovichi, Kotlyna, Udachne, Nadiivka, Uspenivka. According to preliminary estimates, Ukrainian soldiers neutralized 321 occupiers in this direction today, 153 of them irreversibly. Also, our defenders destroyed 13 vehicles, two cannons and three motorcycles, and significantly damaged a tank and nine vehicles of the invaders. In the Novopavlovsk direction, our defenders repelled 17 attacks in the areas of Kostiantynopil, Rozdolne, Shevchenko and Burlatske settlements. In the direction of Gulyaipol, the enemy carried out three assaults in the direction of Charivny, at the same time airstrikes on Gulyaipol and Zaliznychny. There were two skirmishes in the Orihiv direction, the enemy tried to advance in the area of ​​Pyatikhatok. Eighteen combat clashes took place today in the Kursk direction. During the day, the enemy carried out 415 artillery attacks, including 35 from rocket salvo systems, carried out 11 air strikes, dropping 13 guided bombs. Since the beginning of the day, the enemy has not carried out offensive actions in the Dnieper direction. -Today we should celebrate the soldiers of the 422nd separate battalion of unmanned systems, 406th separate artillery brigade, who in extremely difficult conditions restrained the attacks of the enemy's superior forces, causing him significant losses. Glory to the Ukrainian soldiers! -Glory to Ukraine!- - said in a message from the General Staff of the Armed Forces of Ukraine. As reported by ArmyInform, in the Novopavlovsk direction, the defenders repelled eight Russian attacks.

Title: -Speed ​​allows you to avoid enemy FPV-: how the French AMX-10 155 mech brigades stop the enemy near...
Description: French AMX-10 tanks were transferred to the 155th separate mechanized brigade of the Anna Kyivska Armed Forces last year. After training in France, tank crews have been fighting in the Pokrovsky direction for more than two months. Together with other units of the brigade and adjacent units of the Armed Forces, they untangle the enemy and prevent him from advancing to the Pavlograd-Pokrovsk highway. In order to get to the combat vehicles, it is necessary to overcome broken dirt roads and populated areas of Donetsk region destroyed by enemy anti-tank missiles and artillery. There are hidden and well-camouflaged AMX-10 tanks in the forest. Let's get to know the crew: the tank commander, the driver-mechanic, the gunner and the loader. Tank commander Petro with the call sign -Yellow- from Uzhgorod, in the Armed Forces since August last year. He says that the French tank is very maneuverable and fast. -The tank is very mobile, it can turn around 360 degrees on the spot. Perfectly overcomes small obstacles and swampy roads. Hard-to-reach areas of the terrain are difficult for him, since he is wheeled and weighs almost 17 tons. On the track, it develops a speed of up to 80 km/h. It can go up to 30 km/h in reverse during rollback. In Soviet tanks, the reverse speed does not exceed 5 km/h,- says Petro. The gearbox is automatic, the tires have an inflation system. Interestingly, a hydropneumatic suspension is installed on the tank, which allows the AMX-10 to change ground clearance and pitch. This helps a lot during combat missions: the car can -squat-, which increases the angle of the gun's shot, you can reduce the silhouette of the car, fire from behind cover, using terrain and other objects. The tank is lightly armored, the armor is 20 mm, it can withstand fire from large-caliber machine guns, it is additionally equipped with an anti-drone net and a grill against UAV strikes. Its main purpose is to quickly move to the line of fire, support the infantry with fire, make targeted strikes on the enemy, and just as quickly leave the position. So that the enemy could not detect the AMX-10. The tank has a smoke screen system and the ability to protect against means of mass destruction. The combat vehicle is armed with a 105-mm cannon with a firing range of up to 3 km depending on the type of projectile, ammunition of 38 shells and two 7.62 mm machine guns. One machine gun is placed on the armor from above, the other is mounted in the middle of the car. The fire control system is a very cool thing. It allows the crew to adjust shots, set ballistic corrections, projectile corrections, target distance, powder charge temperature, weather conditions, and the like. A laser range finder is installed for measuring the range to targets using the optical location method, in addition, there is a thermal imager for shooting at night. And most importantly, with the help of this system, the crew from the first shot accurately hits the target at a distance of 2 km from the enemy. We impress both moving and non-moving targets. Now, in this direction, we are destroying the advance of small enemy assault groups. We deliver targeted strikes on places of concentration, shelters and dugouts. How it happens: moved into position, the fire control system set the distance to the target, aimed the gun, then fired, the target was hit. We use 4 types of shells: cumulative, armor-piercing, high-explosive and smoke. We did not hit the enemy more than 2 km away, we usually shoot up to 1 km and a little more. We go on combat missions accompanied by our UAVs, which adjust fire from the air. A few days ago, we were reset the coordinates of the concentration of raschits. Conventional afforestation. The enemy was gathering there, planning to attack our infantry positions. The video showed a large and long dugout. There were probably more than 20-25 Russians there. The first 105 mm projectile flew from us, in parallel, the strike drones were dropping. They worked then to their credit, it's a pity that only the trees were damaged by fragments. Some injured racers crawled away from the affected area, but our FPV drone calculations finished them off. After the rollback, our tank began to be shelled with mortars. But due to the high speed, the crew safely left the combat mission area and returned to their -hideout-. By the way, the tank's high-speed capabilities allow us to avoid meeting enemy -fpvishkas- as well. In terms of armor, we do not use tank weapons. For this, the brigade uses other, more powerful means of destruction. And the enemy now very rarely uses heavy or lightly armored vehicles in our direction. Can the French AMX-10 tank be compared with classic tracked tanks of Soviet or foreign production? No, you can't. It is actually a light wheeled tank or combat vehicle with heavy weapons. In terms of combat capabilities, weapons and armor protection, the AMX-10 is significantly inferior to, for example, T-64 or T-72 tanks. Therefore, in a tank duel, a classic tank will, of course, win over a French tank. The 105-mm gun is not a serious argument in the fight against enemy battle tanks. Plus, this gun does not have stabilization, so it will not be able to fire while moving, instead, ordinary tracked tanks fire both on the spot and while moving, - noted the tank commander Petro. -I read that there are a lot of experts on the Internet who criticized and continue to criticize our training both in France and Ukraine. They talk about us, they say, we are not motivated, we don't know how to shoot, and so on. It is easy to engage in criticism while lying on sofas in warm apartments. We are here at the front, beating the invaders, and you are at home. Feel the difference? - Vasyl, the mechanic-driver of the tank, tells. A man from Lviv, in the 1990s served a term of service in the BMP. So he has experience driving and operating combat vehicles. -The training in France was very serious. We were taught by French instructors for two months. Theory, study of tank characteristics, repair of equipment, driving on roads, fields and swamps. Choosing a position for fire, masking a tank in forested areas and in an urbanized area. Well, and of course, shooting at targets, both from tank weapons and machine guns. Hitting targets from different distances, day and night. A lot of things were useful,- says Vasyl. Other crew members had never served in the army at all, so they were learning from scratch. The boys are charged, with each day of combat work they become more experienced.

Title: Expanding technical expansion: known for tanks, missiles and artillery systems, the arms manufacture...
Description: According to Seoul-based news agency Yonhap News, the deal worth US$93.7 million is to be implemented by Korea Aerospace Industries KAI between 2025 and March 2029, with a corresponding logistics package and practical training for Iraqi forces. pilots, ArmiyaInform reports. By chance, local media recalled that, in addition to official Baghdad, interest in helicopters from the Republic of Korea was expressed at different times by the Philippines and Vietnam. In addition to Surion helicopters, the South Korean company KAI is trying to expand exports of aircraft equipment, in particular the T-50 and FA-50 training and combat aircraft, which are actively progress to international markets and have already been ordered by Iraq. Today, the active customer of these aircraft is Poland, which, in addition to their purchase, plans to become a service center for these aircraft in Europe, Africa and the Middle East. While researching these projects, experts of the Ukrainian defense portal IKK Defense Express (DE) emphasized two aspects - South Korea is selling its helicopters for export for the first time, and in addition, we are talking about machines for which the technologies were purchased in Europe. To be more specific, work on the KUH-1 Surion started in the summer of 2006 after a tender was held, the winner of which was the Eurocopter company. This fact, among other things, may explain why the South Korean KUH-1 Surion is visually somewhat similar to the NH90, about its creation and operational features we repeatedly told in our materials. At the same time, DE analysts claim that the value of this tender was the equivalent of $1.7 billion at 2017 prices. There is also information that Eurocopter specialists helped KAI, in particular, in the development of the power transmission, the main gearbox, the automatic flight control system and some other components. Powered by two Hanwha Techwin T700-701K turbocharged engines, the Surion maintains a maximum take-off weight of 8,709 kilograms, a flight range of 828 kilometers and a cruising speed of 251 kilometers per hour. It has advanced avionics, including GPS, radar warning systems and digital mapping capabilities, as well as safety features such as a bulletproof airframe and crash-resistant fuel tanks. The helicopter is designed for multi-purpose use, allowing it to perform both military and civilian missions in a variety of operational environments. In the Republic of Korea, Surion is used by the Army (ROKA) and various government agencies, including the Korea Forestry Service, the National Fire Agency, and the Coast Guard. Its functions include troop transport, firefighting, medical evacuation and search and rescue operations. Options include the Marineon for amphibious operations, firefighting models with 2,500 liter water tanks and night vision equipment, as well as mine-laying helicopters currently under development. The first flight of the South Korean KUH-1 Surion took place in March 2010. KUH 1 Surion multipurpose helicopters have been in service with the Armed Forces of the Republic of Kazakhstan since 2012. At the beginning of 2024, according to data The Military Balance 2024, the South Korean Army Air Force had at its disposal about 200 KUH-1 Surions, another 27 such helicopters in the amphibious version are the aviation of the Marine Corps of the Navy of the Republic of Kazakhstan. KUH-1 Surion Basic Features: In December 2024, Korea Aerospace Industries (KAI) also entered into an agreement to assemble two KUH-1 Surion helicopters, specially designed for firefighting, with delivery expected by March 2029. By 2024, in total, more than 300 units of Surion and its variants have been produced and deployed, which demonstrates the universal application of this helicopter in various sectors of life. KUH-1 Surion helicopter. Video: MILITARY POWER TUBE

Title: Advantages of Armiya+: what discounts are available and how to use them
Description: During this time, our defenders have used this service 200 thousand times and saved more than 15 million hryvnias. What is currently available in the application and how to get discounts, ArmiyaInform tells. Currently, the program has 4 partners that offer special services and discounts for the military. Their services can be tentatively divided into 3 categories. One of the partners is Ukrzaliznytsia. Through the Army+ app, you can purchase up to 4 tickets from a special reserve intended exclusively for the military. The term is from 5 days to 6 hours before departure, if there are no tickets for regular seats. The offer applies to trains from/to cities close to the war zone. How does it work? Directly in the Army+ application, in the -Services- section, there is a -Pros- item. Among them, you can choose the -Ukrzaliznytsia- item. And already there you can click -buy tickets-. Importantly! After purchase, the tickets must be downloaded to the smartphone, as they will not be stored in the application itself. There are currently two partners here that offer discounts for the military: AZK UKRNAFTA Savings on gasoline and diesel - 3 hryvnias per liter, gas - 50 kopecks per liter. Up to 200 liters of fuel are available per month at such a discount. There is also a discount of 30% on the menu at the gas stations - hot dogs, burgers and the like. The maximum discount amount per month is 2,000 thousand hryvnias. WOG Economy 6 hryvnias for each liter of gasoline or diesel and 2.5 hryvnias for each liter of gas. There is also a discount of 20% on food and drinks at WOG KAFE and 10% on goods at WOG MARKET. Military personnel are given the opportunity to send parcels up to 30 kg for 1 hryvnia once a month. The service works in Sumy, Kharkiv, Donetsk, Zaporizhzhia and Kherson regions. How does it work? You need to generate a barcode in the Army+ application, which will need to be scanned at the post office. Importantly! The number of barcodes is fixed. Therefore, it is advisable to generate it only if you really plan to send the parcel. Otherwise, one of the siblings will not be able to use this service. It is possible that over time the number of partners will increase and the military will be able to receive more discounts. The Ministry of Defense is currently inviting businesses to join the program. You can apply follow this link.

Title: A directed video about the -atrocities- of the Ukrainian military: propaganda descends into outright...
Description: Since the beginning of the full-scale invasion, Kremlin -directors- regularly release videos of -horror- allegedly committed by the Armed Forces. Indeed, each new fake becomes a more blatant insult to the intelligence of even their own audience. This time we were shown a scene where -Ukrainian military- torture and kill -defenseless civilians-. The camera shoots comfortable angles, the light is exposed as in a cheap action movie, and the actors overplay in such a way that even second-rate cop series look more realistic. However, there is one -but- - their -Ukrainian military- speak Russian with a characteristic accent, and some -victims- have symbols of racist groups on their hands. It is not the first time that the occupiers have tried to pass off their crimes as the actions of the Armed Forces. Remember at least the story with Bucha, where at first they bragged about the purges, and then, when the world saw the bodies of tortured civilians, they started crying for a -stage-. Now the scheme is similar - they arrange show executions themselves, record them themselves, and then try to convince the world that Ukrainians did it. But there is one problem: unlike the Russian mass media, which eats any abomination from the hands of propagandists, the world community knows how to check the facts. And while the Moscow Telegram channels happily savor the new fake, independent journalists have already found a lot of inconsistencies: from geolocation to personnel analysis. The Kremlin continues to play in its genre, but every time it looks more and more pathetic. It seems that the propagandists have run out of ideas, and now they just run the same gum over and over again, adding a few new special effects. But here's the problem: even their own audience is beginning to doubt it. Because when you talk about -cruel Ukrainians- for ten years, and then your soldiers return home without limbs, some people start asking questions. And while they are shooting new -blockbusters-, the Armed Forces of Ukraine are working on a reality where the Russian invaders will forever remain in the past.

Title: Drones destroyed a Russian tank with an average cost of $2.2 million
Description: They published a video of combat work on their channel. -The tank is a well-protected assault vehicle with high firepower and maneuverability. It is able to break through defenses and maintain fire superiority at the right moment,- the statement said. It is noted that the enemy most often uses the T-80 and its modifications equipped with combined armor, or so-called -sheds- (when the tank body is sheathed with metal sheets). -They are armed with a 125-mm 2A46 smoothbore gun with with a firing range of up to 10 km. Its average cost is $2.2 million. Under ideal conditions and road surfaces, such a tank can reach a speed of up to 70 km/h, but this instance did not manage to escape,- the defenders noted. Our fighters eliminated the driver-mechanic together with the equipment. The rest of the crew managed to escape, but ran towards the drone of neighboring Ukrainian units, where they were overtaken by -explosive gifts-. As reported by ArmyInform, the operators of the 412th Nemesis regiment in Luhansk region destroyed the anti-aircraft missile system Strela-10M4 (9K35M4) is one of the most modern modifications of the Soviet Strela-10 air defense system.

Title: Merged coordinates and prepared sabotage: an enemy agent was exposed in Dnipropetrovsk region
Description: This is reported by the Office of the Prosecutor General. According to the investigation, since February 2024, the suspect, using the Telegram messenger, received tasks from the enemy. He was tasked with setting fire to the relay cabinets of the Ukrzaliznytsia signaling system, recording it on video and sending it to the customer. In addition, he collected and transmitted to the enemy data on the location of administrative and military buildings, including TCC and SP, along with GPS coordinates. The perpetrator was detained in accordance with Art. 208 of the Criminal Code of Ukraine. At the request of the prosecutors, the court chose a preventive measure for him - detention. Pre-trial investigation and operational support is carried out by the Security Service of Ukraine in the Dnipropetrovsk region. As reported by ArmyInform, the Security Serviceneutralized the FSB agent group, which on behalf of the Russian Federation was spying in Kyiv, Kharkiv and Lviv regions. The attackers adjusted the rocket attacks of the Rashists on the locations of the Defense Forces.

Title: The President of Ukraine noted three combat units
Description: This is reported by the President's Office. The head of state thanked the Ukrainian soldiers in Donetsk region, who are repelling assaults and counterattacking. -I will especially mention the 33rd and 225th assault regiments. And it is almost the seventh month that our guys have been holding a buffer zone on the territory of the aggressor, in Russia, and they are almost used to the Kursk region. Our -Eighty- - the 80th separate amphibious assault brigade - I thank all of you, soldiers! Good results in Kurshchyna,- he emphasized. Volodymyr Zelenskyy noted that there are positive reports regarding Ukrainian-made drones. -Of course, we analyze the amount of support coming from each of the partners: America, Europe, other parts of the world. What is irreplaceable, what can be replaced. We work so that Ukrainian positions are protected in any case. And this is one of the key conditions for the diplomacy we need - for the right diplomacy that will guarantee Ukraine peace,- he said. According to him, there was a lot of international work today. -We are preparing for the negotiations already this Friday. Agreement with America. Support of our state and people. Guarantees of peace and security are the key to Russia not destroying the lives of other nations. I will meet with President Trump. It is important for me and all of us in the world that America's aid is not stopped,- the President said. He also had a conversation with the Prime Minister of Portugal. -We coordinate all our efforts with the widest possible range of partners. Europeans should be a part of all diplomatic efforts concerning Europe, and this issue is not simply about what is now, it should always be exactly this practice: Europe should never be somewhere behind - second or third-rate,- Volodymyr Zelenskyy assured. He thanked Portugal for its continued support, and the two sides agreed on further contacts. Also, the President signed decrees to honor the defenders of Ukraine. -In particular, Iryna Tsybukh, a combat medic, a very famous person, unfortunately, was posthumously awarded the title of Hero of Ukraine. We remember. We remember absolutely everyone who fought for our state, for our people — for the very right of Ukrainians to live their lives on their land,- he emphasized.

Title: One shoots, and the other throws a grenade: how the stormtroopers cleared the trench and captured th...
Description: The video of the combat work appeared on the page of the Khortytsya Military Academy. The clearing of the enemy's trenches continued in close cooperation with the drones, which forced the enemy to hide in the dugout. The stormtroopers worked in -twos-, when one directs sniper fire, and the other throws grenades into the dugout with the occupants. One Russian was killed, and another decided to surrender. As reported by ArmyInform, Russian invaders tried attack on Kotlynogo equipment. in the Pokrovsky direction, however, both assault groups were completely destroyed.

Title: -That's another fruit- - border guards exposed a man who was traveling abroad in a truck with food
Description: informs about this on February 26. Having found the -customer-, the carrier hid him in a truck with goods and, together with his partner, took the customer to the state border with Moldova. -The driver did not even suspect that all his actions were being monitored by operatives of the Chernivtsi border detachment, who had obtained information in advance about the preparation of a violation of the state border. The car was stopped, and the violators were detained,- the report says. In the course of communicating with the detainees, border guards learned that a resident of the Rivne region paid 7.5 thousand US dollars for an illegal trip to Moldova. In relation to him, materials on an administrative offense were drawn up. -As for the carrier, a report has been sent to the law enforcement agencies under Article 332 of the Criminal Code of Ukraine. The information is included in the EDPR. The violator was detained in accordance with Article 208 of the Criminal Code of Ukraine,- the DPSU said. ArmyInform reminds that it is better not to break the law or risk your life, but to use the aggregator of vacancies in the Armed Forces and recruiting centers.

Title: -Infernal Encounter-: Ingulets scouts reduced enemy infantry to ashes
Description: The video of the combat operation was published on the page of the Ground Forces of the Armed Forces of Ukraine. In the footage released by 60 OMBr, you can see how Ukrainian scouts, like ghosts, destroy the enemy. The invaders, trying to break through the defenses, fall into a real hell. Accurate UAV strikes leave them no chance. As reported by ArmyInform, the operators of the 60th mechanized brigade of Ingulets killed a lot of occupants who tried to hide in the grass, bushes and under trees.

Title: The SBU exposed the director of a lyceum who worked for the occupiers in Kupyansk
Description: The Kharkiv Regional Prosecutor's Office informs about this. According to the investigation, the 45-year-old woman headed the educational institution no later than August 2022, but already under the occupation leadership. The traitor informed the teaching staff about the transition to new standards, organized the recruitment of staff who were ready to work under Russian leadership, and held meetings. Particular cynicism is caused by the fact that the director organized advanced training courses for her subordinates in Kursk, Russia, where teachers had to -master- the intricacies of teaching Ukrainian children according to the Russian curriculum. In addition, she ensured that Ukrainian textbooks were removed from the library and instead received books published by the aggressor state. Currently, the collaborator has been notified of the suspicion of committing a crime, provided for in part. 3 Art. 111-1 of the Criminal Code of Ukraine (collaborative activity). At the request of the prosecution, she was remanded in custody. As reported by ArmyInform, a 56-year-old man who publicly justified armed aggression of the Russian Federation against Ukraine was exposed in Kharkiv. and admired the Russian army.

Title: -I wanted to be lucky-: a border guard with the call sign -Lucky- about the battles for Vovchansk
Description: The story of the fighter was published on the page of the Gart brigade. Maksym comes from the Kupyan district in the Kharkiv region. His village was under occupation in the first days of a full-scale invasion. Mother and brother remained under the oppression of the occupiers. -We wrote mass reports to the east, but there was a command that all graduates had to serve a year on the western border,- says Maksym. According to the distribution, the young officer got to the Chernivtsi border detachment. After serving the mandatory minimum, Maksym applied to join the combat unit. He went to defend Bakhmut and Chasiv Yar. Before leaving, according to the well-known formula: -what you call a ship, so it will sail-, Maxim chose the nickname Lucky for himself. -I wanted to be lucky so that both the bullets passed and the KAB nearby did not fall,- adds the border guard with a smile. Pseudo did not disappoint. Lucky came out of Bahmut whole and unscathed. Then there was a rotation in Vovchansk. The enemy felt for weak points for assault actions. The positions of the border guards were shelled from barrel artillery and mortars. Frequent guests were sabotage and reconnaissance groups of the enemy. -In Vovchansk, he participated in defensive battles. Repulsed the attacks of the enemy who tried to penetrate the position. Their main task was to take prisoners. And we detected and destroyed them in time,- says Lucky. In the -Hart- brigade, Maksym defends his native Kharkiv region, continues to perform combat missions in the Vovchansk direction. It works at the forefront here. Organizes the service and directly participates in the conduct of defensive battles. The direction is familiar, and most importantly, native. -When my little Motherland was occupied, I was far away and powerless, now I was able to prevent this from happening again,- says the border guard. Maksym is convinced that his land must be defended with weapons in his hands. As reported by ArmyInform, in the Zaporizhzhia area, a mobile anti-aircraft fire group, which includes Oleksandr with the call sign -Kropa-, Artem with the call sign -Tourist- and Andriy with the call sign -Maly-, has been successfully performing the task of destroying enemy drones for over a year. During this time they destroyed about two dozen enemy UAVs.

Title: National resistance: what is the role of resistance movement participants in the restoration of Ukra...
Description: The Ministry of Defense of Ukraine spoke about the essence of the resistance movement, its importance in the liberation struggle, key functions and main risks for the participants The resistance movement is a form of resistance to the Russian occupation that combines effectiveness with almost complete invisibility to the enemy. Underground people operate according to the principles of a strict conspiracy, which allows them to successfully carry out their tasks despite the constant threat of exposure. -Ukrainians have been bravely resisting Russian aggression behind enemy lines for eleven years. Acting inconspicuously and under constant threat, they significantly help the Defense Forces to hit the enemy, destroy his logistics and liberate the occupied territories,- said Yuriy Yelenych, head of the national resistance policy department of the Ministry of Defense of Ukraine. What is the resistance movement? The resistance movement is a system of military, information and special measures aimed at restoring state sovereignty and territorial integrity of Ukraine. It is an important component of national resistance. The activity of the resistance movement is regulated by the legislative framework, in particular the Laws of Ukraine -On the Basics of National Resistance-, -On the Legal Regime of Martial Law-, as well as relevant government resolutions and orders of the General Staff of the Armed Forces of Ukraine. What is the importance of the resistance movement in the fight against the aggressor? The history of the Ukrainian resistance movement begins in 2014, when Russia occupied Crimea and part of Donbas. Even then, the patriots in the captured territories launched active underground activities, from organizing protest actions to gathering intelligence and conducting sabotage operations. Over the course of eight years, the resistance transformed into a powerful force that significantly made life difficult for the occupiers. Underground members disrupted pseudo-referendums, sabotaged the work of collaborators, and established effective interaction with the Ukrainian military. With the beginning of the large-scale invasion in 2022, the resistance movement became one of the important factors in the liberation of the territories of Kyiv Oblast, Sumy Oblast, Chernihiv Oblast, Kharkiv Oblast, and Kherson Oblast. From the first day, the underground operatives actively destroyed enemy equipment, carried out sabotage at important facilities and destroyed the logistics chains of the invaders. Today, the Ukrainian underground continues to operate in temporarily occupied territories. The state supports the resistance movement, but emphasizes the need for caution and coordinated cooperation. Who directs the movement of the resistance? The leadership of the movement of the resistance is carried out by the Commander-in-Chief of the Armed Forces through the commander of the Special Operations Forces. It is the SSO that is responsible for organizing and coordinating the activities of the underground network in the occupied territories. Information about the direct leadership of the resistance movement is protected by state secrecy. What tasks are assigned to the resistance movement? The main tasks of the resistance movement include the formation of a resistance network, conducting special operations and creating obstacles to the actions of the occupiers. An important function is to carry out informational and psychological operations and to carry out intelligence activities. The Special Operations Forces of the Armed Forces of Ukraine organize the formation of resistance movement centers and ensure that they acquire the necessary capabilities. They also coordinate the participation of underground people in special operations and prepare Ukrainian citizens for activities in the resistance movement. Specific work methods are protected by state secrets. What methods does the resistance movement use? Guerrilla warfare has become one of the most effective tools of the resistance movement. The underground carries out systematic strikes on enemy communications, destroys military equipment and disrupts the supply chains of the occupying forces. Sabotage operations are aimed at destroying critical infrastructure for the enemy. Members of the resistance movement disable railway tracks, bridges, ammunition and fuel depots, which significantly limits the combat capability of the occupying forces. Informational resistance plays an equally important role. The underground collects and transmits intelligence on the movement of enemy troops, disseminates true information about the course of the war among the local population, and conducts psychological operations aimed at demoralizing the occupiers. What challenges does the resistance movement face? The activities of the resistance movement are associated with a constant risk to the lives of its members. The occupiers brutally persecute the underground, using torture, illegal imprisonment, and even execution of identified patriots of Ukraine. The necessity of a strict conspiracy requires members of the resistance movement to be extremely careful in their communication and movement. The slightest mistake can lead to the failure of the entire network, so the underground is forced to scrutinize their every move. Work in the conditions of occupation is greatly complicated by limited access to the necessary resources. Members of the resistance movement have to show considerable ingenuity to compensate for the lack of special equipment and materials for operations. We emphasize that participation in the resistance movement requires careful preparation and coordination of actions. How to join the resistance and act safely - at link.

Title: -Drones fall like leaves in autumn-: Galician paratroopers destroyed 31 enemy UAVs in 10 days

FPV drones created by Ukrainian engineers turned out to be hundreds of times cheaper and no less effective than enemy counterparts. The destruction of 1,676 drones is not only an impressive number, but also 1,676 times when the enemy failed to adjust artillery, transmit coordinates for missile strikes, and destroy our positions. These are 1,676 times when Ukrainian soldiers stopped death carried by Russian drones. As reported by ArmyInform, special forces from the 2nd separate detachment of the Omega CSP continue to demonstrate high the drone's level of skill, hinting that their sorties could well be the basis for a video game.

Title: -We had to beat the enemy non-stop-: how -Gran- and his comrades defended Toretsk for 77 days
Description: The story of the fighter was made public on the brigade's page. -Gran- is an ordinary Ukrainian man who before the war was fond of fishing and football. He graduated from an agricultural university and worked by profession growing grain crops. However, when the time came, he did not shy away from service and stood up for the defense of his country. After training and adaptation, Oleg went on his first combat mission to Toretsk. -Gran- stayed in the positions for 77 days, where he demonstrated heroism and courage every day. -All this time, Valer's brother nicknamed -Livsha-, whom we met at the educational center, was next to me. Later, we -picked up- another soldier Oleksandr on the pseudo -Carp- with 150 OMBr, Oleg says, -We had to beat the enemy non-stop. Because if not you, then you.- The most difficult test was the loss of a brother who died in his arms. However, -Gran- continued to fight and fulfill its duty. Oleg also remembers how he had to provide medical aid to his comrades who were injured during shelling. -Some of the boys started festering from small fragments that got into their bodies during the shelling. He took a knife, sharpened the blade well, and there were hydrogen peroxide and dressing material in the first-aid kits. — In a word, I learned to deal with that misfortune — -patients- from neighboring positions were already in line -for an appointment- with me. After returning from a 77-day deployment, the first thing Gran did was call his family to let them know he was alive. And then… sat down on YouTube - until the very early morning I watched reviews of key football matches that I missed during these 77 days! When asked what helped him survive all the trials, -Gran- answers: -The first thing that helped was thoughts about the children - there was a great desire to endure everything, to return and hug them. And prayer saved. Even those who never knew even the -Our Father- suddenly -remembered- everything and began to pray very fervently. By Decree of the President of Ukraine No. 122/2025 of February 23, 2025, Junior Sergeant Oleh Volodymyrovych Grankivskyi was awarded the III degree -For Courage- Order. As reported by ArmyInform, she is only 21, and she has been pulling the wounded out of the fire for two years. Nastya is a paramedic of the medevac crew who was mobilized at the age of 19. Her civilian life lasted only a year, and today she does not imagine herself outside the army.

Prosecutors, together with investigators, continue to document war crimes committed by the military of the Russian Federation,- the message reads. Title: -A tank 20 meters away is more invigorating than coffee-: a scout from Crimea told about two days of...
Description: The story of the fighter was made public on page 32 of a separate mechanized brigade. -I went to intelligence on my own, voluntarily. At first, they did not want to take it, because they saw that it was already old. But he insisted. I will still give a head start to many young people,- says Igor. According to him, during the last mission, a group of six scouts went out to clear the enemy position. -There were six of us. They left at 5 in the morning. They moved covertly through thickets. In the night vision device, I noticed enemy infantrymen moving along the landing. We opened fire. Worked out. And nearby there were already trenches that had to be cleared. What did my trio do. The second was closing,- the scout recalls. According to him, clearing the trenches happens like this: first you throw a grenade, then you shoot the exit from the dugout and the passages, and in this way you advance along the trench. -When the position was completely ours again, we concentrated at certain points and observed each of our own perimeters. We fought off enemy counterattacks for two days, until we were replaced by infantry. This is how we work in intelligence,- Igor says. According to him, the strongest impression on him during the war was made by a tank that was coming at them 20 meters away. -When a tank is coming at you 20 meters away, it's more invigorating than coffee,- he says. Igor emphasized that the issue of protecting and liberating his native land from the occupiers is a matter of principle for him, which is why he volunteered for intelligence. As reported by ArmyInform, war changes people, but there are those who return to it again and again. Platoon Sergeant Dmytro from the 32nd Separate Mechanized Brigade joined the army for the third time. Completed his military service, fought in 2014, and since March 2022 has been holding back a full-scale invasion.

Title: -Zero-: how two Ukrainian soldiers survived the death sentence and escaped from Russian captivity
Description: The story of the fighters was made public in a video on the brigade's page. The task of the Ukrainian military was clear: to strengthen the dugout after shelling and hand it over to the next group. They reached their destination, but instead of the expected support from their side, they saw dead Russian soldiers. When they came closer, the soldiers found themselves in a trap: two invaders suddenly rose from under the bodies of the Russians with machine guns. After a short conversation, the occupiers transmitted information about the prisoners to the headquarters. The answer came instantly: -Zero!-. At that moment, the Ukrainians realized that there was no time. The captives were tied up and prepared for execution, but one of them, Svyatoslav, quickly got his bearings and told the occupiers that they had a radio station through which they could contact the headquarters. This made the Russians pause. They took a pause, then changed the decision: instead of immediate execution, the prisoners were ordered to be taken to another point. On the way along the power line, the Ukrainians were led under surveillance, warning that any attempt to escape would end in death. But Svyatoslav, whose hands were tied with a tie, was able to break it and helped the two brothers to free themselves. Now their only hope was coordination with Ukrainian troops. Thanks to radio communication, the soldiers were able to contact the command and request artillery support. The Ukrainian military opened fire on the positions of the occupiers, creating chaos in their ranks. This gave the captives a chance to break free and run across the field. In addition to artillery, drones also intervened - drone operators guided our fighters, giving them landmarks on a safe route. When the Ukrainian soldiers heard on the radio: -A box is coming for you!-, they understood that their return home was assured. -I realized for the first time how important communication is. This piece of plastic, the walkie-talkie, saved our lives. Without her, we would just be shot,- says one of the fighters. This story ended happily, but such cases are an exception. The Ukrainian military urges: do not lose vigilance, do not give the enemy a chance and remember - communication, coordination and instant decisions can be the key to survival. As reported by ArmyInform, fighters of the 46th Airborne Assault Brigade Army forces captured a Russian attack aircraft, who said that he had no choice: to go to war or not.

Title: KAB tore up the building, but not the brotherhood: how the SSO fighters rescued the marines from the...
Description: The video of combat work was published on the channel of the Special Operations Forces of the Armed Forces of Ukraine. Fighters of the 8th regiment of the SSO worked in the Kurakhiv direction, performing tasks of reconnaissance and countering the enemy. They were monitoring the area, the UAV, when the situation changed dramatically. The enemy intensified attacks, began to use kamikaze drones and guided aerial bombs. One of these attacks on the positions of the Ukrainian military was an enemy aerial bomb of the KAB. As a result of the explosion, the building in which the marines were located collapsed, turning into a pile of debris. All fighters who were in the shelter received severe contusions, and one serviceman was wounded. Despite the constant threat of repeated strikes, a group of SSO fighters immediately went to the rescue. Arriving at the scene, they found that the marines were in a critical condition: disoriented, contused, and the wounded needed immediate help. The group commander, callsign -Ghost-, contacted his trapped comrades through the vent, assessing their condition. The task was complicated by the fact that the evacuation process was under constant surveillance by enemy drones. Another blow could come at any moment. SSO fighters cleared the debris to get the wounded man. Due to the considerable weight of the fighter, caused by a full set of combat equipment, it was necessary to improvise: a path was made of boards and debris to quickly pull him out. The wounded man was promptly taken to a safer place, and later evacuated to a medical center. During this rescue operation, every second could become fatal. The military acted in a clear and coordinated manner, aware of the threat of repeated attacks. Despite the danger, the mission was successfully completed - all marines were evacuated, and the wounded man received the necessary medical attention. According to -Ghost-, in difficult situations, the military should not be divided by the type of troops - fraternity and mutual support on the battlefield is the highest priority. He is sure that at a critical moment any unit of the Defense Forces of Ukraine will come to the rescue. In addition to the military, another -fighter- was rescued during this mission - a small puppy that was left among the ruins. It was named -Kabik- - in honor of the guided aerial bomb that almost took the lives of Ukrainian defenders, but in the end became an occasion to discover the true fighting brotherhood. As reported by ArmyInform, operators of the 3rd Regiment of the Special Operations Forces destroyed approximately a platoon of Russian military during a raid on an industrial complex in the Donetsk direction.

Title: A simplified algorithm for returning from the SZH until March 1: the Ministry of Defense reminds you...
Description: About informs Ministry of Defense of Ukraine. Only in the last week, about 300 reports for return to service passed through Army+. The journey from in-app report creation to in-service renewal to in-service renewal takes less than a week. -Thanks to Army+, we reduced the time to return to service to a few days without the need for extra contacts or personal reporting. With your smartphone services, we give you the opportunity not only to renew, but also to take control of your service and find a place where you can bring maximum benefit,- says Kateryna Chernogorenko, Deputy Minister of Defense of Ukraine for Digitalization. Military personnel who completed the SZH before November 29 can return to service until March 1, 2025, according to a simplified algorithm, and renew their service within three days. To do this, the following steps should be taken: After March 1, you can also return to service, but not according to this simplified algorithm through Army+. In this case, it may take several months to restore the service. And until this moment, the financial security and other guarantees are not returned. As reported by ArmyInform, the Ministry of Defense of Ukraine published step-by-step instructions for the return of servicemen after the voluntary abandonment of a unit (SZCh).

Title: Ukraine uses FPV drones to destroy Shaheds and is preparing to export drones
Description: Colonel Vadim Sukharevskyi, commander of the Unmanned Systems Forces of the Armed Forces of Ukraine, told about this in an interview with LIGA.net a -chess game- with the enemy, constantly improving their technologies and tactics. According to Vadym Sukharevskyi, attacks on Russian military infrastructure are not random or chaotic. They are carefully planned and calculated taking into account intelligence and technical capabilities. -What we see in the news about the next fires on the territory of the Russian Federation is the result of serious planning and mathematical calculations. Hundreds of experienced officers, as well as civilians and international specialists, are working on it,- Vadym Sukharevskyi emphasized. War forces both sides to improve their tactics and technology. Ukraine quickly adapts to new challenges. For example, when Russia began to use -shahedis- on a massive scale, the Armed Forces quickly created thousands of mobile fire groups, which showed high efficiency. However, the enemy adapts: it changes tactics, flight altitudes and routes. -We responded by starting to shoot down “martyrs” FPV drones. And it already gives real results. This is a constant technological pursuit,- he added. Ukraine's military experience in using unmanned technologies is invaluable to allies. The heads of the US and European defense ministries have already expressed interest in Ukrainian developments. But is Ukraine ready for their export? -I think so. But you need to have a state and economic approach. We don't have to give away our best products for free, but we can competently approach exports,- explained Vadym Sukharevskyi. He suggests using a system similar to NATO's approach, where there are three categories of military products: 1. Products for non-allies - limited options. 2. Products for allies - access to 70% of the functionality. 3. Products for internal use - full access. As reported by ArmyInform, in the six months since the creation of the Unmanned Systems Forces, more than 220 operations have been carried out with deep damage on the territory the aggressor state — both independently and in cooperation with other components of the Defense Forces of Ukraine.

Title: The occupier dies in the cemetery, our fighter captured six Russians: stream from the front-line cit...
Description: Our attack aircraft cleared the position of the Russians in the Pokrovsky direction. After several grenades and automatic rounds, one occupier still decided to surrender - the rest were liquidated. The prisoner tells that they had to eat a cat in the trench, as well as how they were abandoned by the command. A Russian came to Ukraine to die in a cemetery. The occupier somehow miraculously found himself in the cemetery and decided to hide from our soldiers in a garbage can. It was there that the drone pilot of the 25th brigade found him and threw a grenade at him. These and other topics are discussed by our presenters - junior lieutenant Volodymyr Kravchuk and lieutenant Serhiy Lipko.

Title: 15 years for treason: a man from Luhansk surrendered enemy defense facilities in Cherkasy region
Description: The Prosecutor General's Office informs about this. It has been proven that the man worked for Russian intelligence - the Main Directorate of the General Staff of the Armed Forces of the Russian Federation. For a monetary reward, he gave the enemy data on the defense facilities of Cherkasy region, in particular, on the location of military units, enterprises of the defense-industrial complex, and critical infrastructure. It is interesting that in April 2022, after the full-scale invasion of the Russian Federation, the convict moved to the city of Smil, Cherkasy region. He received social assistance, free housing, but at the same time he collected intelligence for the occupiers. The pre-trial investigation was conducted by the investigators of the Security Service of Ukraine in Cherkasy region under the procedural guidance of the regional prosecutor's office. The judgment will enter into force after the appeal is considered or when the deadline for its submission expires. As reported by ArmyInform, the Kharkiv Court of Appeal confirmed the sentence of a 50-year-old associate professor of one of the Kharkiv vyshiv, who was found guilty of treason and sentenced to 15 years in prison with confiscation of property.

Title: They wanted to transport 16 evaders abroad: another illegal scheme was blocked in Transcarpathia
Description: The Special Prosecutor's Office of the Western Region informs about this on February 26. It was established that they looked for conscripts who wanted to leave the country during the war, formed groups, collected money, settled them in border settlements and instructed them. Then in a minibus, they took them to the demarcation line, from where they had to cross a barrier fence that had been previously damaged in a certain place. -The cost of such services ranged from 7 to 15 thousand dollars per person. The shippers were detained, and sixteen violators were fined. The establishment of the entire circle of persons involved in the criminal scheme is ongoing,- the message reads. ArmyInform reminds that it is better not to break the law or risk your life, but to use the aggregator of vacancies in the Armed Forces and recruiting centers.

Title: In a day, they demolished three of their houses either with KABs or FPV drones - fighter -Kaban- abo...
