As reported by ArmyInform, for 10 days under heavy fire, Air Force fighters enemy in Kurshchyna.

Title: From -vigorous- to -pale- in a second: how special forces of the Defense Forces change the mood of t...
Description: The video of the combat operation was published on the page of the Center for Special Purposes of NSU -Omega-. In a new video published by -Sharp Kartuza-, the occupiers are traditionally not given a chance for the second level - they quickly lose enthusiasm after meeting Ukrainian drones. -The occupier, as always, is very energetic, running, fussing, but he only wants to shoot until the moment he meets the Foot Crusher,- the special forces quip on their channel. As reported by ArmyInform, a separate detachment of unmanned special purpose systems -Omega Wings- of the Special Purpose Center -Omega- published a video on which the destruction of enemy personnel in places of concentration was recorded.

Title: -Lilit- is a 20-year-old strike drone pilot who destroys the enemy in her native Donetsk region
Description: The defender's story was made public in a video on the channel of the Ministry of Internal Affairs of Ukraine. -Who wants to fight for Donbas if not Donetsk people!- she says proudly. -Lilit- joined the ranks of the National Guard of Ukraine in 2024, signing a contract after completing the young fighter course. Now she is a pilot of attack drones in the 4th brigade of operational assignment of NSU -Rubizh-. Before that, as a 17-year-old schoolgirl, she and her father were involved in volunteer activities: they evacuated people from the war zone and delivered humanitarian aid. The soldiers she met on her travels eventually became her comrades in arms. -I wanted to be a stormtrooper, but I realized that you don't have to be a man to protect your home,- says -Lilith.- According to her, every entry into a combat position is a personal victory for her. She mentions successful strikes on enemy equipment and manpower, although she modestly adds that the main credit for such operations goes to the first pilot. The work of an FPV operator, according to the military, requires a lot of concentration and self-confidence. -FPV drones are on a whole different level. There is no stabilization here, everything depends on the precision of movements and control.- Despite its young age, -Lilit- has already gone through a serious military journey. She is grateful to her commanders and comrades, who taught her everything from assembling drones to combat tactics. But her biggest dream is to return to her native home. -I want to see my younger brothers and sisters. And also, after the victory, build an orphanage.- And while the war continues, -Lilit- together with its team continues to do everything possible to bring closer the day when there will be no more occupiers in Donbass. As reported by ArmyInform, combat medic Anna with the call sign -Mishka-. The girl, who just turned 19 years old, consciously chose the path of the defender of Ukraine and joined the ranks Armed Forces.

Title: Storming after a robot attack: the 92nd brigade talked about the specific functions of recruited sto...
Description: Mstislav Banik, the head of the recruiting section of the 475th separate assault battalion of the 92nd separate mechanized brigade, said this on the air of the Yedyni Novyni telethon . According to him, they communicate with each candidate for attack aircraft separately. This is necessary in order to understand whether a person is really ready to fulfill his duties. After all, the assault battalion with a reinforced unmanned component is recruiting recruits who will perform special functions. -At first, the -dead zone- on enemy positions will be created by drones - both in the air and on the ground. And only then these guys - strong, motivated, cheerful - will finish off the enemy. Take trophies and take positions, liberating Ukrainian territories. Our concept is that they will have the maximum chance of survival. Drones will take on the main assault work,- said Mstislav Banik. As a reminder, -Contrakt 18-24- is a voluntary initiative that allows Ukrainians in the specified age category to join the Defense Forces for one year. The project offers a decent financial reward, professional combat training according to NATO standards and social guarantees that no civilian profession can provide. ArmyInform reported that within the framework of the -Contract 18-24- project, 10 separate mountain assault brigade of the Armed Forces of Ukraine -Edelvejs- released a video that calls to sign an annual contract with the Armed Forces of Ukraine.

Title: Defense forces hit military airfields and an oil refinery of the occupiers
Description: informs the General Staff of the Armed Forces of Ukraine about this. In particular, our fighters hit the Saki and Kacha military airfields, as well as the Tuapsin Oil Refinery. -The Tuapsin Refinery processes oil with a declared volume of 12 million tons/year. More than 90% of produced oil products are exported. The company is also actively involved in the provision of the Russian army of occupation,- the report says. At least 40 explosions were recorded in the area of ​​the oil refinery. There is information about damage to the plant's infrastructure. -The results of the damage are being clarified. Strikes on military and strategic facilities involved in ensuring Russia's armed aggression against Ukraine will continue,- the General Staff of the Armed Forces assured. As reported by ArmyInform, the Ryazan Oil Refinery, which can process 17.1 million tons of oil per year, was attacked for the third time this year. the five largest refineries of the Russian Federation.

Title: In the direction of Novopavlivsk, the defenders repelled eight Russian attacks
Description: This is in the operational information of the General Staff of the Armed Forces of Ukraine as of 16:00 on February 26. The invaders do not stop using artillery on the territories of the regions bordering the Russian Federation. The areas of Turya, Starykove, Velyka Pisarivka, Studenok, and Chernatske settlements came under enemy airstrikes. Glukhiv, Mykolayivka, Semenivka, Masheve were under air strikes. Two assaults by the invaders took place in the direction of Vovchansk and Dvorichny in the Kharkiv direction. Enemy aircraft dropped anti-aircraft missiles on Vovchansk Khutory. The enemy tried three times to advance on the positions of Ukrainian units in the areas of Petropavlivka and Zagryzovo on Kupyansk direction, one battle is in progress. In the Lymansk direction the aggressor is attacking in the Kolodyazyu area. In the Kramatorsk direction The defense forces repelled one enemy attempt to advance near Chasovoy Yar, another attack is ongoing. In the Toretsk direction the enemy attacked the positions of our troops five times in the Toretsk and Crimean Three skirmishes continue until now. In the Pokrovsky direction today, the enemy attacked the positions of our defenders 22 times in the areas of Tarasivka, Novotoretske, Myrolyubivka, Promin, Leontovichi, Kotlyne, Udachne, Nadiivka, Uspenivka, five skirmishes continue. In Novopavlivskyi direction, our defenders repelled eight enemy attacks in the areas of the settlements of Kostyantynopil, Rozdolne and Burlatske, another attack is still ongoing. In the Gulyaipil direction the enemy is carrying out two assaults in the direction of Charivny, at the same time launching airstrikes on Gulyaipol and Zaliznychny. In the Orihiv direction two skirmishes are ongoing, the enemy is trying to advance in the area of ​​Pyatikhatok. In the Siversky and Gulyaipilsk directions since the beginning of the day, the enemy did not carry out offensive operations. Ten combat clashes took place today in the Kursk direction, five are still ongoing. In addition, the enemy carried out 7 air strikes, dropped nine anti-aircraft missiles and launched 193 artillery strikes. In total, last day losses of the Russian invaders amounted to 1170 people. Ukrainian soldiers also destroyed 19 tanks, 15 armored combat vehicles, 34 artillery systems, two air defense systems, 194 UAVs and 120 cars of the occupiers.

Title: The occupiers dropped six aerial bombs on Kostyantynivka: the police showed the consequences
Description: The National Police of Ukraine reported this. Among the dead are a 47-year-old woman and four men: 56, 57, 75 years old, the age of one more is being determined. Five women and six men aged 33 to 83 were injured. 52 civilian objects were destroyed, including more than 20 residential buildings. Information about the exact number of victims and the scale of destruction is being established. The head of Donetsk OVA Vadym Filashkin previously informed that recently Russian attacks on civilians in Kostyantynivka have become more frequent and harsher. It is dangerous to stay in the city, civilians must evacuate.

Title: The partners will allocate 700 million euros to Ukraine for the purchase of demining equipment
Description: As reported on February 26 the Ministry of Defense of Ukraine, this was discussed at the eleventh meeting of the Mine Action Coalition held in Vilnius, Republic of Lithuania, under the chairmanship of Lithuania and Iceland. 40 officials from 15 countries took part in the event. The delegation from the Ministry of Defense of Ukraine was headed by the head of the Main Department of Mine Action, Civil Defense and Environmental Security, Colonel Ruslan Beregulya. The Armed Forces of Ukraine were represented by the Commander of the Support Forces of the Ukrainian Armed Forces, Major General Dmytro Gerega, andThe State Special Transport Service was represented by the Deputy Head of the DSST Administration, Colonel Maksym Komisarov. in the amount of 16.1 million euros. The budget for 2025 is planned at the level of 130 million euros. As of February, the Central Project Management Agency (SRMA, Republic of Lithuania)has already accumulated 51 million euros,- Ruslan Beregulya stressed. He added that the Coalition participants were interested in the experience of the Ministry of Defense, the Armed Forces and other components of the Security and Defense Forces of Ukraine, acquired during three years of large-scale war. In particular, at the initiative of Lithuania and Ukraine, working groups will be created that will study the latest methods of maintenance and maintenance of engineering barriers, innovations in mine countermeasures, including the use of UAVs and artificial intelligence during non-technical inspections. In addition, Colonel Ruslan Beregulya handed over to the Coalition leader countries the approved by the leadership of the Ministry of Defense of Ukraine -Road map of the Coalition of demining capabilities until 2035-. During the meeting, Major General Dmytro Gerega informed the participants about the military-strategic situation and current challenges that Ukraine faces in the issue of demining. He also told how the engineering equipment and technology transferred to the Armed Forces of Ukraine by the partner countries is used in combat operations. During the discussions, priorities were agreed on for the procurement of weapons, military equipment and necessary equipment within the framework of the coalition for 2025. Reference: Fordata Tony Blair Institute due to mines and other explosive objects left on Ukrainian territories by the Russians, the annual losses of our state amount to $11.2 billion. As ArmyInform reported, NATO for the first time allowed developers and scientists from Ukraine to participate in a hackathon aimed at solving common threats.

Title: -A magical and explosive spectacle-: an FPV drone of the Defense Forces destroyed the composition of...
Description: A video with vivid footage of the explosions was made public on the brigade's page. -It exploded beautifully, for a long time, a lot,- the message reads. According to the military, the impression of successfully completing the task is simply incredible. -When you manage to track such positions of the enemy, and the main thing is to get the -birdie- there, the impressions are simply incredible! Such a drive!- - fighters share their impressions. The video shows how the drone hits the target precisely, causing a powerful detonation and a bright flame. Destroying the enemy's ammunition stocks is an important contribution to disrupting their plans and weakening their combat potential. As reported by ArmyInform, the drones of the Charon strike group 14 mechanized brigade named after Prince Roman the Great showed how they hunt for enemies UAV

Title: Children's -excursions- with a military -coloring-: the Russians force children to visit military tr...
Description: This is reported by the Center of National Resistance. According to the Center of National Resistance, the occupiers organize -excursions- for high school students of captured schools to training grounds where UAV operators are trained. Children are taught to fly drones, while glorifying the Russian occupiers and advocating for them to enter Russian military schools. It is important to note that these -excursions- are compulsory and are organized by order of the so-called -education- department. The presence of schoolchildren at such events is mandatory. The fact that the tours are taking place during the occupation exercises is especially cynical. In this way, children are exposed to danger, because the enemy hides his soldiers behind their backs. The Center for National Resistance calls for information on enemy actions and deployment of forces in the region. As reported by ArmyInform, a new wave of Russian propaganda directed against Ukrainian children in temporarily occupied territories. The Kremlin initiated the involvement of war criminals in the educational process, obliging them to -take charge- of schoolchildren.

Title: Beat the occupiers until they catch fire - our drones shoot down Russian attack aircraft
Description: The video was released on February 26 on the brigade's channel. Enemy stormtroopers, having heard the approach of our drones, tried to hide, but accurate drops found them in bushes and hiding places made of branches. -Despite the snow and frost, we have a real arson here - the arson of the occupying bastards,- the brigade commented on the video. As reported by ArmyInform, in the 38th marine infantry brigade told about the training of recruits and the benefits of service.

Title: -Railway saboteurs-: three FSB accomplices who tried to disrupt the movement of trains in Ukraine we...
Description: informs the SBU about this. Saboteurs operated in Kyiv and Dnipropetrovsk regions. They used home-made incendiary mixtures, made according to instructions from the FSB. One of the members of the group of arsonists, which the SBU exposed back in December 2024, was detained in Kyiv region. Then the 21-year-old criminal hid from justice, and later, after receiving a new order from the FSB, set fire to two relay cabinets near the capital. Two criminals were detained in Dnipropetrovsk region. One of them is a 20-year-old recidivist who previously served a sentence for theft. Earlier this year, he set fire to two relay cabinets. Another is a 16-year-old local college student who was arrested while trying to set fire to a relay box at a railroad crossing near Kamianskyi. It is noted that one of his next tasks was to organize the derailment of a freight train with military equipment for the Armed Forces. During the searches, physical evidence of their criminal activities was seized from the detainees: clothes with traces of fuel and lubricants, means of arson, and mobile phones with evidence of communication with Russian special services. Currently, all three detainees have been notified of suspicion of sabotage under martial law (Part 2, Article 113 of the Criminal Code of Ukraine). They face life imprisonment with confiscation of property. Investigations are ongoing. Other possible members of the sabotage group and their supervisors from the Russian special services are being identified. As reported by ArmyInform, the Security Serviceneutralized the FSB agent group, which on behalf of the Russian Federation was spying in Kyiv, Kharkiv and Lviv regions. The attackers adjusted the missile attacks of the Rashists on the locations of the Defense Forces.

Title: -Dill-, -Tourist- and -Malyy-: how a mobile anti-aircraft group destroyed about 20 enemy UAVs
Description: The story of the fighters was made public on the page of the Eastern Air Command. -Immediately after completing a combat mission, we start preparing for the next one: we clean the weapons, check the readiness of pickups and search complexes. No one knows how quickly they will have to move and -catch- the next enemy drone,- says Kropa, the senior crew member of the mobile fire group. Before the war, Oleksandr worked as a service station manager, but from the first days of the full-scale Russian invasion of Ukraine, he mobilized and stood up for the defense of the Motherland. His wife Anastasia is also doing military service in their unit. Artem -Tourist- said that he has been in the army for more than 3 years, because his father is also a military man. -My dad is a military man. After graduating from school, reaching the draft age, he signed a contract with the military unit. I am proud of my father, he has been assigned to the rifle brigade of the Air Force for more than half a year and performs tasks as part of infantry units,- Artem shared. Andriy -Maly- said that in 2014 the Russians occupied his hometown, so he and his family were forced to leave their home. -When the war started, on the morning of February 25, 2022, he went to the local TCC, and was assigned to one of the divisions of the anti-aircraft missile regiment,- Andrii said. Kropa emphasizes the importance of professionalism for their group, so they are constantly improving their skills and training new crews. -Each downed enemy target is a frantic release of adrenaline, we understand that this -bomb- did not reach its goal, but there is another side of the job: we worry when the shot down -Shakhed- continues to move along the trajectory, and the warhead did not explode immediately,- adds Oleksandr. For the successful completion of tasks, each member of the crew of the mobile group -Kropy- was awarded the -Cross of Valor- and -For Exemplary Service- awards of the Minister of Defense of Ukraine. -Since the beginning of 2025, we already have confirmed downed Shaheds.- We don't stop! We are here for Victory!- - declare the fighters. As reported by ArmyInform, Serhiy with the call sign -Forest- is a soldier of the 61st separate mechanized Steppe brigade, who during the battles in Donetsk region saved brothers who were surrounded in the village of Orlivka.

Title: In Ternopil Oblast, a group went to trial, which produced 20 evaders
Description: This was reported on February 26 by the Special Prosecutor's Office of the Western Region. The defendants first created artificial obstacles in obtaining documents for conscripts who had a legal right to deferment, mobilized them, and then released them from conscription for military service for money. The price of -resolving the issue- ranged from 1 to 15 thousand US dollars. 20 episodes of illegal activity of the specified persons have been documented. ArmyInform reminds that it is better not to break the law or risk your life, but to use the aggregator of vacancies in the Armed Forces and recruiting centers.

Title: Enemy attack aircraft from the sides, rockets and -cassettes- from the sky - video of the reflection...
Description: The video of combat work was released on February 26 on the brigade's channel. Under enemy fire from both sides, our fighters maintained a circular defense. Enemy drones hovered over the dugout, and metal and earth fell on their heads. But the fighters did not retreat and repulsed the enemy. As reported by ArmyInform, targeted damage of Russian equipment was carried out by operators of the Fatum unit of the anti-tank battalion of the 3rd assault brigade.

Title: Enemy anti-aircraft guns attacked Kostyantynivka, at least five people were killed
Description: informs the head of Donetsk OVA Vadym Filashkin about this. It is noted that the Russians dropped three guided aerial bombs on the city and its surroundings. -Recently, Russian attacks on civilians in Kostyantynivka have become more frequent and harsher. It's dangerous to stay in the city!- - emphasized Vadym Filashkin. Title: Swallow in the sky: the story of a UAV operator who dreams of being at the helm of an airplane
Description: The defender's story was made public on the brigade's page. Love for the sky is in her blood: her great-grandfather was a military pilot. But instead of the plane's cockpit, there is a drone operator's control panel, which helps to detect enemy equipment and the positions of the occupiers. -When I understand that the targets have been found and the enemy will be justly repaid for cruelty, I am really happy,- says Anastasia. Before the war, she was educated as a programmer, but found her vocation in the army. He works side by side with his brothers every day to ensure that the Ukrainian sky is safe. She is constantly learning, improving her skills, because she is surrounded by real Cossacks, motivated and experienced warriors. -I try not to fall behind,- adds Anastasia. But the most difficult thing is to see the consequences of the shelling of peaceful cities. After one of the strikes on Kostyantynivka, she saved several kittens and found them new homes. She kept one thing for herself - a furry friend helps to overcome stress. It's not easy to be strong, but you can't back down. And, as Lesya Ukrainka said: -There is no turning back for us! Let's go to work better, compete for a new life!- As reported by ArmyInform, Roman Poltavets , a soldier of the 92nd separate assault brigade named after the basket chieftain Ivan Sirk, won a bronze medal at the Games Invincibles 2025 held in Vancouver, Canada. He competed in sitting volleyball.

Title: The number of dead as a result of the night attack of the Russian Federation increased in the Kyiv r...

The number of damaged houses in Buchanskyi district also increased: In Fastivskyi district, garages and two cars were also damaged. Operational groups continue to work on fixing and eliminating the consequences of the enemy's night attack. We will remind, in another settlement of this district, a girl born in 2005 received an injury to the back of her head. In the hospital, she was given all the necessary medical care. Currently undergoing outpatient treatment. A man born in 1981 received a wound on his right hand from a fragment of glass.

Title: Countermeasures to KABs: Ukrainian developers were invited to the NATO Innovation Challenge for the ...
Description: This was reported by the Ministry of Defense of Ukraine on February 26. The NATO Innovation Challenge is a hackathon organized by the NATO Innovation Hub (NATO's Joint Command for Transformation) and the Allies. It is noted that the competition provides an opportunity for scientific associations, individual innovators or startups to prove themselves and aims to expand NATO's cooperation with industry representatives. -Enemy anti-aircraft missiles are one of the biggest threats to the Ukrainian military on the front lines and Ukrainian cities. It is important that this topic is key for the next NATO hackathon. This proves that we are in the same security context as the Alliance,- noted Deputy Defense Minister Valery Churkin. Previously, only representatives of NATO member states could participate in the NATO Innovation Challenge. This year, representatives of Ukraine were allowed to participate. -The event will take place on March 27, 2025 in the city of Bydgoszcz (Poland), and you can also join it online. This year's theme is Countering Guided Aerial Bombs (CBMs). You can submit your applications until March 13. The application for participation in the hackathon must meet certain criteria, which can be found on the website of the event,- the message says. The main thing is that the proposed solution should be relevant to the problem, innovative and realistic. It will be evaluated according to the judging criteria: -Ukraine has long been faced with the problem of countering enemy anti-aircraft missiles at the front, which remains relevant to this day, despite some invented solutions. We invite Ukrainian inventors, innovators, scientists and a representative of the defense industry to participate in NATO hackathons,- the MOU urged. You can register using the link. As reported by ArmyInform, under the Ministry of Defense of Ukraine the state enterprise -Digital Army- was created, which is responsible for sustainable strategic development digital capabilities of the Defense Forces of Ukraine.

Title: -Sown with the corpses of the occupiers- - enemy infantrymen are afraid to cross the canal in Chasov...

From time to time, in such weather, the enemy tries to break through with a large number of equipment. However, both the equipment and infantry of the occupiers are in decline. -They suffer huge losses here, but they don't pay attention to it. Every day, reserve forces replenish losses, and then storm. The captured occupiers say that crossing the Siverskyi Donets-Donbas channel is the most terrifying thing for them. Because there the canal is literally littered with corpses of the Russian occupiers, which are not taken away. They have been lying there for a year,- said the representative of the press service of the 24th OMBr. As ArmyInform reported, the enemy has been conducting massive mechanized assaults in the Novopavlovsk direction along the entire defense line for several weeks. Attracted a total of about 40 pieces of equipment, most of which were destroyed by joint efforts.

Title: The military saved more than 15 million hryvnias during the two months of operation of the Plyusy pr...

Title: Oleksandr Syrskyi and Anthony Radakin discussed the situation at the front and Ukrainian-British coo...
Description: This is stated in a message on Facebook page of the Commander-in-Chief. -He personally thanked the admiral, and also conveyed his words of deep gratitude to the government and the entire British people for consistent support of our country in the struggle for independence and military assistance to the Defense Forces of Ukraine,- said Oleksandr Syrskyi. He noted the recently announced package of military aid to Ukraine in the amount of 150 million pounds, which included air defense systems, armored vehicles and artillery systems. -He shared an assessment of the situation in the areas of hostilities, as well as ways to strengthen and increase the effectiveness of the use of the Armed Forces of Ukraine. He discussed the needs of the Defense Forces of Ukraine in terms of weapons, military equipment, ammunition, material resources, as well as personnel training,- said Oleksandr Syrskyi. Oleksandr Syrskyi and Anthony Radakin jointly assessed the possibilities of developing Ukrainian-British military cooperation for the protection of Ukraine and strengthening the security of Europe. “I received confirmation from the Chief of the Defense Staff of the United Kingdom that the British side is ready to continue supporting the independence and territorial integrity of Ukraine. Admiral Sir Anthony Radakin once again assured me of the readiness of the United Kingdom to provide military assistance to the Defense Forces of Ukraine. In this difficult time, loyal partners and allies remain with us in the struggle for the freedom and independence of Ukraine, including Great Britain,- concluded Oleksandr Syrskyi.

Title: No secrets: military engineers shared an analysis of the guts of the downed Russian UAV SuperCam
Description: It should be noted right away that the equipment of the spy drone, which was -under autopsy-, did not impress Ukrainian specialists in the field of flying unmanned systems with any unique innovations. Ukrainian soldiers have repeatedly shot down similar enemy aerial scouts in different areas of the front, as our editorial office reported. As for the studied example of -enemy electronic eyes in the sky-, among the optional -suspensions- with which the enemy equipped this UAV were two cameras with different extensions. One is very simple, like primitive FPV drones. The other is more complicated. And as the research engineer noted in a comment during the analysis of that device, this optical device, although it came into his hands somewhat damaged, interested him and was quite suitable for further study. As for the electronic components, inside the -SuperKam- body, according to the Ukrainian researcher, the Russian assemblers placed a computing unit, which was connected by a separate wire loop to the common board. In addition, a video signal transmission unit was installed there via radio channels. The built-in standard antenna was responsible for communication with the base station. Also, the circuit of the electronic equipment of the enemy air spy was supplemented with a video transmitter module, to which a connector for data exchange was connected. Another conclusion from the research published by our military specialists can be the fact that all the component blocks of the downed UAV were marked with stickers with inscriptions in Russian. However, as repeatedly researchers of enemy electronic devices told, the enterprises of terrorist countries were never able to fully establish the production of high-tech components, such as the same chips, and try their best to purchase them through -gray- schemes both in Asian countries and through intermediaries from well-known Western manufacturers. It should be recalled that the manufacturer of SuperCam drones is the Russian company -Unmanned Systems- from Izhevsk. Specialists of the Main Directorate of Intelligence of the Ministry of Defense of Ukraine identified four subspecies from the family of these reconnaissance drones.

Title: Three people were detained who, on the order of the Russian Federation, adjusted missile strikes in ...
Description: This was informed in the SBU. According to the results of the special operation, three Russian agents were detained, who were preparing coordinates for fire damage to Ukrainian objects. The enemy's priority targets were military airfields, reserve command posts and training centers of Ukrainian defenders, as well as factories for repairing armored vehicles and UAVs. To carry out the enemy's task, the FSB remotely recruited local unemployed people aged 23, 34 and 40 who were looking for -quick earnings- on Telegram channels. All of them were spread over three regions of Ukraine, but had a common Russian curator - a staff member of the FSB's Black Sea Fleet. Cyber ​​specialists of the SBU have already established his identity. Thus, one of the agents was -seconded- to Lviv by a Russian special service agent. To gather intelligence, the traitor got a job as a freight forwarder at a local construction company that performed contracts for military units. Another figure is a resident of Kyiv region, who traveled around the region, where he tried to identify the main and operational airfields with combat aircraft of the Armed Forces of Ukraine. Another traitor is a resident of Kharkiv, who monitored the places of the largest concentration of personnel and military equipment of the Defense Forces in the front-line city. He also -darkly- asked his acquaintances about local enterprises that restore the combat characteristics of Ukrainian military equipment. All three agents were promptly exposed by security services, documented their crimes, and caught red-handed while each was conducting reconnaissance near potential targets. Mobile phones with anonymous chats in the messenger, which they used to communicate with the FSB, were seized from the detainees. The SBU investigators informed them about the suspicion under part. 2 Art. 111 of the Criminal Code of Ukraine (treason committed under martial law). The perpetrators are in custody. They face life imprisonment with confiscation of property.

Title: Rustem Umerov: We have not come to terms with the occupation. We are fighting on the front lines, in...
Description: The statement published on the minister's Facebook page. Rustem Umyerov recalled that 11 years ago, on February 26, 2014, Crimean Tatars and Ukrainians in Simferopol held a large-scale rally in support of the territorial integrity of Ukraine. On these dates, 11 years ago, Russia began aggression, a war against Ukraine — with the temporary occupation of Crimea. -The Kremlin challenged not only Ukraine, but also the whole world, turning Crimea into a military base and endangering the security of the entire Black Sea. But our resistance also began 11 years ago. Ukrainians and Crimean Tatars were the first to defend their land, initially through non-violent resistance,- he said. The minister emphasized that all these 11 years the Kremlin has been persecuting and throwing behind bars everyone who does not agree with the occupation - Crimean Tatars, Ukrainian activists, journalists. As a result, today 221 citizens of Ukraine, political prisoners, are illegally detained in Russian prisons. 134 of them are Crimean Tatars. Political prisoners of Crimea are tortured, tried on fabricated cases and kept in terrible conditions. But neither repressions nor prisons could break their will — they remain symbols of Crimea's indomitability. -We have not come to terms with the occupation. We are fighting on the front lines, in the rear and in Crimea itself. Ukraine remembers each of its citizens who remained on the peninsula, and is doing everything possible to liberate them from the new -prison of nations,- Rustem Umyerov emphasized. The Minister of Defense of Ukraine added that the only language the aggressor understands is the language of force. Ukraine has changed the balance of power in the Black Sea: our long-range missiles and naval drones destroy the military potential of the occupiers in Crimea every day, and dozens of enemy ships are already lying on the bottom, including the flagship cruiser -Moskva-. -Crimea, my home, is Ukraine! We will return him home,- said Rustem Umyerov.

Title: The tank drove through the forest - our drones hit an enemy armored vehicle in the Kharkiv region
Description: The video of the combat operation was released on February 26 on the brigade's channel. After the defeat, the enemy tank tried to hide in the forest, but did not escape far. -Bah - and there is no Russian tank. In the new video recording of the combat operation, the Charters also reach enemy shelters and infantrymen who are trying to escape from our drones by any means possible. Of course, they can't do anything,- the team commented on the video. As reported by ArmyInform, soldiers of the 13th Brigade of the National Guard of Ukraine -Charter- continue to destroy the enemy on Kharkiv region. This time, two Russian howitzers were under the drones' sights, which were successfully destroyed.

Title: The Day of Resistance in our Crimea is a day of respect for honesty, for Ukraine: the President
Description: The text of the appeal was published on February 26. -Today is the day of courage and honesty of all those who did not close their eyes to Russia's occupation of our Crimea. These days, 11 years ago, the Russian aggression against Ukraine began - precisely with the illegal, vile seizure of Crimea. But the day of February 26 showed that there will be opposition — opposition to Crimea, opposition to all of Ukraine. This day showed that there are and will be people who will not accept lies and will not surrender their home. The following years after the occupation of Crimea brought a lot of grief and cynicism. Many people in the world did not want to understand what was really happening,- Volodymyr Zelenskyy wrote. According to him, Ukraine managed to return the issue of the liberation of Crimea to the world agenda. -We founded the Crimean platform. We do not give Russia the opportunity to -normalize- the occupation. We are freeing Crimean prisoners. We continue the struggle for the right to a normal life and guarantees of security and stable peace for all of Ukraine. Territorial integrity, sovereignty and security of Ukraine are not and will not be the subject of any compromises. The Day of Resistance in our Crimea is a day of respect for honesty, for Ukraine. And I thank everyone who supports!- - said the President. As ArmiyaInform reported, the Presidents of Ukraine and France discussed the next steps to achieve guaranteed peace.

Title: In Ukraine, military-technological sports were officially recognized
Description: This is stated in the message of the Government portal. Military-technological sports unite competitions in four directions: air, land, water and cyberspace. Participants will compete in the control of drones and ground robotic complexes in the following disciplines: racing, interception, reconnaissance, remote destruction, combined missions. Currently, the Federation of Military-Technological Sports of Ukraine is already working, which will develop this sport. Young engineers, programmers, drone operators and analysts will be able to develop their skills in a sports environment. Students of technical specialties will get practical experience of working with innovative technologies. Military-tech sports also open up opportunities for veterans to use their skills in a new way — to teach youth, compete and test innovations. The official status will facilitate the organization of the system of competitions at all levels, in particular, the holding of the first international ones (with the support of state authorities and local governments). It is also planned to integrate this sport into the curricula of technical universities and military educational institutions. Ukraine has unique experience and aspires to become a world leader in military-technological sports. Ahead is the creation of professional leagues, international tournaments and the involvement of partners for the development of the sport.

Title: He was captured and went to serve the enemy - the soldier was informed of the suspicion
Description: This was reported by the Special Prosecutor's Office of the Eastern Region on February 26. The investigation established that in March 2023, a 22-year-old soldier of one of the combat brigades was captured during active hostilities in the Luhansk region. While in the temporarily occupied territory, he received from representatives of the special services of the aggressor state an offer to join the illegal armed formation -Volunteer detachment named after Maksym Krivonos-. Instead of waiting to return home, the suspect voluntarily agreed to cooperate with the enemy and expressed his desire to fight on their side. The investigation is ongoing. As reported by ArmyInform, an FSB agent received 15 years in prison for treason in Donetsk region.

Title: Throwing -tablets- and -Nivam- - in Donetsk region, paratroopers destroyed an enemy convoy
Description: This was told on the air of the telethon -Edyny Novyny-, the head of the communications department of the 46th separate airmobile brigade Oleksandr Nevidimy. According to him, the enemy continues to carry out assaults in small and foot groups of 4-6 people. However, all such attacks end very quickly. No significant changes occurred directly in the area of ​​responsibility of the 46th separate air mobile brigade. -The night before last, the enemy involved six -tabletka- and -Niva- type vehicles in the attack. They were discovered in time and some were destroyed. Unfortunately, part of it rolled back,- said the head of the communications department of the 46th separate airmobile brigade. As ArmyInform reported, in the Seversky direction, in the area of ​​responsibility of the 10th mountain assault brigade, defensive battles are ongoing. The enemy's attacks do not stop. But without result.

Title: The front was confused with the Arbat - our drones struck a strange occupier
Description: The video of the defeat of the weirdo was released on February 26 on the brigade's channel. The pilots of the 55th battalion of the 63rd mechanized brigade found and eliminated another Katsapa weirdo. -This unique animal seems to have been looking for water among the scattered garbage. But the way he did it is impressive. Moskal calmly walks on the ground, as if on the Arbat, in an open area, during the day, hands in pockets, no armor, no weapons. It seems that this year's winner of the Darwin Award is already known,- the team commented on the video. As reported by ArmyInform, the operators of the unmanned systems battalion of the 63rd mechanized brigade destroyed 13 Russian attack aircraft.

Title: -A painful direction for them- — near Siversk, the Defense Forces are holding a line
Description: Stepan Barna, the commander of the Barney unmanned systems unit of the 10th motorized infantry battalion of the Edelweiss mountain assault brigade, told about this on the Espresso broadcast. According to him, the enemy is losing a lot in this direction. In return, he receives little. The -Edelweiss- brigade has already been in this direction for more than two and a half years. And during this time, she actually moved only five kilometers. -You have to hold the line here. And so we hold the line. This, of course, is a painful direction for them. That is why the assault actions, which are stopped by the fighters of the Defense Forces, which are working effectively enough, do not stop here,- Stepan Barna said. As reported by ArmyInform, the enemy is trying to storm continuously in the Limansk direction. Small infantry groups try to break through the defense, because it is problematic to fight in the direction with equipment.

Title: Some fell, others ran away - how our wounded paratroopers gave battle to the invaders
Description: A video about this story was released on February 26 on the brigade's channel. Despite the constant shelling and injuries, our soldiers courageously held the defense, despite the difficult conditions and the constant pressure of the enemy. Their story is an example of indomitable spirit, brotherhood and devotion to their country. As reported by ArmyInform, the drones of the Naddnipryanskyh paratroopers hand over to the occupiers -warm greetings-.

Title: -Everything I knew was lost- — an 18-year-old Russian prisoner regrets that he went to fight in Ukra...
Description: The video of the conversation with the occupier was released on February 26 on the brigade's channel. Title: Security situation and urgent needs: Serhii Boev held talks with the Assistant Secretary General of ...
Description: This was notified in the Ministry of Education. The main topic of conversation is security threats that remain relevant: Russia continues hostilities, builds up its military capabilities, mobilizes and prepares reinforcements for units, and continues missile and drone terror. -Our main focus remains on providing for the Ukrainian army. If we stop and aid stops, the whole of Europe will be at risk. Therefore, the security of the continent depends on us and our partners,- said Serhii Boev. The deputy minister noted that European countries should increase funding for the defense sector and develop their own defense complexes in order to counter existing threats. He also emphasized that NATO membership is important for Ukraine and is the best security guarantee. Serhiy Boev also mentioned the coalition of capabilities as an effective tool for meeting the urgent needs of the Security and Defense Forces and building the future capabilities of the Security and Defense Forces of Ukraine.

Title: The presidents of Ukraine and France discussed the next steps to achieve a guaranteed peace
Description: This was reported by the Office of the President. Emmanuel Macron informed about his visit to the United States of America and meeting with the US President Donald Trump. Volodymyr Zelenskyy shared the details of the meeting with the leaders of the Northern European and Baltic countries in Kyiv on February 24, during which, in particular, clear security guarantees were discussed. The presidents of Ukraine and France discussed in detail the next steps and plans for developing a common position and coordination with all partners in Europe. The leaders also agreed on further contacts in various formats. -The head of the Ukrainian state thanked for all the help and support. -Ukraine will always remember how much France does for our common future,- said the OP's message. On February 26, EU leaders will listen to Emmanuel Macron's report on his negotiations with Donald Trump via video conference. British Prime Minister Keir Starmer will also go to Washington this week. The day before, Donald Trump also said that Volodymyr Zelenskyi may come to the United States on February 28.

Title: Blind the enemy - our drones massacred Russian antennas
Description: The video of combat work was released on February 26 on the regiment's channel. -Saturation of the front with unmanned systems continues. The occupiers use ground-based drones, which we successfully destroy along with communication systems and surveillance cameras. FPVs line up to hit the next target, often attacking several at once. The fight does not stop! Fly with us!- - called on -Rarog-, which is recruiting for its ranks. As reported by ArmyInform, the Russian T-80 -Gorynych- tank with the inscription -For the boys- on the barrel was destroyed by FPV drones of 427 separate regiment of unmanned systems -Rarog-.

Title: - In ecological terms, this is a disaster - in the Lyman direction, the occupiers are burning the la...
Description: About this on the air of -Suspilne.Novyny- told the company commander of the strike unmanned aviation complexes of the unmanned systems battalion 115 of the separate mechanized brigade Yevhen with the call sign -Advocate-. According to him, the enemy does not move forward in mechanized columns, because it is ineffective - the battles take place in the forest area. Although the forest has been turned into a forest during the war, and from an ecological point of view, -Advokat- notes, it is simply a disaster - the occupiers are burning the land to the ground. -They do everything according to the textbook, according to the classics - art training, covering with drones, EW, so that our means could not get into the sky either. However, we try to bypass their means, carry out reconnaissance, fire adjustment and fire damage with the help of unmanned systems,- said the RuBPAK commander of the unmanned systems battalion 115 OMBr. As reported ArmyInform, in Kharkiv Oblast, in different areas where the Achilles regiment operates, the situation is of different degrees voltage To the north of Kharkiv, in the Lyptsi district, it is fully controlled. Heavy fighting near Kupyansk.

Title: Cheap, but dangerous - the enemy began to hit Sumy with new attack drones
Description: This was reported by the police of Sumy region. As a result of these blows, one person died, and three others were injured. The explosions damaged cars and residential buildings. The police gave the following description of the new model of Russian drones: - gray in color, similar to an airplane; — two wings are arranged in a -shelf-; — electric motor behind, pushing screw; — small size, inconspicuous, quiet in motion; — has a warhead weighing about 3 kg. The police are asking not to ignore the warning about the air alert and to stay in shelter. -Be careful - although these drones are almost silent, they can still be seen. If you see a suspicious object, notify the police immediately,- the police said in a statement. As reported by ArmyInform, invaders attacked in Sumy Oblast civilian car.

Title: The defense forces took control of the settlement of Kotlyne in the Pokrovsky direction
Description: The video of the combat operation was released on February 26 on the channel of the Airborne Assault Forces of the Armed Forces of Ukraine. Occupying this settlement would allow the occupiers to reach the Pokrovsk-Dnipro highway, so the enemy threw significant forces at its capture at the time. The Sicheslav paratroopers and related units did not allow the Russians to gain a foothold in Kotlynovo and knocked out the invaders beyond its borders. As reported by ArmyInform, fighters of the 25th Sicheslav Airborne Brigade using a drone captured 9 enemies.

Title: Air attack of the Russian Federation: the enemy launched 177 drones over Ukraine
Description: This was reported by the Air Force of the Ukrainian Armed Forces. As of 09:00, the downing of 110 Shahed-type attack UAVs and drones of other types was confirmed in the Kharkiv, Poltava, Sumy, Kyiv, Chernihiv, Cherkasy, Kirovohrad, Mykolaiv, Kherson and Dnipropetrovsk regions. 66 enemy imitator drones - lost in location (no ill effects). Kyiv region, Kharkiv region, Kirovohrad region and Sumy region were affected as a result of the enemy attack. The air attack was repulsed by aviation, anti-aircraft missile forces, electronic warfare units and mobile fire groups of the Air Force and the Defense Forces of Ukraine. As reported by ArmiyaInform, as a result of a night attack by Russian UAVs in the Kyiv region, one person was killed and two were injured.

Title: Death in the bushes - our drones organized a hunt for Russians--losers-
Description: The video of the combat work was released on February 26 on the brigade's channel. -The reconnaissance company of the 60th mechanized brigade mercilessly destroys the occupying infantry, which is trying to reach our positions in small groups. We observe deathbed monologues in some of the occupiers, and in others silent glances at the sky - this will not help them anymore. The only chance to survive is to get out of our land!- - commented on the video in the brigade. As reported by ArmyInform, in a striking incident recorded by aerial reconnaissance of the 60th separate mechanized Ingulets brigade, a Russian soldier tied his comrade to a tree right on the battlefield.

Title: -Cultural Landing Party- spoke at the NATO headquarters
Description: The Ministry of Foreign Affairs of Ukraine informed about this Musicians who, from the first days of the full-scale invasion, joined the ranks of the Defense Forces to defend their Motherland, performed in front of the participants of the event, leaving no one indifferent. They told personal stories about the experience of war and struggle, inspiring everyone present with the strength of their spirit. Deputy Secretary General of NATO Radmila Shekerynska also spoke before the permanent representatives of the member states of the Alliance, representatives of the International Secretariat, the NATO Military Headquarters and partners. In addition, the -Timeline Of War- exhibition was opened at the headquarters. The photos presented in the exhibition became a vivid reflection of the heroic resistance of Ukrainians during the full-scale war unleashed by the Russian Federation, the war crimes of Russia, the consequences of its brutal attacks against Ukrainian cities and the resistance of Ukrainians. The NATO Headquarters also hosted a meeting of the Chairman of the NATO Military Committee, Admiral Giuseppe Cavo Dragone, with Ukrainian veterans, notified NATO Representation in Ukraine. -Their strength, their resilience, their unwavering belief in victory is amazing. Today, three years later, their struggle concerns not only Ukraine – it concerns all of us who believe in freedom,- said Giuseppe Cavo Dragone.

Title: A moment of silence in Ukraine
Description: -In order to honor the bright memory, civic courage and self-sacrifice, strength of spirit, resilience and heroic deed of the soldiers who fell during the execution of combat missions to protect the state sovereignty and territorial integrity of Ukraine, civilians who died as a result of the armed aggression of the Russian Federation against Ukraine, I decree: to start holding a national minute of silence every day at 9:00 a.m. for compatriots who died as a result of the armed aggression of the Russian Federation against Ukraine, which should be announced in all mass media, regardless of the form of ownership,- the document says.

Title: One against six - our warrior single-handedly captured a group of invaders
Description: The video of the feat was released on February 26 on the battalion channel. Our fighter approached the shelter of the Russians and threw a couple of grenades there. This convinced the invaders to surrender. They climbed to the surface without weapons. They must have been very surprised to see that our fighter was alone. But they could not change anything. As reported by ArmyInform, mortars of the 4th battalion of the -Freedom Force- of the 4th brigade of the operational -Rubizh- units of the National Guard demonstrated phenomenal accuracy of their fire.

Title: In Kharkiv, Russian drone debris damaged houses, a university, and an opera house
Description: This was reported by the head of Kharkiv OVA Oleg Synegubov. Glazing of an apartment building, a university building, an opera house, and a cafe were damaged due to the impact of Geran UAV debris on the roadway. There are no casualties. Debris of another Geran UAV hit a 9-story multi-apartment building, a fire broke out in an apartment on the 2nd floor, partially damaged the wall and glazing of the building. Two people were injured and had an acute reaction to stress. 5 more people were saved. The glazing of another multi-apartment residential building, the cafe building and the contact network of the trolleybus were also damaged. No casualties. As ArmiyaInform reported, as a result of a night attack by Russian UAVs in the Kyiv region one person died and two were injured.

Title: The enemy took the missile carriers from the Ukrainian seas
Description: as of 06:00 on February 26 the Naval Forces of the Ukrainian Armed Forces reported this. There are 4 enemy ships in the Mediterranean Sea, 3 of which are carriers of -Caliber- cruise missiles with a total firing of up to 26 missiles. During the day, in the interests of the Russian Federation, passage through the Kerch Strait was carried out: to the Black Sea - 0 ships; to the Sea of ​​Azov - 2 vessels that were moving from the Bosphorus Strait. Russia continues to violate the International Convention for the Protection of Life at Sea of ​​1974. (SOLAS) by disabling automatic identification systems. As reported by ArmyInform, the 38th brigade of marines told about the training of recruits and the benefits of service.

Title: -Contract 18-24-: in the 28th brigade, they talked about popular specialties and the training of rec...
Description: This was reported by the head of the recruiting department of the 28th brigade, Denys Shvydky, in a comment to ArmiyaInform. According to him, the flow of applications has increased significantly over the past week, because more and more people are learning about the benefits of the new project. -We are approached by both boys and girls, but most of the candidates are boys aged 18-20 who choose assistant positions a grenade launcher and a grenade launcher,- he noted. Recruiters of -Knights- familiarize candidates with the conditions of service in detail, answering questions about the format of training, provision and level of qualifications of instructors. According to the head of the recruiting department, the instructors have significant combat experience and have undergone advanced training, in particular in NATO countries, and throughout the training the candidates are supported by qualified psychologists. The training is conducted according to a methodology that surpasses the standard -NATO- program, as the officers and instructors have real experience of participating in modern combat operations. On the basis of BZVP, interactive classes are organized, where candidates learn to work with heavy weapons and even train in the simulation of shooting down planes and destroying tanks with the help of large screens and special programs. How reported ArmyInform, within the framework of the -Contract 18-24- project, in 95 separate airborne and assault Polish brigades 250 applications from potential recruits. We remind you, -Contract 18-24- is a voluntary initiative that allows Ukrainians in the specified age category to join the Defense Forces for one year. The project offers a decent financial reward, professional combat training according to NATO standards and social guarantees that no civilian profession provides.

Title: At the front, there are almost 100 clashes per day, most of them in the Pokrovsky direction
Description: This is stated in operational information of the General Staff of the Armed Forces of Ukraine as of 08:00 on February 26. Ukrainians repelled six enemy assaults in the Vovchansk and Dvorichny districts in the Kharkiv direction. In the Kupian direction, there were five attacks by invaders during the day. Defense forces repelled enemy assaults near Petropavlivka and Zagryzovy. The enemy attacked nine times in the Lyman direction. Tried to wedge into our defense near Nadia, Novolyubivka, Zelena Dolyna, Torsky and Yampolivka. In the Siversky direction, the enemy carried out seven offensive actions in the areas of Bilogorivka, Ivano-Daryivka, and Verkhnyokamyanskyi. In the Kramatorsk direction, the occupiers attacked once in the area of ​​Chasovoy Yar. In the Toretsk direction, the enemy launched seven attacks in the Toretsk and Krymsky areas. In the Pokrovsky direction, our defenders stopped 25 assaults by the aggressor in the areas of Promin, Tarasivka, Kotlyna, Pishchane, Nadiivka, Preobrazhenka and Andriivka settlements. In the Novopavlovsk direction, the Defense Forces repelled 11 Russian attacks. The occupiers most actively tried to advance in the areas of Kostiantynopil, Novoocheretuvate and Burlatske settlements. Five attempts by the enemy to advance in the areas of Maly Shcherbaki, Kamiansky and in the direction of Novoandriivka were repulsed by the Defense Forces in the Orikhov direction. Once, the enemy unsuccessfully attacked the positions of our troops in the Dnieper direction. The enemy did not carry out offensive operations in the Gulyajpilsk direction last day. Defense forces of Ukraine continue the operation in Kursk region. Over the past day, the Russian invaders carried out 16 airstrikes, dropped 26 anti-aircraft missiles, and launched 469 artillery strikes. Ukrainian defenders repelled 16 assaults by invaders. No signs of the formation of enemy offensive groups were detected in the Volyn and Poliske directions. Our soldiers inflict significant losses in manpower and equipment on the occupying forces and actively undermine the offensive potential of the enemy in the rear. In general, the Russian invaders lost 1170 people last day. Ukrainian soldiers also destroyed 19 tanks, 15 armored combat vehicles, 34 artillery systems, two air defense systems, 194 UAVs and 120 vehicles of the occupiers.

Title: Night attack of Russian UAVs in the Kyiv region: there is a dead and wounded
Description: This was reported by the Kyiv Regional Military Administration. The body of a dead person was discovered during the liquidation of a fire in a two-story private house in Buchansk district. The fire was extinguished on an area of ​​200 square meters. In another settlement of this district, a girl born in 2005 with a wound in the occipital region of the head was hospitalized in a local hospital. A man born in 1981 received a wound on his right hand. Not hospitalized. All the necessary medical assistance was provided to both victims. According to preliminary information, five private houses, glazing of apartments in four multi-storey residential buildings, two garages, three cars were destroyed and 8 were damaged as a result of the enemy attack in the Buchansk district. Operational groups continue to fix and eliminate the consequences of the enemy's night attack.

Title: Raid on a Humvee - our special forces destroyed the platoon and captured a prisoner
Description: The video of the battle was released on February 26 on the channel of the Special Operations Forces of the Armed Forces of Ukraine. Only one enemy soldier managed to save his life - the operators forced him to surrender. He gave valuable information about the enemy's stockpiles and ammunition depots - these arsenals were destroyed on the same day. When the enemy's infantry occupied the industrial complex, the command of one of the detachments of the 3rd SSO regiment planned and sent sub-groups to carry out special actions at the object itself and around the perimeter of the industrial zone. Drone operators were the first to work. After drops and fpv strikes, the operators flew in at a rush in armored Humvees and cleared all the buildings. As reported by ArmyInform, soldiers of the 3rd Regiment of Special Operations Forces named after Prince Svyatoslav the Brave conducted a successful operation to clear a forest strip in Donetsk region.

Title: The enemy lost more than 1,100 soldiers and 19 tanks — General Staff of the Armed Forces
Description: The General Staff of the Armed Forces reported on the morning of February 26 about the losses of the enemy. The total combat losses of the enemy from 24.02.22 to 26.02.25 are approximately: As reported by ArmyInform, the enemy attacked 16 times in Kurshchyna.

Title: Another country has joined the Interflex program for the training of the Ukrainian military in Brita...
Description: About reported Ministry of Defense of the United Kingdom. In addition to Britain and Albania, Australia, New Zealand, Canada, Denmark, Norway, Sweden, Finland, the Netherlands, Estonia, Lithuania, Romania and Kosovo are involved in the training of the Ukrainian military. -The United Kingdom and partner states will continue to support Ukraine as long as necessary,- the British Ministry of Defense said in a post. As of November 2024, about 50,000 Ukrainian military personnel have been trained under the program. Britain has previously confirmed that it will continue the operation on its territory throughout 2025, regardless of whether the hot phase of the war ends. It should be noted that Ukrainian military personnel undergoing training in Great Britain receive clothing, personal protective equipment, hygiene products and many other necessary things In total, the list contains more than 60 items. ArmyInform has published a series of materials on the training of Ukrainian servicemen in Great Britain as part of the Interflex operation.

Title: The enemy attacked 16 times in Kurshchyna — the General Staff of the Armed Forces of Ukraine
Description: Operational information as of 22.00 on February 25 was published by the General Staff of the Armed Forces of Ukraine. The defense forces continue to courageously hold the defense of Ukraine. Ukrainians repulsed five enemy assaults in the Vovchansk and Dvorichny districts in the Kharkiv direction. In the Kupyansk direction, the enemy tried five times to dislodge our units from their occupied positions near Petropavlivka and Zagryzovy. Nine times the enemy attacked in the Lyman direction, trying to advance near Nadia, Novolyubivka, Zelena Dolyna, Torsky, and Yampolivka. Our defenders repelled all enemy attacks. In the Siversky direction, our soldiers successfully repelled six attacks in the areas of Bilogorivka, Ivano-Daryivka, and Verkhnokamyansky. One battle continues so far. In the Kramatorsk direction, the Defense Forces repelled one enemy attempt to advance near Chasovoy Yar. Kramatorsk suffered an airstrike. The enemy tried seven times to penetrate our defenses in the Toretsk direction in the Toretsk and Krymsky areas. Two clashes are still ongoing. Enemy aircraft attacked Toretsk and Kostyantynivka. The enemy is intensively attacking the Ukrainian defenders in the Pokrovsky direction. Here, during the day, the aggressor carried out 26 assault and offensive actions. The Russian occupiers are most active in the areas of Promin, Tarasivka, Kotlyne, Pishchane, Nadiivka, Preobrazhenka, and Andriivka settlements. According to preliminary estimates, Ukrainian soldiers neutralized 176 occupiers in this direction today, 85 of them irreversibly. Also, our defenders destroyed six tanks, 19 vehicles, three armored combat vehicles, a motorcycle and two satellite communication systems, besides significantly damaging a tank and a car of the invaders. In the direction of Novopavlivsk, our defenders repelled seven attacks in the areas of Kostiantynopil, Novoocheretuvate and Burlatske settlements. Three skirmishes continue. In the Orihiv direction, the enemy unsuccessfully tried to advance in the areas of Maly Shcherbaki, Kamiansky, and in the direction of Novoandriivka. Once, the invading troops tried to dislodge units of the Defense Forces from their occupied positions in the Dnieper direction. Sixteen combat clashes took place today in the Kursk direction. During the day, the enemy carried out 412 artillery attacks, including two from rocket salvo systems, carried out 16 air strikes, dropping 26 guided bombs. Since the beginning of the day, the enemy has not carried out offensive actions in the Gulyaipil direction. Today, we should celebrate the soldiers of the 44th separate artillery brigade named after Hetman Danylo Apostol and the 79th border detachment, who in extremely difficult conditions restrained the attacks of the overwhelming enemy forces, causing him irreparable losses. As reported by ArmyInform, the enemy launched 213 drones and seven missiles.

Title: Why it is profitable to create a joint European force: an expert's comment
Description: This opinion was expressed by a lawyer, a military officer of the Armed Forces of the Ukrainian Armed Forces, Oleksandr Musienko, answering the question of the ArmiyaInform correspondent about what positions Ukraine is currently in in the negotiation processes and what role is assigned to European partners in security issues. -As far as our negotiating positions are concerned, Ukraine's position is clear, understandable and well-founded, as emphasized by the Supreme Commander-in-Chief, the President of Ukraine. It consists in the fact that we need peace through force and that Putin can only be forced to do something by force. Voluntarily, there will be no agreements - only through force, and this is exactly what our Defense and Security Forces are proving on the battlefield, destroying Russian troops,- says Oleksandr Musienko. The second component of power that can bring about peace is security guarantees. -When Putin will understand that Ukraine is so strong that Russian troops have no chance to attack, then he will stop his aggressive actions.- Commenting on the role of Europe and the West on the current geopolitical map of the world, Musienko recalls the -very correct initiative- of the President of Ukraine to create a united army of Europe. -That idea, which was communicated in one way or another in European countries, but was not implemented, is now coming to life with new colors. Because Europe is actually in such a state of shock that the United States may reduce its military presence or withdraw from Europe altogether. And this means that, in fact, as of today, Europeans have a choice: either learn the Russian language (as the Secretary General of NATO said, because Russia will certainly take advantage of a weak developed Europe), or unite around Ukraine, creating a powerful united force of Europe. That's it for today's selection. And that's why Ukraine offers it,- says Oleksandr Musienko. He added that Europe is important in that it has financial and defense-industrial potential, etc. -And that's why she is able to actually mobilize. But for us here now, the fact that they realize this is fundamentally important. Because, in principle, by jointly creating the Joint Forces of Europe, we can actually become a powerful entity. Ukraine is already a subject, and Europe together can become one,- the interlocutor emphasized. Oleksandr Musienko emphasized that Europe, by investing more in the defense-industrial complex, can invest in the defense of Ukraine. -We can invest in the defense-industrial complex of Ukraine, jointly produce missiles, drones, jointly produce what we need for our common security. Thus, Europe will become a serious subject with which the whole world will be reckoned. Europeans, in principle, have this resource. This is what Ukraine is now calling for,- Oleksandr Musienko summarized. As ArmyInform wrote, recently President Volodymyr Zelensky stated that the military contingent in Ukraine can become the first platform for the creation of the future armed forces of Europe, which are in the sky, on water and on land, with the help of drones and artificial intelligence, will be able to respond in the event of an attack.

Title: Cheap, effective and effective: Israeli gunsmiths presented a portable system to counter kamikaze dr...
Description: According to the experts of the defense portal Breaking Defense, based on the statements of the authors of the product, the complex is designed to protect against threats posed by drones and can be used both on the ground and on various platforms, including manned and unmanned ground or sea-based vehicles, ArmyInform reports. At the heart of SMASH DOME's kinetic response is the SMASH Hopper, a lightweight remotely controlled fire station (LRCWS) equipped with an assault rifle and a ballistically calculated fire control system (FCS). Designed for high-precision engagement of unmanned aerial vehicles, regardless of their communication channels or models, the SMASH Hopper can be integrated with a command and control (C2) system for automatic detection and tracking of UAV targets. It provides operators with calculated ballistic solutions in real time and can use different types of weapons and munitions to kinetically intercept various UAV threats. SMASH Hopper can integrate with control systems such as ATAK to automatically detect, track and calculate trajectories. Complementing the SMASH Hopper, the SMASH DOME includes both active RF radar and passive optical surveillance systems to classify and track UAS targets. With a detection range of up to 1-2 km (depending on sensor type), these devices continuously transmit target data to SMARTSHOOTER's proprietary tracking system, providing real-time monitoring and readiness to intercept. SMASH DOME is intended for deployment on manned and unmanned vehicles and platforms, as well as for ground use along borders and at strategic sites. Michal Mohr, CEO of SMARTSHOOTER, said that the SMASH DOME, based on SMASH technology, offers a cost-effective and accurate solution to the growing threat of enemy drones disrupting critical areas and putting them at risk. -SMASH DOME's deep integration with existing command and control (C2) systems makes it a versatile asset that serves as both an autonomous defense system and an important 'insurance policy' for passive C-UAS solutions,- the entrepreneur added. -Minimizing the use of munitions and providing effective interception of both small UAVs and large drones, SMASH DOME exemplifies SMARTSHOOTER's commitment to protecting forces and critical infrastructure from emerging threats from the air,- MARTSHOOTER said. One of the advantages of Smash Dome, according to the developer, is the possibility of -manual control- of the complex. Through the fire control interface, operators can visually confirm targets and initiate intercepts with a simple command. According to the creators of this weapon, this approach minimizes collateral damage and increases the overall effectiveness of operations, especially in densely populated areas. What will be the cost of the new complex has not yet been announced. Meanwhile, the developer claims that this tool is one of the most advanced in terms of price-performance. SMASH DOME counter drone system. Video: SMARTSHOOTER

Title: -How to drive to Klishchiivka-, or -Lick it up, Moskalyka, you've already arrived-: incredible stori...
Description: Why did they come up with a motor on his FH-70 gun? But is it possible to destroy the enemy 2C7 -Peony- with a direct hit? The gunner told our correspondent about it. -I'm from Zhytomyr. I first entered the army in 2018. It was a training session: the training of a reserve tank brigade. That's where I actually started learning how to use artillery. And on February 25, 2022, I called the TCC and found out if there were vacancies in the 26th artillery brigade. They said there was. And in the evening I was already there. We are currently working on the FH-70. These are -trailers-, but they are motorized (155-mm towed self-propelled howitzer - ed.). I am the fire platoon leader. The FH-70 is a gun that was developed in the late 1960s and adopted for service in the 1970s by three countries: Great Britain, Germany and Italy. Its barrel is English, the breech part is German, the engine in this gun, so that it can drive itself into the firing position, is from Volkswagen. It is in service in many countries. Overall, the gun is pretty good. And the idea for the motor is this: so that it can move independently, at a low speed of up to 15-20 kilometers per hour. It's quite convenient. That is, he left, hitched to a tractor and drove on four wheels. It's the same way back: I unhooked it, she drove in by herself, spun around on the hood, got up as she should. And that's it. This is great. If our gun was still new, it would be possible to hit the target continuously from the second or third shot. And sometimes that's how it works for us. It also depends on the ammunition. Therefore, it is now possible to hit the target with about five or six shots. Currently, one of our tasks is counter-battery fighting. That is, when repelling an assault, we shoot at either enemy mortars or cannons. And earlier we worked on both equipment and tanks. But we have not seen this technique from the enemy for several months. As an exception, yesterday we fired at the enemy's RBU-6000 system when it moved to a position to open fire. This is a home-made marine-type MLRS. We missed a bit. If there had been a shot three seconds later, maybe, they would have been hit. There was literally a gap in front of her. But the main target for us right now is the infantry. There was more than one time when we hit and destroyed a landing party after knocking out BMD or BMP. First of all, it should be said that the team with which we cooperate gives us goals. It depends on the brigade, on its management style, who will adjust the fire: either us or them. As a rule, we help repulse assaults even at distant approaches, when personnel are accumulating and they are already starting to advance for an assault. As a rule, we see streams where our work is visible. And after each shooting, we conduct an analysis: how was the shooting, what was the shooting and how to improve it in the future? Maybe you need to change the detonator or something else. Each case has its own nuances that need to be taken into account. The -fattest- target we had was the 2S7 -Peony-. Direct hit. It was in the Bakhmut district. At that time, we did not work for infantry brigades, our brigade gave us targets. The only thing is that during that hit there was no detonation of the BC, because it (-Pion- - ed.) was probably empty. It was the year 2023. Also in the 23rd year, we started working with the 93rd brigade. We supported them when they repelled enemy assaults. According to Klishchiivka, it was. We still scared the enemy with tapes on the distant approaches, or we hit the assault groups directly. There were three to five to seven people in each. On the landings, they went to the dam, piled up there and then stormed. And somehow two such groups gathered in the landing. And I have already played two cassettes on them. And I was so lucky that I then hit this cluster with the tape. At least 10 Muscovites were there. But then two of them got up and ran away. I remember one more case. In the summer of last year, I was on duty, and we chased an enemy turtle tank (an informal name for Russian tanks with massive improvised superstructures - ed.) in the Klishchiivka area. We didn't hit then. But we chased him for about an hour at a time. Then something strange happened. I saw that the FPV drone hit that tank. But he drove on. Then he stopped near our M-113. Muscovites don't have one. I followed her, and another tank followed them, so I realized that it was ours. Because it was already on the channel. I didn't follow it further because there were no streams. And in the morning, I read on the Internet that the 22nd brigade captured an enemy tank in that place and captured the crew. It's a good thing I didn't hit that tank then. And his crew, by the way, stopped by our M-113 to ask how to get to Klishchiivka.

Title: -The shaman who sang in the wrong place-: the SBU in absentia handed suspicion to the Kremlin singer...
Description: The SBU informs about this. According to the case materials, this performer with a light heart and a heavy repertoire long ago turned into a media weapon of the aggressor country. He systematically participates in activities that support the Putin regime and occupation forces, and also openly justifies the Russian Federation's full-scale war against Ukraine. Among the most famous -hits- of the propagandist is a video message recorded in 2022, in which he glorifies the Russian invaders and calls for support for their aggression. And already in February 2023, Dronov toured the temporarily occupied territory of the left-bank Kherson region, performing his compositions at the request of Kremlin curators. A linguistic examination initiated by the Security Service of Ukraine confirmed that Shaman is not just a singer, but a full-fledged element of Russian information and subversive activities. Taking into account the collected evidence, the investigators informed him in absentia about the suspicion under part. 3 Art. 436-2 of the Criminal Code of Ukraine — denial of temporary occupation, justification of armed aggression and glorification of the Russian military, carried out repeatedly and with the use of mass media. The official status of a suspect in crimes against national security is, perhaps, the most serious -reward- in Dronov's career, which he will definitely not be able to receive personally. Currently, comprehensive measures are underway to bring him to justice, and the investigation is being conducted under the procedural guidance of the Prosecutor General's Office. It is obvious that -Shaman- miscalculated with the repertoire, because even the most fervently performed odes to the Kremlin regime are not exempt from responsibility. Now he will have to face the consequences of his -creativity-, even if in absentia. As reported by ArmyInform, the Russian actor Dmytro Pevtsov, known for his role in the series -Banditsky Petersburg-, has now played the main role in a new production - Ukrainian court verdict. The Security Service of Ukraine gathered enough evidence for Pevtsov to receive 10 years in prison in absentia for war propaganda and calls for the seizure of Ukrainian territories.

Title: Who went to the border - they are all already -200- - GUR-interception
Description: The conversation was made public on February 25 by the Main Intelligence Directorate of the Ministry of Defense of Ukraine. -A whole day of sympathy again. The boy had to go to demobilization. I signed a contract in November, and today they called and said that's it, there's no more boyfriend, 19 years old […] Newbies, these are -autumn people-, they are told to sign.
