Title: Enemy anti-aircraft guns attacked Kharkiv region: almost half a hundred houses were damaged, people ...
Description: The Kharkiv Regional Prosecutor's Office informs about this. About 50 private and apartment buildings, commercial buildings, cars, and a power plant were damaged. Two women aged 48 and 78 received multiple cuts on their bodies. The injured were taken to the hospital. -Under the procedural leadership of the Bogodukhiv district prosecutor's office of the Kharkiv region, a pre-trial investigation into the commission of a war crime (Part 1 of Article 438 of the Criminal Code of Ukraine) has been initiated. Prosecutors and police investigators are taking all possible and appropriate measures to document war crimes committed by the Russian military,- the statement said. As reported by ArmyInform, on the night of February 25, 2025 (from 19:00 on February 24), the enemy attacked 213 Shahed-type shock UAVs and simulator drones of various types from the directions: Orel, Bryansk, Kursk, Primorsko-Akhtarsk - Russian Federation.

Title: War criminals are massively involved in the -education- of children at the TOT of Ukraine
Description: This is reported by the Center of National Resistance. Andrii Samoylov, a -deputy- of the fake -LNR- parliament, was appointed to be responsible for this shameful -mentoring-. This Russian posipaka was given the task of organizing the presence of at least two so-called -his- heroes in every educational institution in a short period of time. Their goal is to -instill- love for Russia and Putin in children. This process is not new. Since the beginning of the Russian invasion of Ukraine in 2014, in the temporarily occupied territories, collaborators, mercenaries and war criminals regularly hold -patriotic- lessons, meetings and training with children, promoting the ideas of -Russian world-. The purpose of these actions is to re-educate Ukrainian children into obedient servants of the Kremlin, deprived of their own national identity and critical thinking. As reported by ArmyInform, Russian occupiers continue to use children for their propaganda purposes in the temporarily occupied territories of Ukraine. Another children's military propaganda action was held by the enemy at the TOT of Luhansk region.

Title: -Communication is not only a walkie-talkie-: how the fighters of the Steppe Brigade ensure communica...
Description: The combat work of signalmen was told in a video on the brigade's page. The work of signalmen is not only technical settings, but also physical risk. During one of the combat missions, when the military was deploying equipment, an FPV drone flew nearby. The enemy constantly monitors such groups with the help of thermal imaging cameras, so the signalmen are the first to enter the danger zone and the last to leave it. In Kurshchyna, when the use of Starlink became impossible, the signalmen of the 61st OMBr quickly mastered a new type of communication. They developed a fiber-optic Internet transmission system that allowed units to stay in touch with command. -We spent a lot of time mastering optical communication, because we had not worked with it before. But in the end, everything worked out. -We have a very strong interaction: everyone works according to their capabilities and knowledge, and officers are connected where special expertise is needed,- the fighters say. As reported by ArmyInform, the fighters of the 61st separate mechanized Steppe brigade of the Armed Forces again surprised with their ability to receive Russians -hospitably- occupiers, this time on the territory of the Russian Federation, in the Kursk region.

Title: The Armed Forces of Ukraine received the FPV drone -Vitmak-
Description: The Ministry of Defense of Ukraine reported this on February 25. The high-speed FPV drones of this complex are capable of catching up with any wheeled vehicle of the occupiers. This was reported in the Main Directorate for Life Cycle Support of Weapons and Military Equipment. -The Witcher- is manufactured at a Ukrainian enterprise. The complex was created taking into account the combat experience of our soldiers. Most of the components are of domestic production. With fairly compact dimensions, the -Witcher- is able to carry a charge, the power of which is sufficient for effective damage to armored vehicles and protected firing positions of the enemy. At the same time, the copter develops significant speed and can maneuver sharply. -Birds- of the complex work day and night, detecting and recognizing typical enemy targets. The Ministry of Defense reminds the manufacturers of OVT that useful information regarding the codification procedure of new samples of weapons and military equipment is available. As ArmiyaInform reported, representatives of the Ministry of Defense and the US delegation discussed increasing Ukraine's defense capabilities.

Title: Don't miss your chance: the Edelweiss team released a spectacular video
Description: The conditions for signing such a contract are announced in the video. ArmyInform talked in detail about financial opportunities offered to volunteers, as well as about other incentives offered by the state to Ukrainians aged 18 to 24 for a year of service. As a reminder, -Contrakt 18-24- is a voluntary initiative that allows Ukrainians in the specified age category to join the Defense Forces for one year. The project offers a decent financial reward, professional combat training according to NATO standards and social guarantees that no civilian profession can provide.

Title: The channel of illegal transportation of men to Moldova has been eliminated in Odesa
Description: informs DPSU about this. The organizer of the channel turned out to be a citizen of Ukraine who lives on the territory of Transnistria. Together with his accomplices operating in Odessa and Odesa region, he organized the illegal transportation of men across the border. The cost of such a -service- for those willing to avoid mobilization was from 6 to 10 thousand US dollars. The -package of services- offered by criminals included: Law enforcement officers detained seven people involved in the organization of this criminal business. Currently, they face criminal liability in accordance with the current legislation of Ukraine. ArmyInform reminds that it is better not to break the law or risk your life, but to use the aggregator of vacancies in the Armed Forces and recruiting centers.

Title: -We are not just a crew - we are a family-: the story of brothers who fight together
Description: The story of the fighters was published on the brigade's page. Before the full-scale invasion, the brothers worked in civilian occupations: one was a dental technician, the other had his own business. However, when Ukraine called, they came to the Military Commissariat and got into the tank unit. -Immediately they saw a tanker in me. They approached, they said: will you be our mechanic? I answer: no questions, just let me have another brother with me,- says -Yeroma-. He disproves the common myth that tankers should be short, because modern tanks allow even those taller than 180 cm to work comfortably. Everyone in the crew has a role, and everyone's life depends on harmony. -When you go into battle, all arguments fall away. We become one. If one person panics, it threatens the entire crew,- explains the soldier. The main enemy of tankers is not only enemy vehicles, but also FPV drones and Lancets. They are faster than a 40-ton armored vehicle and are able to hit it in the most vulnerable places. However, Ukrainian tankers are learning to counter new threats: they use radio-electronic warfare systems, quickly camouflage equipment, and sometimes repair damage right in the field. The first battle of -Yeroma- took place in September 2022 in the Golden Niva region of Donetsk region. -We didn't know how to properly drive in, clear the road, bypass crossings. At first, the gunner could not see the target because of a small tree, he had to knock it down with a tank. After a few shots, the fire system failed, but a quick repair allowed us to come back and finish the job,- he recalls. Subsequently, the crew had to restrain the enemy, working almost without rest. During one of the sorties, they destroyed four targets, including a building with twenty occupants. -We worked so clearly that the enemy didn't even want to go back there,- says the fighter. Despite exhausting battles, -Yeroma- does not lose optimism. He dreams of victory and a return to a peaceful life. -I was a dentist, I made prostheses. And now a tank mechanic. After the victory, I would like to return to my work,- he says. But while the war continues, the crew does not leave their combat positions. Their tank is not just an armored vehicle, but an extension of themselves. -We are the machine, and the machine is us,- says -Yeroma,- with the confidence of a warrior who knows his crew will go through fire and iron, but return home alive. As reported by ArmyInform, Gostomel. February 24, 2022. The sky is cut by the roar of Ka-52 attack helicopters. There are six of them, they fly low, covered by the folds of the terrain. Russian airborne troops are preparing to land at the Antonov airfield. But they are already waiting on the ground.

Title: Hide in the cemetery, then die - GUR pilots destroyed enemy infantry and vehicles
Description: The video of the combat operation was released on February 25 by the Main Intelligence Directorate of the Ministry of Defense of Ukraine. In addition to the infantry, a Russian T-72 tank, BMP, D-30 guns, BC warehouse, military transport, communication equipment, as well as personnel of the occupying army were destroyed. -A demonstrative case is the adventures of Muscovites at the cemetery, where they tried to hide among the graves, but were destroyed by the FPV masters of the Kryla unit,- the GUR commented on the video. As reported by ArmyInform, GUR drones arranged for them -warm welcome- on the southern front.

Title: - Stormtroopers can be seen on a white blanket - - enemy infantrymen are hunted like partridges

According to him, the border guards of the -Hart- brigade respond with artillery, rocket launchers, mortars, and attack with drones. They hit enemy positions, places of concentration of personnel, enemy equipment. -There are days when there are more assaults, but there are practically no KABs. On the contrary, it happens that there are no assaults, but aviation is very active. Day to day is not the same. The only thing I will say is that it is a little cold now and they are showing. After all, storming is more difficult in such weather. The groups that are trying to attack are very clearly visible on the white cover,- said the head of the media interaction group of the State Border Service -Hart- brigade. As reported by ArmyInform, in the Kupyan direction, in the area of ​​responsibility of the 116th separate mechanized brigade and tense. The enemy tries to look for weak points in the defense, uses various weapons. These are artillery, FPV drones and bomber drones.

Title: Three Russians went on an assault in the Pokrovsky direction and died on the way

Title: In January, the production of Ukrainian drones increased tenfold compared to last year
Description: Prime Minister Denys Shmyhal announced this on February 25. Ukraine is becoming a world leader in the production of drones. Investments in the Ukrainian defense industry are what strengthen our defense capabilities and strengthen the defense of Europe. -Together with the President of the European Commission Ursula von der Leyen, Deputy Prime Minister Mykhailo Fedorov and representatives of the State Intelligence Service, they inspected our advanced models. Among Ukrainian developments: large attack copters that destroy Russian tanks, warehouses, and equipment. And also reconnaissance drones, which help the military plan missions, and NRK, which can perform the functions of logistics, mining and kamikaze,- wrote Denys Shmyhal. According to him, our priority is the further development of cooperation between the EU and Ukraine in the defense sector. Increasing support for the Ukrainian defense industry through additional funding, direct purchases of defense products, and creation of joint ventures with European defense companies. All this is very important for strengthening Ukrainian production capacities. As reported by ArmyInform, a forum -Ukraine. The year is 2025.-

Title: -Lancet- did not fly — our drones shot down a Russian attack drone
Description: The video of the combat operation was released on February 25 on the brigade's channel. This drone of the Russian Federation was going to the target, which was led by the reconnaissance UAV Zala. Title: Convenient services and access to international markets: the Ministry of Defense told about the stat...
Description: This was notified in the MOU. SE -Digital Army- cooperates with the private sector and international institutions (intergovernmental, state and private) in the field of digital military innovations. -Over the past year, the army has been significantly digitized. But we need to move even faster and look for new opportunities. That is why we created the -Digital Army-, which will help to effectively interact with the private sector in Ukraine and abroad, government agencies around the world, and will also give access to our products to the international market,- said Deputy Minister of Defense of Ukraine for Digitalization Kateryna Chernogorenko. What the creation of a new state-owned enterprise will bring: Director of the -Digital Army- state-owned enterprise Iryna Kvaskova said that it should become a platform that will unite digital products in the field of defense. It is not only about the -Reserve+- and -Army+- applications, but also combat systems and defense innovations. -Digital Army- will become a bridge between the state and the private sector. This will help significantly accelerate the introduction of innovations that can significantly increase the effectiveness of combat units. We plan to attract the best civilian and military specialists to our team. In addition, we see great interest from international partners in unique combat experience and truly innovative digital products in the field of defense. In turn, this means a high potential for Ukraine in general and -Digital Army-, in particular, in the international market of defense technologies,- Iryna Kvaskova emphasized.

Title: In Odesa, an agent was detained who was preparing caches for terrorist attacks
Description: reported this on February 25 Security Service of Ukraine According to the case file, the suspect is a 32-year-old Odesa woman who was remotely recruited by a staff member of the special operations forces of the Russian military at the end of last year. It was established that on his instructions, the traitor set fire to the relay cabinet of the signal installation and the transformer substation on the local railway line. Then the agent received a new task — to arrange a cache with components for an improvised explosive device (IED) near the port. For this purpose, the woman traveled to Dnipro, where, following the coordinates of her Russian curator, she took an explosive element disguised as a pack of cigarettes from the hiding place. After returning to Odesa, the traitor tried to put the components for SVP in a previously prepared hiding place near the port infrastructure. At this stage, SBU counter-intelligence agents caught the agent red-handed and seized part of an explosive device from her. It was also established that the next component of the stash was firearms, which the defendant had to take from another front-line city. During the searches, a mobile phone with evidence of communication with a Russian game was seized from the detainee. So far, the SBU investigators have informed her about the suspicion for h. 2 Art. 111 of the Criminal Code of Ukraine (treason committed under martial law). Questions regarding the additional qualification of the perpetrator's actions under part. 2 Art. 113 of the Criminal Code of Ukraine (sabotage committed under martial law). The perpetrator is in custody. She faces life imprisonment with confiscation of property. As reported by ArmyInform, a deputy from Odesa who led a Russian convoy in Kyiv Oblast was informed of suspicion.

Title: They wave their hands, climb into holes, dance - the Russians are trying to surprise our drones
Description: The video was published on February 25 on the brigade's channel. The occupiers were caught during their movement to our positions. -Someone was buried under the rubble, someone, on the contrary, did not have time to hide, and especially gifted people gathered around the wounded to die simultaneously together,- the brigade commented on the video. As reported by ArmyInform, fighters of the 63 brigade destroyed Russian road-paving machine BAT-2.

Title: Are believers allowed to fight, or myths in which Ukrainian Christians can still believe
Description: You must have often heard -Believers cannot fight-, -War is a punishment from God-? So we offer to find out if the Bible really interprets everything that way. Isn't the most widespread myth the one that claims that Christians should not fight. So, maybe it's worth looking at the biblical texts? What do they tell us there? And it turns out that the Bible does not forbid fighting for justice: -Book of the prophet Isaiah 1 17 Learn to do good; seek the truth, defend the oppressed, defend the orphan, intercede for the widow!- -Exodus 22 1 -When a thief is caught breaking in, and beaten so that he dies, there is no crime of blood.- Next myth: pray for peace, not victory. Well, let's see how the Bible actually interprets this thesis. If you read carefully, you can make sure that peace is not the absence of war, but the result of the victory of truth: -PSALM 2 Prophecy about the Kingdom of the Son of God 8 Ask of Me, and I will give Your people are Your inheritance, Your possession is to the end of the earth! 9 You will kill them with an iron rod, you will crush them like a potter's vessel. 10 And now - be wise, kings, learn, you judges of the earth: 11 Serve the Lord with fear, and rejoice with trembling! 12 Respect the Son, so that He does not become angry, and so that you do not perish on the way, [3] because His anger will soon be kindled. Blessed are all who trust in Him!-. Another no less widespread myth is that, they say, the war – it is God's punishment for our sins. So we read the Bible again: what is written about it there. And they write that everyone who does good will always have enemies: -The First Council Message of St. of the apostle Peter, chapter 4 ⁴ They are therefore surprised that you do not partake of the debauchery with them, and they despise it. The next myth: if you believe in God, you will not be affected by war. If you take the Bible in your hands, you can learn that God tests our faith precisely through the war: -The Cathedral Message of St. Apostle James 2 Have full joy, my brothers, when you fall into all kinds of trials. So, as you can see, everyone who denies Ukraine's right to defend itself is working – consciously or unconsciously – in the interests of the enemy. Therefore, it is advisable to always treat with caution any information that aims to stop us on the way to resisting the aggressor.

Title: -Bombers take off immediately- - in the Kupyan region, the Russians do not risk showing off their eq...
Description: Andriy Rubtsov, head of the communications department of the 116th separate mechanized brigade, told about this on the air of -Suspilne Novosti- . According to him, the brigade controls the defined boundaries. If a few months ago there were powerful -rollings- of tanks and various armored vehicles, now the situation has changed. For the most part, assaults take place without the involvement of -armor-. -One of the factors that can potentially influence the fact that the enemy uses armored vehicles less is the efficiency of our units. As soon as they see enemy activity, for example, a column of enemy vehicles advancing, our bombers, FPV pilots, immediately begin to take off. And they destroy it,- said the head of the communications department of the 116th separate mechanized brigade. As reported ArmyInform, operators of the 429th regiment of unmanned systems -Achilles- together with soldiers of the 1st operational brigade -Storm- of the National Guard and paratroopers of the 77th Airborne Brigade repelled the attack on the approaches.

Title: The exhibition project -Lutyy: the edges of indomitability- is being exhibited in the capital
Description: It was in February that key events in Ukraine's recent history took place: the victory of the Revolution of Dignity and the Russian invasion of Ukraine in February 2014, and then the beginning of Russia's large-scale aggression against our country in February 2022. The exposition of the exhibition project details the chronology of events that developed around the heart of Ukraine - Kyiv. The end of February 2022 marked the beginning of a large-scale Russian invasion of Ukraine. Kyiv, the heart of the Revolution of Dignity, became an outpost of powerful resistance to the occupiers. The battle for Kyiv turned Moscow's ambitious plans to capture Kyiv in three days into a defeat for the Russians and completely shattered the illusions of the -second army of the world- and prevented them from carrying out their next blitzkrieg, which they managed to implement in the past in Budapest (1956), Prague (1968) and Kabul (1979). Emphasizing these historical parallels, the exhibition reveals the current stage of the formation of the Ukrainian nation, the process of hardening its character in the victorious struggle against the background of the fateful trials of the Ukrainian people. The Center for Researching the Military History of the Armed Forces of Ukraine, the National Memorial Complex of the Heroes of the Heavenly Hundred - the Museum of the Revolution of Dignity, and the Ukrainian Institute of National Remembrance joined the implementation of the exhibition project -Fierce: Faces of Invincibility-.

Title: The occupiers are shot with RAK ​​— the border guards foiled the enemy assault with rockets
Description: Video of combat work released on February 25 by the State Border Service. For the strike, the fighters used the RAK-SA-12 rocket salvo system of Croatian production. The system worked against the enemy directly from the capon, where it was hidden from the blows of enemy kamikaze drones. As reported by ArmyInform, Ukrainian border guards destroyed the enemy tank with the first shot.

Title: Russian medicines were traded in Ukraine - a criminal group was exposed
Description: This was announced on February 25 by the Prosecutor General's Office. According to the investigation, two foreign citizens, with the participation of two pharmacists, established the activities of pharmacies that specialized in the sale of unregistered medicinal products in Ukraine, in particular those manufactured in the Russian Federation. Also, expensive oncological drugs with signs of falsification were illegally sold there, endangering the lives and health of citizens. Medicines, in particular antibiotics, anti-inflammatory drugs, immunomodulators and stimulants of mental activity, arrived from the territory of the aggressor state to Moldova by regular buses. After that, the suspects personally or with the help of drivers transported them to Ukraine, avoiding customs control. According to preliminary estimates, as a result of such activities from the Russian Federation, more than 1.5 million UAH were transferred to the current accounts of the network of Russian pharmacies, part of which was later paid in the form of taxes and fees to the federal budget of the Russian Federation. During the authorized searches in the network of pharmacies, as well as at the places of residence of the suspects, more than 100 names of foreign drugs were seized, including more than 30 - manufactured in the Russian Federation, mobile phones and computer equipment with evidence of illegal activity. The State Service of Medicines and Narcotics Control of Ukraine was informed of the facts of the detected illegal activity, as a result of which the controlling body made a decision to cancel the license of the -entrepreneurs- to carry out business activities in the retail and wholesale trade of medicinal products. The suspects are charged with economic activity in cooperation with the aggressor state, committed as part of an organized group (part 3 of article 28, part 4 of article 111-1 of the Criminal Code of Ukraine). At present, the issue of selecting preventive measures for them is being resolved. As reported by ArmyInform, the director of an online casino, whose owners are citizens of the Russian Federation, was detained.

Title: Frontal Attacks of High-rise Buildings - In the Ravine of Time, there is a fierce war in the ruins
Description: Andriy Polukhin, a representative of the press service of the 24th separate mechanized brigade named after King Danylo, told about this on the air of the Espresso TV channel. According to him, these are generally infantry assaults, but sometimes the enemy tries to use mechanized equipment. The invaders are advancing from the north, but their speed is slow. -These are urban battles. The enemy is trying to hide in high-rise buildings. It is trying to infiltrate the central part of the city. Thus, it settles precisely in these ruins, houses. The guys start working there as soon as they see signs of the presence of the enemy in them,- said a representative of the press service of the 24th separate mechanized brigade named after King Danylo. According to the information of the General Staff of the Ukrainian Armed Forces, in the Kramatorsk direction last day, the occupiers attacked twice in the Chasovoy Yar and Stupochky areas. As reported ArmyInform, operators of the 429th regiment of unmanned systems -Achilles- together with soldiers of the 1st operational brigade -Storm- of the National Guard and paratroopers of the 77th Airborne Brigade repelled the attack on the approaches.

Title: The defense forces hit the Russian air defense system -Buk-M3-

Title: They warm themselves with fire at the enemy - how our artillerymen work in the cold
Description: Photos of gunners were published on February 25 on the brigade's channel. -One of the coldest days this year. Due to the extreme temperature, some mechanisms of combat vehicles refuse to work. The steel character of the gunners of the Mykolaiv marines does not fail,- the brigade said in a statement. As reported by ArmyInform, the fighters of the 36th marine infantry brigade named after Rear Admiral Mykhailo Bilinsky recorded low morale Russians after our drone attacks.

Title: More than 500 shelling per day in Zaporizhzhia: the consequences of enemy strikes

Title: In the Kupyan region, our fighters destroyed a column of enemy armored vehicles

As reported by ArmyInform, in the Kupyan region of the Armed Forces of Ukraine repelled the enemy assault and destroyed 4 BMPs.

Title: A moment of silence in Ukraine
Description: -In order to honor the bright memory, civic courage and self-sacrifice, strength of spirit, resilience and heroic deed of the soldiers who fell during the execution of combat missions to protect the state sovereignty and territorial integrity of Ukraine, civilians who died as a result of the armed aggression of the Russian Federation against Ukraine, I decree: to start holding a national minute of silence every day at 9:00 a.m. for compatriots who died as a result of the armed aggression of the Russian Federation against Ukraine, which should be announced in all mass media, regardless of the form of ownership,- the document says.

Title: -Contract 18-24-: in the 38th brigade of marines, they talked about the training of recruits and the...
Description: Deputy commander of the 38th separate brigade of marines, Dmytro Pulinets, told about this on the air of the telethon -Edyny Novy-. -At the moment, a lot of applications have been received, they are currently being processed. The positions are exclusively combat, such as gunner, grenade launcher, sniper, orderly,- said Dmytro Pulinets. After the selection process for the chosen post, the stages of training begin, but not for candidates, but for servicemen, said the chief sergeant of the 38th OBrMP Artur Kondryuk. Recruits are sent to training centers of the Navy of the Armed Forces of Ukraine, where training takes place in three stages. The first is basic military training for 45 days. The second stage is 14 days of professional training. It can be more depending on the position. The third stage is 14 days of adaptation in the brigade, recruits spend this time closer to the front line and then begin to perform tasks. Acting the chief of staff of the battalion of the 38th brigade with the call sign -Borziy- emphasized that there are now many myths about this contract in social networks. -Some call it hidden mobilization. No, it's not like that. This is a clear term of service. There is a myth that the contract is signed for life. It is also not true. After the service, a person can study at the expense of the state, the state fulfills all financial obligations,- he said. Acting the chief of staff of the battalion is convinced that after the first contract, many will show a desire to continue military service. -Because they will see the service, how everything works, what the provision is. Who doesn't want to - there are advantages in the form of a mortgage, financial security and, most importantly, a clear service life,- Borziy said. In the brigade, all instructors were previously in combat positions and have combat experience. -No one immediately sends people to the front line. In any case, there is adaptation, training. We pay attention to each fighter regardless of his position. If a person is not ready, it means that you need to work with him more. During adaptation, we already work directly with each soldier, depending on the specifics of his position,- added Acting Officer. chief of staff of the 38th OBrMP battalion. ArmyInform talked in detail about financial opportunities offered to volunteers, as well as about other incentives offered by the state to Ukrainians aged 18 to 24 for a year of service. As a reminder, -Contrakt 18-24- is a voluntary initiative that allows Ukrainians in the specified age category to join the Defense Forces for one year. The project offers a decent financial reward, professional combat training according to NATO standards and social guarantees that no civilian profession can provide.

Title: Optical fiber against -Vampires- - the Russians are trying to defeat our bombers
Description: Lieutenant Yuliya Stepaniuk, head of the communications department of the 117th heavy mechanized brigade, told on the Army TV stream about this. -The occupiers are trying to displace our -Vampires- with fiber-optic drones. We are destroying their Zala, Orlans and Supercam with our -Efpivishkas-, and they are destroying our bombers,- Yulia Stepaniuk said. According to her, the enemy also actively uses ammunition discharges with various gases to smoke out our fighters from their positions. -They make discharges, use various gases, which throw e dugouts and trenches, where they are most effective. These gases cause nausea, sometimes tearfulness,- said Yuliya Stepaniuk. As reported by ArmiyaInform, the armored column of the Russians was -unwound-: scouts discovered the advance of the enemy for 30 kilometers.

Title: Over the past 24 hours, there have been almost a hundred skirmishes at the front - the General Staff...
Description: Operational information as of 08:00 on February 25 was made public by the General Staff of the Armed Forces. The aggressor carried out airstrikes, in particular in the areas of Galaganivka settlements of Chernihiv region; Gulyaipole, Kamianske, Zaporizhzhia region. Over the past day, missile troops and artillery of the Defense Forces inflicted damage on three areas of concentration of personnel, weapons and military equipment, a command post and the enemy Buk-M3 anti-aircraft missile complex. In the Kharkiv direction, the enemy twice tried to break through the defensive lines of our defenders near Vovchansk. 11 attacks by invaders took place in the Kupyansk direction yesterday. Our defenders repelled enemy assaults near Petropavlivka, Zagryzovy and Nova Kruglyakivka. In the Lyman direction, the enemy attacked six times. He tried to penetrate our defense near the settlements of Zelena Dolyna, Borivska Andriivka, Novolyubivka, Dibrova and Katerynivka. In the Kramatorsk direction, the occupiers attacked twice in the Chasovoy Yar and Stupochky areas. In the Toretsk direction, the enemy carried out 11 attacks in the Toretsk and Krymsky regions. In the Pokrovsky direction, our defenders stopped 28 assault actions of the aggressor towards the settlements of Vodyane Druge, Promin, Pokrovsk, Leontovichi, Kotlyna, Udachne, Molodetske, Nadiivka, Troitske, Andriivka, Tarasivka and Ulakly. In the direction of Novopavlivsk, the enemy launched 13 attacks in the direction of Konstantinopol and Burlatsky during the past day. In the direction of Gulyaipil, our defenders repelled one attack near Novopol. In the Orihiv direction, the occupying forces stormed the positions of the Defense Forces three times in the areas of Maly Shcherbaki and Kamianskyi. The defense forces are making efforts to prevent the enemy from advancing deep into the Ukrainian territory and have successfully repelled two offensive actions of the enemy in the Dnieper direction, towards the settlement of Sadove. The enemy did not conduct active operations in the Siversk direction last day. No signs of the formation of enemy offensive groups were detected in the Volyn and Poliske directions. Defense forces of Ukraine continue the operation in the Kursk region. Last day, the enemy carried out 34 airstrikes, dropping 43 anti-aircraft missiles, and fired 375 shots, 17 of them from anti-aircraft guns. Ukrainian defenders repelled 11 assaults by invaders. -Our soldiers inflict significant losses in manpower and equipment on the occupying forces and actively undermine the offensive potential of the enemy in the rear. Join the Defense Forces! Together we will win! -Glory to Ukraine!- - said in a message from the General Staff of the Armed Forces of Ukraine. As reported by ArmyInform, over the past day, the Russian army lost 1,300 personnel, 26 artillery systems and 2 air defense systems.

Title: - Aviation is not only pilots, but also thousands of engineers - Rustem Umyerov
Description: The Ministry of Defense of Ukraine informed about this on February 25. -Aviation is not only pilots, but also thousands of engineers who work every day to keep our planes and helicopters ready for combat. It is the aviation engineers who guarantee the technical serviceability of the machines, the safety of the crews, and the successful execution of combat missions. These specialists perform extremely complex and responsible work — from aircraft maintenance to the integration of modern weapons and improvement of aviation systems. Thanks to their skill and dedication, Ukrainian aviation defends our skies and destroys the enemy every day. Thanks to everyone who keeps Ukrainian wings strong! Glory to Ukraine!- wrote Rustem Umyerov. As reported by ArmiyaInform, the Ministers of Defense of Ukraine and Denmark, Rustem Umyerov and Troels Lund Poulsen, together with the Minister of Strategic Industries, Herman Smetanin, signed an important a document that opens new horizons for the defense industry of Ukraine.

Title: The enemy attacked Sumy with attack UAVs, two people were injured
Description: This was reported by the Sumy Regional Administration. As a result of the fall of one of the Russian drones with subsequent detonation, two people were previously injured. Window glazing in two apartment buildings was damaged. Also today, the enemy carried out an airstrike using a Shahed UAV on the Khotyn community. The State Emergency Service of Ukraine reported that 148 windows were blown out by the blast wave in three high-rise buildings and other buildings. Rescuers examined the area and provided assistance to the injured. As ArmyInform reported, as a result of the Russian attack in Obukhiv district of Kyiv region damage was recorded to two private houses, an outbuilding, a garage and a car.

Title: In the Kyiv region, due to the Russian attack, houses were damaged, there was a victim
Description: This was reported by the National Police of Ukraine. Two residential buildings in Fastiv region were also damaged. As a result of the attack, a 44-year-old local woman was injured and hospitalized. Patrol police response teams, an investigative-operational team and police bomb squads are at the scene and continue to document the aftermath of the shooting. According to the facts of war crimes, investigators will initiate criminal proceedings under Art. 438 of the Criminal Code of Ukraine.

Title: They fought for donkeys - in the Pokrovsky direction, the Russians threw unusual cavalry into battle
Description: Lieutenant Yuliya Stepaniuk, head of the communications department of the 117th heavy mechanized brigade, told on the ArmiyaTV stream about this. -The so-called -loaves- are used to transport infantry. We also have ATVs and buggies. And from the last cases, the Russians stole a donkey somewhere and used it to get to the position,- said Yuliya Stepaniuk. According to her, after the enemy suffered heavy losses in equipment during mechanized assaults in the first half of the month, he now uses only infantry for attacks. -From the department to the platoon, it happens cyclically every day. There are a lot of enemy infantry,- Yuliya Stepaniuk said. As reported by ArmyInform, they -unwound- the armored column of the Russians: scouts discovered the advance of the enemy for 30 kilometers.

Title: In the Novopavlovsk direction, the enemy attacked 13 times - the General Staff of the Armed Forces o...
Description: Operational information as of 22.00 on February 24 was made public by the General Staff of the Armed Forces of Ukraine. Ukrainian defenders continue to resolutely repulse the enemy's attempts to advance deep into our territory. In the Kharkiv direction, our defenders repelled one enemy assault in the Vovchansk region, another battle is still ongoing. In the Kupyansk direction, the enemy stormed the positions of our defenders in the Petropavlivka and Zagryzovo districts 11 times. Ukrainian defenders repelled eight attacks, three clashes are still ongoing. Since the beginning of the day, Russian invaders have attacked Ukrainian positions near the settlements of Zelena Dolyna, Borivska Andriivka, Novolyubivka, Dibrova and Katerynivka six times in the Lymansky direction. In the Kramatorsk direction, one battle was recorded near Stupochy. In the Toretsk direction, the Russians attacked the positions of the defense forces ten times. The enemy is suffering significant losses - today 137 occupiers were neutralized in this direction, 84 of them - irreversibly. 18 vehicles, two motorcycles, two UAV antennas, a communication antenna and a UAV control post were also destroyed, besides, a mortar and two vehicles of the invaders were significantly damaged.
